summary: Kill a variety of enemies with your pistol or swing your bat. Collect letters while you trying to find your sister in dark atmospheric action top-down shooter 2D game.

name: Shinrei Gakkou kara no Dasshutsu
summary:
In search of clues about their missing friend, four high school girls set foot in an old school building rumored to be haunted. What you will experience there is more terrifying than fear or despair...

A mystery-solving game that adds a horror story to the traditional escape game.

name: Shark Riders
summary: Shark Riders is a pixel-pulp(fast paced visual novels featuring rich pixelart) made by LCB Game Studio in 14 days.

name: Shadow Seeker
summary:
Amorita Town, a sleepy location filled with peaceful residents and gloomy scenery.

You are Carlos Ramirez, a seasoned Detective who has experience in many different kinds of cases and investigations. On a fated day, you come face to face with a case you have never witnessed before. A very mysterious and tragic murder of a family that lived in the outskirts of the town. Something about it is not right, it makes you feel extremely uneasy, and almost, unsure.

As your mission deepens, the mystery appears to be shrouded in an evil like never before. What awaits you will tear you down and shake you to your core, an ancient darkness arises from the shadows. Enter the Shadow Seeker.

name: She Turned Me Into a Newt!
summary: You've been turned into a newt by a necromantress! Your task is to find the way to turn back.

name: Shadow Dreams: The Last Thought of Hope
summary: Explore a world of psychological issues as the embodiment of the last thought of hope to enter a suicidal mind, a fast magic based first person shooter with a strong emphasis on dealing with emotional trauma.

name: Shooty 2D
summary: Shooty 2D is a gun battle game. You can set up a room and fight with your friends.

name: Shiro no Noroi
summary: Mashiro is a simple girl with typical father occupied by his work, so it ends up living in her grandmother’s house. After months of living with her ​​grandmother, Shiro (Mashiro) contacts her father asking him to visit so you can both enjoy the festival to be in place. However, the day of the festival, while waiting for her father Shiro, they begin to appear spirits. Being attacked by such spirits Shiro is saved by Hachi, who tells her that these spirits are actually “Curses” and that some of these souls stole his 7 souls. If not recovered quickly, she will die.

name: Shuutai Headless
summary: Erina is a girl who appears in a mysterious place that seems to be an old prison. When she explores the place, she encounters the mysterious character known as the Red Witch, she warns her that place is full of evilness and prisoners who seek for revenge. Erina must find the way to escape from that place without being caught by the prisoners.

name: Sharecare You
summary: Sharecare You is an immersive, photorealistic simulation of the human body, enabling anyone to explore its astonishing details in 360 degrees. Travel inside systems and organs, dissect them, visualize their natural and disease states, and even personalize the human body to be a virtual YOU!

name: Shoebill
summary: Shoebill is a platformer that plunges you into a world called The Void and tells the story of Shiro.

name: Shodo
summary: Be the master of your martial art. Enter the universe of psychic command of Chaos Magic, where your in-game strength relies solely on your strength within. Combine creativity and strategy to engineer the perfect combat art, and command your style to victory in a VR experience unlike any other.

name: Shattered Runes
summary: Shattered Runes is a fast-FPS in which you fight your enemies with magic. Choose from 186 unique spells to shape your own playstyle and defeat your opponents.

name: Shatris: Infinite Puzzles
summary: Insert mysterious runes back into their sockets! Identify correct shape combinations and solve hundreds of puzzles in this world of pure relaxation!

name: Ship Shifters
summary: ShipShifters is a chaotic online co-op multiplayer Battle Royal game. Up to 75 players on 25 ships are fighting for victory at sea! Your crew, consisting of you and one or two of your best mateys, is confronted by a wave of dangers. Use your ship's stations wisely to be the last crew standing!

name: Shape of Stars
summary:
This is a story of stars and constellations for you and me.

In the world where all the constellations are lost, you need to collect stars to bring back the constellations in the night sky.

name: Shuuen ~Another World~
summary: Shuuen ~Another World~ is a short Shuuen no Shiori fangame where you play as C-ta and need to find a way to get out of your school alive.

name: Shiro no Shinju
summary:
Prequel to Ido no Akai.
Echo is a 13 years old girl who lives completely alone in an abandoned house, without any friends but the forest animals. People say she's a witch, but is that only a rumor? Or is there a true witch hiding our there?

name: Shashingo: Learn Japanese With Photography
summary: An edutainment game that teaches you Japanese through virtual photography. With your trusty camera, take photographs of the fictional streets of Japan to capture new words and images as fully translated flash cards!

name: Shokujinki
summary: A man-eating monster wakes up, in a snowy night. He meets a mysterious girl willing to die. This omnibus novel game tells the story of the strange interaction between them.

name: Sheltered 2
summary: A brutal survival management simulator set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland. Keep your faction of survivors alive, maintain your shelter and scavenge the ravaged world for resources. Befriend and trade with the factions you meet or conquer them by force.

name: Sheepy: A Short Adventure
summary: Sheepy: A Short Adventure is a short handcrafted pixel art platformer that follows Sheepy, an abandoned plushy brought to life.

name: Shipwreck Escape
summary: Shipwreck Escape is a 2,5D immersive game with puzzle elements. The catastrophe happened when the cruise ship was sailing from Athens to Dubai. The main character is a croupier in a ship's casino and he got stuck in this sinking hell.

name: Shakespeare? More like Thirstspeare, amirite?
summary: A human dating sim about writing a furry dating sim.

name: Shoujo Shuryou no Suiri Ryouiki: Kogane Shima no Mitsuyaku
summary:
On an island ruled by the mafia, a young girl's quest starts...

This story takes place in 2002 on a group of islands named Gueml in the Atlantic Ocean. Our main character has decided to find out the truth behind the previous mafia boss' - her father's - murder. The islands of Gueml are divided into four parts which are all dominated by the mafia, so in order to get any leads, she needs to talk to the boss of each and every area and make deals. In order to find out the truth, and maybe even find out more about the islands where she lives, the main character has to go through various sacrifices and has to make deals of all kinds. However, the ending is completely dependent on whatever choice you make.

name: Shuttle Commander
summary: Take command of the Space Shuttle as it embarks on various missions to the Hubble Space Telescope. Fly the shuttle in a full landing simulation based on real physics and flight dynamics.

name: Shanye
summary: Shanye is an indie platformer by the developer Mittens0407 about a yellow cube on an adventure through dangerous worlds. The cube, Shanye, has to travel and collect coins to reach the portals at the end of each level, and complete the game in the fastest time possible.

name: Shooty and the Catfish: Fully Reloaded
summary:
Weird things are going on and it's up to our two hero Monster Hunters, Shooty and Zaat, to solve these unsolvable mysteries, only they aren't really heroes and they don't ever really solve anything...

Join them on a wild adventure inspired by some of the many games that were inspired by Earthbound.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Steelbook Launch Edition
summary:
The Steelbook Launch Edition includes:
- Game
- Steelbook

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Fall of Man Premium Edition
summary:
The Fall of Man Premium Edition includes:
- The game
- Steelbook
- 2 CD Soundtrack
- Demon Handbook
- Sling bag
- Collector's box

name: Shopping Mahjong connect
summary: Shopping Mahjong connect is a tile-matching puzzle game. Simply connect pairs adjacent to each other and on the outer edge of the board!

name: Showa Candy Shop
summary:
Memories with Grandma at the Candy Shop will come back!
Follow the story with letters as you run a Candy Shop by tapping.

Fill up your collection catalog with vintage Japanese sweets and toys! …and customers!!
“Model planes”, “soda mocha”, “whistle candy”, and more!!
Each one will bring back nostalgic Japanese memories.

name: Sherwood Classic
summary: Sherwood(now Sherwood Classic) was an old MMO by Maid Marian. In it users can fight against two mobs being Evil Minions and Giant Spiders. They may also fight amongst each other in PVP. New items were obtained via chests throughout the island which contained a single fortress.

name: ShrineSpark
summary:
Somewhere in the deepest reaches of space...

An execution is to be carried out...

Play as Orange, a perfect simulacrum of the Orange Experience. Be freed from prison by a strange hero.

name: Shutter Heist
summary: Shutter Heist is an 8-bit Crime Adventure, with a focus on quick moving, quick thinking, and legally debatable puzzles!

name: Shadowrun Trilogy
summary: Complete your tactical RPG Shadowrun collection from developer Harebrained Schemes with this definitive bundle which contains: Shadowrun Returns + Deluxe upgrade (includes Anthology pdf + Official Soundtrack), Shadowrun: Dragonfall - Director's Cut, and Shadowrun: Hong Kong + Deluxe upgrade (includes Art Book pdf + Official Soundtrack).

name: Shaped Touches
summary: 'Shaped Touches' is a simulation game of our future public spaces. Every 60 seconds, the game restarts in the same spaces with new sensory perceptions, experiencing the same place in new ways. This game was installed as part of the 17th International Architecture Exhibition - La Biennale di Venezia.

name: Shoganai
summary: This is simple action hentai game but if you want to win you must try more times. If you want to relax you have to pay the price but this price is time and experience. Don't never forget, the simple glory is not glory.

name: Shenmue III: Deluxe Edition
summary: The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full game, DLC Pass (the complete post-launch DLC content and the “Burning Sandstorm” Advanced Technique Scroll) and Ryo's legendary Flight Jacket.

name: Shoot Your Friends
summary: Shoot Your Friends is not just a command, but is also a fast-paced couch shooter for 2-4 pals. It's never been easier to blast your buddies with a handful of staple guns and exotic game modes. Also, you're a tank.

name: Shortest Trip to Earth: The Old Enemies
summary: The second DLC for Shortest Trip to Earth adds over 20 new enemy ships across 3 major new factions to the original game. Explore 10 additional planets with their own unique game-changing events and take command of a new playable ship - The Exception.

name: Shisen-shou: Match-Mania
summary: A handheld adaptation of the 1989 Tamtex arcade mahjong solitaire eroge Shisen-shou, removing all eroge elements while adding a new series of pre-made puzzles ("Challenge Mode").

name: Shenmue III: Big Merry Cruise
summary: Various types of entertainment can be enjoyed aboard the ship, as well as challenge missions which can only be played here. Also, new outfits for Ryo can be obtained by clearing mini-quests encountered onboard.

name: Shenmue III: Story Quest Pack
summary: One day, Ryo encounters Zhang Shuqin - a subordinate of Zhu Yuanda, who had helped Ryo out in the past. Just as Ryo thinks that he's renewed an old friendship, he learns that Zhang has been kidnapped. But by whom - and why?

name: Shadows: Awakening - Necrophage's Curse
summary: Gear up, pull yourself together and set off to confront the Necrophage – the Eater of the Dead – before it’s too late.

name: Shadows: Awakening - The Chromaton Chronicles
summary: Shadows: Awakening – The Chromaton Chronicles leads you to the northern edge of Thole. There lies the mysterious Arcanum Laboratory – a long since abandoned place known for its ruthless and immoral magical experiments.

name: Sherman Commander
summary: Command a platoon of Sherman tanks over the most famous theatres of WW2. Take the commander’s seat and give specific orders to your crew, or open the tactical map to coordinate your actions with accompanying units.

name: Shattered Worlds
summary: Follow Prometheus, his trusty wardog pet Snap, his new pirate friend Calenda and the honorable spirit knight Karul in a grand and full of exploration adventure! Defeat monsters, find secret rooms, complete quests, earn items and loot, fight with fierce bosses and learn about the mythos of Astus!

name: Shleepy Time Catching Z's
summary: Can't sleep and you can't imagine sheep? Catch the sheep with the bed and bounce them succesfully to the other side, faster and faster, while avoiding or defeating enemies sent by the Sandman.

name: Shape VS Shapes
summary: Shape VS Shapes is a fast-paced arcade game. Blast your way through 50+timed levels or go for a high score in Endless Mode!

name: Shadow Lost
summary: What dark and twisted things are happening in the strange town?

name: Shattering Obsidian
summary: An RPG inspired by the classics, and based upon a series of published stories. A deep, character-driven adventure, in a Fantasy-Steampunk world of betrayal and intrigue.

name: Shank the Cop
summary: A multiplayer mind game. Cops have to decide who is a threat and who is not. Decide who is your opponent and shoot them down, or play as the criminal and shank the cop!

name: She Doesn't Walk
summary: She's following you, but your fear keeps you from looking back. You must focus on the path ahead to escape the forest in this Survival-Horror, or risk exploring to find closure.

name: Shields of Loyalty
summary: Experience tactically challenging turn-based strategy in the hostile island world of Mantaria. Command a dynamic army of various unit types and classes to slay a dark and possessed undead army. Train forces into powerful warriors and fight fervently until the snake's head is at your feet!

name: Shutterbug Stud
summary: Welcome to Morlock Lake! The Demanding Mayor May has invited you, Doug ‘Shutterbug’, here to take pictures of local girls for a Calendar, but from Shy Waitresses to Daring Heiresses, a camera roll full of Tricky Tasks await!

name: Shot of Rhythm
summary: Shot of Rhythm is the arcade music shooter in VR. Use your music library to generate your levels and fight waves of enemies.

name: Shores of Plunder
summary: Avast ye! Welcome aboard to the ultimate pirate adventure in SHORES OF PLUNDER! Battle friends, outlast hordes of enemies, and amass the greatest fortune in the seven seas. Race against time on a dangerous island filled with treasure, then unwind in a secret pirate cove full of shenanigans.

name: Shoresy: Legends of the North
summary: Shoresy: Legends of the North brings the hit TV comedy series Shoresy (Hulu, Crave, Netflix, SBS) to life with a modern take on classic hockey video games. Enjoy fast-paced Sudbury Blueberry Bulldog hockey gameplay with hits, goals, fights, chirps and more.

name: ShootRun
summary: ShootRun is a classic first-person shooter with dynamic fights , arena looking area , different and interesting enemies and hard situations. You dont have to wait for movies or read very carefully NPS stories, just GO and KILL THEM ALL !!!

name: Sheep Love
summary: Little game of living with cute sheep "MeiMei"

name: Shoot. Push. Repeat.
summary:
This fun and dynamic clicker puzzle game will not leave anyone indifferent! You have to deliver the blue ball to the desired point using only the laws of physics!
The game is a worthy successor to the Oik series, taking only the best from it.
A huge number of various puzzles will not leave anyone indifferent!

name: Shopping Empire Tycoon
summary: This Game is Basically a Market Management Simulator. Make Your Store Get The Best Profit With Various Upgrades and Unlocks. Including Basic Clicking stuff, Managing Your Own Market , Upgrading and A game with the theme of reaching to going to next level.

name: ShapeNeon Chaos
summary: ShapeNeon Chaos is an old school style space-shooter. You are a ship facing off waves of deadly enemies. This game was made to give you a shot of adrenaline in a couple of minutes. Lots of bullets and neon in an arcade psychedelic shooter!

name: Shoo, Box!
summary: Shoo, Box! is a silly sneaker adventure, where you play as a shoe box who comes to life with a pair of human legs. Use the shoes you collect to solve exciting stealth puzzles, explore the world in search of your owner, and ruin a bunch of peoples' days!

name: Ship of Theseus
summary: Ship of Theseus is an intense Sci-Fi shooter with an in-depth story. An atmospheric single-player campaign is accompanied by a fully featured co-op multiplayer, where cooperation is as important as your own skills.

name: Shu's Misfortune
summary: Shu's Misfortune is a sample RPG made in RPG Maker MZ. As Shu, end your father's haute couture legacy by unraveling his empire of fashion.

name: Shokuo Shoujo
summary: Huntress Yuki and her brother Yuu depend on each other, living in a remote village.

name: Shadows Behind the Throne 2
summary: An apocalyptic grand strategy game, in which you take the role of the forces of darkness, trying to bring an end to a fantasy world. Complete with complex internal politics by NPC factions and wide ranges of strategies and types of doom to choose between.

name: Shadownest
summary: Asymmetric multiplayer meets atmospheric horror

name: Shutter 2
summary: Shutter 2 is a classic 3D survival horror game that combines combat, exploration, puzzles and photography. Choose between classic static CC cams or switch to the over-the-shoulder cam to navigate your surroundings and upgrade your RC to defend yourself against the ghosts of Kent Island.

name: Shiba Mekuri
summary: January 23, 2021. A small family member has joined our family. A two-month-old Shiba Inu puppy. We named her Hina. This is a puzzle game with lots of cute daily videos of Shiba Inu Hina.

name: Sheep Cutter
summary: Cute clicker game with super simple controls which will make you forget about everyday stress. This game will take you on a farm where the only goal is to cut as much wool as you can, you will want to play this game all night long.

name: Shieldwall Chronicles: Realm of Madness
summary: Gather your party and venture into a corrupted land ruled by demons and dark magic. Explore freely in an open world and decide your fate in tactical, turn-based combat. Forge legendary heroes in the furnace of battle and make decisions that will have lasting ramifications for your campaign.

name: Shattered Minds: Encore
summary: As a detective with a knack for strange cases, your Chief has assigned you to a new investigation. After a series of famous monuments vanish into thin air, you are sent to Paris to investigate a possible link between the disappearances and a calling card discovered at the scene. Play through challenging hidden object scenes and perplexing puzzles as you unravel this thrilling mystery. Can you solve the case before anything else disappears?

name: Shout Seven
summary:
Set in Ye Olde England, with stunning visuals and simple gameplay, this is an all new, addictive, medieval romp that takes alignment challenges to the next level, with a brand new way to move.

-You can start anywhere on the board
-You can only go where your opponents let you
-You can push your opponents off the board

For two, three, and even four players, Shout Seven is a whole new take on the classic struggle of wits. You are rewarded for your cunning but punished for the slightest mistake. You can advance from Knight to Monarch or be demoted to Peasant. Even without a single stone in play, you still have the chance to declare victory over your defeated foes.

So read of the discovery of this fabled royal game in the hallowed grounds of Avalon and let us put it back on its noble pedestal!

Yes, there are ads, but the chancellor has a war to fund against the barbarian hordes.

name: Ships at War
summary: A physics-based strategy game with player-made warships and submarines. Build the most effective warships and use them to sink the enemy during battles. Conquer the ocean by deploying your ships in strategic locations on the sea in round-based scenarios.

name: Shooter Buddies
summary: A fast paced, Sci-Fi first person shooter. Up to 4 buddies defend the planetary core against an onslaught of robots!

name: Shoot Shoot My Waifu
summary: Your mission is to search for those 7 sins demons disguised as Waifu's in human world. Fighting and confronting beautiful demon bosses. Punish them with holy water. Force them to return to their own form by using pleasuring tools. And collect new photos of their shameful defeat to your album.

name: Shark Attack
summary: One of the Most addictive Shark Game Play as a shark and you must do what you love! Swim around the ocean and fill your appetite by killing everything you can find.

name: Sheep Island
summary: You've get a no people island. Then there is only one thing to do. Use your hands to increase the number of sheep.

name: Shattered Slime
summary: A cartoony and colorful 2.5D platformer.

name: Shohei's Adult Streaming Channel
summary: Shohei is the host with the most on Shohei's Adult Streaming Channel. With user feedback from the audience, he makes his moves on his female guest which is the key to the success of this internet program. What will happen on today's show and its special guest?

name: Shape Arena
summary: Shape Arena is a local multiplayer 2D game in which players control skillfully illustrated geometric shapes on a chalkboard, fighting to collect all the candies and achieve the highest score.

name: Shoot Covid-19
summary: Let's try our covid-19 shooting game. In the game, you need to clear all kinds of monsters infected by pneumonia virus in the infirmary, and finally eliminate all the viruses to reach the destination.

name: Shadows on the Vatican: Nightingale
summary: Writing on a blog and using her obscure ability, the mysterious Nightingale has been helping people in danger for years. Now, she’s forced to disappear, facing threats from a killer... one of those people she helped in the past. An interactive short story featuring an advanced navigation UI.

name: Shape
summary: A first-person puzzle game where you explore a maze and your identity.

name: Shades of Sakura
summary: This is a casual strategy game - Shades of SakuraThe player will have a fascinating journey through ancient Japan, the game has 4 Main Heroines, wonderful mechanics and an interesting plot. The player needs to draw lines and connect the balls together.

name: Shop Tycoon
summary: Shop Tycoon lets you build, furnish and run your own shop. Hire employees, order goods and face various challenges on the way to success! Develop your business, discover new districts and try to meet the expectations of new customers.

name: Shinsen Renki
summary: The Shinsengumi is an organization that exists to protect the district of EDO, and you are their commander! You'll start a new life with strong, unique, and attractive team members. Which division do you want to join?

name: Show do Milhão 2006
summary:
WILL YOU ACCEPT THE CHALLENGE?

All the emotions of the television program Show do Milhão from SBT, with Silvio Santos are in this game, now with more than 20.000 questions. In this new 2006 edition you can play with up to 8 players on the same computer, or if you prefer you can play online, against real opponents over the internet, increasing your sense of competition, and trying to reach the highest scores in the Show do Milhão Hall of Fame.

name: Shinsengumi: Bakumatsu Genshikou
summary: An ordinary school girl experienced time slip to the Edo period while on a school trip. And since she resembled captain of Shinsengumi unit Okita Souji, she just pretended to be him.

name: Shinsengumi: Bakumatsu Gensou Renai Kitan
summary: The stage is around the Ikedaya incident at the peak of Shinsengumi activity. There is a conflict between Toshizo Hijikata who wants to head to Kyoto and more cautious Serizawa who works hard for the established Shinsengumi reputation. Hijikata faces new challenges and finds his way in the complex net of relations. Romance blooms even in this turbulent era.

name: Shinsengumi Fukuchou no Yuuga na Hitotoki
Shinsengumi Soumonki Fugo no Kusa: Nanatsu no Yuube
shapez.io: Puzzle DLC
summary: You enjoyed scaling down and optimizing machines in shapez? Now it's its own game mode! Solve the puzzles by creating the given shapes, but space and buildings are limited - there are no resources and you only get a given amount of shape types and colors to work with!

name: Shikoku Kororozashi Deluxe: Sake Jidori Udon Senki
summary: 稀代の飯テロ&観光ゲーここに爆誕!? 四国を征服し、ヒロインといっしょに観光したり、グルメを満喫しよう! 地元民ですら唸る、ディープな四国戦略SLG。

name: Shooting Type
summary: Shooting Type is a single-player side-scrolling dungeon game with five stages. You can clear the stage by defeating various enemies that appear on the stage and defeating the stage boss that appears at the end. Learning the enemy's behavior patterns and player skills will help you clear the stage.

name: Shard of Kronos
summary: The ever peaceful sky lands of Tygardia are being threatened by a destructive meteor. This meteor can only be destroyed by activating an ancient beacon, guarded by monsters and puzzles. Can you prevent this mysterious catastrophe from happening?

name: Shut your teeth
summary: Shut your teeth is an absurdist mystery visual novel inspired by Thai culture, folklore and traditions. The complex plot full of dark atmosphere, vivid characters and psychological tension will keep you guessing until the very end.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Crimes and Punishments Redux
summary: Become the most celebrated detective of all time: Sherlock Holmes! Use your impressive talents as a detective to solve six thrilling and varied cases.

name: Shonen Adventure: The Dual Blades Hero
summary: Explore multiple worlds, fight creatures, level up, unlock powerful elemental skills, sell your loot, buy items to increase specific stats and more. Start from the bottom and become a hero with the shonen spirit. You can also rank yourself among all the other players and try to reach the top.

name: Shiny Summer
summary: Shiny Summer is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Shinobi Story
summary: Shinobi Story is a 3D Free Ninja MMORPG where you play as a character in the Ninja world! Choose your village and rise up the ninja ranks, even up to the Kage! It is a player driven game where the community makes decisions for the game world. Gather your allies, fight your enemies, master powerful jutsu, protect your village, or turn your back on it entirely-- this is your Shinobi Story!

name: Shark Pinball
summary:
Get ready for Shark Pinball, a pinball machine where you'll try to score points avoiding Sharks, octopus and many other perils, show everybody that you're not affraid of the sea monsters on this table.

Discover all the missions and secrets, in this unique two leveled pinball arcade machine. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Shape Suitable
summary: This is your free canvas. Let's draw freely and enjoy the puzzle! For "Shapes" who carry various things Draw a bridge, draw a wall, and sometimes protect yourself from bad guys! "Shapes" are rich in individuality, and some are tall,powerful, flying in the sky like a UFO. There is no right answer to clear, let's help Shapes with your free ideas. If the puzzle is difficult, you can worry with your family If you still can't clear it, you can look at the hints!

name: ShiroKuro's Adventure
summary: "Shirokuro's Adventure" is a top-down action mini-game where you can control two characters at the same time. Control the cute twin characters "Shiro" and "Kuro" to aim for the inner part of the island!

name: Shattered Reality
summary: First person, fast paced shooter, focused on fluid and complex movement set in a stylized, futuristic world, where speed life, and the possibilities are endless

name: Shinseiki Yuusha Taisen
summary: Shinseiki Yuusha Taisen is a Strategy game, developed by WinkySoft and published by Atlus, which was released in Japan in 2005.

name: Shawarma or Shaverma
summary: Shawarma or Shaverma - a rogue-like game made in 2D hand-drawn graphics in which you need to help Shawarmyonok Gennady .

name: Shifter
summary: Shifter is a rogue-lite game, where you can shift gravity and walk on walls. Shifter has 3 different areas, each of which has a unique boss fight. Use different weapons such as swords, scythes, and shotguns to escape your dream, which has been hacked and turned into a twisted game by a hacker.

name: Shadow of Loot Box: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Shadow of Loot Box Collector’s Box
Shadow of Loot Box Game (region free)
Shadow of Loot Box Manual
Shadow of Loot Box Toy Brick Set (265pcs / nano size)
Shadow of Loot Box Numbered Certificate

name: Shield Shock: Winter Wonderland Pack
summary: In this Festive Content Pack you will find new Costumes for the Soldier, Wizard, Dragon, Shifter, and Rogue. A New Winter-Themed Map, "The Frost Chambers" will also be available to play in VS Mode and the Arcade Mode.

name: Shisha no Yobu Yakata
summary: Pandora Max Series Vol. 2: Shisha no Yobu Yakata is an Adventure Horror game developed and published by Pandora Box, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Shark Slayer
summary: Shark Slayer is a terrifying underwater wave-based horror survival game. Take on the horrors of the deep with up to 3 of your friends in online co-op.

name: Shadow Eclipse
summary: Shadow Eclipse is an action roguelite dungeon crawler. Build up your mage with diverse spell builds and abilities each run. You can play the game alone, or join 5-player online coop.

name: Shotgun, Dungeons, Laser Traps
summary: A first person puzzle shooter. Shoot boxes, push bombs, fend off enemies, find a way out of laser-mechanical traps.

name: Shooter for Dummies
summary: Shooter for Dummies puts players in the perspective of a dummy. Play the most iconic FPS PvP maps: CTF, Team Deathmatch, Kill confirmed... where the winning is not the common goal: The dummy with less receiving damage wins! But don't worry dummies, you can punch players almost off the map!

name: Shenmue I & II: Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Shenmue I & II
Soundtrack CD x 2

name: Shikhondo: Soul Eater - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Shikhondo – Soul Eater Collector’s Box
Shikhondo – Soul Eater Game Disc (region free)
Shikhondo – Soul Eater Game Manual
Shikhondo – Soul Eater Original Soundtrack
Shikhondo – Soul Eater Numbered Certificate

name: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne - HD Remaster Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:

- Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne HD Remaster
- Vortex Case
- 106-page Magazine
- Soundtrack CD x 2
- Aroma Lamp

name: Shin Ruriiro no Yuki: Furimukeba Tonari ni
Shoujo Kidan
summary: "You" who got lost in a strange land, will hear a ghost story from a eccentric girl who lives there, relieving that vague memory.

name: Shoujo Gidan
summary:
Waking up in a strange prison, "you" will work with a girl who is also there, to escape from the building.

A sequel to Shoujo Kidan.

name: Shem Ha Mephorash
summary: "Shem Ha Mephorash" is a historical low fantasy strategy game set in the battlefield at the end of the 19th century, where you can explore the language of miracles. Treat the unique "rabbi" and the soldiers skillfully and guide them to the end.

name: Shadow Warrior 2: Bounty Hunt Part 2
summary: The Shadow Warrior 2: Bounty Hunt Part 2 DLC delivers thirteen thrilling new missions, two spectacular new weapons, and three powerful new perks for Lo Wang and the gang.

name: Shuzzler
summary: Shuzzler, the classic word game first released on iOS, has returned and is now available for the first time on Steam. The Steam edition comes with all new game modes to play single-player or with friends on the same device.

name: Shambled Spiral
summary: Singleplayer Genre - Weird/Casual/FPS Purchase now to possibly get a much better version in the future for FREE!

name: Shine Within
summary: A top-down action-adventure game as you collect & solve puzzles in order for you to explore & unravel this mysterious world.

name: Shots Fired in the Dark Forest
summary: You have to open doors, use teleports, dodge saws and shoot at intelligent hostile plants.

name: Shots
summary: Shots is a PvP action multiplayer shooter game with a lots of weapons!

name: Shikokushi: Food and Sightseeing and Beauties
summary: In order to avoid the financial failure of Kagawa Prefecture, and aim for traveling around and all-you-can-eat-gourmet, Jiro Urashima, the governor of Kagawa Prefecture, and Deputy Governor, Onohime Megi, will push forward to unify Shikoku!

name: Shadow Fear: Chapter 0
summary: In this DLC you will be able to play 2 mode. The first one is to see what happened to Catherine the sister of Nathan on the first night she went to Lencour mountain... This is Chapter 0! And the other mode is the Horde Mode, you will try to survive five 3min rounds with only the items you can get by collecting coins and opening chest...

name: Shadow Redemption
summary: Shadow Redemption is a truly free MMORPG where you play a 2D game in a 3D perspective. Play casually, or take the game more seriously. The world of Lightwell calls upon you, answer the call and become a Warchief.

name: Shanghai1920
summary: This game is a suspenseful visual novel style game, Players will play a 20th century police in Shanghai, China, Discover the hidden story and truth behind the murder through exploration and investigation.

name: Shinobi Breaker
summary: Hit the shuriken, break the bricks, get ultra instinct and become... The ShinobiBreaker.

name: Ship Surveyor Through the Ages: VR
summary: The Lloyd's Register Foundation Heritage & Education Centre is proud to introduce our unique VR experience, set across three different time periods. You take on the role of surveyor, tasked with tracking down and investigating hazards and faults on board three ships throughout history.

name: Shikon-X Astro Defense Fortress
summary: Shikon-X is a space Point & Click game where you play as Major Daaia, the best Federation pilot. During a routine operation, you receive a mysterious transmission from the attackers, which kick-starts an epic intergalactic (and funny) quest to uncover the truth about the war, and your place in it.

name: Shade
summary: Shade is an atmospheric 2D stealth game. You've just been murdered, and as a new ghost you need to find out why. Move between the worlds of the living and the dead, avoiding enemies and hazards. Uncover hidden truths and use your new powers to determine the fates of those around you.

name: Shadow Keep
summary: A fun top-town adventure/questing game where you fight weird creatures, find treasure, and talk to entertaining NPCs.

name: Shan Gui II: Sweet Osmanthus II - Episode 2
summary: He Jia and Han Hui, Li Qiucheng and He Dai, He Ren and Eryue Lan... Different people encountered with their thoughts conveyed. In this autumn day, shall they lost again in sweet osmanthus's fragrance?

name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Boston Lockdown - Infected!
summary: With Boston saved, but still under Lockdown, what do you do if you have become one of the infected yourself? As you loose control over your body and mind, you will have to find a cure or die trying!

name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Infected - Missions
summary: Random Mission Pack: Boston never sleeps and there are always Nuyen and Karma to be earned for an industrious Shadowrunner. From collecting nanite samples to freeing hostages and defusing bombs, a wealth of repeatable randomized set-ups mission will keep you on your toes and allow you to improve your character and gear.

name: Shine's Adventures 0: Zombies Reload
summary: Shine woke up in an unfamiliar place, and she found many horrible zombies around. In order to survive, Shine needs to explore this unfamiliar place. She needs to collect weapons, medicines, items and so on.Everything is to survive.

name: Shadow Step
summary: Blaze your own trail through uncharted and mysterious territory!

name: Shaman
summary: Shaman is a third-person action-adventure game where you assume the role of a young Shaman amidst a great cataclysm. Seek out the ancient secrets of your people and gain the ability to Shapeshift into the mighty Jaguar, cast fireballs and incinerate your foes, and unlock the ability to lift objects at a distance.

name: Shape Shift Shawn: Episode 1 - Tale of the Transmogrified
summary:
Help Shawn to survive the underworld by transforming into powerful new forms and mastering a gauntlet of bizarre platforming challenges!

Shape Shift Shawn is a brand-new, episodic sidescrolling saga, styled with retro pre-rendered art that evokes the early 3D sidescrollers of the 90s, backed by a funky soundtrack (featuring veteran drummer G. Calvin Weston!) Each episode has 18 challenging levels and four dastardly bosses for Shawn to take down – a challenge worthy of any platforming veteran!

name: Shadow of Valhalla
summary: Visceral physics-based VR combat set within an ancient realm of Viking lore and mystic powers! Discover magical runes and unlock spells while battling evil forces throughout eternity!

name: Shrimp
summary: Play as a Shrimp and complete a ritual that had been abandoned in a world of abstract darkness. Shrimp is a third person platformer based in a terrifying world with entities delivering a thrill you'll never forget.

name: Sheep Quest
summary:
Molly the lamb has run away! Can you help shepherd Angus find her?
Meet quirky villagers, collect items kleptomanically and enjoy colorful graphics during your quest.

name: Shifter
summary: Impersonate the townsfolk to get things done in this game, but first you have to learn everything about them... Shifter is an escape the town point and click adventure with a twist!

name: Shifter's Box: Outside In
summary: Sally is taking a walk outside one fine day when she comes across a strange box. Curious as to who would leave such a strange box lying around, she opens it - only to find herself in a very strange place indeed. Help Sally uncover the true nature of the box and find her way home!

name: Shadow: Treachery Cannot Be Tolerated - Episode 2: Retaliation
summary: After Shadow takes her revenge she gets to know that one of her men is arrested and he is about to rat her out. She determines to stop him and also promises her boyfriend that it will be her last crime after this she will leave behind her life of crimes.

name: Shoal
summary: Hungry for shark games? Start fishing! Go fish for food as a hungry shark swimming in a shoal of fish.

name: Shining Flower: HikaruHana
summary: The game follows the journey through a dreamlike or even surreal landscape of a little man holding in his hands a red flower from which emanates a bright light. He will meet strange creatures, who will make him a little in spite of himself visit the nooks and crannies of these unknown countries.

name: Sheriff Rage
summary: Sheriff on guard for the defense of Oldstone city against extraterrestrial forces

name: Shadows of Adam: Guild of the Artificers
summary: Thrilling Battle Arena, Artifact Crafting, New Game Plus, and a new super optional dungeon! All complete with tons of new items and artifacts. Are you up for the challenge? This exciting DLC pack to Shadows of Adam awaits you!

name: Shadow Ninja: Apocalypse - Endless Runner
summary: Endless version randomly choosed levels. Stay on the platform as long as you can, on your way there will be many obstacles and rogue ninja's. Dodge these obstacles to increase your score.

name: Shovel Escape
summary: A vertical platformer in which you traverse up falling rocks and teleport with your magical shovel, to reach the top and escape before the lava gets you from below.

name: Shadow Corridor
summary: Chased by the spirits of the cursed Noh mask, you must do everything you can to escape. Set in traditional Japanese locales, Shadow Corridor provides a unique survival horror experience. Randomly generated maps filled with a variety of items make every playthrough different. Immerse yourself in the darkness, for only the determined will survive.

name: Short Hop Laser
summary: Take the short hop laser concept from SSBM, and make it a 2d side scroller arcade game. Actually don't do that, because I already did that.

name: Ship Simulator Realistic
summary: Ship Simulator Realistic experience the real simulation. The game will be based on a free roam aspect to explore the Greece Scenery in a physics based game , realistic handling and many more features.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Deluxe Edition
summary: Sherlock Holmes Chapter One Deluxe Edition includes a Season Pass with new quests: 'Saints and Sinners' DLC (available on release day), 'Mycroft's Pride' DLC (coming later), 'M for Mystery' DLC (coming later), 'Beyond A Joke' DLC (coming later).

name: She Will Shoot
summary: She Will Shoot - is a cool zombie killer from the third person in a variety of scenery. Choose an arena and use different types of weapons to clear it of zombies.

name: Shinorubi
summary: Shinorubi is a Bullet Hell Shoot'em up in the tradition of Danmaku games. A pure dose of adrenaline and frenetic arcade action. Choose your pilot and a spaceship, face powerful Bosses, and experience many cool Arrange Mods!

name: Sheep's Quest
summary: You`ll love this stimulating Brain Teaser in which you guide a herd of sheep through seven game worlds in an effort to collect enough coins to rebuild their once magnificent farm. Steering the adorable animals around enemies and obstacles to the riches they need is as simple as placing arrows on the ground pointing the way. Featuring colorful graphics and delightful audio, Sheep`s Quest is sure to become one of your favorites!

name: Shootin Star
summary: Play as a star that has been shot out of the sky, and shoot your way back up. Sometimes when you shoot for the stars, they shoot back. Shooting Star is an endless platformer where you use a variety of weapons to propel yourself ever upward toward outer space.

name: Shred BackCountry
summary: Grab ya snowboard and hit the Back Country. Find your way down the slopes, and get some huge air, whilst doing insane tricks. Shred down the same mountain many times to find the best path to perform tricks and get huge scores.

name: Sheep Legion - turn-based tactical RPG game
summary: Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay. Fight in PVP battles. New turn-based strategy game is coming! You'll learn polymorph and command kinds of heroes to wipe out enemies! Monsters are too powerful! Don't worry, they can temporarily be turned into a sheep. There are a variety of roles in the army: warrior, archer, mage, priest, necromancer and eagle. You will fight with a dangerous, fire-breathing dragon.

name: Shadow Blade Zero
summary: Shadow Blade Zero is a fast paced action platformer game for Android Devices.

name: Shelter SCG
summary: Zombie card dueling in a graphic novel style - tasty! Playing like a hybrid of a collectible card game and the castle defense genre, Shelter will provide you with hours of challenging play. Defend yourself from the zombie onslaught as you fight to be reunited with the woman you love. You define your strategy, but be warned... No single strategy will win.

name: Shapes & Colors Farm Puzzles
summary:
The funny farm animals shapes & colors learning game for kids and toddlers is an early learning app that incorporate both educational material and engaging activities.
With our unique Shapes & Colors Farm Puzzles you can help develop your child's logic and mental abilities, motor skills and visual senses. The animal farm environment ensures your child will have a great time while learning and developing all this important skills.

name: Shaark!
summary: A game about being a bird. A bird needs to fly. To eat. To think on it's feet. But most of all: to avoid being eaten!

name: Shadow Codex
summary: Battle against an evil force in this unique word/RPG hybrid game! Face off against countless enemies in turn-based combat by mastering words, spells, weapons, and items. Explore an ever-unfolding map with characters to meet, stories to tell, and quests to embark upon. Earn gold and visit shops to upgrade your equipment and buy items. Earn experience to level up and improve your character's fighting stats in combat.

name: Sheepland
summary:
Sheepland: a sunny land of rolling green meadows, lush forests, and majestic mountains. The peaceful, happy people of the island want nothing more than to roam the land with their fuzzy little flocks of fluffy white sheep. All is well and good, until somebody has the bright idea to put up some fences...
Now the shepherds must compete for the most profitable lands to raise their flocks, driving the sheep to the lands they own and fencing them in so they don’t wander off and join some other shepherd’s flock!
And then there’s that strange black sheep that keeps showing up. Its rare black wool is certain to fetch a pretty price in the market for the shepherd that can pen him in!
Can you corral the finest herd in the best lands and become the richest shepherd in Sheepland?

name: Shut the Box Infinity
summary:
An exciting game for all ages - challenging and addictive for adults, fun and educational for kids.
Unlike any other Shut The Box game on the app store, Shut The Box Infinity takes this traditional dice game to a whole new level.

name: Shrek 2
summary: Shrek 2 for PC is a game released in early 2004. It is unique from the video game for other consoles, the main difference being that the game is a straightforward platformer/beat-em up with each level using a specific character. It also uses the Unreal Engine 2, developed by Epic Games.

name: Shin Gyakuten Touhou
summary:
Shin Gyakuten Touhou is a visual novel & adventure style game based on the Gyakuten Saiban/Ace Attorney series. The player assumes the role of Aya Shameimaru as a defense attorney as she proves her clients not guilty using investigation, evidence, and cross-examination.

Shin Gyakuten Touhou is the completion of the original game (Comiket 74, 2008) with three primary cases and an extra trial where Aya faces overwhelming evidence as an unpopular celestial Tenshi is accused of stealing.

name: Shadow Corridor
summary: Now on Steam, revamped with brand new content! Immerse yourself in the latest chapter of the popular, Japanese indie horror title, Kageroh: Shadow Corridor. Survive against the onslaught of horrors that lie in wait in eerie, traditional Japanese locales that change with every playthrough.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator
summary: Visit the largest ship graveyard in the world. A dozen kilometers of beach filled with wrecks. Hundreds of ships wrecked on the coast. Thousands of tons of steel. Choose the most valuable ship for you and start the adventure. Play as one of the workers during the most dangerous work in the world!

name: Shifting Sands
summary: A game about building a city in a desert with ever shifting terrain.

name: Shocklane
summary: Play as an aggressive vehicle, switch between elements and collide into your opponents to win the race!

name: Shan's Salty Seamen
summary: Use your sultry singing voice to help merman Shan lure sailors to their doom!

name: Shootout Inc.
summary:
You play as QA-Bot1986, a weapon quality assurance robot working for a big and shady corporation called SHOOTOUT INC.
An unexpected glitch occured during your manufacturing, giving your cyber brain the ability to process data at 5861% higher speed than ordinary bots, allowing you to alter your perception of time and make it advance only when you move.

name: Shipwreck
summary: Your ship had to make an emergency landing and you are now shipwrecked!

name: Shut Up and Slam Jam Karate Basketball
summary: ONE COURT. TWO SPORTS. NO FOULS.

name: ShootUp.io
summary: Shootup.io is a zombie shooter game. You find yourself stranded in a mysterious town. Bad luck, it's infected with zombies. There's only one solution for you... SHOOT'EM ALL! Build a base or squash the zombies with your vehicle. Team up with your friends or fight the other survivors Unlock bonus, ammunition, turrets, landmines... What's your high score gonna be? You can team up with your friends by sharing the link on the button "Team with your friends".

name: Shagster Online 2
summary: Set 100 years before the original game, Shagster 2 is a multiplayer MMORPG set in the wild west! Yeehaw!

name: Shelled Shinobi
summary: Parkour platforming as a shinobi tortoise

name: Shinkendo
summary: シンプルな格闘ゲーム Simple Fighting Game

name: Short Rest
summary: A party-based roguelike deckbuilder

name: Shiba Cafe
summary: Just my type of game

name: Show by Rock!! Fes A Live
summary: Show by Rock!! Fes A Live is a rhythm mobile game based on the anime. It is a free-to-play with a Gacha monetization system. Come join the legend about young musicians who dream of becoming top stars!!

name: Shit 3
summary: 100 levels, 2 buttons: Shit 3.

name: Shrimp Slam It
summary: Slam shrimp faster than your bro

name: Shifting Dreamscape
summary: A game about sleep, dreams, and their consequences...

name: ShanShui
summary: A living painting in VR

name: Shiya
summary: A mini platformer about a little kid looking for his blanky.

name: Sharks! In Space?!
summary: Claymation Space Shark Warfare

name: Shock Block.
summary: Basic block based boredom beater.

name: She's a Bit Sluggish
summary: A simple story of a date between a copper robot weeb and a beleaguered slug girl. Nothing can possibly go wrong.

name: Ship Adventure
summary: The world is in danger, you have to destroy the dark eye !

name: Ship War
summary: Ship War is a board game transferred to the PC, in which a player takes turns with a bot to attack at coordinates on an opponent's unknown map.The main task is to destroy all ships.

name: ShapePlacer
summary: A simple game based on the classic tetris mechanics. Fill up lines to gain score and don't let the shapes reach the top. Made with the Godot Engine 3.1.

name: Shizoku: Shuriken Brawl
summary: Shizoku is a local multiplayer game where Samurais and Ninjas come together to play tennis, but the ball is actually a Shuriken. Painful, huh? Well they had to stay in shape someway!

name: Shoe Snake Reloaded
summary: Run and dodge bombs, kamikaze pilots, and shuriken in this really simple game.

name: Shrubnaut
summary:
A small metroidvania made in 6 days for a self-imposed Game•A•Week challenge.

Explore a space station with your grapple!

name: Shy
summary: SHY, it's an art-game about shyness and fight with your fears.

name: Shura No Mon
summary:
Shura No Mon (Shura's Gate) is a fighting game released for the Sony Playstation in 1998.
It was developed and published by Kodansha, based on the manga of the same name by Masatoshi Kawahara, which was also published by Kodansha on their monthly shonen magazine from 1987 until 1996.

name: Shattered Legion
summary: The Universe is in a time of great turmoil. After thousands of years of peace, Three huge factions battle each other for complete Universal Domination. As a mystical guardian, you must choose a faction to champion to victory!

name: Shadows on the Vatican Act 2: Wrath
summary: When Silvia is hunted by the person behind the attempted murder she was assigned to commit, she knows the only option remaining is to face the deadly conspirator openly.

name: Shaolin Sudoku
summary:
Sharpen your mind by crunching numbers in a relaxing way!

The Yin Yang is a concept of dualism. There must be some darkness in the light and some light in the darkness. Shaolin Sudoku borrows this idea and presents it in an aesthetic sudoku game. It might just be the most beautiful Sudoku game. It is an indie game made by an Indian developer.

name: Shadows of Forbidden Gods
summary:
A strategy game in which you attempt to bring about the apocalypse, by moving covert agents through a complex fantasy world to accomplish a wide range of schemes, plots and rituals. You start the game by bribing guards and infiltrating minor farming communities and slowly build up your forces until you are bringing about ice ages, eradicating entire nations with plague, summoning volcanoes and commanding city-devouring snake-gods.

You play a set of agents and corrupted heroes against the forces of good, the rulers and heroes of humanity, lead by the Chosen One. They may be stronger than you, and could eliminate your agents with ease, but you have the advantage of secrecy, and humans are easily turned one against each other. Why fight a war against a unified empire when you could shatter in into civil war and clean up the pieces with orcish hordes?

name: Shadow Asylum
summary: An FPS Horror experience where you're locked in an old asylum being chased by husks of shadow.

name: Shadow
summary: In Shadow you are a shadow-made person who needs to escape through a door made with shadows, but for this door to open you need to push 3 blue buttons across the scene. You can push these buttons by jumping on them.

name: Shadow Wrangler
summary:
Your shadows have split from you and you must guide them to the exit. You can move at will, but the shadows need to be given commands. Pick up command boxes (turn, jump, explode) and drop them where you want the shadows to act.

Take on TEN CHALLENGING STAGES of PUZZLE PLATFORMING BY PROXY.

name: Sheldon Cooper Presents Fun with Flags
summary: Hello, I'm Dr. Sheldon Cooper, and welcome to Sheldon Cooper presents 'Fun with Flags'. So, fellow flag enthusiasts, what sort of flag questions keep you awake at night?" This a Fan, Fun, Educational, Parody, Pixel Game to test your vexology knowledge, you know, the study of flags, this funny trivia is based on popular tv show "Big Bang Theory"

name: Shit Country Sweeper
summary: Shit Country Sweeper is a Minesweeper variation. Clean after yourselves.

name: Shanties in Strange Waters
summary: A colorful sea shanty rhythm game

name: Should I Buy It?
summary: Clicker game made for ludum dare 49

name: Shillelagh
summary: Shillelagh (Shil-lay-lah) is a fast and frantic arena shooter where players are armed with the aura of nature to defend against destructive, undead monsters.

name: Shifting Dungeon
summary: Solve interesting puzzles, manipulate shifting blocks to your advantage Various mechanics combined for interesting and fun puzzles

name: Shall We Date?: Destiny Ninja
summary:
In the middle of war…a Ninja appeared. Since then, you’ve been in the midst of the Genpei war and involved in a forbidden romance…

Engage in battles with the survival of the ninjas hanging in the balance, seek out and conquer true romance, and achieve success in both love and adventure!

A romantic life with handsome ninjas and feelings of love…who is your Destiny Ninja?

name: Shikigami
summary:
In the capital during the Heian era, there was a onmyouji named Douman who doesn’t fare too well in his studies. However, the talented noblewoman Michinaga told him that everyone is unique and he should be himself. Because of this, he continued to study hard and vowed to protect her. The most powerful onmyouji Senmei told him that he is useless and is just a burden to everyone else in the world, and end up taking Michinaga away from him. He devised a stupid plan to oppose her, but how can the weakest guy like him defeat a genius like her? On top of that, suspected of planning an assassination against Michinaga, he was driven from the city. Now alone except for with Michinaga’s cousin Akimitsu, who is just as dumb as he is, how will he be able to gain revenge against Senmei?

This is an SLG using actual figures such as the protagonist Ashiya Douman and Abeno Senmei (although now female). Of course the setting is a bit different being in a girl’s school, and there’s robots and stuff as well. During the ADV parts, you can sneak in as a girl to gain intelligence, or go and equip yourself for the battles during the SLG part. A jankenpon system similar to Koihime is used although onmyouji attacks trump all 3 types (infantry, spearmen and archers). There are light and dark elements which also modify damage, and there are area elements as well.

name: Shoujo Yoshitsune-den
summary:
An ordinary second-year high school student is on a class field trip to Kyoto, the heart of traditional Japanese culture. One night, as a penalty for losing a game to some of his friends, he is forced to attempt to sneak into the girls' bathing area to peep on them. However, he is caught, and falls into the bath, suddenly being surrounded by a strange light. When he comes to, he finds that he has somehow been transported back in time to the late 12th century, at the twilight of the Heian period of Japanese history. Having been dragged into this crucial historical period, he is forced to come to terms with what to do, while also struggling to understand why he was transported back eight centuries in time...

Shoujo Yoshitsuneden (lit. The Tale of the Yoshitsune Girl) is a tactical RPG with romantic & visual novel elements. The game's structure is broken up into chapters, and the story is primarily told in the visual novel format, with battle sequences being interspersed throughout. The (nameable) protagonist can also pursue relationships with the various heroines, and the game's ending hinges on which one the player has chosen to become the most intimate with, making for six possible endings.

name: Shall We Date?: Heian Love
summary:
You are a young lady who recently became an attendant of the court of Kyoto. You were raised in the countryside, so life in the imperial court is very new and different to you.

You were supposed to go to a poetry contest that was organized by the emperor, but you got a stomachache, so you couldn't go. This made you very sad. In any case, that's when the mysterious love letter that started all of this arrived.

Who is the poem from? It was well written, and conveyed genuine feelings for you.

name: Shounen Onmyouji: Tsubasa yo Ima, Sora he Kaere
summary:
The protagonist of the series, which is set in the Heian era, is Abe no Masahiro, the grandson of the great onmyouji, Abe no Seimei, who passed his teachings on to his grandson. Unfortunately, Masahiro has lost his sixth sense and with it the ability to see spirits. Masahiro constantly feels overshadowed by his grandfather's fame.

One day, Masahiro meets a fox-like creature which he names Mokkun who shows him his true potential powers after fighting a demon. Mokkun is actually Tōda, who prefers to be called Guren. He is one of the twelve shikigami called the Shinshou who has pledged his loyalty to Seimei and is helping Masahiro to surpass his grandfather.

Masahiro's dream to surpass his grandfather will not be realised as easily as he hopes. Not only does he have to convince the other Shinshou that he is Seimei's true successor, he must also increase his power in order to stop demons coming from China, the other parts of Japan and the Underworld. In addition to this he has to deal with the schemes of rival onmyouji who want to destroy Japan not to mention keeping his promise to protect Princess Akiko of the Fujiwara clan.

name: Shinobit
summary: Your enemies have you surronded, but you won't give up without a fight! Use your ninja skills to get the highest score!

name: Shooty and the Catfish: Episode 1
summary: Join Shooty and Zaat as they investigate some mysterious mines!

name: Shift
summary: SHIFT is a colorful, lightning-paced, dodge-crazy FPS.

name: Shooty and the Catfish: Episode 2
summary: Join Shooty and Zaat as they investigate some spooky ghost sightings!

name: Sherlock: Hidden Objects Game and Mystery Match 3 Cases
summary: Investigate mysterious cases with Sherlock! Solve match-3 puzzles, find hidden objects, meet familiar characters and restore the original plots of the well-known books!

name: Sheriff of Mahjong
summary: Solve Mahjong puzzles, rebuild a frontier town and thwart the evil machinations of outlaws in this exciting new game!

name: Shattle
summary: Shattle is an action-packed PVP, points-based survival game where you shoot, loot and craft your way to shelter as you dodge bombs on the way.

name: Shakadou-san no Jun'ai Road
summary:
Shakadou decides to move temporarily to Shounan, where he "turns out" to survive and to live under the bridge, bathing at the beach shower and feeding by working to the fishermen.
Until one day, when a different girl seems to change the attitude of the yankee looking oji-san.

name: Shark Attack: Deep Sea Adventures
summary: Shark Attack is a deep-sea, classic 2D adventure game. It comes with an intriguing gameplay, fun character, and an epic boss fight amongst other enemy.

name: Shelled Flame
summary: A difficult mission drives Lorys to her impending doom, unless she makes the right choices.

name: Shotgun Wedding
summary: ​Shoot enemies and blast yourself into the air in this Shooter-Platformer!

name: Shattered
summary: Shattered is about a bird living nearby a beautiful mountain. The player takes the role of the little blue bird and starts the game by searching for his brother. Once reaching the village, he uses his magical bell to defeat the dark creatures threatening his fellow birds. To find the source of these so called ''Nightmare'' creatures and to save his brother, who is headed to the mountain, the player has to embark on a journey to the top of the mountain. Making their way to the top, the player will face more enemies, puzzles, landmarks and characters along their adventure to reveal the truth.

name: Shrinking Planet
summary: Feel the wind in your hair as you race through an ever-shrinking world. Oh an meteors are raining upon the planet.

name: Shadow Over Normoth
summary:
Taking inspiration from PS1 classics like Resident Evil and Silent Hill, Shadow over Normoth sets out to bring you back to the original survival horror experience. With fixed cameras, tank controls and visuals that are reminiscent of the good old days, you will truly feel like it's 1996 again.

Unravel the mystery behind the town of Normoth, gather resources and survive the horrors of this forsaken place. You will once again enter the world of survival horror... Good luck!

name: Shadows of a Sunless World
summary: Echolocation based horror game.

name: Showa Summer Festival Story
summary: As you progress through the game, old-fashioned "summer memory goods" will be registered in the picture book. Nostalgic! Showa Summer Festival Story is full of nostalgic memories, from those items that make you feel uncomfortable, to items that are a little painful.

name: Shutin
summary: [72hLD] Simulate the survival horror of life… 🚪

name: Shifting Edge
summary: destroy some bushes or something

name: Shotgun Angelic
summary: Short Touhou-but-backwards shooter for the 48 Secret Jam

name: Ship Defense
summary: Tower defense game with a twist.

name: Shadowplay: Journey to Wonderland
summary: A simple platform game modeled on the theater of shadows.

name: Shapeshifter Biker
summary: Just a regular biker.

name: S.H.E.
summary: Procedural, horror, sci-fi, dungeon-crawler.

name: Sheep Annoyer
summary: Very accurate simulator

name: Should the Stars Have Eyes
summary: A story driven point and click game about fragility

name: ShortStacked
summary: Pretend to be an adult as two kids in a trenchcoat in this silly couch co-op game!

name: Shibuya Marble Texture
summary:
Shibuya Marble Texture RPG is a free fangame of a Hypnosis Mic.

In this game you have to find your old enemy - Jakurai and kill him. Before that you must visit the 4 districts of Tokyo.

name: Shoot to Slide
summary: Shoot all the enemies on screen in this grid-based puzzle game.

name: Shadow of Babel
summary: A downcast civilization, someone who wants answers, and a great tower where nothing is what it seems.

name: Shines Over
summary: First Person Horror Game

name: Shooty Ballz
summary: Keep the green ball alive and protect it from.. YOURSELF! easy when you're in control, but what if you LOSE CONTROL?

name: Shih Ho
summary: Boy meets girl; or rather, boy gets bitten by vampire girl.

name: Shell Kingdom
summary: Command a group of turtles

name: Shipping Out!
summary: A Wholesome, Friendship Adventure Game

name: Shattered World: Beneath a Stone Sky
summary: Tactics RPG; deep, long but unfinished.

name: Shroomio's Adventure
summary: Shroomio sets out on an Adventure to save his village

name: Shattered Stone
summary: Your number one archery game for murdering golems.

name: Shootmephrenia
summary: A FPS where you have to shoot no one but yourself.

name: Shot2048
summary: Shot2048 is a puzzle game developed as a solo project by veteran game designer Yuji Naka. It riffs on games like 2048 and its ilk with a dice shooting twist, combining mastery of the physics engine with strategic placement, and ricocheting, of the dice to increase your score.

name: Shmup Ball
summary: Created for the AI and games game jam for theme "breaking the rules". The referee has gave up the day job and all rules have been aborted. Except one: Shoot to win. Shoot the ball, shoot the ball at the goal, shoot the enemy team, shoot your team mates. It's shmup ball. Anything goes.

name: She Who Fights Monsters: Choice Edition
summary: Once upon a time, there was a sweet little girl with a big imagination. Her name was Jennifer (Jenny for short), and her world was full of adventure. A closet became a sanctuary. A basement became a secret passage to the Land of Elves. And her home became a nightmare world with no warning, rhyme or reason beyond the unpredictable winds of her father's drunken rage.

name: Shikkoku no Sharnoth: What a beautiful tomorrow
summary: The player assumes the role of Mary Clarissa Christie. Mary has heterochromia eyes, her right eye is gold while her left eye is blue. She originally had blue eyes but her right eye changed colours one year prior to the game's events and she has been seeing strange visions since.

name: Shooterwave
summary: Do you like the VAPORWAVE style? If yes, like me, then I believe that you should play this game, which contains nice music, nice graphics and a shooter. Enjoy it!

name: Shiba Army
summary: Try to survive with your character on an imaginary path to the moon. Collect as many coins as possible, play to get the highest score, so that you can be your own captain in the Shiba Inu army.

name: Shadow Watcher
summary: This game is a RPG action type game with female protagonists. Use all kinds of active and passive skills: assassination, back stabbing, rebound, counterattack, pursuit, combo, and active skills to show their skills in the face of a variety of enemies in bloody confrontation.

name: Shadow Tactics: Anniversary Bundle
summary:
This bundle celebrates the 5th anniversary of the critically acclaimed game & contains the full Shadow Tactics experience
- The original game Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
- The standalone expansion Aiko's Choice
- The complete set of DLC for both games

name: Showa American Story
summary: Showa American Story is a brand new RPG and an enthusiastic love letter to the 80s' pop culture that features a strong taste of B-Movies. Follow Choko's journey of truth and revenge across North America as she grows stronger.

name: Shape TD
summary: A Tower Defense game, where geometric shapes face each other, and you, the Leader of the Order, must carefully plan your time and money to defeat enemies. With a minimalist design, this is the game for those looking to relax and at the same time train their agility and logical thinking.

name: Shiori no Kotoha: Dark Reflections
summary: A series of murders and bizarre incidents occur in a private library that has become inescapable. Eventually, the food runs out and the library becomes filled with madness... This work is a visual novel of the survival suspense genre, set in a private library.

name: Sheltered Double Pack
summary: The original Sheltered and highly anticipated sequel Sheltered 2 join forces in this unforgiving survival management double pack.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Beyond a Joke
summary: Race to outsmart a daring opponent who targets only rich people.

name: Shinya Ichizoku: The Battle for Hokkaido's Delicious Foods
summary: Hokkaido, Japan's Kingdom of Gastronomy! In this action game, members of the popular Japanese TV show "Shinya Ichizoku" fight off aliens who have attacked Hokkaido in an attempt to steal it. Play against the aliens who attack 179 cities, towns and villages in Hokkaido. By controlling your character, you can collect Hokkaido's specialties and delicious ingredients that appear on the screen, and give them to the goal, the bear, for points. As you progress through the game, you will collect various Hokkaido delicacies, which will be added to your "Picture Book". Let's collect all the delicious foods of Hokkaido!

name: Shadowgate VR: The Mines of Mythrok
summary:
The first book in the Shadowgate Saga, Shadowgate VR: The Mines of Mythrok brings the hit adventure series to virtual reality! Step into the fantasy world of Kal Torlin like never before and immerse yourself in this exciting action/adventure game made exclusively for the Oculus Quest!

With Odin the raven as your guide, and three difficulty levels to fit your play style, it's time to discover what secrets await within the Mines of Mythrok!

name: Shores of Loci
summary: Escape the Ordinary, Create the Extraordinary. A Puzzling Adventure by MikeTeevee.

name: Shooter's Island
summary: Shooter’s Island is an aim trainer with VR support, built for FPS pros and beginners alike. On an expansive, remote island, several trials await you that train your reflexes and precision. Analyze your shooting skills on your personal low-poly testing island!

name: Sharon and the Last Garden
summary: Cleanse the world with the power of bacteria.

name: Shadow Life
summary: Explore temples and caves. Slay monsters and avoid traps and hazards. Uncover hidden rooms. Repair the Book of Dark Magic to defeat the evil spirit that inhabits this world.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Mycroft's Pride
summary: Big brother Mycroft sends you a series of cases linked to homeland security. Make the Empire proud!

name: Shaped Beats
summary: Shaped Beats Is A 2D Video Game Of The Bullet Hell Genre, with Pixel art graphics, You control a Wolfs Space Forces plane, which is sent to different missions together with its Squad, however things are not as they seem and you have to find out what mysteries in space.

name: Shibadungeon
summary: Shibadungeon is a turn-based dungeon crawler that you can play with friends!

name: Shards of Chaos
summary:
This Visual Novel tells the story of a dark journey in a broken world.

The action takes place in the abandoned estate of the former Order called “Black Rose”. One day this estate was swallowed up by the magical catastrophe which spread death to all nearby lands, turning people into “Shadows”.
You will have to plunge into this cursed place, where a mad & legendary adventurer, and a girl from the “Hel” clan are hiding in the darkness.

A non-linear plot that can change depending on your choices | A dramatic story, not a dating sim.

name: Ships
summary: Take control of 3 special-purpose ships and perform interesting missions in the dangerous waters of the Baltic Sea.

name: Shin Mahjong Tenka Fubu
summary: 戦国時代に信じる者は己のみ！がキーワード！ 麻雀とシミュレーションゲーム要素を同時に楽しみたい方に待望の麻雀ゲーム 『真 麻雀天下布武』がSteamに登場いたしました！

name: Shadow Quest
summary: Shadow Quest is a game where you are exploring massive shadowland with the hope of getting out alive. There are lots of things you can find in there, from powerful enemies to countless money. But be aware, you might not be able to come out from that place. Grab Shadow Quest right now and engage yourself in the most exciting and rewarding game experience!

name: Shadows
summary: Visit a mysterious hotel and solve puzzles. Travel through creepy rooms and face your fears.

name: Shining Force: Hero of Light and Darkness
Shoot!
summary: Shooting, flying, using a shield, night vision... That is "Shoot!". VR shooter game, which requires a little bit of thinking. In our game, you will become a superhero, who has to save the others. Try it now and don't forget "With great power, comes great responsibility."!

name: Showdown
summary:
Showdown is a competitive PvP shooter that will make your heart beat faster!

You will be divided into two teams and placed in a kind of battle arena.
The battle between the two teams takes place on 3 levels with different layouts.​

Three maze-like levels await you. The first two levels have lifting platforms for variety, and the third level even has teleporters.

name: Shadow of Egypt
summary: Shadow of Egypt - is an adventurous 3D shooter with surviving and hardcore elements where you will fight with ancient Egyptian evil.

name: Shadow Running
summary: An evil cube trying to overcome all obstacles

name: Shadow of the Guild
summary: Combine your lightning spells, assassin skills, and warrior power to defeat your enemies in a 2D platformer / beat'm all! And prevent Emperor Gethro III from carrying out his project! Based on the french books "La Guilde des Marchands de Pluie"

name: ShapeGrid
summary: Shapegrid is a casual puzzle game. Find your way through different shapes and colors. Play 70+ levels or compete against other players in endless mode.

name: Showbiz Tycoon
summary: Own a movie studio, negotiate with talents, schedule releases, make money, expand your business and become the biggest in the industry.

name: Shattered Gardens
summary: Shattered Gardens is the all-new Open-World, Fantasy RPG!

name: She Hates Unicorns
summary: Clearly she hates unicorns. And will fight against their followers to return the unicorns where they come from.

name: Sharp Wands
summary: Fight your friends in an action packed 2D experience, learn to use the forest at your advantage and collect useful powerups to show off your style! Learn to fight with different characters each with its unique powers and flaws

name: Shadow Cave
summary: Shadow Cave - Uncover the secrets of the shadow cave in this platformer game with its protagonist. Explore the dark sections of dangerous nooks and crannies, collect coins and watch out for ghosts!

name: Shrumblo and the Magical Grumblo
summary: Survive for as long as you can while playing as the blue robot Shrumblo! The objective of this game is to lure Grumblo, the red demon, into several moving spikes which temporarily stuns him, and also earns you a point. Survive for as long as you can and earn a high score!

name: Sherberia
summary: With your mother gone and your father falling ill, it is up to you to cure your dad and to save the family farm. Can you tackle the every day responsibilities of running a farm? Can you save your father?

name: Shootvaders: The Beginning
summary: The Space mission center has ordered you to fly into space and find a new planet. New planet will bring a new possibilities to humankind. The flight won't be easy! The universe has many alien groups that want to stop you.

name: ShapeVS
summary: ShapeTECH welcomes you to participate in their latest aptitude assessment program, ShapeVS. Gather your friends, family members and even colleagues as you participate in a variety of mini-games designed to test your capability of supporting our new society.

name: Shadow Fate
summary: Shadow Fate is a modernized, turn-based epic adventure where combat is intricate and challenging but immensely fun and satisfying, relying more on intelligent choices than repetitive grinding.

name: Sheryl Nome Chou Jikuu Virtual Clip: Ite-za Gogo Kyuu-ji Don't Be Late
summary: The existence of this Macross game is close to impossible to confirm. There are bits and pieces on the internet that can validate that it did exist at some point, though as there is no proof of it ever being released it was likely cancelled before it saw the light of day.

name: Shooter League
summary: Shooter League is a multiplayer first-person shooter converted into a sport! Score baskets to win and attack players with your gun or abilities. Play with different champions with unique abilities and use your gun for defense. Do very precise passing and more!

name: Shadow War
summary: Shadow War is a MMORPG set in a fantasy Eastern-themed environment. The game was released in Taiwan and Brazil and, even though officially offline since 2013, it still has active players through unofficial servers.

name: Shroomchitect
summary: A relaxing creative game where you care for your shroomies like virtual pets and help them build a cute home in a big mushroom and take pictures!

name: Shroom and Gloom: Jam Version
summary:
Descend into the unknown in Shroom and Gloom a first person, dungeon-crawling, deck-building tale of mushrooms and madness.

Enter The Underealm armed with nothing but a rust blade, a dying phone and a healthy appetite for roasted mushrooms. Explore your way through the depths, digging up new weapons in your quest to reach The Megashroom at all costs! Combine, grow and enchant your discoveries as you battle your way through terrifying Terry's, enchanting Bardshrooms and otherworldly Pizza Blobs!

name: Shadow Burglar
summary: In Shadow Burglar, you will be playing as Jean, a thief with the mystical power of morphing with the shadows. Creating yourself an improbable path in the dark and carefully dealing with guards in the light, you will try to steal back your deceased brother’s paintings, who were stolen by a secret criminal organization. Do you have what it takes to avenge his legacy?

name: Shadow's Bullet
summary:
Shadow’s Bullet is a top-down local multiplayer arena game with a twin-stick shooter gameplay, for 2 to 4 players sharing the same screen.

Players control agents from the future who have the particularity to become invisible as long as they’re not under a bright light or taking actions.

Players will fight each other, free for all or in teams, in various game modes, on multiple maps throughout various locations and time periods. Each one with their own game mechanics and traps to discover.

name: Shadows of Glory
summary: Shadows of Glory is a free-to-play online roman gladiator combat multiplayer game for PC.

name: Shinobi Warfare
summary: Play an 2d turn based RPG multiplayer game, stylize your own shinobi and play different game modes alone or with your friends! Level up, unlock various items and skills and procced in your journey of becoming the next Kage!

name: Shadow Killer
summary: Shadow Killer - Top Down View game for a samurai who fights off a flying shuriken with his katana and thereby kills his enemies. Unique levels are built so that you cannot relax and are always ready to dodge your own shuriken and fight off enemies in time.

name: Shadow Samurai Revenge
summary:
