Arashi's son was kidnapped, and his wife was killed by an evil demon called Orochi. Last 10 years Orochi was sealed away by Arashi, but now Arashi has to take his Revenge and try to rescue his son.
The game needs strategic thinking and memorizing with extra focus on avoiding traps. It has numerous levels to go through, each with its fair share of challenges and demanding situations.

name: Shark Adventure
summary: Shark Adventure puts you in the role of a shark and your primary focus is to acquire as many stars as you can, while avoiding obstacles that come your way. It's a very engaging and impressive game with lots of fun and enjoyable mechanics. This is not a simple game, it requires a lot of precision and attention. But it goes to show how exciting and fun this type of experience actually is.

name: Sharing Lights
summary: Gather all your grey matter and enter the dungeon. Sharing Lights is a 3D isometric puzzler in which you control multiple Ghosts at the same time. Manage their lights and use their abilities cleverly to reach the Architect and find the exit.

name: Showdown
summary:
Showdown is a 1 or 2-player action shooter for the Commodore 64, released in 2020. The game is inspired by a host of older titles with the same theme, going all the way back to Gun Fight from 1975.

You play a cowboy out to win a fierce gun duel. The first one to outwit and knock down the opponent 5 times is the winner of the duel.

name: Shepherd
summary: Watch over the flock!

name: Showdown Party
summary: A tale of courage and friendship. Catch creatures called Zelds. Raise them. Train them. Use them for battle! You will be aided by your deck of cards, built around your own strategy. Can you overcome the challenge and save the world?

name: Shroomscape Zone
summary: Shroomscape Zone is a beautiful and also surreal action shooting game with light platforming and puzzle elements. It utilizes realistic ballistics with honest physics simulation, hit-scan is not allowed!

name: Shinobi Non Grata
summary: Shinobi alert! Use your 7 shinobi weapons to survive the bloodshed! Introducing a hard core 2D ninja action game by Hyper-retro graphics.

name: Shred and Tear: Explosive Kajun
summary: An ultraviolent, fast-paced, sexy and gory Hack n' Slash Single player game giving you heavy doses Adrenaline-rush with eye-candy fan service QTE and mecha-waifu.

name: Shinobi Shift
summary: Shinobi Shift is a first-person platformer with shooter elements where you can control the time!

name: Shrine of Tails
summary: You ended up in an ancient shrine and now you have to figure out what is going on here. Meet the girls living here and show them the power of your "artifact".

name: Shirone: the Dragon Girl
summary: ”Shirone: the Dragon Girl" is a 3D adventure game where you help Shirone solve puzzles and riddles to find a way out of a haunted castle. Escaping the castle is the main objective, and to do that you'll need to make full use of her wings and tail!

name: Sharing Lights
summary: Gather all your grey matter and enter the dungeon. Sharing Lights is a 3D isometric puzzler in which you control multiple Ghosts at the same time. Manage their lights and use their abilities cleverly to reach the Architect and find the exit.

name: Sharp Trouble
summary: Sharp trouble - King, wake up, we're under attack! Evil barbarians have invaded your castle and are trying to take out the entire treasury - stop this outrage in this hardcore platformer!

name: Shankaram: Code Reborn
summary: Shankaram is a third-person shooter, story-based detective game. In where you play as a government agent using your unique ability to fight back against corruption. Investigating from shady slums to big MNCs with the help of your tactical strategies and surviving in forest to flooded rural areas.

name: Shadowrun Chronicles: Boston Lockdown - Missions
summary: Random Mission Pack: Boston never sleeps and there are always Nuyen and Karma to be earned for an industrious Shadowrunner. From collecting nanite samples to freeing hostages and defusing bombs, a wealth of repeatable randomized set-ups mission will keep you on your toes and allow you to improve your character and gear.

name: Short Circuit
summary: Unique PvP flying arena fighter set around macro electronics

name: Shale Hill Secrets
summary: In this story-focused adult visual novel by Love-Joint, you suddenly gain the power to peer into people’s hidden lives. Seduce your classmates in beautiful rendered 3D art. Unravel a conspiracy, fall in love, or use your power for yourself.

name: Shooter Dual Pack I Necromunda: Hired Gun + Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition
summary:
The Shooter Dual Pack includes:
- Necromunda: Hired Gun
- Space Hulk: Deathwing - Enhanced Edition at a reduced price.

name: Shimojimo no Seikatsu wo Tashinamu Tame no Tsudoi: Muchi de Kouki na Ojou-sama wa Shomin no Seikatsu ni Kyoumi Shinshin
Shiraha Kirameku Koi Shirabe
summary:
Ayato is an exorcist who works for the government. This time his mission is to investigate and destroy a supernatural object which had been brought into the sword arts school Murakumo Gakuen. With the help of his team members Hime and Ruri, he traced its location to Matsurika, the sole daughter of the head of the Swordbearing Defence Group. They were successful in destroying the object, but as a result, Matsurika became the initiator of the Spiritual Calamity. To teach her skills to fight against spirits, Ayato became a temporary mentor to her.

“No matter what, I want to stand by your side…”

name: Shukusai no Utahime: Kimi to Tsumugu Asu he no Uta
Ship of Harkinian
summary: Ship of Harkinian, also known as The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time PC Port, is a mod (which requires the original game to compile) of the famous Nintendo 64 game, made using the open-source code by the Nintendo 64 Decompilation Project, just like the Super Mario 64 PC Port. This mod adds quality of life improvements to the game, like Widescreen resolution, HD textures and compatibility with modern controllers, while making it playable on Windows.

name: Ship of Fools
summary: Ship of Fools is a seafaring cooperative roguelite. Set sail, man the cannons and battle sea monsters through the tempestuous seas of the Archipelago. Are you fool enough to stop the Aquapocalypse?

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - M for Mystery
summary: Mycroft's agents were outsmarted, and confidential documents have been stolen. You are tasked with locating a shadowy figure known only as M. It appears there is a worthy opponent at large on Cordona.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Saints and Sinners
summary: Sherlock is forced to find the boundary between church and state, challenging his commitment to the law and justice.

name: Shooting Star Island
summary: Shooting Star Island is a big and colorful 3d platformer. Stanky Star will rekindle his powers throughout his journey to the comet's depths, where lost worlds slumber and the Muses of the End sing their songs of destruction.

name: Shady Business
summary: Shady business - The security of your homeland is under threat! Take control of the plane and destroy the rising threat before it destroys you in this sidescroller shooter!

name: Shooter Engine
summary: A sci-fi shooter set on a space base

name: Shell Girls in Puzzle Skulls
summary: Strip puzzle with skulls and monster girls.

name: Sheep's Territory
summary: A gang of wolves are invading the sheep's territory. The sheep are stepping up the construction of fences to defend their home. Due to limited resources and space, the fences have to be built in the most material-saving way, which is a huge challenge for the sheep. They NEED your help!!!

name: Sheep It Up!
summary: Sheep It Up! is a homebrew platformer for the Atari 2600 which stars a sheep who needs to use velcro platforms to go up.

name: Shooting Covid
summary: Years and years after the virus outbreak, humanity has been suffering. Alpha Zen sends their last hope, Bella, to save humankind from the apocalypse. Bella's mission to restore hope and hunting for vaccines is risky and hazardous. She cannot do this on her own. So, she needs the best sidekick, you.

name: Shoot. Kill. Repeat
summary: When immediately after the New Year holidays there is an outbreak of a new virus, and the world quickly turns into a bloody mess! The one who could - survived, the rest turned into angry zombies! You have to immerse yourself in a world where your weapon has the last word.

name: Shadow of the Wool Ball
summary:
Shadow of the Wool Ball is a 2016 total conversion for the ZDoom engine. Made by MSPaintR0cks, this is a unique shooter in which the player is a hedgehog fighting an army of cats. It is spread across three episodes, each having six levels. The mapping style is more akin to Wolfenstein 3D than classic Doom.

The playful art style, creative gameplay mechanics, and humorous plot were well-received, including a runner-up at the Cacowards 2016. A sequel, Rise of the Wool Ball, was released by MSPaintR0cks the following year.

name: Shotgun King: the Final Checkmate
summary: It's chess, but you replace your entire army with a royal shotgun, with some roguelike elements.

name: Shunga Frame
summary: Immerse yourself in the world of traditional Japanese erotic art with Shunga Frame. Relaxing music, candid arts and atmosphere of ancient japan. Awesome for relax after a day at work.

name: Shelter 69
summary: Expand your shelter in a unique take on the post-apocalypse genre, thrown straight into a wild world where women reign supreme across the wastelands. You are the last male, and all is for your taking.

name: Shadow Over Innsmouth
summary:
Very Early and Historically-relevant in the Quake modding scene, this map stood out when single-player modding wasn't common, with its moody atmosphere.
Shadow over Innsmouth is a large medieval village with a few new textures and reskinned monsters. Somewhat of a sequel to "Village of Dread".

This is considered Steve Rescoe's finest map by many.

The map was featured on the RockPaperShotgun's "Quake Renaissance: a short history of 25 years of Quake modding" article.

The map name is taken from a horror-occult short story by author H.P. Lovecraft, main inspiration for the Quake game.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Crimes and Punishments + Sherlock Holmes: The Devil's Daughter Bundle
summary:
His skills, your wits.

Become the ultimate Sherlock Holmes with this bundle of two acclaimed detective best-sellers: Sherlock Holmes Crimes & Punishments and Sherlock Holmes The Devil’s Daughter. Put your intuition and logic to the test as you investigate a multitude of mind bending and gripping cases, and make your own deductions and difficult moral choices.

name: Shootball Arena
summary: Shootball Arena is a fast paced online multiplayer game in which football and third person shooter merge together. Choose your avatar, hold your favorite gun and challenge your friends in exciting matches up to ten players. You need speed, agility and a perfect shot… do you have what it takes?

name: Sharp Shooter Bundle: S.N.I.P.E.R Hunter Scope + Knights & Guns
summary: Aim, breath, hold, squeeze - those fundamentals of marksmanship will come in handy! This bundle includes two arcade-style shooting games: - Become a hunter and fight for your freedom in S.N.I.P.E.

name: Shirazu Yama
summary: First-person horror action game. Stranded on a mountain, you can only rely on your lighter to show you the way through the dark forest. Can you overcome your fear and find the way out?

name: Shinogi Chess Club
summary: At Yoshino High School, all that matters is your skill in Shinogi Chess. As the Spring Championships approach, Himiko Masaki investigates a dangerous organization and discovers a powerful ability. Climb the ranks, make new friends (and enemies), and search for answers in Shinogi Chess Club!

name: Shatterspace
summary: Super-tight controls and satisfying mechanics will guide you from the seemingly-peaceful early levels all the way to complete insanity in this survival space adventure. Beginner pilots will grow, skilled pilots will be challenged, but only the best will reach the end.

name: Sharknado VR: Arcade Edition
summary: Sharknado VR: Arcade Edition puts you in the middle of the action - use a variety of weapons to battle the terrifying Sharknado. Maim, shoot and explode your way through hordes of hungry flying sharks and other airborne sea creatures in Sharknado VR!

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator: Submarines
summary: Ship Graveyard Simulator: Submarines brings a new and exciting addition to the game we know and love. Have you already disassembled all the ships on the sandy beach? Then now it’s time to put your skills to test with submarines!

name: Shibainu: VR Katana Simulator
summary: ShibaInu is a virtual reality (VR) Katana simulator. This game mainly focuses on proper Katana handling, physics interactions and cutting mechanics. Precise and controlled cuts are performed on Tatamis (traditional Japanese floor mat) rolled into a cylindrical shape.

name: Shuriken
summary: This is a computer RPG game. In the game, players are responsible for playing roles, moving and surviving in a world full of monsters.

name: Shuuchakueki
summary: There are three stories about departure and separation, each focusing on a different heroine of Air.

name: Shapebreaker
summary: A fusion of tower defense games and roguelike deckbuilders. Use your cards to build towers and to upgrade them in unique ways. Gain rewards to customize your deck, defense and playstyle. Break the shapes before they break you!

name: Shadow XS
summary: Shadow XS is a Flash game that was available on the official 4Kids website. You play as "Shadow Xs", and have to get to the end of the level while collecting rings and defeating enemies. It is a version of Sonic XS, with a different level layout.

name: Shift Shaft
summary: Manipulate your player and the board by rotating it and clearing groups of 3 or more rocks. Collect and spend gems to upgrade your stats and unlock over 30 different items during each run. Go up against 5 unique enemies and the gem-eating spider to uncover the world beneath the mines.

name: Should Shoot
summary: With Should Shoot, you can play together on one device! This is the most fun you’ll have playing together on a Mobile device ever! Tired of beating your friends? Then try one single-player modes and set a high-score!

name: ShapeOminoes
summary:
The goal is simple: fill generated shape three times using different types of ominoes.
Each level has its own unique shape to fill and consists of three sublevels that need to be solved in order to unlock the next one. Each sublevel has its own omino type to use. Difficulty is scaling throughout the entire game. In the beginning, levels are simple and teach how to play. After that, they get bigger, more complicated and more challenging. There are over 120 levels in total to solve.

name: Shieldwall Chronicles
summary: In Shieldwall Chronicles, you lead a mercenary band into the perilous and cold northlands of Tarren. Your search for fortune will see you pitch blade and spell book against a host of enemies including the undead, demons, and lizardmen and many other creatures. In a battle that is part game-book and part tactical RPG, you will build a powerful band of warriors and wizards and tilt the balance of power in the northern kingdoms.

name: Shadow of the Tomb Raider: Limited Steelbook Edition
summary:
Experience Lara Croft's defining moment.

As Lara Croft races to save the world from a Maya apocalypse, she must become the Tomb Raider she is destined to be.

Become the Tomb Raider

Limited Steelbook Edition includes;
- Shadow of the Tomb Raider (the game)
- A steelbook
- Three art cards.

name: Shooter League: Robot Goal
summary: Robot Goal is a multiplayer first-person shooter with a soccer twist!, score goals with your gun to win! Choose one of many champions with each their own abilities! Use your gun or abilities to attack players! Do very accurate passing! Use your gun for defense and more!

name: Shoot Trip Die
summary: Shoot Trip Die is a psychedelic, arcade, rogue-like romp! Finger blast your way through dozens of levels mowing down strange monsters and collecting even weirder items, all to get back to your pissed stained mattress!

name: Shadow Grinder
summary:
Shadow Grinder is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2003. There is a single button on the game which allows the player to jump.

The objective of the game was to grind down the rails with Shadow, avoiding gaps by pressing the jump button. No directional pad was needed as Shadow moved automatically. After clearing 15 gaps the level and speed increase. Four levels is the maximum amount of levels. If the player falls into gaps 10 times in a single level the game ends.

name: Shadow Hockey
summary:
Shadow Hockey is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2004. This game was repackaged and released as Shadow Basketball. Omega is also featured on the cover.

The objective of the game is to move left or right to an area where there is no defender or where a defender is in a unguarded position. When in this position press the right button to score a point. After scoring enough points the level will advance but if your player is blocked enough times the game will end.

name: Shinobi
summary: The LCD version of Shinobi is a watered-down version of the arcade game Shinobi created by Tiger Electronics.

name: Shape Puzzle
summary: Relaxed puzzle game with challenging riddles. Combine, rotate and move different shapes to reach the next level. Solve several puzzles at the same time, but be careful not to destroy your progress by unwary changes.

name: ShadowBringer
summary: Escape the underground research facility and discover the truth of your origin. ShadowBringer is a 3D stealth game where you take on the role of a shadowy monster. Awakened with no recollection of the past, a voice in your head whispers softly to you: "Get out of this place".

name: Shall we date?: Blood in Roses
summary:
Now included in the "Dear Otome" app.
The heroine of the game meets a beautiful and bloodcurdling kind, ‘Vampires’ at the castle connecting the dark world and the human world. One day, she is taken her blood by the vampires. If she fails to find and drink the evening dew from the Rose Garden within ten days, she is told to be turned into a vampire. Nurturing a love with her partner, she struggles to find the Rose Garden somewhere in the castle, and reveal its mystery.

name: Shadow of Death 2: Awakening
summary:
The sequel to the epic Shadow of Death with over 10 million downloads worldwide.
Shadow of Death 2 continues the story of Maximus - a warrior with a cleansed memory. He wandered in the dark, fighting demons to bring back light to Aurora - the land he once lived and to rescue the ones he once loved. And now, warriors, are you ready to join Maximus in the next chapter of Aurora? Challenge the enemies, and show them what you've got!

name: Shinies: Call of Light
summary: A single-player adventure full of wonderful landscapes and beautiful musics for PC, it tells a deeply emotional story of a lovely friendship. Solve puzzles, sneak around creatures and use your spherical shield as your only protection. Attack using the same shield with speed, or by countering

name: Shaun the Sheep: Sheep Stack
summary: Sheep Stack is the new game from Shaun the Sheep, where flying by the seat of your pants has never been so much fun! Using a pair of massive pants, launch Shaun’s flock into the sky and stack ‘em high to help them reach a plate of doughnuts waiting at the top. But watch out – the slightest wobble and your woolly wonder will crash to the ground!

name: Shaolin vs Wutang
summary: Shaolin vs Wutang is a real love letter to classic 70's and 80's Kung Fu cinema. This is a indie passion project that was made by one person who has tremendous passion for, and knowledge of Kung Fu films.

name: Shiro to Kuro no Alice for Nintendo Switch
summary: Shiro to Kuro no Alice for Nintendo Switch is a bundle of both Shiro to Kuro no Alice games.

name: Shopping Clutter: The Best Playground
summary: The Walker family is back with an all new puzzle adventure game. You know the Walkers from the Travel Mosaic series. This time, they are looking to create a perfect playground where children of all ages and their parents can spend quality time together. As it turns out, this will not be an easy task. Help the Walkers sort through mounds of clutter to find all the necessary equipment to finish the job.

name: Shrek the Third
summary:
An action video game based from the third installment of the Shrek movie series.

The Frog King has died and Shrek has inherited the throne. Since Shrek's not a big fan of this idea, he and his friends journey to the Worcestershire academy to recruit Fiona's cousin, Artie, for the job. Unfortunately, while he's away the dastardly Prince Charming has big plans to take over the kingdom.

name: Shadow the Hedgehog Flash
summary: Flash game released to promote Shadow the Hedgehog.

name: Sherlock Holmes Essential Bundle
summary: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One + Sherlock Holmes: Crimes and Punishments + Sherlock Holmes: The Devil's Daughter Bundle

name: Shump Mania
summary: Challenge yourself to complete this classic retro-style adventure

name: Shmup Mania
summary: Challenge yourself to complete this classic retro-style adventure.

name: ShamaL
summary: ShamaL is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Modori who doesn't want to leave her room. The main task in the game is to collect all the effects.

name: She is mad: Pay your demon
summary: A horror defence adventure set in the 80's in which black magic to save a daughter has gone wrong

name: Shadow's Kiss
summary: A modern gothic vampire online RPG featuring turn based combat, intrigue, horror, and mature themes.

name: Shooting girl
summary: It's a casual stress-busting shooter game where you beat enemies to get gold for upgrades and unlock weapons and the more levels it is, you have to think about how do you complete the game by refine Weapons . Also there alot fun things like turntable flip cards and other mini-games and CG in here.

name: Shell Soldier
summary: Shell Soldier is a high‑octane first‑person shooter set in a bleak dystopian future. Featuring frenetic firefights against a diverse range of enemy combatants, each employing unique tactics and weaponry, and offering a wide arsenal of lethal tools at your disposal.

name: Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Cursed Wedding & Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Under the Crimson Moon
Shadow Chronicles: Collector's Edition
summary:
Shadow Chronicles: Collector's Edition includes;
- Ghost Encounters: Deadwood
- The Mystery of the Crystal Portal
- Odysseus: Long Way Home
- Shadows: Price for Our Sins
- Shiver: Poltergeist

name: Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Curse of the Full Moon & Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Bane of the Family
Shady Lewd Kart
summary: Shady Lewd Kart takes go karting party games and mashes it with a dating sim to give you fast power sliding game play, sexy power-ups and lewd unlocks. The first ever Ecchi Kart game!

name: Shuv-It
summary: A minimalist puzzle game for the Playdate.

name: Shatter Remastered Deluxe
summary:
Shatter returns in stunning 4K resolution running at 120fps, with a modernised UI, and multiple visual improvements. Re-experience the highly acclaimed original soundtrack, remixed and remastered in 5.1 surround sound.
Travel through 10 distinct worlds and battle 9 unique bosses; packed with amazing physics effects, power-ups and special attacks. Take control of the playing field with the innovative “suck and blow” mechanic, altering the game to your benefit and charging up ultimate ability SHARDSTORM.

name: Shtdn
summary:
The desktop is peaceful as usual.
In order to delete the computer virus called "Agape", the anti-virus program, Virus Buster "Goyou", must cooperate with it while searching through the computer's files.

name: Shirushi
summary: Shirushi is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You start as Yatsuki, a girl who refuses to leave her room. She can travel to the dream world by sleeping on her bed. Her main task is to collect Stoicheios in certain dream worlds.

name: Shark Assault Simulator
summary: I don't think you'd want to rest on that beach. Shark Assault Simulator is a game that shows us how dangerous it is to sunbathe on an unknown beach.

name: Shadow Angel
summary: This game is a domestic third person RPG action soul game with female protagonists. In the process of fighting against the dark forces, you will continue to become stronger. Use multiple skills flexibly to defeat the enemy in bloody battle.

name: Shake Ground
summary: "Shake Ground" is a classic top-down arena shooter. The player takes on the role of a fearless tanker and the main goal is to defeat all enemies and survive in the battle.

name: Shoot Shoot Nitori the Golden
summary:
Collect equipment items that appear from enemies and item boxes to make Nitori more and more powerful.
Defeat enemies and become even stronger.

name: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution
summary: The long-lost sequel to the original Shantae, is back in development after being put on the shelf for nearly two decades. Building off the original game code from the early 2000s, this once-canceled title will be completed and released physically on a Game Boy Advance-compatible game cartridge.

name: Sheeplings
summary: With 'Sheeplings' children can discover the use of mobile devices and their possibilities in a gentle way. The app lets children experience a day of a lamb and its mother in a blooming meadow. There are no rules, goals or tasks. When children engage with the digital device for the first time, they can observe the lovingly designed and animated animals. Simple touch gestures can then be used to discover the interactivity of the game: The sheep follow the finger or can be stroked. A technically sophisticated simulation makes it a lot of fun to stroke the grass with your fingers. And children who have already tried out the app loved making the colorful flowers literally sound. The playful and self-directed experience is not disturbed by any menus. At the beginning, the game explains to parents how to prevent accidental switching to other apps. The duration of the game can also be set here. After the time has expired, the day comes to an end with a sunset. When the sheep lies down to sleep, the interaction options end and the game comes to an end.

name: Shadow of Asha
summary: Asha's shadows are invading and corrupting Narkian. It's up to you to stop her!, level up, explore the village for resources and become stronger.

name: Shattered Memories
summary:
This is a game made with Tomb Raider Level Editor. It uses the mechanics of Tomb Raider 2 while recreating its entire story.

This TRLE was placed in the trle.net hall of fame in 2023.

name: Shishi: Timeless Prelude
summary: Shishi : Timeless Prelude is a colorful dungeon role-playing game. As Elia, a young mage, you will explore the depths of a sacred sanctuary to complete your training to become an Oracle.

name: Shattered State
summary:
A city in turmoil. A nation under threat - where only your decisions can prevent catastrophe.

From the BAFTA award winning creators of Until Dawn comes a new cinematic VR experience.

You assume the role of the Director of the National Intelligence Agency in the midst of a national crisis. Take control of the situation and make tough decisions that decide the fate of your colleagues, the population and ultimately the nation. Who will you save? Who will you trust?

name: Shackles of Ellswyn
summary: You've fallen into a weird world where men don't belong and are hunted down to become slaves. Will you submit or escape?

name: Shadow and Bone: Enter the Fold
summary:
Shape the fate of the Grishaverse. Travel war-torn Ravka and choose which powers prevail in this interactive adventure based on the fantasy series.

You determine the choices of the iconic heroes of "Shadow and Bone" in this interactive RPG featuring original adventures based on the Netflix series and bestselling books. Explore the world as Alina, Jesper, Sturmhond and General Kirigan as you discover previously untold stories set between Seasons 1 and 2 of the hit Netflix show. Encounter familiar faces, new villains, hard choices and dramatic twists in this narrative RPG that puts the player in charge as the story unfolds.

name: Shoulders of Giants
summary: Shoulders of Giants is an explosively colourful roguelike where players simultaneously control a mysterious mech and the gunslinging amphibian riding on its back. Work alone, with a friend, or as one member of a four-person online co-op team, cutting through waves of enemies on a quest to rescue the galaxy from the forces of Entropy!

name: Shigatsubaka-tachi no Utage
summary:
This is an RPG game, so explore the town a lot.
Don't stay in your room and talk to many people.
Fight the evil monsters that attack you.
And make friends on the riverbank.
When you have 1000 friends, you have reached the goal.

name: Shining Jump Jump
summary: Yggdra Resonanc (old Shining Maiden)'s cute girl jumping game~!

name: ShapeR
summary: SHPR is an arcade shooter, arena survival roguelike in which you have to choose items, create builds and synergies that will help you to defeat enemies and bosses to be able to pass to the next levels.

name: Shanghai Mahjong
summary: Shanghai Mahjong, one of the most popular games of all time, returns in this definitive edition. Whether you have two minutes or two hours you'll quickly lose yourself in this classic tile-matching obsession.

name: Shh...! Welcome to Frightfearland
summary: An arcade light-gun shooter that serves as the second entry in the Panic Museum series. The game stars two special agents investigating the disappearance of a town of 100 people as they stumble into an evil plot involving killer clowns, American folk tale figures, and a sentient runaway roller coaster.

name: Shinobi, Koi Utsutsu: Banka Aya Emaki - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Shinobi Koi Utsutsu Banka Aya Emaki
- Drama CD
- Soundtrack CD

name: Shanshanshanshanshanhai
summary: This is a mini-game created by Desunoya at an event called Touhou Game Jam.

name: Shyftrs
summary: Shyftrs is a 2D stylized action adventure metroidvania game that will take you on a journey to uncover the mysteries of your lineage and the world beyond. Your weapon of choice are Cane Sword, Pistol or use your new found prowess. Step up and embrace the adventure.

name: She's My Vampire
summary: Find your perfect anime girlfriend in this unique visual novel.

name: Shisha: The Lost Souls
summary:
Life in Tokoyomi Village is quiet and peaceful. Yet the tiny village has a single restriction in place: no one may cross into the secluded Sealed Forest until the coming-of-age ceremony when they're officially recognized as an adult.

If you enter the Sealed Forest as a child, Lady Chiyo will come to take you away.

You've never broken the restriction despite your dreams of adventure. On the day of your friend Hayato's coming-of-age ceremony, however, you and your friends follow him into the Sealed Forest and find yourselves trapped in a world of eternal twilight, where shadow children play amidst dark trees and the ghost of Lady Chiyo stalks your every move.

Will you escape the Twilight World?

name: Shogi
summary:
This is a portable version of the classic board game (also known as Japanese Chess.) Two players can share a PSP and play Shogi together.

This game is one of a series of For Two games, where two players can simultaneously play together using the same PSP.

name: Shogun: Total War - Warlord Edition
summary: The Warlord Edition contains the complete Shogun: Total War game, plus two expansion packs: Invasion of the Mongol Horde and Campaigns of the Three Unifiers. These expansion sets include new military units, terrain, buildings, and scenarios.

name: Shadowland
summary: Shadowland is a work about the adventures of the main character, Tarosuke, in hell.

name: Shattered Between
summary: A dynamic roguelike shooter, where you can experiment with weapons and special abilities, wander through various rooms-worlds and defeat opponents! Will you pass the tests and reach the final goal?

name: Sheba: A New Dawn
summary: Sheba: A New Dawn is an action adventure metroidvania game that takes you through a compelling story of revenge and despair. Fight your way through the next decisive battle, A New Dawn. Explore the world of Sheba and the corruption of Jinn possessions.

name: Shuumatsu Shoujo
summary: An action game with two girls fighting together to survive the end of the world where crazy people roam.

name: Shobon no Rukimin! DX: Shobomi to Yuki no Tiara
Showrunner
summary: Create and run your own TV show! An isometric management game where you craft scripts, populate your world with characters and cast actors to play them. Hire and manage staff, develop your studio and gain a dedicated following.

name: Shred! Remastered
summary: With flowy level design and addictive gameplay - every inch of trail will keep you on the edge and keep you coming back for more! A total remake of “Shred! 1” remade with love, from the ground up.

name: Shards of Nogard
summary: Shards of Nogard is a powerful, evocative fantasy adventure game that will surprise you with fastpaced combat, mind-boggling puzzles, beautiful hand-crafted environments and an immersive story about the eternal battle set in the medieval fantasy world.

name: Shadows of Taumiel
summary: First-person horror game that includes several genres such as stealth, platforming and exploration.

name: Shadowsense.
summary: Heighten your talent to save the world.

name: Shockwave: Land of the Blind
summary: A first-person immersive bomb disposal sim with stealth mechanics that lets you taste the anxious life of a sapper. Work with specialistic equipment to disarm a wide range of explosives. Gather intel to choose the right path in the multi-layered levels and stay out of sight from armed militants.

name: Shattered Heaven
summary: Shattered Heaven is a single-player deck builder card game with RPG elements and an ambitious branching narrative, set in a dark fantasy world. The game focuses on a card game and roguelike gameplay fueled by a great replay value, thanks to procedural dungeons, a deep crafting system.

name: Shaun the Sheep: Shear Speed
summary:
Turbo-charge your hooves and get ready for the race of your life! Shear Speed challenges you to lead the Flock through the bustle of the Big City, dodging obstacles and keeping your distance from the dastardly Trumper, an evil animal catcher with the Flock firmly set in his sights. Drop the pace and you could find yourself spending the night in the pound…

Race through a colourful cityscape, jumping, rolling and dodging a variety of hazards along the way, keeping your eyes peeled for the grass you’ll need to munch to keep that boost meter powered up.

Shear Speed is a racing challenge that’s simple to play but tricky to truly master. Are you ready? On your marks, get set, GO!

name: Shutokou Battle Gaiden: Super Technic Challenge
summary: Shutokou Battle Gaiden: Super Technic Challenge is a Racing game, developed by Mitsui & Co. and published by MediaQuest, which was released in Japan in 1996. It features 25 licensed vehicles. The gameplay consists of drifting your vehicle with arcade-like handling in drift zones and recieving scores based on the angle, length and speed of the players's drift. Events are set up as a 1 v 1 battle between the player and a CPU, with the winner being whoever has the highest drift score at the end of the lap.

name: Shadow the Ronin: The Revenge to the Samurai
summary:
Dokuganryū, a legendary samurai of ancient capital imperial was deprived and expelled from their lands, and all your family was killed by the orders of the emperor.

After these events, he swore vengeance against his opponents until death. However, the emperor knowing of Dokuganryū's plans organized a group of ninjas highly trained assassins to defeat him.

Thus begins a long and bloody battle in the Edo period.

name: Shogun Showdown
summary: Shogun Showdown is a turn-based combat game with rogue-like and deck-building elements. Position yourself and attack at the right time, upgrade your tiles and combo them to get ready to face the Shogun!

name: Shiro: Midori
summary:
Midori, sequel to the award-winning puzzle game Shiro, tells the wondrous story of priest Yoshida. Together, you leave home and bring back hope to the people of Kyoto.

Travel through dark forests to invite the ancient gods, the Kami-sama, to Yoshida’s shrine. Solve challenging, handmade puzzles by placing emptiness in between maple trees to the Kami-sama.

Animal messengers of the gods will cross your way and offer their help. Learn Japanese words from them and whisper with the wind.

name: Shogunaria
summary: Shogunaria is an action-adventure RPG that takes elements from old school classics like Zelda, YS, Neutopia, Golden Axe Warrior, and Diablo. Select one of the 4 characters and take on a series of dungeons filled with traps and enemies!

name: Sheep
summary:
Sheep is a sheep herding game. Unbeknownst to most people, sheep are actually aliens that were sent to observe the earth millions of years ago. In the process, they were dumbed down to the sheepish mammals we all know and love today.

In this Lemmings-inspired game, your goal is to herd sheep across 28 hazard-filled levels so they can be rescued by their educated alien cousins. You play as one of the four sheep herders. These are the humans and dogs Bo Peep, Adam Halfpint, Motley and Shep. You herd four breeds of sheep and have to protect them from the evil Mr. Pear.

name: Shape Shifter
summary: You're a white, ever shifting shape. You need to find your way through the cracks. Use the holes punched by the ones that came before you. Make your way through the cracks, break through and create new holes by using the green elements. Enjoy the party.

name: Shangri La 2: The Valley of Words
Shadow of Destiny
summary:
Shadow of Destiny is an adventure game. There are no action elements in the game, and the protagonist has no health bar. Each chapter has a time limit, during which Eike has to find a way to prevent the murderer from killing him. This is mainly achieved by traveling through time to different hours, days, years, and even centuries. Obtaining a crucial item, having a conversation with a specific character, or performing another action in the past will prevent Eike from getting killed. Time-traveling requires energy units, which can be found by exploring the town. If Eike fails to achieve the goal at hand within the allotted time and prevent his murder, the chapter must be restarted.

During the course of the game the player will have several choices and opportunities to change the future in various ways. Due to the time-traveling feature, many objectives can be accomplished in non-linear ways, branching the storyline and eventually resulting in eight different endings, six of which can be achieved during the first playthrough, and two others unlocked after having reached the other six.

name: Shin Nobunaga no Yabou
summary: A new smartphone app "New Nobunaga's Ambition" made under the official license of "Nobunaga's Ambition / Creation" is now available! Challenge new ambitions with generals from all over the country!

name: Shrek 2 Activity Center: Twisted Fairy Tale Fun
Sherlock Holmes: The Hound of the Baskervilles - Collector's Edition
Shinseiki Evangelion: Typing Hokan Keikaku
summary: Neon Genesis Evangelion: Typing Hokan Keikaku, is a game for the Sega Dreamcast which uses the Dreamcast Keyboard. Its gameplay resembles the likes of The Typing of the Dead.

name: Shotdogs
summary: Shotdogs is a comprehensive score-based arcade game about stone skipping, but with guns. Hurl your weapon across the endless depths to reach the next island, upgrade your arsenal at the hot dog stand, and even buy some cool hats.

name: Shipwrecked 64
summary:
Bucky and his gang are in danger and they need your help!!

With this brand new 3D platformer, Bucky and his friends are going to be taken on a wild ride through an island they had crashed upon. Help out your pals and get the ship back up and running so you can go home once again!

This is a horror game, and contains potentially shocking content, loud noises, jumpscares and bloodshed.

name: Shrek Forever After
summary: Shrek Forever After is an action-adventure video game based on the film of the same name. It was released on May 18, 2010, in North America. It is the fourth and final video game based on the movie series of Shrek.

name: Shadow of Witch Marionette
summary: Shadow of Witch Marionette is a direct sequel to 2019's WitchSpring4 following Eirudy the Marionette Witch inside the Shadow World.

name: Shuyaku Sentai Irem Fighter
summary: Shuyaku Sentai Irem Fighter is a 1993 strategy video game developed and published by Irem exclusively in Japan for the Nintendo Game Boy on July 30, 1993. It features characters from four of Irem's franchises: R-Type, Mr. Heli, Ninja Spirit, and Hammerin' Harry.

name: SharkDrag Episode 5: Uniting the 5 Kingdoms
summary: A 2D classic RPG style game with unique custom-made monsters. Travel across the continent of Penta, fighting a variety of hostile creatures, and gathering allies as you go. A not too serious adventure awaits!Made in RPGMaker VX Ace, by a two person team.

name: Showgunners
summary: As a contestant on a brutal reality game show of the future, you must survive a deadly urban environment packed with lethal traps, confounding puzzles, and murderous, heavily armed psychopaths. Turn-based combat in hand crafted levels, built for entertainment.

name: Shadow's Light
summary: Shadow's Light is an atmospheric 3D puzzle platformer about a child refugee and their shadow, trying to survive across two different planes of existence, while solving puzzles by travelling across multiple universes, and traversing levels by casting physically interactable shadows.

name: Shufflepoker
summary: Shufflepoker is a revisited poker game, turned into a duel where you have to play tactics and tricks so that your challenger’s life points reach 0 before yours. Take a seat, sustain yourself and impose your style in this tavern full of opponents who are looking for fame.

name: Shutter Labs
summary: Work your way through 25 intricate puzzles designed to subvert your expectations using your trusty Shutter Cube as leverage to reach higher platforms... But keep in mind that each throw, is a dice roll, potentially causing you to swap places with your cube or you know, spontaneously combust!

name: SHPR
summary: SHPR is an arena survival roguelike in which you have to buy items while creating amazing builds and synergies that will help you defeat enemies to be able to pass to the next stages.

name: Short Stories Paranoia
summary: How do you know, if something is real, or just in your mind? Are you really sure that you can distinguish imagination from reality? For the next couple of hours, listen, watch and be part of a story where imagination and reality intersect each other.

name: Shafted
summary: Shafted is a quick resource management game. Build your mini mining colony. Optimize your mineral outputs. Strategically position your buildings with turn based tactics. Pay off your contracts or else you'll get shafted.

name: Shooting Game Kari
summary: The ultra-hardcore, authentic vertical scrolling shooter game comes back to life in the modern age. Dodge, shoot, and destroy. Conquer all six stages and experience the real thrill of vertical scrolling shooter.

name: Shapik: The Quest
summary: This is a story of Shapik, traveling through magic forest in search of his missing sister. Explore a beautiful world, full of mystery, magic and danger and find your missing sister, solving puzzles on your way.

name: Shiny-Man-Adventures
summary: Shiny-Man-Adventures is a 2D-Platformer Shooter in which you are playing the Shiny Man character... You have been missing for many years but now your time has come to shine again.

name: Shido's World
summary: Explore an amazing world with the Shido and learn a little more about our history. Many adventures, beautiful places and remarkable stories await you in the Shido's World

name: Shadow Heroes
summary: Shadow hero is an act game with roguelike elements.

name: ShadoWave
summary: Shadow Wave is a Metroidvania-style action rogue lite. Explore different biomes always with different arrangements. With the help of your faithful companion, move fast, be precise in combat and watch your powers grow stronger. Evolve in death and enjoy the path.

name: Shadows on the Vatican: Act III - Sloth
summary: The intrigue continues, as American doctor James Murphy and the professional assassin Silvia join forces to expose the members of a conspiracy that leads all the way to the highest levels of the Catholic Church before they’re silenced forever for what they know.

name: Shock Troops
summary:
The Shock Troops are sent anywhere in the Galaxy where a problem needs to be solved with extreme prejudice.
Players will shoot their way through an epic interstellar adventure and uncover a dark conspiracy to end mankind.

Inspired by classics such as Doom and Quake, Shock Troops visual features include pixel-art textures and a mix of 3D environments and 2D sprites, seamlessly blending classic style with modern lighting.

Shock Troops gameplay aims at preserving the high-octane physicality of the classic shooters. Players will dodge incoming projectiles while responding in kind with a varied arsenal with various effects, at range, or in melee, with some impressive weapons or special powers.

You will be fighting your way through derelict space stations, frozen colonies, mining asteroids, large military spaceships, and lush alien planets. Each of these worlds will feature large “open” areas, set-pieces and theater of epic firefights.

name: Shining Resonance Refrain: Premium Fan Box - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: Shining Resonance Refrain
- Fan Book: Shining Magazine
- Drama CD
- Opening Song CD

name: Shark Adventure
summary: Challenge your Scuba Diving skills in this unique Retro Exploration game.

name: She Awaits
summary: She Awaits is a traditional style Yume Nikki fangame, it was originally developed for Dream Diary Jam 3. Play as Noelia and explore her dreams while you collect cards.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened
summary: Experience a nerve-racking Lovecraftian adventure, rebuilt from the ground up with modern graphics and gameplay. Become Sherlock Holmes, and find yourself at the heart of the terrifying Cthulhu Mythos as you investigate a series of mysterious disappearances in Europe and the US.

name: ShipRect
summary: Transform through various levels as Greg! Human now turned rectangle. Greg's spaceship crashed and he landed on a planet named Egg-12B and he is on his anxious quest back to Earth. Help Greg, he needs it.

name: Shatterline
summary: Shatterline is an arena FPS with a roguelike co-op mode (Expedition) as well as several traditional PvP modes such as TDM, Conquest, Plant-the-Bomb, and Escort. Players can choose Operatives and an armory of weapons that can be customized via attachments. Set in the near future, where humanity faces a threat of cosmic proportions. Players take on the roles of the Immunes – bearers of an extremely rare genetic combination that allows their bodies to resist the alien plague.

name: Shinobi
summary: The original arcade classic Shinobi now on Xbox LIVE Arcade!

name: Shadow Force
summary: Shadow Force is an action role-playing game with rogue-lite elements in dark universe. Become a vigilante monster hunter who hunts and slay ancient and terrifying creatures.

name: Shadowverse: Champion's Battle - Legendary Edition
summary: Introducing the Shadowverse: Champion's Battle Legendary Edition, bringing together the original strategic card battle game and the "Mythical Cards Premium Pass + 10 Levels" downloadable content.

name: Shoot Run
summary: Shoot Run is a first-person paintball shooter

name: Shukuchi Ninja
summary: Shukuchi Ninja is a fast-paced, high intensity arcade game with unique controls

name: Shocked
summary: Control electricity in this inFAMOUS-inspired game!

name: Shovel Software Insurance Claim
summary: Welcome to Shovel Software!

name: Shuttle Scuttle
summary: Shuttle Scuttle is a fast-paced, retro-style shooter game with a mission. It's the year 2285 and all is peaceful since the forming of the USSA (United Sol System Alliance). That is until Neptune station reports of unidentified spacecraft approaching. A hostile force is making its way through the Sol system towards Earth. Armed shuttles for asteroid destruction are the only defense crafts available. Seek out and intercept this hostile force before Earth becomes a target!

name: Shoot the Buuuuuuugs
summary: Shoot the Buuuuuuugs is hardcore arena survival game, collect crystals, kill bugs and have real fun!

name: Shiver: Moonlit Grove - Collector’s Edition
summary: Shiver: Moonlit Grove – Collector’s Edition is a premium release of the third installment in the Shiver hidden object adventure series. Developed and published by Artogon Games and Big Fish Games, this edition expands the original game with exclusive content including a bonus chapter, replayable puzzles, and downloadable extras. You play as a young doctor sent to replace your missing foster father, only to uncover dark secrets in a mysterious village.

name: Shadow Archer Special
summary: You are Shadow, a skilled archer of the realm. You must survive hordes of creatures by defeating them with your trusty crossbow. Find power-ups to defeat even tougher enemies!

name: Shellrazer
summary: You are a Klang Clan Turtle Wrangler and you must ensure your War Turtle completes his annual trek across the Goblin Kingdoms. Battle hordes of goblin archers, ballooners, sheep riders, mutant monsters and steampunk war machines and collect their loot to keep your edge in battle.

name: Shutokou Battle R
summary:
Shutokō Battle R is the third installment in the Shutokō Battle series for the PlayStation. This time, however, the action is not limited to Tokyo - it has spread to the Osaka metropolitan area. There are three game modes to choose from:

Scenario: Try to beat the clock as well as your competitors to the finish line. The points you earn can be used to upgrade your car in the machine shop.
Practice: You can practice driving before you try it on the real thing.
Link Race: Connect another PlayStation and play against another player.

The more opponents you defeat, the quicker you will be able to meet the challenge of professional driver and street legend Keiichi Tsuchiya.

name: Shin Hisui no Shizuku: Hiiro no Kakera 2
summary: Shin Hisui no Shizuku: Hiiro no Kakera 2 is an otome game created by Idea Factory and is one of the sequel games of Hiiro no Kakera. The game is the remake of the Hisui no Shizuku: Hiiro no Kakera 2.

name: Shin Hisui no Shizuku: Hiiro no Kakera 2 Portable
summary: A port of Shin Hisui no Shizuku - Hiiro no Kakera 2 for PSP.

name: Shinsouban Mahoutsukai to Goshujin-sama
summary: Otome game about a princess of a magical kingdom off to choose a new personal servant from the magic academy.

name: Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula
summary: Racing game based on the Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula animated series.

name: Shall we date?: The Niflheim
summary:
Now included in the "Story Jar" app.

Welcome to the world of Niflheim, the darkest and coldest kingdom for the dead, ruled by King Jean! This is the story of the princess, who has awakened from a millennium of sleep by three men (Orlando, J.J. and Philippe), and tries to find her true love, being demanded by King Jean to be his queen. Who will be her everlasting partner? Could the king be the one she can trust and promise, “till death again do us part?” Or, maybe the other?

name: Shining Core
summary: Shining Core was an RPG-combat themed Match 3 mobile game, where the player would line up action commands (attack, heal, magic) on a traditional Match 3 to battle opponents.

name: Shopping Clutter 3: Blooming Tale
summary: The Walkers, the traveling animal family well-known to fans of the Travel Mosaic series, have decided to help Auntie Sheep decorate her flower shop. After moving to Animalville, Auntie Sheep noticed there weren’t enough plants hanging from the balconies of the apartment buildings and decided to open a flower shop. But decorating isn’t as easy as it looks, and the Walkers are here to help! Clear the clutter from the store shelves and find all the necessary flowers and equipment.

name: Shapeu
summary: Learn the names of the shapes in our game Shapeu. Easy game for the kids, where they can learn something new.

name: Shop of Things
summary:
On a gloomy afternoon, a sudden burst of rain sends you under a shop's roof.

But was it just bad weather, or did someone (or some...thing) want you under this very roof in this very moment?

Find out, by stepping into the Shop of Things!

name: Shaytan
summary: Shaytan is psychological horror game.Shaytan is devil in islam. Devil will try to mislead you so that you are on wrong way before Angel of death comes.

name: Shift of War
summary: Get ready to perform all kinds of jobs such as eliminating the most wanted terrorists or recovering vital merchandise. All of this is represented in this top-down shooter game where you can play alone or with up to 4 friends in local multiplayer mode.

name: Shopping Spree: Extreme!!!
summary: Make your way around the shopping center to collect items on your shopping list. But be careful; one slip up and you'll be paying for a broken item! Avoid grumpy shoppers or simply shove them out of the way! Various other obstacles get in your way as you fill your cart and make it to checkout!

name: Shutokou Battle Online
summary: Shutokou Battle Online was a MMO take on the infamous Shutokou Battle (aka, Tokyo Xtreme Racer) formula. Released on PC only in Japan, this game had a short life from 2003 to 2005.

name: Shooting Waltz
summary: Fight with beautiful waltzes with crisp shooting battles, what are you waiting for?

name: Shin Omoide no Shokudou Monogatari: Kokoro ni Shimiru Showa Series
Shitsuji ga Aruji wo Erabu Toki
summary: All the visual novel elements are there featuring full voice-acting. On-screen text can be toggled off with ability to use analogue sticks to zoom and scroll the clear background image with characters. While this game is a port of an adult visual novel for Windows with the same title released a couple of years earlier, this version has all the adult content removed and main scenario adjusted to work accordingly.

name: Shinobi Rising
summary:
Welcome to Shinobi Rising, the exciting new game set in the Japanese-inspired cyberpunk universe of Katana-Ra. In this thrilling adventure, you play as a shinobi who must solve a murder mystery and discover the culprit behind the death of an innocent child heiress.

As you navigate your way through the streets Clan Kata’s village, the entire game takes place across one single night and you'll need to use all your cunning and skill to survive. Uncover clues and solve puzzles and inch closer to uncovering the truth behind the killing. But be warned, this is a village where not everyone is what they seem.

Who will you strike from the shadows?

name: Shada Kalo
summary:
A game jam build for the Epic Mega Jam 2022.
The theme of the jam was: "As Above So Below"

Control the pair of characters in game to solve your way out of each level by solving puzzles.

WASD : Movement

Space : Jump

name: Shadowrun Returns: Deluxe Edition
summary: It includes: Shadowrun Returns Game, The Shadowrun Returns Soundtrack, The Shadowrun Returns Anthology - Explore the world of Shadowrun Returns even more with an illustrated PDF of short stories written for the game.

name: Shadowrun: Hong Kong - Extended Edition Deluxe
summary: It includes the full 22-track, 320kbps Shadowrun: Hong Kong Soundtrack from fan-favorite composer Jon Everist, and a 125-page Art of Shadowrun: Hong Kong PDF showcasing a wide variety of the concept and production art that went into the game.

name: Shattered Star
summary: Shattered Star is a small indie game made by 3 action game enthusiasts that tends to combine hack&slash and roguelike gameplay together to let you have the most fun out of it. There is no storyline due to the limit of 3 part-time developers. Just drop, kill, and have fun.

name: Shopping Mall Renovator
summary: Build the mall of your dreams! Clean, renovate and decorate old shopping malls and halls to get the best ratings from your visitors. Manage, invest and risk to get a fortune!

name: Shenanigans
summary: Shenanigans is a chaotic party board game for you and your friends, where anyone and anything can change the course of the game at will. Don't let pesky rules stop you from winning. Just change them in your favor!

name: Shargad: First Blood
summary: He drew the first blood. Winter is named after him, carrying its perishing winds to the very essence of his legacy. Enten, son of Adapa, killed his brother, staining the honour of his unborn descendants and leaving them a burden to carry for ages...

name: Shootin' Gallery VR
summary: Keep pulling the trigger to save your soul! This is Shootin' Gallery!

name: Shadows in the Dark
summary: Shadows in the dark is a short roguelike game with frantic action. Defeat the horde of enemies, collect coins to improve your skills Collect the diamonds to activate the holy statue. There are four automatically generated areas to leave your even more interesting gameplay.

name: Shoot to Kill
summary: Shoot To Kill is a single player retro-FPS inspired by the violence and pace of shooters of the past. Take on hordes of soldiers and experiments created by an authoritarian military group in the dystopian future of 2140.

name: Shamblers Castle
summary: A Quake inspired map for Doom 3

name: She's Got a Thing for a Spring
summary: It's been a hectic year, and it's time to get away. He told you that, and you agreed. Now you're here, in a grove of aspen, and long for a good, long bath in the nearby hot spring.

name: Shine Post: Be Your Idol!
summary: Shine Post: Be Your Idol! is a Japanese idol-raising game and part of the Shine Post multimedia franchise. The game features an original story and also includes scenarios based on the anime and novels stories.

name: Shaftdiver
summary: A Hellsinker fangame and 3D rail shooter.

name: Shape of the Toilet Rim
summary: A single player arcade-like game where you crush Toilet Cars driven by small suns. See how high of a score you can get!

name: Shooting Gallery
summary:
Shooting Gallery is a simple game for DOS simulating a shooting gallery. You control mainly with the mouse to aim and try to hit targets to score points.
The game is divided into 7 rounds where each round has a different shooting game or a little bit more difficult version of a previous round.
Round 7 is always the Shootout which is a race against time to shoot as many badies as you can before the time limit runs out.

name: Shinsouban Clover no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
summary: Shinsouban Clover no Kuni no Alice Wonderful Wonder World is a remake of Clover no Kuni no Alice released for the PSP with new artwork by Fujimaru Mamenosuke.

name: Shrimp Magicality
summary:
Shrimp Magicality is an adventure game that is focused on exploration. You play as ‘The Professor,’ a narcoleptic academic, wandering around a fictionalized Seattle. Experience her wildest dreams, as she dozes off throughout The Ave.

Meet quirky characters, discover a colorful world, and try to get some rest.

name: Shall we date? Sengoku Darling: Choose your Destination
summary: Known as Iza, Shutsujin! Koi Ikusa Dai Ni Maku in Japan. Published by NTT Solmare under the "Shall we Date" series.

name: Shinigami Kagyou: Kaidan Romance
summary:
Shinigami Kagyou: Kaidan Romance was released in 2013.

It is the fourth game in the Kaidan Romance series. The Kaidan Romance games are split into three sets of games set in the same world but with different characters and protagonists. This is the first game in the Kuromon Sumi line, with the sequel being Shinigami Shogyou: Kaidan Romance.

name: Shinigami Shogyou: Kaidan Romance
summary: Continuation of Shinigami Kagyou: Kaidan Romance.

name: Shopping Clutter 4: A Perfect Thanksgiving
summary: Shopping Clutter 4 - A Perfect Thanksgiving invites you to create the perfect Thanksgiving feast! Give thanks with the Walker family and create your own unique holiday traditions. Clean up the shop, set the table, and serve the best meal Animalville has seen in years! Enjoy over 150 colorful puzzles in Shopping Clutter 4 - A Perfect Thanksgiving.

name: Shadow Survival
summary: Shadow Survival is a single-player / multiplayer cooperative wave based first person shooter with deep class and weapon customization, on procedurally generated landscapes, against armies of procedurally generated demonic forces.

name: Shadow Jump
summary: Shadow Jump is a challenging fantasy platformer game focused around difficulty and freedom of movement. There are no set routes or strategies; players will be able to carve their own route to the top. Success will require determination, precision and a lot of patience...

name: Shadow Fight: Arena
summary: Experience gripping real-time PvP. Choose three brave heroes from a large set of Shadow Fight characters - and fight your way through the tournaments against real players.

name: Shuffled Words
summary: Shuffled Words is a casual word guessing game!

name: Ships Simulator 2024
summary: Play as the captain and take the controls of one of the many available ships. Perform various tasks, plan the route yourself and admire the views as you navigate between the largest European ports!

name: Shizuku: Japanese myth
summary: "Shizuku : Japanese myth" is a 2D action game set in Japan. The fox girl can transform into various forms, and can take over not only the form of the target but also its abilities. There is no single answer, and the game can be played according to your style of play.

name: Shark Game
summary: You are a shark in a strange blue sea. As you begin to gather fish you are joined by fellow sharks, rays, and other creatures who help you collect a variety of resources and learn about the world around you. As you explore you discover something strange in the darkest depths of the sea floor.

name: Shiseido Beauty Solution Kaihatsu Center Kanshuu: Project Beauty
summary: Shiseido Beauty Solution Kaihatsu Center Kanshuu: Project Beauty is a game developed and published by Sega for the Nintendo DS released only in Japan.

name: Shirube no Kazari
summary: Shirube No Kazari is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. You control Michito, who stays in an abandoned facility, keeping watch over a mysterious girl in a chamber. The game does not feature a traditional Nexus, but rather a linear starting area that branches out as the player explores further. There is also a health system wherein the player will be woken up if they're caught by chasers too many times.

name: Shinobu
summary: Shinobu is a videogame made for Amstrad CPC using Z80 assembly and with the CPCtelera library. This project was highly related to optimize every piece of memory due to the Amstrad CPC limitation of 16KB of memory RAM.

name: Shock Lobster
summary:
Zip and zap your way to the top in this aquaventure!

Shock Lobster is a Game Boy ROM designed to run on the original Game Boy handheld video game system using a flash cartridge. It should also play well on most emulators.

name: Shovel Adventure
summary:
You are Johnny Pallas, the legendary archeologist of Utrera. After your hardest researching job, you finally have found the mystery of the mysteries of ancient Egypt: the secret entrance to the Pharaom Lholha Flowers' chamber.

To get to the entrance, you have to enter in the big pyramid and found all the gems before the time is over. Only when you unearth all the gems, you can take the Ankh and the next chamber will be open.

40 chambers are waiting for you and your shovel before getting to the secret entrance... Are you ready to accept this challenge?

name: Shutter Nyan!: Enhanced Edition
summary: The Enhanced Edition provides various gameplay improvements and new story content. The game has players becoming a cat and exploring the world unknown with the magical camera that can copy and paste objects.

name: Shootout At Old Tucson
summary: Shootout at Old Tucson is a live-action laserdisc video game, released by American Laser Games in 1994 in the arcade. The game saw a limited production run and was the only release by the company never to be ported from the arcade. Soon after the game appeared on the market, American Laser Games went out of business, which, along with technical issues which limited its popularity in the arcades, further contributed to the title's obscurity. Shootout at Old Tucson was also one of the first games by American Laser Games developed based on 3DO technology. The game was filmed at Old Tucson Studios.

name: Shounen D no Kokuhaku
summary:
A super short melancholy BL game with the theme of adolescence and juvenile delinquency.
A certain prefecture public high school had 2 consecutive murder cases on September 7, 1997.
Autumn is a week after the opening ceremony after the summer vacation.
It is a bizarre murder case that occurred in an ordinary public high school.
It was a brutal and bizarre murder, and the fact that all the victims were boys and girls in the same class shook the world.
Also, the fact that the criminal who was the perpetrator was a boy student in the same class made a lot of noise.

name: Shinoda Shinjuku Tantei Jimusho Karajishi Botan
summary:
The protagonist - Usui Yoshihito works at Shinoda Shinjuku Detective Agency.
The agency received a classified assignment from the Shinjuku Central PD.
A joint-investigation behind the wide-spread drug smuggling route within Shinjuku area.

His partner from the police department, Agumo is a diligent detective.
Having a shady past, he feels umcomfortable working with Agumo,
but the job itself is right up his alley.
Soon, the undercover operation begins.

In the meanwihle, he encounters a mafia named Hata, who seems to know Usui's past...

name: Shining Gadget
summary: Shining Gadget is a passive creature collecting idle game that transforms your Playdate into an online-enabled specter catcher! Take aim at ghosts and suck them into your Playdate using the built-in crank! Keep your tractor beam on target to weaken the ghost and crank for maximum pull! Your precision and reflexes will be put to the ultimate test as you collect ancient and powerful spirits!

name: Shiba Eternity
summary: Time to enter the Dogjo! Collect awe-inspiring cards to craft your perfect deck then train with your own unique Shiboshis and take to the world to defeat all of your friends and foes alike!

name: Shadow the Hedgehog: Reloaded
summary: Shadow the Hedgehog: Reloaded is a quality of life and enhancement mod for the original Shadow the Hedgehog.

name: Shall we date? Eternal Vows: Love Beyond Time
summary:
Originally released as Nise no Chigiri in Japan for PSP & PC.
Published by NTT Solmare in English for iOS and Android.

name: Show do Milhão 4
summary: Show do Milhão is an interactive game where you learn by playing with Silvio Santos and have your name registered on the general scoreboard. Become a champion! The more answers you get right, the more points you earn.

name: Shiratsuyu no Kai
summary: Shiratsuyu no Kai is a otome adventure game for the PlayStation Portable that was released on August 1, 2013 by Otomate.

name: Shin Tennis no Ouji-sama: Let's Go!! Daily Life from RisingBeat
Shounen Ashibe: Go! Go! Goma-chan - Cute na Goma-chi Ippai Puzzle
Shokugeki no Soma: Yuujou to Kizuna no Hitosara
Shangrlia
summary: Shangrlia is a turn-based tactical game. The ten female commanders reside in the castle and can be approached in any order. Each of them transfers the player to a different location (alternating between urban, dungeon-like, and rural areas) where a tactical battle takes place. Every commander is responsible for a unit type in the army. These types include Lancers, Fighters, Swordsmen, Cannoneers, Horsemen, Archers, Mages, Ninjas, Dragon Riders, and Birds. Enemy forces possess the same unit types. Each type has advantages and disadvantages in terms of power, mobility, range, etc. The goal is to select and position units on the battle field, taking the conditions of the terrain, number of enemies, distance, etc. into consideration. Defending own castle and capturing that of the enemy is the top priority. The battles then proceed in a turn-based fashion. Some unit types can attack from a distance, while others are restricted to fighting on adjacent squares. Battles are displayed as animated sequences on a separate screen, their outcome calculated according to the unit's properties and parameters. After each round of victory, the female general removes an item of her clothing. The final result for each general is an erotic picture with partial nudity and implicit sexual scene, but no explicit images.

name: Shining Star
summary: Shining Star is a cancelled strategy game for the Game Boy Advance by Eworks Studios.

name: Shinonome
summary: Shinonome is a roguelike game based around the concept of a haunted house from the Japanese Edo period.

name: Shadowalker
summary:
Shadowalker is a side-scrolling action game for mobile phones. Players take control of Phoenix Shadowalker, a mysterious female bounty hunter that earns bounty by protecting the villagers from the evil spirits at sea. Strange ghostly creatures have been appearing during the night and kidnapping children from the villages. The frightened villagers have turned to Shadowalker, whom they've turned their backs on, to stop them and she follows the ghosts to investigate the reasons for the kidnappings!

The protagonist can use her sword and the gun she picks up to fight enemies and will automatically switch to shooting when an enemy is far from her, however, Shadowalker can't shoot while jumping. Throughout the game, Shadowalker will also unlock additional skills such as double jumping. Money earned in levels can be spent in stores on better weapons and armor, which can also be found inside chests in some of the levels. All the unlocked levels and stores are shown on a world map; however, they cannot be replayed.

name: Shortline Railroad
summary:
Shortline is a real-time railroad management game that eschews complicated financial aspects (as in A-Train) and all realistic factors in favor of the pure joy of creating a miniature railroad.

You goal is to assure an uninterrupted collision-free passage of different trains to target points, and your success both in traffic dispatch and railroad management and construction determines your score.

name: Shopping Clutter 5: Christmas Poetree
summary: Shopping Clutter 5 - Christmas Poetree invites you to enjoy the holiday season with the Walker family! The Walkers have plenty to do to prepare for the holidays. Help them clear the store's clutter and find the best ornaments for their Christmas tree. Play over 150 festive holiday puzzles in Shopping Clutter 5 - Christmas Poetree!

name: She Who Rises
summary: As the object of the prophecy, it rests upon Druna's shoulders the duty to fight and defeat the Conqueror, the Tyrant King who enslaved all the world under his reign of terror.

name: Sharded World
summary: Sharded World is a survival and mission game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements. Your main task is to collect all the pieces of the main character's soul. They are needed to defeat the main villain Lich. He destroyed our world. And now the fate of the world depends only on you.

name: ShotFightDisaster
summary: ShotFightDisaster (SFD) presents its tactical, team-based and action-packed gameplay. Players are catapulted into a conflict from which only the best return.

name: Shields of Asgard
summary: The shields of Asgard have been stolen. You have been chosen by Odin to retrieve them. Your first journey takes you to Jotunheim. Travel the vast deep and dark forests. Climb mountains where winter never stops. Fight challenging enemies.

name: Shong
summary: With less pieces and a smaller board size, Shong is the smallest brain board game you'll never play.

name: Shanubis
summary: You find yourself trapped alone in a pyramid, being hunted by an Egyptian God. Break containers to find what you need to survive and escape but stay quiet, Shanubis doesn't like trespassers. Just ask the rest of the research team...

name: Shankstars
summary: You've been chosen to assemble an elite team of golfers to conquer courses the likes of which this world has never seen. Tee off on your own or compete head-to-head against other players as you level up and unlock new characters, imaginative courses and increasingly epic adventures!

name: Shinobi, Koi Utsutsu: Setsugekka Koi Emaki
summary: PlayStation Vita port with four new character routes added.

name: Shinigami Soul Agency
summary:
You were just a child when you first started seeing Shinigami—supernatural beings whose duty is to collect the souls of the fallen. Once you reached adulthood, your rare talent got you scouted to work at a secret government agency monitoring their activity in Japan. Unfortunately, your office life consists of nothing but tedious paperwork and endless meetings… until one night, you come face-to-face with a ghost—a dangerous apparition that only appears if a soul isn't successfully retrieved.

Soon, reports of these hauntings come pouring in from across the country, and you're assigned to a secret task force with the three top Shinigami to investigate. As if that wasn't overwhelming enough, your heart stops when the agency director gives you some chilling news—your own soul is scheduled to be collected in just 30 days.

name: Shin Galaxy: Alpha War
summary: A space shooter game with RPG mechanics. Players will be able to improve their ships to tackle the challenges ahead, as well as buy better ships and customize them.

name: Shadows of Steel Moons
summary: Shadows of Steel Moons is an action-platformer with dark techno-fantasy style. The story of a valiant knight who defeats mechanical gods and monsters.

name: Shadow Empire: Oceania
summary: The new maps being generated with Oceania DLC change the feel and ambiance of the game completely. But it also changes the gameplay a lot and will make you experience a different style of game.

name: Sherbert In A Bottle
summary: "Sherbert In A Bottle" is a short visual novel about wrestling with decisions relating to one's life path, and the positive impact online friends can have on a person.

name: Shall we date?: Angel or Devil
summary: A otome game by NTT Solmare.

name: Shall we date?: Ninja Love
summary: Ninja Love is an interactive romance novel game developed and published by NTT Solmare.

name: Shall we date?: My Sweet Prince
summary: My Sweet Prince is a romance novel game developed by NTT Solmare.

name: Shall we date?: "Konkatsu" for marriage
summary: A otome game by NTT Solmare.

name: Shall we date?: Actor to be
summary: Shall we date?:Actor to be is a visual novel type Dating Simulation Game set at the Opera School.

name: Shall we date?: Can't Say No
summary: Can't Say No is an interactive romance novel game developed and published by NTT Solmare.

name: Shall we date?: Mononoke Kiss
summary:
Now Included in the "Story Jar" app.
Mononoke Kiss is an interactive romance novel game developed and published by NTT Solmare. The game was released on Apple devices worldwide on 11 November 2013 and Android devices worldwide on 21 November 2013.

name: Shall we date?: My Fairy Tales
summary: Shall we date?: My Fairy Tales is a novel type dating sim game which enables players to enjoy their romance with the male version of Cinderella or Snow White.

name: Shall we date?: Magic Sword
summary: "Shall we date?: Magic Sword" is the first ever western fantasy created by shall we date series based on the legendary King Arthur. Let the Magic Sword transport you as a princess and your knights back in the Arthurian time and start your adventure romance.

name: Shall we date?: Hero in Love
summary: “Shall we date?: Hero in Love” is a romantic action fantasy game depicting a life-or-death battle between heroes, supernatural powers (a samurai: telepathist, a cowboy: clairvoyant, a ninja: teleporter), and enemies

name: Shall we date?: Never Look Back
summary: A life-risking journey to the Underworld.

name: Shall we date?: Ninja Assassin
summary:
Now included in the "Story Jar" app.

Shall we date?: Ninja Assassin is a novel type dating simulation game.

Alongside the vigilante ninjas, you will begin your pursuit of justice.

name: Shall we date?: Ninja Shadow Her One and Only Love
summary: Now included in the "Dear Otome" app.

name: Shards
summary: A game for the Dream Diary Jam 2018. An ordinary girl wakes up in a strange place and goes searching for shards of a portal to get home.

name: Shall we date?: Lost Island
summary:
Now included in the "Story Jar" app.
New researcher (heroine) arrives at the beautiful island to do energy research. Soon after that, a series of mysterious deaths occurs around her… What she is going to witness is that unbelievable phenomenon of dead people... Zombies are roaming in an isolated island!? Blooming romance in an unusual setting!

name: Shall we date?: Guilty Alice
summary:
Now included in the "Story Jar" app.
“Who’s Guilty Alice... Are you talking about me?” When I open my eyes, I find myself standing in a defendant’s seat. At the moment I am about to be executed, there appears a strange man with a cat-shaped hood pulled over his eyes...

name: Shall we date?: Wizardess Heart
summary:
Now included in the "Dear Otome" app.
Wizardess Heart is a visual novel game with full of fantasy, adventure, love romance and school life in the wizardry world!

name: Shall we date?: Castle Break
summary: Castle Break is an interactive romance novel developed and published by NTT Solmare.

name: Shoalroot
summary: Play as a merperson and farm underwater featuring water animals and plants!

name: Shapez 2
summary: Dive into a factory-building game where the focus is on just that — building huge factories! Construct sprawling multi-level factories and min-max your layouts without limits. Shapez 2 is tailor-made for enthusiasts who crave the thrill of optimizing production lines and perfecting automation.

name: Shadows Over Loathing
summary: A slapstick-figure comedy adventure-RPG full of mobsters, monsters, and mysteries.

name: Shall we date? Love Tangle: Finding my Better Half
summary:
Now included in the "Dear Otome" app.
The game is set at the luxurious apartment in Kaleido City, and it is called Lilac Court, where many celebrities reside. One day, the heroine moves in to start her new life there, and she gets to know many handsome and mature men who live in the same residence. Then, she gradually finds herself getting trapped into a bitter sweet love triangle.
