As her heart wavers, she makes her decision to choose her partner, whom she would pursue their dreams together.

name: Shall We Date?: War of Prayers - Inori no Otome
summary: “Shall We Date?: War of Prayers - Inori no Otome”, is a visual novel and dating simulation game about a romance between a girl who is destined to save the world as a prayer maiden and a knight who protects her.

name: Shall we date?: Arabian Dreams Wildest Tales in Starry Nights
summary:
Their stories are supposed to have been already made, but you can change their fate out of your love as the tale-spinner.
How would you like your love story to change? Happy ending or sad ending?
Their fate and the course of your romance are in your hands…

How would you like to spin a tale?

Romance and adventure await you!

name: Shall we date?: Pirates Treasured Love in the Ocean
summary: Now included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Shall we date?: Oz
summary:
Oz is a girls' dating simulation visual novel moblie video game told from the prespective of Dorothy Gale as she dates male characters loosely based on the Oz series.

After the journey in the Land of Oz, the heroine had returned to her home in Kansas. Years had passed since then, and her 17th birthday was drawing closer. One evening, there was a knock at her door. She opened it and there stood three handsome strangers! ...Wait, they were actually her old mates from Oz; the Scarecrow, the Tin Woodman, and the Lion!
“Come on! Let’s celebrate your birthday in Oz!”
So excited, she headed back to the Land of Oz.

name: Shall we date?: Guard Me, Sherlock!
summary:
Now included in the "Dear Otome" app.

Guard Me, Sherlock! is a social-based dating simulation game developed and published by NTT Solmare.

name: Shall we date?: Modern Cinderella
summary: Modern Cinderella is a dating simulation game developed and published by NTT Solmare. The game was released on Apple and Android devices worldwide on 18 April 2017.

name: Shall we date?: We the Girls
summary: Now available in the "My Shelf: My Choice, My Episode" app.

name: Shall we date?: Love, Mafia Dawn of the Don
summary: Otome game included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Shall we date?: Love, Mafia My Signore
summary: Story Jar's first BL title.

name: Shall we date?: Null;
summary: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Shall we date?: The World or You
summary:
Included in the "Story Jar" app.
Fantasy story The World or You was released on 15 March 2020 and has a total of 12 chapters.

name: Shall we date?: Rewind
summary: Rewind is a fantasy and mystery story under Shall We Date's Story Jar app.

name: Shall we date?: Pretty Awesome
summary: Included in the "Story Jar" app.

name: Shall we date?: Become Elite
summary:
Included in the "Story Jar" app.

Your rich uncle has suddenly passed away! You're going to inherit a share of his will, including the famous Water Lily estate. Together with three obnoxious butlers, you will spend the next three weeks training to come out into society at a formal debut.

name: Shall we date?: Mononoke Kiss x Lost Island
summary:
Included in the "Story Jar" app.
Mononoke Kiss and Lost Island crossover.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2
summary: Dust off your torch and hammer - it's time to get back to work, you have a new job to do. Visit the new beach coast with the largest, biggest ship graveyard in the world, dismantle huge ship parts and collect tons of precious steel. Roll up your sleeves, it's time to get back to the business.

name: Shrieking Darkness
summary: Close your eyes. Step into a world filled with nothing but darkness and terror, where everything wants to destroy you. Your time has come to fight the shrieking darkness, be brave and don't look back or you won't make it.

name: Shuffle Tactics
summary: Shuffle Tactics is a roguelike deckbuilding tactical RPG. Strategize to survive tough battles, pick the right cards to create powerful synergies, and bond with your sidekicks to get an edge in battle. Adventure awaits! Will you rise as Asteria's new King?

name: Shichisei Tantei Club: Koganemushi-tachi no Kisou
summary: A clickable adventure game reminiscent of detective adventure games of the '80s and '90s. The story follows the main character, a young detective, as he meets a series of unique characters and works to solve a case.

name: Show Ball: Tiger Life
summary: Show Ball: Tiger Life is a challenge where you will have to overcome 200 levels making a single movement. Enjoy 25 illustrated scenes, upgrades, multiple skins with realistic physics, classical music, and an ultra-realistic stage. Show Ball: Tiger Life… Let the show begin!

name: Shy Girl
summary: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Sherlock and Watson: A Study in Scarlet
summary: Step in the shoes of Sherlock Holmes or Dr. Watson and venture on a journey filled with intrigue and mystery. Use your logic and teamwork skills in order to solve the mysterious murder which shocked the 19th century London. Play it with a friend on 2 devices with an open voice connection.

name: Shape Shifter: Formations
summary: Shape Shifter: Formations is an action twin-stick shooter with rogue-lite elements, where you must destroy hordes of geometric enemies alone or with a friend. Select your ship and combine a large variety of weapons, abilities and infinitely stacking upgrades to craft your own unique build.

name: Shadow Knight
summary: Explore and fight to become the legend of a dark fantasy world

name: Shave & Stuff
summary:
Shave & Stuff is a casual barbershop game where the player's objective is to serve a client by matching the client's needs using many tools at the player's disposal or just have raw creative fun.

Create unique haircuts. Discover a lot of tools as a barber master, and find out the best haircut for your clients. Make the best barbershop in VR with your own hand and imagination!

name: Shaper
summary: Shaper is a sandbox building exploration game. Defeat enemies and monsters by collecting square materials to synthesize tools and equipment. Build unique buildings to survive and develop in this fantastic world.

name: Shingata Kururin Pa!
summary: Competitive puzzle game where the player places rope pieces. Once ready, drop a flame to ignite! This starts a burning chain reaction, clearing blocks and mucking up the opponent's board with snowballs. Choose from a myriad of diverse and colorful characters, each possessing a unique piece that will help in the game. Released in Japan on Saturn and Playstation by Sky Think System.

name: Shadow Lens
summary: Monsters lurk in the dark. Use your camera to navigate unlit spaces. Find your missing daughter and discover what happened to her. Find tools to help unlock new areas to explore. Don't Die.

name: Sharpshooter
summary: This is a novel shooting game, which focuses on testing the quick reaction ability of players. Kill the enemy and give you a new shooting game experience.

name: Shadowplay: Whispers of the Past - Collector's Edition
Shadowplay: The Forsaken Island - Collector’s Edition
Shake it up! Dice
summary:
Shake it up! Dice is a mobile game on Android and iOS that feature's the world's first Deck of Cards on Dice. The gameplay is centered around 9 six-sided dice that feature all 54 playing cards from a traditional deck (including two WILDS).

The cards are distributed across the dice faces in a patented mathematical formula allowing players an incredibly fun and much easier way to play games that require making traditional playing card hands.

The mobile game has a familiar but fresh player experience of rolling all 9 dice a total of 3 times while getting to hold what you want to achieve a goal (like Two Pairs, Four of a Kind, Full House, etc). Players play head-to-head against friends, random opponents, and bots to achieve the most goals by filling out their scorecards and receiving bonus points for achieving a higher hand than their opponent. There is a classic 9-Hand Game mode as well as a 3 and 1-Hand game mode.

name: Shark! Shark!
summary: Shark! Shark! is an upcoming action video game developed by NeoBird and Bonus Level Entertainment. It is an updated version of Shark! Shark!, scheduled to be released for the Intellivision Amico.

name: Shattered Lands: Towers of Perdition
summary: Shattered Lands: Towers of Perdition is a multi-part RPG saga for the Arduboy.

name: Shift
summary: Shift is a deceptively simple match-four game for Playdate that requires a little strategy, a small amount of luck and occasionally a deep breath and a fingers-crossed gamble.

name: Shin Fumi Ikemen Ouoku Kinjirareta Koi
summary: A otome game by Cybird.

name: Shrek: Fire Donkey
summary: Shrek: Fire Donkey is a game included with the on the original DVD of Shrek.

name: Shattered Kingdoms
summary:
Shattered Kingdoms (SK) is a text-based sword and sorcery fantasy role playing game, played online by many people at the same time who each assume the identity of a different character.

Our players are readers and gamers – those compelled by adventure, role play and being a part of an ongoing saga story line. The world of Pyrathia is filled with turmoil and conflict. The political and physical landscapes can change over time. Some of these changes are the direct efforts of players through their mortal characters. Other changes are beyond their control as the gods and other powerful forces have real influence on the realm.

name: Ships Simulator
summary: Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea. Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions.

name: Shichisei Toushin Guyferd: Crown Kaimetsu Sakusen
summary: Shichisei Toushin Guyferd Crown Kaimetsu Sakusen is a game based on Seven Star Fighting God Guyferd, that was a Tokusatsu series made by Toho and Capcom, and aired on TV Tokyo in 1996. Guyferd borrows aspects from Bio Booster Armor Guyver and Fist of the North Star.

name: Sheep
summary:
Sheep takes puzzle game elements and blends them into a game that's tailor made for Game Boy Advance.
Your task? Guide these hapless creatures back to the truck. Sounds easy huh? It's not when your sheep keep going in the opposite direction!

name: Shooting Gallery
summary: Aim for the middle and test your mettle against a volley of diabolical ducks, tricky targets, and bewitched bombs as they tauntingly float across your playdate screen.

name: Shmups Pack 2x1
summary: Two spaceship games for fans of the genre.

name: Shades
summary:
A curse has fallen on the island of Arulan called Shades and it causes people to vanish and reappear elsewhere. Whatever brought the curse also brought monsters and traps making the island a dangerous place to be. You play a hero determined to find out the truth and rid the island of the curse, monsters and traps, and make the island the lovely place it used to be. You can attempt this quest solo or you can allow three other players to attempt the quest as well, each taking it in turns at various points. Three skill levels can also be picked.

Shades is a flick-screen arcade adventure where each screen is viewed from an elevated angle as you explore the island. You are armed with a sword (a crossbow can be found later) and as you move about the island you can encounter many monsters who can either be avoided, fought or pleaded with but if pleading fails then you can fight or run away. On each screen are many traps and you can search by pressing T but be careful because if there are many traps then not all will be revealed at first. Secret doors can also be searched for by pressing E and these are an important part to complete your quest. Fighting or hurting your self on traps decreases a Physical State bar but if you can avoid battles this can increase slowly if in the green section. Once the bar is empty then it is game over for that player.

Scattered around the island are chests containing various objects to help you in your quest. You can carry up to eight items and any items carried can be dropped or used in various locations to aid you on your quest. Objects cannot be dropped on stairs or The Moors as the winds would blow them away. Taking objects or fighting monsters increase your experience and is used as a high score at the end of the game. As you explore the island the Shades curse can hit you and transport you to an earlier location you visited. Once all the players are dead then the game is over.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Beheaded Smuggler
summary: A text adventure in which the player takes up the mantle of Sherlock, called upon to investigate into the business of George Wathley. His cousin Victor is suspicious that George has been importing contraband and wants the famous sleuth to turns his skills to discover the truth.

name: Shrek's Vacation
summary: With three busy ogre babies at home, Shrek finds himself a very tired ogre dad. He decides that the family needs a vacation, so he and Fiona pack up the babies and head to the great outdoors in this adventure for the V.Reader from VTech. The trip doesn't go as planned when Donkey tags along. With 8 reading games and activities included, children will build core reading skills in compound words, parts of speech, order of events and so much.

name: Shazabi and the Cantina Catacombs
summary:
Enter the catacombs of the Cantina of Eight (that's the name of the community) and search for the Achtefakt!
While you're at it save the Cantina residents who have been kidnapped by the zoo (which doesn't actually exist).

name: Shoot Away
summary: Shoot Away is a 1977 electro-mechanical (EM) light gun shooter arcade game developed and published by Namco. Players use the rifle-shaped light guns to fire at clay pigeons, represented as flying white dots on a projector screen. There are two that must be shot down in each round, and players only get two bullets to hit them. Bonus points are awarded for shooting the pigeons as soon as they appear, or by destroying both of them with a single bullet. The game was a critical and commercial success, maintaining a presence in arcades into the 1980s.

name: Shooting Gallery for Playdate
summary: Carnival inspired shooting gallery.

name: Shrine of the Spirits: SS Hero
summary: The demon army is invading and the Goddess is in danger! At the most critical moment, you lead many heroes, equipped with artifacts, to fight for the Goddess in a dark fantasy world! Together with your friends, fight against the demon army and become a legend of the Pantheon!

name: Shoot! VR
summary: Shoot! VR is a first-person shooter simulation game using virtual reality. The game simulates the environment of an indoor shooting range. The game has different modes and offers a choice of different weapons.

name: Shieldmaiden: Remix Edition
summary: Shieldmaiden: Remix Edition is an expanded version of Shieldmaiden, with a revised and more in-depth story, balance and quality of life improvements, new levels, and gameplay features.

name: Shopping Clutter 6: Love Is in the Air
summary: Shopping Clutter 6 - Love Is In The Air celebrates not only Valentine's Day, but also the anniversary of Mr. and Mrs. Walker! Buy gifts, choose decorations, and pick out the perfect Valentine's Day cards.

name: Shikinjou
summary: A block-pushing puzzle game where players must push large mahjong tiles in order to reach the stage's exit.

name: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne Maniax Chronicle Edition
summary: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne Maniax Chronicle Edition is a re-release of Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne Maniax featuring Raidou Kuzunoha XIV and his feline companion Gouto. They replace Dante from the original Maniax version. This version was released only in Japan exclusively as part of a bundle titled Devil Summoner: Raidou Kuzunoha vs. King Abaddon Plus.

name: Shin Nippon Pro Wrestling: Gekitou Densetsu
summary: A cancelled action Virtual Boy game that was in development by Tomy and planned to released in December of 1995.

name: Shrine of the Spirits
summary: The demon army is invading and the Goddess is in danger! At the most critical moment, you lead many heroes, equipped with artifacts, to fight for the Goddess in a dark fantasy world! Together with your friends, fight against the demon army and become a legend of the Pantheon!

name: Shikinjoh
summary:
Shi-Kin-Joh ("Forbidden City") is a puzzle game similar to Sokoban in which the player must reach a goal by pushing oversized mahjong tiles which block the path. When two matching tiles are pushed next to each other, they disappear. Other types of tiles will lock any movable tiles that come in contact with them.

The Megadrive version includes five different sound & graphics sets, dozens of puzzles to solve, and a "special puzzle" mode where the rules of the game are changed dramatically. There is also a puzzle construction mode where custom puzzles can be created. Game progress is saved using passwords.

name: She Wants Me Dead: Deluxe Edition
summary: Along the base game, you also get access to the Soundtrack DLC. Help Max escape from his fate and survive this purrfect punishment.

name: Shiitake Showdown
summary: The showdown between Snakes and Shrooms rages on in this high action first person arena shooter. Use your control over the elements and your experience with a gun to show up your friends and slay your enemy's.

name: Shadow Spotter
summary: Shadow Spotter is a game on the Nintendo Kids Club website.

name: Sheltered Deep
summary: Sheltered Deep is a psychological horror game about desperation, cruelty and thin lines between right and wrong. Will your choices be your salvation, or will they doom your soul for eternity?

name: Shuttlecock-H
summary: Survive challenging bullet hell stages and enjoy the rewards of your cute companions!

name: Shalnor Legends 2: Trials of Thunder
summary: A Story-Rich RPG/Action-Adventure Game. Step into the shoes of the young Orc Mogren, and explore all of Thunder Island. Venture into dangerous dungeons, explore caves and solve puzzles and help the residents of the island with their quests.

name: Shavalyn Pop
summary: Help our friend Shavalyn Pop escape from this alien trap.

name: Shop Heroes Legends: Idle RPG
summary:
Shop Heroes Legends—the much anticipated sequel to Shop Heroes is about to be released worldwide! On this wonderful journey of forging, you can solve brand new challenges, develop your business globally and become the Epic Shop Tycoon!
One day, you were led to your Uncle's poorly managed equipment shop by his best friend Jack. The shop almost went bankrupt because of your uncle's mismanagement. Now, it is your mission to take over this empty little shop and miraculously turn it into a business empire. Are you ready to become a Shop Tycoon?

name: Shot Online: Golf Battle
summary: Enjoy real-time (parallel) golf battles and experience our incredible golf clubs.

name: Shopping Cart Defense
summary: Shopping Cart Hero invades the defense genre! Fight off waves of groupies through epic battles of bananas, pitchforks, and the occasional UFO. Work your way through the farmlands and the snowy mountains to see if you can triumph over what lurks in the mysterious jungles. You probably can't. Don't bother trying.

name: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew
summary: Welcome to the Lost Caribbean! In this stealth strategy game, join a ghost ship with a living soul and assemble a cursed pirate crew. Embrace magical powers to defy the menacing army of the Inquisition, who stands between you and the mysterious treasure of the legendary Captain Mordechai.

name: Sheep Launcher 2
summary:
The much anticipated sequel to the original hugely popular Sheep Launcher is now available and running beautifully on the new iPhone5 in full Retina Display!
Explore an infinite universe with strange new worlds. Battle the massive Martian Overlord and his minion to earn the rights to space travel. Check out the new Style Shop and show off your cool new threads. Use home grown and advanced Martian tech to power up and go farther than ever before!

name: Shape Shipter
summary: In this arcade shmup roguelike, you control a shapeshifting spaceship. Adapt to a different playstyle in each encounter - shoot, dodge & destroy wave after wave of the toughest foes.

name: Shuzle
summary: Minimalistic mind-bending shuffle puzzle.

name: Shark Attack: Fish Predator Ocean Sea Adventure Survival
summary: Who is the king of the underwater world? What animal is as old as the world? Many people don't even know what it looks like - of course it's a Shark! With our game Shark Attack: Fish Predator you can feel like a shark.

name: Shanghai Summer
summary: Shanghai Summer is an adventure game set in the millennium. Our protagonist, Baichuan, goes through a series of "anomalies" over the length of twelve days. In his pursuit of the truth, he found that his hopes and regrets from the past finally seem to converge. Will he be able to "fix" it for good?

name: She Vomited Guns
summary: A tragic gun shortage has brought many fortunes to the Synthetic Order, who are in the bleeding edge of arms development.

name: Shiodome Train Simulator
summary: A realistic fictional railcar driving game is now available! Please enjoy driving on the various types of lines, over 70 km long, multiple tracks, tunnels, and various scenery changes. Single-track sections and many other types of trains are scheduled to be available in the future.

name: Shatterpoint
summary: Shatterpoint is an NFT-based, Free-to-Play, action RPG mobile game built on the Polygon blockchain. Players battle in a Player vs Environment campaign to gain Abilities, Experience, and the Equipment needed to take on the challenge of Player vs Player, the combat mode where in-game Tokens, rewards, and leaderboard domination are at stake.

name: Shopping Cart Hero
summary: Jump your shopping cart to greatness. You know you've always wanted to try this in real life.

name: Ships of Battle Age of Pirates
summary: Ahoy, captain! Are you ready to become one of the most feared pirates in the world of the Caribbean Sea? Set sail with your pirate ship to an unexplored island near Cuba or Nassau to conquer and take over the settlement. Ships of Battle: Age of Pirates is a strategy game to explore the world while fighting epic blaze of battles.

name: Shark Rain
summary: The very first Shark-Based Shooter game! Become a cute shark-girl and speed through water then emerge in human form and blast your enemies to oblivion! Nowhere will they be safe, not even on land!

name: Shy Cats: Hidden Orchestra
summary: Shy Cats Hidden Orchestra is a hidden object game where you need to find musician cats that are embarassed to play their music. When you find them, they will play songs for you.

name: Shifted Heart
summary: Explore, fight, and discover new spells and abilities in the world of Shifted Heart! Customize your build to your liking and save the province of Shutterweld, and perhaps the rest of the world, from certain doom.

name: Short Horror Story
summary: An unexpected visitor turns a peaceful night in the desert into a terrifying nightmare. An horror FPS made in two weeks, Short Horror Story, is a non linear horror tale that develops in a creepy shooter game.

name: Shitty Fish: High Speed Combat Arena
summary: Shitty Fish is an action adventure about becoming alive! Built around speed, this small open world pushes the boundaries of what is possible in movement based gameplay.

name: Shadow Hold
summary: Shadow Hold is a 2D coop action adventure rpg where you will fight spirits, the undead, and hell itself. Adventure through haunting and zany environments that blend the normal and ethereal while defending your party and eliminating the demonic threat.

name: Shit Clicker
summary: Shit Clicker is a clicker game about destroy the world with an overload of poop, if you are tired of this shit world, you can destroy him with your own shit.

name: Sheep Lad
summary: Sheep Lad is a grand scale Swashbuckling, Role-playing, Platforming Adventure Game, with a focus on combat, exploration, and surreal mysteries. Take on the Role of Basil the Sheep Lad as he journeys into a dangerous land Dungeoneering and Questing in search for his older sister

name: Shapes & Shots
summary: Shapes & Shots is a Roguelite Shooter Bullet-hell, where you can control time as you make your way through a twisted and delusional universe. Your enemies will merge, creating infinite combinations to try to overwhelm you: only your skills, combined with upgrades you choose, can lead you to victory.

name: Shori Conquest
summary: 7 Powerful Ancient Beasts have been Reawakened! Choose your hero, complete 10 challenging dungeons, find the Shori Stones, battle many strong foes, and put a stop to Purdrag’s plans!

name: Shatter
summary: Join a wide group of characters as they travel across the world searching for answers, fighting a brutal autocracy, and chasing Esfal Psychi, a man of malevolent ambitions, in the first RPG title from uNIC Studios.

name: She Wants Me Dead + Clumsy Rush
summary: Angering your cat is never a good idea. It's even worse, if your pet turns out to be a maniacal genius. Help Max escape from his fate and survive this purrfect punishment. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family. Why pick one when you can have them both.

name: Shopping Talent
summary: Over 100 challenging levels! Show up your wisdom!

name: Shadow Warrior 3: Definitive Edition
summary: Take an adrenaline-fueled journey through a mythical Japanese realm in the Definitive Edition of Shadow Warrior 3, packed with new features, and enjoy an ultraviolent blend of fast-paced gunplay, razor-sharp melee combat, and spectacular free-running movement.

name: Shadow of the Night
summary: Build and survive inside the desolate forest.A struggle for survival in the north of Sweden.

name: She Wants Me Dead: Ultimate Edition
summary: Along the base game, you also get access to the Artbook DLC.

name: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne - HD Remaster: Maniax Pack
summary:
Relive the original version!
Adds a mode where Raidou Kuzunoha is replaced by none other than Dante of Devil May Cry fame.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: A Goddess in Training
Shin Megami Tensei V: The Rage of a Queen
Shin Megami Tensei V: The Doctor's Last Wish
Shin Megami Tensei V: Return of the True Demon
summary: Grants access to the subquest "Return of the True Demon". In this quest, players will be able to take on and recruit the legendary nine Fiends: Matador, Daisoujou, Hell Biker, White Rider, Red Rider, Black Rider, Pale Rider, Mother Harlot, and Trumpeter. The challenge doesn't stop there, however, for upon defeating the fiends, players will then be able to challenge the strongest opponent of them all: the Demi-fiend.

name: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne - HD Remaster Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Shin Megami Tensei III Nocturne HD Remaster Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
• Maniax Pack
• Mercy and Expectation Map Pack
• Shin Megami Tensei BGM Pack
• Merciful Difficulty

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Digital Deluxe Edition
Shita ni
summary:
A surreal dream exploration game, both beautiful and terrifying.

Shita ni is a surreal dream exploration RPG Maker game. Through the exploration of both beautiful and haunting dreamscapes, you will uncover the different facets of a young girl's mind. This game will not hold your hand. Instead, you will be free to investigate the mysteries of your surroundings at your own pace in whatever way you see fit.

name: Shadow of Scintilla
summary: Hack and slash your way through hordes of monsters with fluid movement system including wall run, mantle and grapple in this action rogue-like. Master melee and range weapons with customizable combos. Reject or embrace your inner beast. And discover the secrets of this dark fantasy world.

name: Shadows of the Night
summary: There is a war coming. Pallas joined the Fortress out of his sense of duty towards protecting his country and most importantly to him, his family, and will soon realize that to truly protect them he will have to abandon it all.

name: Shall We Golf?
summary:
Are you worried that your golf skills are not improving? Don't take it all on yourself. Playing with your friends is a great way to solve this problem. The more people you have, the better. Go out with as many friends as you can!

It's easy, isn't it? It's all you need and your ball will fly straight to wherever you want it to go. Or rather, it's hard not to fly too far.

If your ball accidentally hits a friend, don't worry. They will laugh and forgive you. Of course, you too, please be prepared to take physical risks.

Remember, we are all a team. You may have one club, but you have as many chances as the number of your friends to get a shot. Sometimes, you just need to find the right spot, push the directional key and leave the club to your friends.

Have a nice golf!

name: Shin Seizonritsu 0%! Chikatetsu Kara no Dasshutsu
summary: Shin Seizon Ritsu 0%! Chikatetsu Kara no Dasshutsu is the first suspense novel game from Voltage Inc. and is currently only available in Japanese.

name: Shifted
summary: To shift outside the box, you need to think outside the box. Think you can swipe your way though 30+ mentally exhausting levels? Then consider this a challenge!

name: Shell Song
summary: Shell Song is an interactive audio-narrative game about deep-fake voice technologies and the datasets that go into their construction. By considering physical and digital bodies and voices, it asks what a voice is worth, who can own a human sound, and how it feels to come face to face with a ghost of your body that may yet come to outlive you.

name: She Wants Me Dead: Extended Edition
summary: Along the base game, you also get access to 2 DLC: artbook and soundtrack.

name: Shield Blast
summary: Planet Earth is running low on resources and your goal is to help the cargo spaceship, named Mother Ship, reach Planet Earth. You are in hostile territory and will be attacked by all kind of alien enemies such as flowers, mushrooms and weird Lovecraftian creatures.

name: Sharks
summary:
You are the Apex Predator.
Swim, bite and attack in VR using a unique locomotion method that only needs the movement of your head and one controller: look where you want to go, pull the trigger to swim, squeeze the grip button to bite. You won't believe how fluid and dynamic the shark motion is.
Hunt with groups of up to 10 people online. Eat whatever you can to survive and avoid the zombie sharks: last player standing wins.
Escape from other sharks, or outmaneuver the survivors to catch them. Use powerups, hide in caves and shipwrecks, and use cannonballs and mines to evade and chase sharks down.

name: Shadow of Ether
summary: Shadow of Ether is a first person horror game where a man with a spiritual power goes deep into the lower astral plane to banish an archon in a secluded haunted house in a forest.

name: Shape of Mind
summary: Shape of Mind is a simple puzzle game similar to Solitaire card games. Connect shapes by dragging them on the board. Shapes of the same color won't connect. You can move strips of connected shapes by grabbing the top-most shape of a strip. Drop shapes onto the Dreamer to begin a Halo. Shapes in the Halo cannot be removed. Once a Halo is complete the shapes will disappear. Complete three Halos to clear all the shapes and win the game!

name: Shiki Oni no Koku: Chuugoku-hen - Daiisshou
Shiki Oni no Koku: Chuugoku-hen - Dainishou
Shiki Oni no Koku: Chuugoku-hen - Daisanshou
Shiki Oni no Koku: Chuugoku-hen - Daiyonshou
Shambhala Gateway
summary: Designed with peaceful yet adventuristic and unique environment, immersive activities, Meditation and relaxation experience. You will achieve wonderful and cohesive relaxion experience

name: SharkKing
summary: You play as a rogue shark, battle your way up the food chain and become the shark king

name: Short Staffed
summary: In Short Staffed you are a server who has been tasked with bringing food to customers in a variety of different restaurants. Toss food across the room and jump over customers in this hectic couch co-op game.

name: Shaper
summary: Shaper is an integrated 2D dungeon editor allowing you to create your own adventure. Create a dungeon with enemies, objects, decorations and share it with your friends and the community!

name: Shape Garden
summary:
You're an explorer in a strange landscape of beautiful and ethereal computer generated shapes. Play is simple. Just swipe to move shapes. When shapes collide they merge to form new higher level shapes with higher point values. A new shape is added after each move.
The game's over when there's no free spaces and no shapes can be merged. But don’t worry, there’s always next time with a completely new wondrous set of randomly generated shapes.

name: Sharp Minds
summary: Solve unique and challenging puzzles by adding numbers! How difficult can addition up to ten or twenty be? Find out in this fun puzzle game which really drains your mental energy completely.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - The Whispered Dreams
summary: Unlock exciting side cases that expand the world of The Awakened beyond the main adventure. Enjoy new stories, mysteries, and investigations, sure to satisfy your hunger for more detective work. You will need all of your investigative skills to unravel these baffling mysteries, and uncover the extraordinary truths behind them.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition Includes:
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened
- Exclusive Pre-Launch DLC - The Sleuth's Attire (3 costumes)
- Set of digital wallpapers
- The Whispered Dreams Side Quest Pack

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - Premium Edition
summary:
The Premium Edition Includes:
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened
- Exclusive Pre-Launch DLC - The Sleuth's Attire (3 costumes)
- Set of digital wallpapers
- The Whispered Dreams Side Quest Pack
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened Soundtrack
- Sherlock Holmes The Awakened Artbook

name: Shiner
summary: Learn every attack that gets used against you in this turn-based strategy game. Meet (and battle) a colorful cast of fully voice-acted characters as you search for the bully who wronged you.

name: Shadow BoXR
summary: Shadow BoXR is a rhythm boxing game intended to make working out fun. Punch the targets and dodge the obstacles all while rocking out to your favorite music. This is your workout built by you for you.

name: Showtime: Vampire Diaries
summary: Are you a good interviewer? You have the most intriguing guest ever, a vampire, but be careful with the question! He's a pretty irascible guest.

name: Sherlock Purr
summary: Join Sherlock Purr on a purrfect adventure!

name: Shade: The Border Collie Flycatcher
summary: Shade The Border Collie Flycatcher is an exciting point and shoot game that challenges players to catch as many flies as possible.

name: ShovelFall
summary: Shovelfall is an action platformer with a fun and satisfying charge jump mechanic. Escape your heavenly imprisonment, battle those standing in your way. Dig, slash and journey from heaven through the 9 circles of Hell to reach the bottom of your destiny.

name: Shame Legacy
summary: Shame Legacy is a first-person survival-horror, set in a forsaken cultist village. You attempt to survive using stealth and escape. By solving puzzles, you unravel the mystery that's h(a)unting you.

name: Shapey Heads
summary:
Welcome to the colorful 8-bit world of Shapey Heads!
Tap the screen to switch the shape of your head to avoid all of the traps and obstacles!
Collect coins to open up secret boxes that will let you play with over 40 of the craziest characters through 5 different challenging worlds.
Run as long as you can to improve your high score and climb the leaderboards!

name: Shinobi Harisenbo
summary:
Otome game by Spice+.
Set during the Sengoku era, a short story about a princess and her shinobi guard.

name: Shatter Bot
summary: Shatter the shackles of corporate tyranny in this action-packed shooter-platformer. Upgrade your ShatterBot, unlock new weapons, and blast all around you to smithereens! Features fully destructible, procedurally generated levels, guaranteed to challenge even the most experienced robo pilot.

name: Shepherd
summary: Lead a small herd of sheep through the desert. Ensure their survival by managing their needs. Protect and save them from various environmental hazards, as well as their own silly decisions. Bond with them over the course of your journey by fulfilling their wishes, and be their Shepherd.

name: Shota Kare!
summary: Shota Kare! is a visual novel game.

name: Shuttle World
summary: Shuttle World is a third person simulation business game. I believe that most people are struggling to achieve financial freedom and strive to become the boss of the richest party; When the penniless you come to a strange city, please use your wisdom, arrange your time reasonably, and strive to live

name: Shadow Land
summary:
One day, the world suddenly lost its colour…
All the colour in the world was taken by a monster that came from nowhere!
The colourful world became monochromatic…
In these times, we need the help of the legendary puppeteer!

name: Sham City
summary: Strategy and planning game developed by Bug Neko Soft / Tainyan, similar to Simcity.

name: Shock Hop
summary: How long can you survive the experiment?!

name: Sherlock Purr: Extended Edition
summary: Sherlock Purr is a fun and engaging children's game where players help the feline detective search for hidden objects in an apartment. With colorful graphics, entertaining animations, and brain-teasing puzzles, this game is perfect for young minds who love mysteries and cats. Follow Sherlock Purr's pawprints and solve the mystery today!

name: Shogi!
summary: Shogi! Experience the ultimate 3D Shogi video game! Featuring stunning graphics, and a cutting-edge AI that brings the Japanese chess game to life like never before. Master the art of Shogi, a chess-like tabletop experience, and become a true champion of the popular strategic game.

name: Shh! This is a mystery game! But watch out for spoilers
summary: Reasoning... It's annoying.... I want to go home and play with Sara...❤ So please help me......

name: Shirime: The Curse of Butt-Eye
summary: In Shirime: The Curse of Butt-Eye you find your missing girlfriend Sharon in Shirime Forest, stalked by the malevolent yokai Shirime. Collect pages to uncover the mystery, but beware: every page increases the intensity of Shirime's pursuit. Can you survive and unravel the truth?

name: Shooting Saucer
summary: A flying saucer chases you all over the galaxy. Run away, defeat enemies, and evolve to avoid getting abducted

name: Sharkphobia
summary: Sharkphobia is a short underwater found footage survival stealth horror focused on galeophobia, thalassophobia & claustrophobic environments.

name: Shell Shatter
summary:
It's a shell of a game!

Get ready for some fast-paced shell breaking action! Drag your finger across unwanted dirt tiles to make them crumble, letting your shimmering shells fall into place! Line them up in horizontal rows for points and more time! Touch a "B" icon to destroy all blocks of that color. Touch a "C" icon to turn all blocks of that color into shells!

name: Shodot
summary: Shodot is a short first-person adventure inspired by myst-likes, half-likes, and the artworks of Moebius. You find yourself in a deserted city full of curious mechanisms - what are they for and how do they function? Is there a way out of this place?

name: Shape Theory
summary: Simple to learn, difficult to master. SHAPE THEORY is a minimalist puzzle game that will challenge your mind and soothe your senses. Link your movement. Find the path. Nothing is what it seems.

name: Shattered Sky
summary: The bullet-hell online co-op dungeon runner. Shoot, dodge, and loot your way through an infinitely changing sci fi disaster.

name: Shadowkin
summary: Face waves of enemies as you travel from room to room in your auto-shooting horde survival conquest. You and your companion (AI or 2 Player) must work together and create builds that compliment each other while exploring branching paths through various zones and worlds in a Roguelite setting.

name: Shelley's Haunted House
summary: Shelley's Haunted House is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror Game based on the story of the Shelley's house which is a famous haunted location in the US known for the dark spirit of the lady in black.

name: Shotgun Knight
summary: Embark on an impossible climb with nothing but yourself and a shotgun to propel yourself upwards while falling losing all your progress countless times.

name: Shapy Road
summary: Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the highscore your friends put on and beat them in the best time waster game. Do you have what it takes to run as long as the top player? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold!

name: Shutter
summary: In Shutter you play as Keith, a new employee that has arrived at the mysterious research center L.I.E. (Learn, Investigate and Exploit). Explore and solve puzzles with a camera that modifies objects using perspective. All in a space-age inspired setting.

name: Sheepdogs
summary: A casual single-player game where you are the shepherd and your sheepdogs follow your every command. Your goal: Get those sheep into the pen!

name: Sheep in Love
summary: Sheep in Love is a unique puzzle game with addictive gameplay. It's easy to pick-up and learn, but it will give your brain a workout as you advance to the more difficult levels. Guide your hero to his love by sliding the tiles!

name: Shooting Zombie
summary:
In 2025, the human race was labeled as the biggest threat to continued progress on Earth by Dr. Evil. In the eyes of the Doctor, humans were no longer fit to wear the crown of masters of this world.To him,it is time for the Zombie the next evolutionary step to becoming masters of the Earth.
The Doctor has amassed enormous zombie armies and has begun unleashing them on the world. The world has plunged into crisis. Our species is facing extinction!
As the world’s governments fall, one after the other, it’s up to you and a handful of survivors to take the planet back for the living.
Hunt Dr.Evil across the globe, using wormholes to jump through space and time, destroying legions of the undead everywhere you go.They have you outnumbered, but you have them outgunned!
The world is waiting for a savior to bring hope back for the human race.
19 different weapons to use in your quest to rid the planet of the walking dead!
6 different characters with 5 different skills to develop and upgrade. Upgrade your character in different ways to make the adventure unique.
3 World maps! 21 classic scenes! 126 levels! A truly global adventure! Sweep away all zombie enemies in the chaos of time and space.
21 different zombie enemies! Pick up your weapon to smash them to atoms!
Thrillingly tough BOSS battles! More challenges and better rewards if you have the skills to conquer them!

name: Sharks
summary: A game featured in Action 52. You are a frogman and must collect rare marine creatures and recover lost treasures at the bottom of the sea. You have your stun-gun and can always retreat into your electro magnetic base that that repels sharks and the rest of the enemies. Your diving suit can only survive a few sharks bites and is useless against the deadly jelly fish.

name: Shooting Gallery
summary: A game featured in Action 52.

name: Sharpshooter
summary: SHARPSHOOTER is one of the listed mini game in Action 52. Action 52 was released in 1993 for SEGA Genesis.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Victorian Starter Pack
summary:
This DLC includes the following items:

500 Manghirs
The Consulting Detective Outfit
Victorian Vampire Outfit
Vampire's Pallor
'Lead Zeppelin' Quest

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Detective Pack
summary:
This DLC includes the following items:

Master Sleuth Outfit
The Greatest Detective Outfit
Ukrainian Jon Outfit

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Plague Doctor Pack
summary:
This DLC includes the following items:

Plague Doctor Costume
Laboratory Coat

name: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One - Clergyman Cassock
summary:
This DLC includes the following items:

Clergyman Cassock

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Awakened - The Sleuth's Attire
summary:
Get ready to immerse yourself even deeper and channel your inner detective with three new Victorian-era-inspired costumes!

With the Clergyman Cassock, you'll give the impression of a true man of the cloth, ready to absolve even the most hardened sinners.

Unleash your inner detective with the Master Sleuth costume. This sleek and sophisticated outfit will make you the talk of the town, and give your character the mystery and intrigue of a true virtuoso investigator, ready to solve even the most challenging of mysteries.

The Consulting Detective outfit adds a classic touch to your look and elevates your immersive experience.

name: Shrek: Multi-Game Mayhem - Featuring Shrek
summary: A standalone handheld electronic device that only includes a Shrek game.

name: Shrek: Multi-Game Mayhem - Featuring Princess Fiona
Shinehill
summary: Yet again they dumped the toughest job on you. Now you are on a Shinehill Island, where you suddenly replaced one of the new residents. Explore the world, meet charming townspeople, do farming, fishing, cooking and try not to reveal yourself.

name: Shattered
summary: A shattering revival of '90s fighting games set in a sci-fi/fantasy world inspired by European comics.

name: Shikyokusei
summary: Turn-based tactics game developed by Kogado Studio's Usagi Team and released for Windows PCs in March, 2001.

name: Shame Legacy: The Cult Edition
summary:
Shame Legacy is a first-person survival-horror, set in a forsaken cultist village. You attempt to survive using stealth and escape. By solving puzzles, you unravel the mystery that's h(a)unting you.

The Cult Edition includes special case and metallic-effect post card

name: Shooting Star VR
summary: Become a hero in Shooting Star VR! Choose from 4 themes and 100 stages to save the goddess of Archery Land with your magic bow. Travel through forests, lava pits, icy mountains, and space to defeat monsters and restore peace. Get ready for thrilling challenges and heroic feats

name: Shovel Knight: Pocket Dungeon - Puzzler's Pack DLC
summary: This DLC adds new characters, areas, quests, relics, and more.

name: Shielded Souls: Legendary Love
summary:
You've always had a strong sense of justice, but you never knew where it came from until a freak landslide sends you to another world—your home world! As you acclimate to this new land, you realize you have the ability to strengthen the powers of others through physical contact... and the more intimate that contact is, the stronger the effect!

Party up with three gorgeous heroines to uncover the truth behind your past and save your home from the wrath of The Demon Lord!

name: ShenSonic
summary:
ShenSonic is a fan game made by SimSonic, whose real name is Simon Elo, of Magitek Soft which has also created the Sonic in Mobius games. This fan game was previously created using The Games Factory but the final version used Multimedia Fusion Express.

ShenSonic is Shenmue but with Sonic characters and makes changes to the plot to fit the Sonic universe. It features 100+ characters, 4 locations, 8 mini-games, day and night cycle, QTE's, inventory system, and much more.

name: Shepherd's Crossing
summary:
Shepherd’s Crossing is a different kind of box garden simulation game that pursues the fun of increasing what you want and creating the landscape of your choice.

You have been entrusted with a miniature garden (farm)! Use the farm to raise animals and crops. Animals and crops can be exchanged with others. While there may be a main story, the ultimate goal is up to you. There are no time limits, so enjoy creating a relaxed and carefree farm landscape!

name: Shovelboy
summary: Shovelboy is a retro-style platformer where you have to collect shovels in 21 increasingly difficult small levels. How fast can you go?

name: Shadow Saboteur
summary: Shadow Saboteur is an exciting 2D side-scrolling adventure game where players take on the role of Robin Hood, robbing from the rich and giving to the poor. Players must avoid the sight of enemy soldiers and steal money

name: Shooting Ballons
summary: A game usually included in plug & plays, and usually with the wrong spelling for the world "balloons".

name: Shadow of the Treasure
summary: A fantasy pseudo-card game of 15 levels that tests your thinking and combinatorial skills.

name: Shoot Fighters
summary: Step into the future where the universe's fate hangs on judicial duels fought by elite pilots in unique spaceships. Represent your galaxy and defend your values in unpredictable judicial duels. Get ready for an adrenaline-pumping ride into the future!

name: Shrommzzz
summary: Fung around and find out! A cozy mushroom foraging and farming game. Plant shromspores on 6 different islands to unlock all combinations. Can you make all 100 of 'em pop up? Challenge accepted!

name: ShudderStep
summary: "ShudderStep" is a terrifying first-person horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Step into the shoes of a survivor who must navigate a dark and foreboding world filled with unspeakable horrors. Can you survive the darkness and uncover the secrets that lie hidden within?

name: ShadowKitty: Thief by Night
summary: ShadowKitty: Thief by Night is a fun 2D Cartoon Platformer currently in development. This is the story of an unusual thief who steals artworks from criminals and returns it to the museum. The game is inspired by classic games like Megaman X, Spelunky, Ducktales Remastered and CupHead.

name: Shroom Siege
summary:
Welcome to Shroom Siege, a fast-paced multiplayer game that balances strategy and fun. In a 4 vs 4 setting, you'll embody a shroom character, coordinating with your teammates and using quick thinking to outsmart your opponents.

Shroom Siege brings together the best aspects of local and online multiplayer games, making it a versatile choice for any gaming session. Whether you're sharing a couch with friends or playing with others from around the globe, this game ensures a dynamic experience tailored to your setup.
What's more, Shroom Siege supports cross-play across Steam and Nintendo Switch platforms, bringing together an even larger community of players. This means you can compete with friends and others regardless of their chosen platform. And don't worry if you're short of human players - AI steps in to balance the 4v4 gameplay.

name: Shred-A-Bunch!
summary: Shred zombies in slow-mo while drifting with your good old tractor?! Harvest crops, slaughter zombies, overcome epic boss fights and upgrade your vehicle. Rinse and repeat.

name: Shattered: The Final Days
summary: An open world survival mmo, set 50 years after a viral outbreak that took out 90% of the world's population. Now you must choose your next path of survival, whether you go solo or join forces with other survivors.

name: Shooting Survival
summary: This is the 2d shooting game with building and crafting that features extremely easy play styles. Its super cool and enjoyable gameplay, mixed with rogue-like, crafting, and farming elements will get you hooked from the very first shooting run!

name: Shootero: Galaxy Space Shooter
summary: Shootero is an arcade shooting game like galaga shooter with stylized gameplay. It is not a mundane alien shooter game, but highlighted with a combination of classic galaxy attack gameplay and rogue-lite features. Shootero definitely puts you on fire every time you play.

name: Sheep Simulator AR
summary:
The most realistic and cutest Augmented Reality Virtual Pet Sheep Simulation game! You can choose to play in 3D or AR mode.
One day, you receive a box with a lovely sheep illustration on the cover, when you open it you discover a live tiny sheep!
Do your best to care for this sheep, tiny pets need food, rest and amusement. Choose what food you give your sheep wisely, as different types of food will affect your sheep’s personality and mood as it grows up.
Shopaholics will love the amazing selection of outfits and costumes for the sheep!
Play with your sheep in the real world in AR mode.
Entertain your sheep with fun playsets such as a carnival ferris wheel and swimming pool!

name: Showgunners: Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition includes:
- Showgunners full game
- Neon Justice Skin (exclusive to Deluxe Edition)
- Soundtrack
- Art Book

name: Shadowspear Knight’s Quest
summary: Shadowspear Knight’s Quest is an addictive mobile adventure game with simple and easy game play for single player.

name: Shrek 2
summary: The gruff but lovable ogre returns to Game Boy Advance in this platform-hopping adventure that encourages teamwork among a small squad of onscreen characters. Players control Shrek and up to three of his companions as they side-scroll through levels based on locations in the feature film sequel Shrek 2. Different obstacles require the abilities of different characters to overcome them, so players must switch between their chosen team members as each situation requires. Shrek is strong enough to move objects that others can not, for example, while Donkey is able to kick open doors and Fiona can slow down time for easier attacks. The game also features characters and areas not seen in the film, offering fans new fairy tale people to meet and lands to explore.

name: Shrek 2
summary: Mobile port of Shrek 2.

name: Shin Megami Tensei
summary:
Shin Megami Tensei is a remaster of the original Super Famicom game with improved graphics and gameplay along with a new difficulty mode.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Shibuya Sukeban
summary: "Shibuya Sukeban" is a total conversion mod for Hotline Miami that aims to bring the stylization of Japanese manga and animes, into a faster paced and adrenaline fueled twist onto the regular formula, along with visual novel styled storytelling. You'll be fighting dozens of triad goons across 10 levels, along with unique bosses that will challenge your skill. Will you save anyone, or will you fail to save yourself?

name: Shadowman: Darque Legacy
summary:
Take up the scythe of Shadowman in a spine-chilling third-person action adventure. Follow a dark path from the land of the living to the hellish realm of the Deadside. Slice through foes in visceral combat and unravel unique environmental puzzles.

In Shadowman: Darque Legacy, duel against a horrifying cast of enemies in challenging, visceral combat. Clash with the fanatical Brethren cultists, from hammer-wielding brutes to sorcerous necromancers, and battle truly wretched creatures that have slithered forth from the most desolate depths. Deliver brutal and bloody finishers with a range of Shadowman weapons.

Explore diverse locations - traverse vivid, detailed locations in the Liveside, and wade through their dark reflections in the hellish realm of the Deadside. Shift between realms to solve unique environmental puzzles.

Ascend through an RPG-lite character progression system, upgrading your character to acquire new skills, and become a Shadowman worthy of fear.

name: Shale
summary: Discover the abandoned world of Shale in this 1-3 player action adventure. Shoot, craft and loot through cities of possessed creatures, industrial parks of corrupted bodies and fields of forgotten souls.

name: Shorkie Software presents: Proto
summary: An all ages top-down 2D musical adventure for lifting the spirits.

name: Shepherd Dog
summary: Shepherd dog havhav starts looking for the sheep that have escaped from the farm to catch them. If he finds it in the fastest time, he writes the name on the leaderboard. Competes with other players.

name: Shopping Clutter 7: Food Detectives
summary: Shopping Clutter 7 - Food Detectives unwraps a shocking investigation. The Walker family restaurant has been targeted by a criminal, and now all their recipes are gone! Follow the clues and find hidden objects to locate the recipes and save their cooking dreams.

name: Shopping Clutter 8: From Gloom to Bloom
summary: Shopping Clutter 8 - From Gloom to Bloom surrounds you with a floral Puzzle festival. When Auntie Sheep decides to search for rare flowers, she leaves her beautiful shop in hands of Sloth Walker. Yet trouble ensues! Can you clean up the shop before Auntie Sheep returns?

name: Shape
summary: "Shape" is an exciting story game that challenges players with intriguing puzzles. You'll delve into the life of a triangle living in a world dominated by squares. As you explore the triangle's inner world and uncover its true identity, you'll piece together the mysteries of its past. Every shape you discover brings you one step closer to understanding the triangle's journey and the emotions of being cast out of the norm.

name: Shuffle and K.O.
summary: In this game, your goal is simple : knock all of your opponent's circles/polygons out of arena ! You may play with computers or other players at the same device.

name: Shape Shipper
summary:
Welcome to shape shipper!

You have been tasked to construct items out of raw materials to be shipped off to customers! Try to keep up with the demand!

name: ShellShot Arena
summary: ShellShot Arena is a fast-paced, top-down, online multiplayer game from the 'ShellShock Live' universe. Master a massive arsenal of upgradable weapons to be the last tank standing in Team, Free-For-All, and Battle Royale matches.

name: Shin Megami Tensei
summary:
Shin Megami Tensei is a port of the original Super Famicom game and features new highly detailed cutscenes.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Shin Megami Tensei
summary:
Shin Megami Tensei is a port of the PlayStation remaster of Shin Megami Tensei for Game Boy Advance, iOS, and Android. This port adds new events that provides more backstory to the story. However, this port also has washed out colors and lower quality music than its PlayStation counterpart, due to hardware capabilities of Game Boy Advance. This is the only version of Shin Megami Tensei that got an official English localization with its iOS release.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Shin Megami Tensei
summary:
Shin Megami Tensei is a port of the original Super Famicom game. This port adds a new intro, new demons, enhanced graphics, and some presentation tweaks.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Shop-Like: The Rogue-Like Item Shop Experience
summary: An Item-Shop Game meets the concept of roguelikes! Endless Replayability and countless options to victory are awaiting you in Shop-Like! Shop-Like is all about running a business in order to pay your debts, so you will not land in the brutal hands of debt slavery.

name: Shambles
summary: “The world you once knew is gone.”Leave your bunker and explore a world that’s gone through 500 years of change. Witness countless stories and intriguing events with your own two eyes. Will you bring peace to the world outside? Or march it towards its ruin? Everything is up to you.

name: ShapeHero Factory
summary: ShapeHero Factory is a game that fuses the factory simulation, roguelite, and tower defense genres. Use different shape combinations to mass-produce a variety of heroes, who will then fight all on their own. All you need to worry about is building the optimal factory to manufacture them.

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 2 - Innocent Sin
summary: Updated port of Persona 2: Innocent Sin for the PSP. Features a new quest, remixed music and updated artwork.

name: Shell of a King
summary: Test your strength in Shell of a King! A precision bullet-hell adventure that will push your dodging skills to the limit. Challenge tough bosses, uncover secrets, and explore a world left to ruin in this top-down RPG.

name: Shining Symbol
summary: This is a galactic castlevania-type game, based on the design of four elephants and twenty-eight stars as the boss, four scenes, five attribute skills, and a variety of gem abilities waiting for you to unlock.

name: Shadowfall
summary: "Shadowfall" is an action-packed RPG set in a world of magic and myth. Play as Kael, a young hero on a quest to save the kingdom of Arvandor from a looming darkness. With 20 unique character classes to choose from and immersive storytelling, this game offers a truly unforgettable experience.

name: Shape Shifter
summary: Experience heart-pumping arcade shooter action. Each combat presents a new challenge as you adapt to a different ship with a unique way to play. Dodge an onslaught of bullets, blast through enemies, and shapeshift your way to victory.

name: Shadow Hunter
summary: A famous writer announces her engagement and starts to receive threats and gets blackmailed. The main character is a detective tasked with identifying the stalker. As the investigation proceeds, a murder occurs.

name: Shounen Tantei-dan to Oka no Ue no Kimyou na Karakuri Yashiki
Shadow Stalker
summary: An Asymmetrical Horror FPS.

name: Ships at Sea
summary: Experience the thrill of navigating a wide range of ships. Immerse yourself in various career paths such as service, cargo and commercial fishing, as you explore the breathtaking open world of Norway´s Lofoten Islands with its stunning scenery. The ocean is within your reach!

name: Shield King
summary: Fight off hordes of enemies, slay bosses, dash through enemies and push them off the buildings In this shield themed roguelite.

name: Shadows of Duat
summary: An old school survival horror set in Egypt. An indie game with the essence of the classics of the genre, with realistic graphics and immersive sound. A difficult and terrifying challenge only suitable for the bravest people. No one will hear your screams from inside the grave.

name: Shimazu
summary: Shimazu is a side-scrolling action/dark art style game. Take on the role of a samurai named Shimazu, who's son is kidnapped and his wife is killed by an evil demon called Takeda with help from another demon called Fudo.

name: Shadows of the Damned: Hella Remastered
summary: Shadows of the Damned, an action-adventure road trip through hell, has been remastered at last! Get ready for a story about rock, love, and just a little bit of demon slaying.

name: Shin Megami Tensei II
summary:
Following the remake of the first game, Shin Megami Tensei II is a revamped version of the original Super Famicom sequel with improved graphics and gameplay along with a new difficulty mode.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Shards of Her
summary: Embark in a world of magic, where once mighty gods reigned supreme, but now are hunted and on the brink of oblivion. Can you save your love amidst a world consumed by lust and betrayal?

name: Shin Megami Tensei II
summary:
Shin Megami Tensei II is a port of the PlayStation remake of Shin Megami Tensei II with new content exclusive to Game Boy Advance version. However, this port also has washed out colors and lower quality music than its PlayStation counterpart, due to hardware capabilities of Game Boy Advance.

The gameplay uses first-person navigation of dungeons and turn-based battles against demons. The player can recruit demons as allies by talking to them rather than fighting them, and two to three demons can be fused to create new demons.

name: Shootout
summary:
SHOOTOUT is VR multiplayer experience where you become your own hero.

Explore a variety of weapons and modifiers to discover over 1000 unique combinations and abilities to build the loadout that YOU want to play. Change your playstyle and role mid match to adapt quicky to the game and competition. You are one part swap away from becoming a carry, support or mobility hero.

Express yourself with a catalog of customizables and impose your style on the opposition.
Explore the depth that this game has to offer and strategize in a PvE arena and then jump into 3v3 PvP Game Modes to battle it out with other players.

Play with friends or battle alone through an expanding playlist of maps and game modes, and prove once and for all..

name: Shot Shot Shoot
summary:
This game is catering to the iPad's unique strengths as a beautiful social gaming platform of the future. Shot Shot Shoot is part of a new way of playing games with your friends, combining the magic of computers with the special interactions made possible by board games.
The goal of the game is simple: destroy the five squares on the opponent's side of the board. Maneuver single shots with high precision or overwhelm the other player with massive attack waves – a fun mixture of fast-paced gameplay and deep strategy!

name: Shooting Genius
summary: Shooting Genius is an archery game. It is a game that shoots bows to hit apples arranged at different heights. Bombs are also mixed, so you should avoid them and hit the apple. To play the game, tap the screen and pull back to release. It is a game that can continue endlessly.

name: Shinobi, Koi Utsutsu for Nintendo Switch
summary:
Port of Shinobi, Koi Utsutsu for the Nintendo Switch.

The heroine, Katagiri Kaede, goes to a ninja school! She lost her parents very young and her grandmother at sixteen and is trying to become a ninja. She attends a local ninjutsu dojo, and one day meets the head of the Sanada Secondary Training Campus (founded by Sanada Yukimura after beating Tokugawa Ieyasu), which trains ninja. He invites her to take a ninja exam, and she agrees, transferring to the school to do a short-term study before taking the test. On her first day, she accidentally uses an advanced technique that makes her male classmates go meromero (lose their heads) over her when her heart thumps!

name: Shuttlecock Carbuncle
summary: Released in Disc Station in 1997.

name: Shirime 2: The Genesis of Butt-Eye
summary: Get ready for a thrilling and terrifying adventure in 'Shirime 2: The Genesis of Butt-Eye'. Uncover the secrets behind the curse as you explore a mysterious inn. Engaging storyline, intense combat, third-person perspective, and stunning visuals await. Prepare for a spine-chilling experience!

name: Shadow Of The Devil
summary: This game is an action, adventure, and horror game played from a first-person shooter (FPS) perspective. The main goal of the game is to immerse players in an exciting world and provide them with an engaging experience.

name: Shot Supreme
summary: Sink baskets to score points, complete missions to buy upgrades, rinse and repeat. Shot Supreme is an arcade basketball game inspired by incremental games. Like a clicker, but you have to score baskets.

name: ShortCircuit
summary: The classic Mac game now on iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad. ShortCircuit is an action puzzle game where you must remove tiles by connecting two matching tiles with no more than three lines.

name: She Wants to Suck My Blood?
summary: Step into the shoes of a daring hero and embark on a thrilling adventure set in 19th-century Europe. Your mission is to defeat the tyrannical vampire queen, Camila, but when you're unexpectedly caught and forced to serve her, everything changes. With the help of Nadia, Camila's loyal butler, and Trinity, her vampire-in-training maid, you'll uncover secrets that will alter the course of your journey. Brace yourself as danger lurks around every corner, and you realize that the lines between good and evil are not always clear-cut.

name: Shadowvane
summary: Shadowvane is a Soulslike MMO with a 1v1 PvP Arena, 5v5 Battlegrounds, and an Open World realm where players can interact and advance their character.

name: Shikisai Kankaku Test Art na Kyouyou Nou-tre Joushiki IQ Check
Shire Scopes
summary: A multiplayer arena shooter with sniper-muskets, swords, and fluid movement mechanics. Climb the leaderboards!

name: Shardpunk: Verminfall - Rat Pack
summary: Leah, the Electromancer joins the Shardpunk roster and brings shock and awe to the ratty faces of her enemies. Her electrifying powers will come in handy during encounters with brand new enemy units - Stun Lancers and Elite variants of Shardpunk's vermin.

name: Shattered Legacy
summary: Start an exciting journey through a magical world, where the familiar idea of nudging blocks and solving puzzles combine to offer an amazing adventure puzzle game. Discover a magical world. Explore difficult puzzles and cryptic challenges in unique levels.

name: Shechu de Fubao
summary: A Blessing for the Herd is a morality tale about China's "996" system of overworking employees, aimed to expose the societal and cultural structures behind the "996" system. Take control of a fledging e-commerce startup, manage investor funds and employees, and grow your customer base -- but be warned, pushing your employees to the edge can have devastating consequences. As the company expands, the stories of you and six other employees intertwine, as you work overtime to fulfil impossible investor expectations.

name: Show da Copa com Estádio 97
summary: Show da Copa com Estádio 97 is a comedic soccer trivia game featuring the cast of the radio program Estádio 97 and questions related to the World Cup.

name: Sharper Minds: Brain Games
summary:
Want a collection of fun brain games for adults and kids that requires no registration? and works offline?
Try Sharper Minds. It's 15 fun games for the brain that require no registration or Internet.

name: Shuvani
summary: Shuvani is an isometric roguelite with a Romani-inspired aesthetic, where action and strategy complement each other in a system of magic related to music. Will you be able to escape from the forest?

name: Shan Hai Express
summary: Step aboard Shan Hai Express and experience an fantasy journey through the world of the ancient Chinese mythology Shan Hai Jing ( 山海经 ). This is an interactive narrative game inspired by the nonlinear structure of the text of "Shan Hai Jing".

name: Shipmatch
summary: Shipmatch, the furutistic flight simulator, is here! Fly alone or with friends in a variety of game modes, like racing, dogfighting, and defending the city from an alien mothership invasion.

name: Shadow of the Night: Monsters
summary: Shadow of the Night : Monster is a battle against monsters on a deserted island and a struggle for survival.

name: Shameless Clone
summary: A retro Flash shooter game in space.

name: Shameless Clone 2
summary: An extended version of Shameless Clone, with more characters and worlds.

name: Show do Milhão
summary: Unofficial game based on the Brazilian television show, "Show do Milhão". The game follows the "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?" and features the voice of the original Brazilian host of the TV show, Silvio Santos.

name: Shaman King Chou Senjiryokketsu: Funbari Version
summary:
Shaman King Chou Senjiryokketsu is a trading card game for the Game Boy Color. There are two versions, Meramera and Funbari that differs in the main characters of the game. The Meramera version has:

- Kaita
- Mitsuru
- Maria

name: Shroom & Doom
summary: A top-down tower-defense game where you play as a little robot that has crash landed on an alien planet. Defend yourself against waves of bug-like enemies using towers made from the local mushrooms. Find a way to repair your ship and escape the planet!

name: Shadows of The Nightmare Realm
summary:
The premise is Lovecraft-inspired, but not part of any of Lovecraft's universes. The story takes place not long after Doom 2, where Hell was defeated by the Doomguy. What no one knew was that there was a far greater and nigh inconceivable evil lurking beyond our realm: the Elder Gods. They saw how Hell had failed and felt it was now their time to succeed. They knew of the Doomguy's strength, and so decided to attack him in the one place he's vulnerable: in his nightmares. Thus, SoTNR takes place within the dreams of the Doomguy, each one manipulated by the Elder Gods.

The gameplay is pretty straightforward, with Doom-style exploration and combat. One difference is that your inventory is cleared and your health reset at the start of each map. After all, each one takes place in a separate dream :-P There are six total maps: three main levels, one secret level, one boss level, and a Quake-style start map.

name: Shards of God
summary: Shards of God is a retro hand-painted point and click murder mystery. It was originally started as part of AdvJam2023, and the full game was then finished within two months.

name: Shitataru Nikki
summary:
Shitataru Nikki is an exploration of the thoughts and mind of the most deplorable and sickening human being possible. You play as Keko, a criminal hiding from the law, as he holes himself up in a dingy hotel room and waits for the heat to die down.

It was developed for the 2023 Dream Diary Jam

name: Shatter Realm
summary: Shatter Realm is a short green ooze techbase-themed episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports made by various members of Doomer Boards, lead by 40oz.

name: Showgunners: Security Breach
summary:
Showgunners first DLC - Security Breach - is out now!

Five new tactical combat arenas, a new map, a new elite enemy, and new unique weapons and abilities are included in this exciting new chapter. Oh, and it's free. And new.

We'll see you in the arena!

name: Shadows of Fate
summary: "Shadows of Fate" is an exhilarating fusion of fantasy medieval elements, bullet hell mechanics, and dungeon crawling. Step into a mesmerizing world where ancient prophecies intertwine with relentless combat, as you embark on a quest to uncover the secrets shrouded in darkness.

name: Shinjuku Hearts
summary: Skateboard into the bustling city of Shinjuku in this beautiful, hand drawn, adult visual novel. Follow the misadventures of Guy as he humorously pursues the affection of sexy ladies and discovers their heartfelt stories. Which girl will you choose?

name: Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra
summary: Shy Dogs Hidden Orchestra is a hidden object game where you need to find musician dogs that are embarassed to play their music. It's like Shy Cats Hidden Orchesta, when you find them, they will play songs for you.

name: Shattered Reflections: The Abyss Within
summary: Immerse yourself in the captivating perspective of Evelyn as you embark on an exploration of a haunting realm where realities become distorted. This psychological horror game offers a compelling experience that unravels the enigmatic secrets concealed within a dark era.

name: Shred the Undead
summary: Shredthe Undead, is a 4 player musical co-op hack-and-slash games. Instead of warriors, elves and wizards, you will be slaying zombies with guitars, drum sticks and piano keys. Travel from LA to Hell in 28 levels.

name: Shadow Corridor 2: Ame no Yohira
summary: Lost forever in the pitch black! But that's what makes it fun! The vast corridors covered in darkness change with each play. All you can do is run or hide from the frightening Apparitions. Use unique items and Karuta cards with special powers in your desperate search for an escape from the darkness!

name: Shadow of Mammon
summary: In a land they were never meant to enter. A sibling's desperate quest to save her brother will uncover a secret meant to stay buried. Shadow of Mammon is a heart-pounding third-person action RPG shooter delivering intense combat in a captivating narrative.

name: Shroom Keeper
summary: Shroom Keeper is a mushroom farming simulator and a puzzle game that encourages experimentation. So grab your flasks and gardening tools - there is science to conduct and magic to be made. Discover the might in the mycelium!

name: ShantyTown
summary: ShantyTown is a relaxing diorama-building game about finding beauty in everyday chaos. Bring new locations to life, stack your urban buildings high, and fill each little nook and cranny with your own touch. Even messiness has its own little charm.

name: Sherlock Holmes Consulting Detective: The Case of Banker's Final Debt
summary: This mysterious case involves the murder of Oswald Mason, found dead at home. Lestrad and Scotland Yard believe that the murder was a result of Mason disturbing a burglar. I have my doubts. The Treasury wants us to investigate the case as Mason was dealing with sensitive Treasury work at the time.

name: Shadow Zone
summary: This minipack consists of three levels, two of which are redone old levels, and the third is completely new. Mouse look is supported but not required. Music taken from Quake II by Sonic Mayhem.

name: Shadowblade Odyssey
summary:
"Shadowblade Odyssey" is an enchanting 2D platform adventure game that draws inspiration from the classic retro Shadow style. Embark on a thrilling journey through a mysterious phantasmal world, where players take on the role of a young hero.

In this game, players must skill fully evade cunningly placed traps and employ their mastery of blades and darts to vanquish enemies. However, combat is not the only approach; players can also learn potent shapeshifting abilities to conceal themselves within the shadows, quietly elude adversaries, and seek out hidden treasures.

Players can exchange their hard-earned currency to acquire new abilities, upgrade their existing skills, and unlock powerful enhancements for their character. Whether it's improving the effectiveness of their blades and darts, extending the duration of their shapeshifting ability, or acquiring unique and rare skills.

name: Shuffle in One
summary: Shuffle in One is a physics puzzle that your goal is simple : Knock all targets out of arena in one move only! You may adjust the speed of your polygons/circles, and set spin for polygons. Your are allowed to launched your polygons/circles once only! Beside you and target polygons/circles, there are some other types of objects such as blocks, traps and heaters.

name: Shin Galaxy: Engage
summary: Shin Galaxy: Engage is an action game with RPG elements in a top-down perspective, where you control spaceships and tries to survive as much as possible in the stages. Improve performance, change appearance and unlock new ships to get as far as you can.

name: Shadows of Zana
summary: Swing, dash, slide and slice your way through the Sequel of Phantom of Zana. Blast, hack and slash your opponents or bounce off their heads! Power up Fantastic Fania and bring The Color back to Zana in this retro inspired 2D Action Platformer.

name: Shooter
summary: Shoot, dodge, and jump your way through adversaries in this action packed adventure!

name: She Fell Off
summary: Uncover the cryptic remnants of a destroyed world in "She Fell Off," a solo-developed indie game.
