Embark on Eve's intense journey through a dark post-apocalyptic underworld, devoid of familiar life. Navigate a dark environment, endure unforgiving gameplay, and immerse yourself in an eerie mystery.

name: Shop Is Done
summary: Shop Is Done — Story-driven 3D Tactics-Horror game with microgames. Move employees from task to task, satisfy customers, and follow the rules of the capricious clown puppet manager. Stay out of debt! Or face eternity as a lifeless puppet.

name: Shakunetsu no Miko Shizune
summary: Shizune Ayatsuji was born in a prestigious priestess family and raised to become an Exorcist. One day, she confronted a powerful Fiend. Shizune did not stand a chance, but her mother Kaori, also a powerful priestess, came to rescue her. Shizune made a resolve to defeat that monster at all costs.

name: Shougakusei no Uchi ni Oboetai Eitango
Shady Wars
summary: Why be a king, when you can be a god? Rap God is now in Shady Wars, developed in partnership with Shady Records. Earn your Rap God props in 135 battles with Rap God and 14 more Shady hits or play in Ken Mode for max protection. MTV News calls it “addictive and fun” for any music fan. It’s a must-have for all true Stans.

name: Shadows of Chronos
summary: 6 map hub for Hexen based around the world of Chronos

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Hung Parliament
summary:
Don your deerstalker and step into the shoes of the world’s most famous sleuth in this gripping 1-4 player mystery detective adventure.

With three cabinet members already murdered by hanging and Sherlock Holmes missing in action, it is up to you to find the killer before Big Ben strikes midnight. Interrogate suspects, analyse crime scenes, collect evidence, and enter your ‘Mind Palace’ to construct a compelling case in this ‘Whodunit’ that will push your deduction skills to their limits. Enjoy this narrative alone or with friends to make this a social sleuthing experience you will never forget.

Combining the worlds of immersive theatre and VR, Sherlock Holmes: The Case of the Hung Parliament’ is a unique ‘evening-sized’ experience that you can enjoy again and again.

Please note: We are a small team and want to create the best possible experience, so any feedback you can share is appreciated. It will help us create an immersive and fun ‘Sherlock’ experience.

name: Shinjuku Soumei
summary: Shinjuku Soumei is an upcoming visual novel from G-MODE and Plus81 that questions the value of life in a city where life and death intersect.

name: Shadow Shoot
summary: Shadow Shoot is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Shinseiden Megaseed: Fukkatsu-hen
summary: Shinseiden Megaseed: Fukkatsu-hen is a Strategy game, developed by Japan Media Programming and published by Banpresto, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Shoot Rock
summary:
When you shoot rock, gem fall out. Get gem. More gem got without shoot = more combo point. Get 10000 point to become master of shoot rock.

This was an entry for PICO-1K Jam 2022. The whole game fits in exactly 1024 bytes of compressed PICO-8 code.

name: Shrine of the Silver CyberPrimate
summary: Shrine of the Silver CyberPrimate is a 6+? map techno-mesoamerican adventure from the Diabolical Broadcasting Korporation, serving as a semi-spiritual successor to DBP09: Legends of the Hidden Tech. The project targets ZDoom 2.8.1 but has also been tested with recent GZDoom versions, especially 4.10.0. As with previous DBKs, the goal here is to use well-established ZDoom features to suggest a hypothetical '90s game engine made up of bits of Doom, Build, Quake, and Hexen. Since our goal is not to push the bleeding edge of modern source ports, effort has been made to keep the set playable on lower-spec machines.

name: Shoot n Scroll 3D
summary: Helicopter arcade game. Shoot'em-up action with plenty of sky adventures and adrenaline. The game is aimed at all gamblers, from novices to core action gamers. Gamblers can try their skills at lot of levels and bosses. As they complete levels, gamblers gain access to new, more powerful armed enemies and unexpected air attack surprises. Easy game controls, arcade action and lot of guns, bullets, rockets and explosions. Ready for takeoff? Wheels up!

name: Short Warp: Deep Space Bounty
summary: A new take on the classic arcade shoot 'em up, Short Warp: Deep Space Bounty combines top-down and side-scrolling action with gorgeous 3D graphics and modern features. Pick up and play multiple game modes. Choose from stock ship designs, or immerse yourself in component stats and custom builds!

name: Shape Shuffle: A Shape Saga
summary: Crafted for gamers of all ages, Shape Shuffle is a fun, addictive & educational puzzle game. Play it now and get taken on a visual adventure featuring puzzles made from shapes of all different colors and sizes.

name: Shrinking Professor
summary: Shrinking Professor is a text adventure.

name: Shadow of the Ninja Reborn
summary: After 34 years in the shadows, prepare to see this legendary action adventure in a new light! Looking and playing better than ever before, Shadow of the Ninja - Reborn is Tengo Project’s remake of a cult classic, that the fans have been waiting for.

name: Shovelware Adventure!
summary: Welcome to Shovelware Adventure! This is a 100% vanilla compatible wad & dehacked file for DOOM II. This map is full of bloody battle arenas and slimy passageways! There are many secrets to discover and several paths to reach the exit. This map was designed with a high quality but oldschool 90's style in mind, the little gems with quirky graphic edits that you find on those old discs among 1000 random wadfiles - hence the name Shovelware Adventure. It's meant to feel like a mini-episode despite being just one lone map. The objective is to pump rockets into the core and blow the place up!

name: Shades of Azure
summary: This is a mapset with the following traits/gimmicks/whatever; All map titles are one word and end on the letter T, except for MAP32. The maps are primarily coated in blue, using textures from 32in24-15tex & OTEX. Some maps might have a semi-speedmap feel to them, with sparse detailing. Some maps are easy, some are hard; but all except two of them can be knocked out in less than 15-20 minutes.

name: Sherwood Extreme: Rogue Level Pack
summary: Expand the world of Sherwood Extreme with 3 NEW LEVELS! Experience new challenges at record-breaking speeds. Discover new locations. Compete online for leaderboard glory.

name: Shadow of the Orient
summary: Ready to do battle with evil and save the day? Shadow of the Orient is a 2d pixel art action adventure platformer game with fully customizable touch controls, fluid movement and smooth animations. Explore vast levels filled with secrets, quests and loot. Fight your way through hordes of samurai enemies and mythological creatures using your Dao sword or fight off enemies at a distance with ranged weapons.

name: Shadows on the Walls
summary: Shadows on the Walls is an immersive VR game of psychological horror, exploration and puzzles that takes place in the Crystal Palace Museum of London. Put yourself in the shoes of a security guard in charge of watching the new and mysterious exhibit of the museum known as the “Cursed Loot”.

name: Shizumeru Rakuen
summary: Follow the girls' "last day" and unravel the truth

name: ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival
summary: Survive the undead onslaught! Customize your katana, team up or go solo. Hack through zombies, master combat, and dominate the leaderboards in ShadowStrike: Blades of Survival.

name: Short Piece
summary: A small collection of interactive illustrations depicting scenes you’d apt to encounter in any ordinary, peaceful town. Just by touching and tapping on different components in the scenes contained within a five-meter radius, various objects and people move subtly.

name: Shoot!
summary: The aim was to create a level with a classic approach to custom pwad making. In other words, he just wanted to make an old school Doom 2 map with lots of fun action, a hard pumped midi track, no custom textures besides the sky and a short no-bullshit title!

name: Shy Dwarf
summary: An abstract puzzle platformer made by Jaromír Plachý, author of Botanicula and Chuchel. Navigate the Shy Dwarf through series of landscapes to the always unclear destination and try not to get too confused.

name: Sheepish
summary: Navigate your sheep through traffic and across the river without getting hit.

name: Ship Shape
summary: Follow the rules, ship the shapes!

name: Shipwrecked
summary: Shipwrecked on a uncharted island, master survival alone or with friends. Battle, build, and conquer foes as you confront the mysteries lurking in its shadows.

name: Shut Up, Rabbit!
summary: Shut Up, Rabbit! is a shooting survival game mainly for relaxing. A chatty rabbit with sci-fi laser gun and cannon to fight with animals to survive in the forest.

name: Shadow Gadget
summary: is a passive creature collecting idle game that transforms your Playdate into an online-enabled specter catcher! Take aim at ghosts and suck them into your Playdate using the built-in crank! Keep your tractor beam on target to weaken the ghost and crank for maximum pull! Your precision and reflexes will be put to the ultimate test as you collect ancient and powerful spirits!

name: Shoot For Fun's Sake
summary: A short solo shooter game where you shoot fixed sensors and sensor patrols without anything shooting back. Use tactical skills to destroy sensors without exceeding the detection limit.

name: Ship Regulus
summary: In the first year of the ephemeris, the warp engine was invented. Due to the initial engine being too large, it was installed on the space city Regulus. During engine testing, the jump signal attracted an alien fleet, and the Ship Regulus embarked on a flight path.

name: Shape Quiz
summary: -Shape Quiz- is a knowledge game with guessing elements.

name: Shopping Match
summary:
Looking for a different type of memory match game? Well look no further.
Welcome to Shopping Match by Deanavryn Studios.
Shopping Match is a memory match game with a difference.
First you need to select grocery items to place on your shopping list. Once your list is complete it’s time to go shopping.
Each player needs to find all the items on their shopping list by turning over cards one at a time. Make a match, pick again! No match, the card turns back over.
The first player to find all their grocery items wins.
You can choose from 16, 24 or 36 cards.
You can play with one or two players.
Happy Shopping!
All Deanavryn Studio Apps are child friendly.

name: Shapeguard
summary: Shapeguard is a 2D top-down interactivity driven puzzle game where you move on a grid, inside a temple, and collect different shapes to solve puzzles. Will you manage to use the machines, walls and doors to your advantage to escape from the temple?

name: Shinobi Slash
summary: Tap, slash, run and ring! Shinobi Slash is an exhilarating new style Japanese style rhythm game with a slashing motif! In addition to original Japanese-style songs, famous sound game songs.

name: Shadows of Soldiers
summary: A team-based third person shooter, with an emphasis on futuristic devices to create tactical teamplay.

name: Shine of Fullmoon
summary: Shine of Fullmoon is a novel game where you interact with your friends in a peaceful Full Moon Village and continue your story by taking adventures thereafter. Let's choose what kind of stories you will continue with our unique friends and what kind of adventures you will take with them.

name: Ship Smash
summary:
Wanna Smash?
Ship Smash is a unique, fast-paced, tower defense style, action game that requires quick and accurate fingers but timing and strategy as well. Use the octopus's arms and ink to smash and blast the enemy ships before they bring your health to zero. Along the way, you'll encounter new ships with different speeds, health and attack styles. Beat levels to unlock new zones, each with their own unique location and hazard. Earn stars and complete unique challenges to unlock fun costumes. Can you earn all 180 stars?

name: Shadow Stalker
summary: Shadow Stalker is a cancelled 2D side scrolling action game that was in development in 1993 by Athena for the Super Nintendo / Super Famicom.

name: Shrink Assault
summary: Shrink Assault is a Sci-Fi game featuring a mix of Infinite Runners and Rail Shooter games. Skilfully control your spaceship to dodge obstacles and shoot enemies.

name: Shattered World
summary: Play as the your sisters hero as you fight monsters along the way and make friends as well.

name: Shadows of the Damned
summary: Well after its 2011 Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3 release, developer head Goichi Suda noted in passing that the game had started as a Wii game, but that version of the game was cancelled for reasons he would not elaborate on.

name: Shipping Manager
summary: Create and manage your own shipping empire. Control every aspect from route creation to marketing to staff handling and beat other managers to top the leaderboards.

name: Shaq-Fu
summary: Game Boy port of Shaq-Fu.

name: Shaq-Fu
summary: Game Gear port of Shaq-Fu.

name: Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance
summary: As Himiko Masaki continues the search for her mother, the resistance to change ever marches on when new rebellion groups challenge the city's obsession with Shinogi Chess, and the struggle for truth envelops Yoshino High School. Every move counts in Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance!

name: Shipwrecked
summary: Fight your way to establish yourself as the greatest pirate in a newly discovered archipelago, battling numerous other pirate factions and navies along the way in strategic turn-based combat, all while managing your own resources and armada. Crown the true king of pirates in your own way.

name: Shutdown
summary: Engage in heart-pounding top-down shooter action as a skilled operative fighting against powerful mega-corporations in a dystopian future. Unleash a barrage of futuristic weaponry, master tactical combat, and liberate humanity from the clutches of oppression in Shutdown.

name: Shadow of Murders
summary: Shadow of Murders is a murder-solving game.Help solve the FBI's unsolvable murders with Psychiatrist Joseph. People and situations are not normal. Make people talk. Gather evidence. Find the killer and inform the FBI.

name: Shadows of Revenge
summary: Shadows of Revenge puts you into the sinister heart of a mafia-dominated Manhattan. As the boss of a once-proud family now fallen into disgrace, your journey to reclaim the city will test your wit, resourcefulness and determination.

name: Shadows Are Alive
summary: Enter the ever-changing world of Shadows Are Alive! Team up, channel epic alter-egos, and outwit "The Shift" in a shape-shifting haunted mansion. Relentless suspense, vibrant visuals, and unmatched strategy. Can you escape the mansion before time runs out?

name: Shakabula
summary: A South African urban legend called the Shakabula traps you in your house, could it be connected to your problematic past? You will need to find a way out of this horrendous curse. Creepy FMV+2D Art Atmosphere. "Steer" 'n Click + Metroidvania navigation system. JRPG + Twin-Stick Bullet Hell battles

name: Shadows of the Past
summary: Shadows of the past is a visual novel for adults only. In a small town, private detective Josh Wilson leads a quiet and measured life, solving small problems for the locals. But everything changes when Ellie shows up on his office doorstep....

name: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Humanity's Last Hope
summary: It is a game created for the SNV community to recreate the most epic battles in anime.

name: Shadow Bundle: Shadow Quest and Nightshade Ninja Warrior
summary: Dive into this amalgamation of excitement, strategy, and allure, as you become the master of both light and shadow.

name: Shunya
summary: "Drawing, Solve, Adventure"Girl and Cat embark on a CUBE MAGICAL journey.

name: Shin-chan: Shiro and the Coal Town
summary: Shin chan starts a mysterious daily routine, traveling between two worlds: the Village in Akita and Coal Town.

name: ShelfLife: Art School Detective
summary: ShelfLife: Art School Detective is a Mystery Adventure featuring a cast of loveable weirdos! Befriend and investigate 7 potential suspects. Use psychic powers to astral project into their artwork and learn their secrets. Unmask the mysterious ART KILLER that’s terrorising your campus!

name: Short Night
summary: In Short Night:The Half Pint Lady choose between four horny goblin coworkers while keeping The Half Pint Lady from falling into disrepair. Complete unique quests, find hidden items, explore each goblin’s unique personality during the day and tackle increasingly difficult mini-games at night.

name: Shigeru Planet
summary:
A boisterous and bizarre commotion! Overrun the planet with chatter-plants!
Propagate these eccentric yet endearing chatter-plants, only if you dare! Operate a UFO and strive to spawn as many of them as you can before time runs out. Revel in the outlandish frenzy that can only be experienced here on Shigeru Planet!

The fourth release from the 2022 New Hire Onboarding Program at Bandai Namco Studios!

name: Shards of the Past
summary: A trading trip with a nearby village turns into an epic adventure when you discover a hidden truth about your world. You will meet new friends and foes, explore amazing places, and face a choice that will shape the future. Your actions and choices will determine the outcome of this story.

name: Shadow Rebirth
summary: Shadow Rebirth is a classic top-down ninja game with an exciting story, dungeon exploration, monster and ninja fights.

name: Shadowstalk
summary: Shadowstalk is a multiplayer stealth game where you play as a hero, or a traitor possessed by an evil spirit, you should escape from various places that are haunted by supernatural dangers using your abilities and items wisely and watch out for the traitor before they kill you.

name: Shape Hunter
summary: Shape Hunter is a 2D roguelike action game in which players defeat an infinite number of monsters.

name: Shadow Mate
summary: A horror action adventure game in which you work with Belial, a life form that has possessed the body of a young girl named Cynthia, to escape from a mysterious laboratory.

name: Shadow King
summary: The Shadow King has invaded the castle belonging to the Knights of Valor and they need your help to get it back! Explore the massive castle in this metroidvania and help the fallen knights back to their former glory! Upgrade your moves and weapons along the way as you fight minions, defeat bosses, find secrets, and unravel what has happened.

name: She'sn
summary: She'sn is a visual novel dating sim which focuses on a four different stories through all four seasons. The player can select to play the story of any season in any order. Different season also features different heroines and different love stories to play through.

name: Shikinjou
summary: Shikinjou, or Shikinjoh, is a puzzle game inspired by Mahjong Solitaire and Sokoban. Like most Mahjong Solitaire variants, it takes its name from a region in China: in this case, the former Imperial Palace of China, also known as The Forbidden City. The goal of the game is to get the protagonist, who is a jiang shi by default, to the exit. To do this they must push mahjong tiles out of the way. Most mahjong tiles will disappear once they touch one or more of the same type, and these tiles will also vanish along with it. Some, like the dragon or wind tiles, are barricades that will transform any tile that comes into contact into another barricade. The player can also switch graphical modes, which changes all the tiles, the protagonist, and even the background and UI. These graphical modes include alternative themes like space, medieval knights, and Japanese ninja (with shogi tiles replacing the mahjong tiles).

name: Shard Seekers
summary: Shard Seekers is a 3rd person shooter rogue-like dungeon-crawler where players command elemental golems through a mechanical, crystal-laden dungeon that changes with each run.

name: Shells Delivery Deluxe
summary: This is a Kaizo Light romhack with Shell Jumps challenges. A version of Shells Delivery (previous version), but reformulated, with more challenges, backgrounds and a new map. Challenges much more optimized.

name: Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island
summary:
Shiren the Wanderer and his companion, Koppa the talking ferret, return for an all-new roguelike dungeon crawling adventure on Serpentcoil Island! After receiving a vision of a mysterious girl held captive by a terrible monster, Shiren and Koppa make their way to Serpentcoil Island—a distant isle rumored to be the lost stronghold of treasure hoarding pirates. Determined to rescue the girl and find the treasure, the two race into danger… only to be soundly defeated, like all the others who tried before.

Undeterred, Shiren and Koppa vow to challenge the monster again in order to save the mysterious girl. To brave the many dangers that await them, Shiren and Koppa must traverse complex dungeons filled with hostile monsters, hidden traps, and useful items. All the gear and experience Shiren accumulates will be lost if he collapses during exploration, so beware of rushing in unprepared! Rescue the mysterious girl and uncover the mystery that clouds Serpentcoil Island!

name: Shattered Paradise
summary: Shattered Paradise is an expansion for Tiberian Sun on OpenRA, its goal is to (im)balance the game by adding new factions (Mutants, C.A.B.A.L. and Scrin) and reworking the original sides, all of this to create a game a little more varied and balanced than TS.

name: Shitting Pigeon
summary: Shitting Pigeon is a 3D pigeon stealth action game and bird droppings simulator. Fly over the city, scare people and eat a lot of bread.

name: Shelter in the Doomsday
summary: This game is a 2D platform game mainly focused on defense and adventure, with some storyline tasks, as well as collection and construction.

name: Ship Wreck
summary: Rescue all passengers with your shiny sail boat.

name: Shiraha Kirameku Koi Shirabe
summary:
Ayato is an exorcist who works for the government. This time his mission is to investigate and destroy a supernatural object which had been brought into the sword arts school Murakumo Gakuen. With the help of his team members Hime and Ruri, he traced its location to Matsurika, the sole daughter of the head of the Swordbearing Defence Group. They were successful in destroying the object, but as a result, Matsurika became the initiator of the Spiritual Calamity. To teach her skills to fight against spirits, Ayato became a temporary mentor to her.

“No matter what, I want to stand by your side…”

name: Shadowcaster
summary: A 21st century Heretic episode covering many styles of level, both traditional and unusual as well.

name: Shmup Bundle
summary: 2 in 1 PolarityFlow Shoot em up Bundle including Steel Rain and Sky Mercenaries

name: Shadowy Forest
summary: Battle your way through a forest at night.

name: Shrek 64
summary: A Shrek game designed for Nintendo 64.

name: Sheepong
summary:
Join the heroic journey of Sheepong, a bold lovely teenage sheep, whose mom was taken by wolves.
Match 3 or more blocks on the boards to make a match, learn new rules of creating and mixing specials, meet new enemies, interact with various characters and prepare your mind for new exciting missions!

name: Shooting Love. 10-shuunen
summary:
Shooting Love is a collection of two shmups, where you control space ships blasting everything in sight, and dodge bullets to stay alive.

This is the second Shooing Love collection on the 360 from developer Triangle Service (the first one is titled Shooting Love 200X). This collection, Shooting Love 10-Shuunen, contains XIIZeal (XII Stag) and DeltaZeal (G-Stream G2020). It is unknown why the game names were changed here, possibly for licensing reasons.

name: Shiei no Sona-Nyl Refrain: What a Beautiful Memories
summary: The year is 1907. The 20th century is still young. This is a world that experienced a 19th century very different from our own. A world of innumerable steam-powered Engines. The unnaturally rapid development of this steam civilization filled the air with smog, robbing humanity of the blue skies they'd once known. There is one place in particular where the sky is darker than anywhere else: the ruins of the Engine city New York, perpetually shrouded in grey clouds and polluted rain. Five years ago, a mysterious disaster known as the "Great Disappearance" reduced this entire metropolis to a deserted, crumbling wasteland. Sealed off from the world by the United States government, it stands in utter silence. Not a single soul now walks its streets. But today, a woman named Elysia quietly sets foot inside it - guided by a singular purpose. Her destination: old Manhattan, said to be the epicenter of the catastrophe. Unbeknownst to her... There is a place said to be the city's "Underground." This is an enormous subterranean realm, permeated with a dim purple light. No one on the surface world knows of its existence. In this place, the Skyscrapers that crumbled five years ago still stand tall; but their forms are warped and twisted. "Underground New York" is a place of black and violet shadows. A prison with no exit. And beneath its unnatural "sky," the men and women who vanished five years ago still exist... Cowering in fear of the seven monsters known as the "Messengers." Suffering terror, agony, and death at the hands of the "Messengers." They linger on in this twisted underground city, as if waiting for something. A girl named Lily sets foot in this place, her mind devoid of memories. There is only one thing she's certain of. She doesn't have a reason. She doesn't know who or what awaits her. She doesn't even know why she feels this way. But even so, she's absolutely certain. "Manhattan. The ends of the violet sky." "I have to go there. I'm the only one who can." ─The girl sets off for the tower of violet shadow looming far in the distance. ─With every step, she finds the shades of those yet to fade away. ─She isn't aware of the tears she sheds.

name: Shades of Darkness
summary: A new mission pack for HeXen containing 5 all new levels and a 6th unfinished map. A sequel to Despair for Heretic.

name: Shadows of the Afterland
summary:
Madrid, 1960. The old city zoo is rocked by a mysterious death, catapulting a soul to the threshold between the world of the living and the afterlife. But when the transition goes awry, the soul arrives with the memories of Carolina, one of the pioneers in Madrid's police force, who has yet to be born.

Step into Carolina’s shoes and plunge into a riveting adventure to unravel the enigma shrouding these ominous events. Explore the wacky realm of the afterlife, teeming with unique characters and with its own set of rules.

name: Shadow Labyrinth
summary: Challenge the unknown in thrilling Dungeon Explorations, encounter formidable creatures, discover hidden treasures, and unravel the secrets of the ancients.

name: Shallow World
summary: A "reimagination" of Doom 2 episode 1 (11 maps). + 2 early/reused maps

name: Shady Trial
summary:
The most-terrible-ever Patchouli presents a hilarious "court game"!
Dance battles occur in the court! By the way, let's play baseball.

name: Shougi ga Tsuyokunaru: Gekisashi - Jouseki Doujou
Shinkyoku Soukai Polyphonica: 0~4 wa Full Pack
Shin Maru Goukaku: Shikaku Dasshu! IT Passport Shiken, Kihon Jouhou Gijutsusha Shiken, Ouyou Jouhou Gijutsusha Shiken
Shiba Simulator Supreme
summary: Play as a dog (Shiba Inu) and save him from his nightmare. Explore a fever dream landscape to unlock different outfits and abilities. Climb the tower and achieve victory !

name: Shadow Strikers
summary: In a city dominated by underworld organizations, street violence gives way to an unusual pact. "The Shadow Tournament". In Shadowhaven each organization chooses a champion to fight on its behalf, where victories bring power and influence. Get ready.

name: ShotGun Exorcist
summary: ShotGun Exorcist is a bloody fast-paced retro FPS inspired by the mid-90s classics that defined the genre. Battle through swarms of demon spawn as you hunt down the son of Satan. Use a variety of both outlandish and realistic weapons to demolish everything that stands in your way.

name: Shrapnel
summary: Shrapnel is a 4v4 objective FPS. Operators clash in a storm-ravaged impact zone to control Sigma—a volatile resource capable of reshaping humanity’s future.

name: Shadows of Truth
summary: Unravel a plot in New York, play as two detectives who fight to find the truth.

name: Shop Empire
summary: Build the biggest, most luxurious and extemely profitable shopping malls around the world. Deploy and upgrade boots, restrooms, elevators and restaurants to make your vistors spending lots and lots of money. Hire cleaners to keep it tidy, technicians for dealing with power failures and security against the shop lifters.

name: Shaky Ground: Apocollapse
summary:
Duke woke up from his slumber. The hotel room looked dark.
The sky outside still tried to go for as many shades of grey as possible, but at least it stopped raining.
What just happened? It felt like the entire room was shaking.. An earthquake?
As far as Duke knew, there were no major fault lines in Europe. Must have been his imagination.
Suddenly, the room started to violently shake again. But this time, it didn't stop...

name: Shaky Grounds: Tragedy
summary:
Having survived the events of part 1: Apocollapse, Duke tries to find his way towards the epicentre of the disaster, located right underneath a local venue called "The Kompleks". The situation is dire. The alien weapon is recharching for an even bigger blast and time is running out. Duke is the only one close enough to get there before it's too late. But deep chasms, collapsed buildings and unstable surfaces transformed the city into a very dangerous and hostile environment.
And that's without mentioning the constant assault of ruthless aliens, sent by their mysterious leader Froyd Eenakee..

name: Shaky Grounds: Epicenter
summary:
This continues right where the last part left off. You finally know why Froyd Eenakee is after you and the human race, and you know there's a very big ticking clock looming above your head.
Luckily, in his arrogance he was stupid enough to let you go. You made your way out of the alien hive back on the streets, so there's no time to loose.
Try to reach 'The Kompleks', descent into the epicenter of the quake and find the doomsday device before it strikes again!

name: Shin Megami Tensei if...
summary:
Like the first two entries in the Shin Megami Tensei series, the spin-off with the mysterious title If... got its own remake. As in the other two cases, the graphics of the remade version have been redone from scratch, to match the 2D standard of 32-bit generation consoles. Interior locations are much more detailed, with visible furniture and other items in rooms that were empty or contains just a few objects in the original version.

The 3D dungeons can now be navigated with smooth scrolling, unlike the "jumping" navigation of the earlier versions. The remake also has an additional difficulty level, dubbed "normal"; the original difficulty level is called "hard". The easier difficulty level also reduces the amount of random battles. Story, dialogues, layout of locations, and general gameplay remain unchanged in this version.

name: Shared Beauty
summary: Shared Beauty is a dark fairy tale about jealousy, friendships lost, and aging, set in a fictional medieval German village.

name: Shisya
summary: Horror adventure game to appraise spirits photos

name: Shadows Of Deceit
summary: Shadows of Deceit is a next-gen horror and psychological thriller game developed with Unreal Engine 5. While you are getting a chill down your spine with the impressive story and realistic locations, you will also witness the mystery behind Janet's story.

name: Shipwrecked
summary: Explore, craft and fight your way on the uncharted islands! Shipwrecked is an Action-RPG where you will build your base, craft useful tools to survive and even use magic!

name: Shlob
summary: Sword Fight with your friends as goopy beans in Shlob. Use a unique and expansive locomotion system to get around the arenas! Skate, Jump & Boost yourself around as you learn about each arena's gimmick and fight to become the best Shloblet in Shlobtopia!

name: Shitataru Ano Ko: Drenched Girls
summary: Secretly? Forcibly? Agreement? The mischievous school life to see drenched girls begins!

name: Shoot & Sow
summary: Shoot & Sow is a top-down arena shooter roguelite, where players control unique characters and fight vegetables and fruits. Players can plant seeds to grow special items, as well as buy a variety of weapons and items. Complete the talent tree to gain more power. Can you survive on your own farm?

name: Shifting Planes of Existence
summary: Medium-sized Knave-style level with button-operated movable "planes". This is an updated version of the level. The map source is included.

name: Short Haired Girls
summary: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Shaky Grounds Series
summary: Custom episode for Duke Nukem 3D. 5 epic maps filled with intense battles, destructive earthquakes, a post-apocalyptic atmosphere and an evolving storyline Also contains a custom soundtrack especially written for this episode.

name: Shadow Overlord: The Beginning
summary: As a player, you will have to lead your armies of undead and magical creatures to expand Your empire and defeat your enemies. With an exciting plot and a challenging gameplay, this game will take you through epic and dangerous adventure battles while you become the most powerful ruler.

name: Shadows of Rogue: The Sorcerer's Curse
summary: In this game, you'll face increasingly relentless hordes of enemies and formidable bosses, all while discovering an array of valuable items and surprises along the way. Prepare for a casual yet intensely challenging gaming experience, with a wide range of battle combinations at your disposal.

name: Shadowgate PD
summary:
Shadowgate is one of the most well-known and beloved point-and-click adventure titles in gaming history. As one of the original titles in the popular MacVenture series that went on to be celebrated on the NES, GBC, and Nintendo 64, Shadowgate quickly endeared players with its fantastic atmospheric soundtrack, perilous locations to progress through, countless puzzles to solve, and more ways to gruesomely die than gamers previously thought possible.

Developed by Pixel Ghost, Shadowgate PD is being lovingly reimagined for the Playdate console using Pulp, a web based game making tool made by Panic.

name: Shark Turtle
summary: Tile-matching puzzle video game, based on SameGame (さめがめ) originally released in 1985.

name: Shotgun Recovery
summary: A psychological shooter set in a small Nordic town. Take part in robberies, drive-bys and self-medication, all while fighting literal nightmares to survive.

name: Shikakukes
summary: Puzzle game for Playdate

name: Shattered Lands
summary: Simplified real time strategy game where you lead an island expedition. The player can take direct control of a hero on the battlefield and fight enemies head on! Choose between various heroes with unique abilities and playstyles. Conquer the mysterious islands for the kingdom!

name: Shadows Labyrinth
summary: Embark on a journey through the enigmatic realm of shadows, battling countless creatures to unveil the path towards emancipation.

name: Ships Simulator Bundle
summary:
Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.
Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions. Assemble massive naval installations on open waters.

Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.
Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions. Assemble massive naval installations on open waters.

name: Showdown of Fate
summary: There are various types of beauty characters here, come and participate in our exciting game!

name: Shark's Cove
summary: Two Caribbean-style maps which were supposed to be the beginning of a full episode that never got finished.

name: Shift 2
summary:
Get your Shift fix with the next action packed flipping frenzy that is the world of shift.
This time not even gravity is what it seems!

name: Shifted
summary:
Shifted's gameplay is based on Pesky Marbles, a Java game developed by Martijn Wenting under the Karma Studios label in 2003 for cellular phones. In Shifted, the task is to combine three or more marbles of a specific colour next to each other to make them explode.

Shifted is an improved version of Pesky Marbles with enhanced gameplay in challenge mode and adapted for the Vectrex.

name: Shanshui Haven
summary: Explore, Build, Prosper — Embark on a tranquil and strategically rich journey of city-building in ancient China.

name: Shadow of Fear
summary: In 'Shadow of Fear', your only purpose is to solve puzzles and then escape; You can also continue to survive, whether you can survive until the end depends on yourself

name: Shadow of the Depth
summary: Shadow of the Depth is a top-down action Roguelite game. Delve into a dungeon world of light and shadow to eradicate the monsters that ravage your home. Be prepared to step into the abyss before you!

name: Shotgun Mario 64
summary: Blast your way through good ol' Mario 64 with a SHOTGUN! A completely new shotgun mechanic complete with firing, a jump-boost, an aiming mode with a crosshair, and many unique interactions to make for a fresh SM64 experience. This initial version game took around 200 hours of work to make.

name: Shadow Pulse
summary: Nightmares come true when Leonard Venturi sets out on his first mission. Falsely convicted, sentenced to certain death, he follows a reconnaissance team deep into the nightmarish forests and ruins that remain of human civilization.

name: Shell Runner
summary: 2045. Life's never been cheaper. Shells mean you can come back if you have money. You used to. Now you're on the bottom in a cyberpunk sprawl. Claw your way back up through wet work as a Shell Runner, in a PvE extraction looter shooter, where a gig can make you rich - or broke.

name: Short 'n Quick
summary: this is a tech-styled map taking place in a warehouse

name: Short 'n Quick 2
summary: It looks to be inspired by Christian Hansen's 'Flay the Obscene 3', but it's actually based on the look planned for 'The Anomaly: Part III. The layout of the map is done in such a way that you can actually go anywhere you want to and chose a route that you feel best. Some routes make the level more hard and some routes make it easier.

name: Shape Tunnel
summary: Welcome to Shape Tunnel: A Dimensional Challenge! Prepare for a mind-bending journey through twisting tunnels and geometric puzzles. Match your shape to the ever-changing tunnel by deftly rotating the shapes. Precision and quick thinking are your allies. Conquer this challenge!

name: Shivering Stone
summary: Experience a serene journey through the winter forest as you unravel the secrets before you and enjoy brainteasing scenarios amidst tranquil visuals and soothing sounds.

name: Shadow Of Sound
summary: Traditional 4k drop style music game —— "Shadow Of Sound".

name: Shantae: Costume Pack
summary: These fabulous outfits aren't just for show - they also provide Shantae with three new arcade-style play modes! Bounce off walls, throw stars, and teleport with the Ninja Costume beat the life-draining heat by collecting sunscreen in the Beach Costume and lay down the law with your pellet blaster and block-shifting ability using the Mighty Switch Force-inspired Officer Costume. Indulge your passion for fashion while testing your mettle with this chic and challenging DLC!

name: Shin Pokémon: Blue Version
summary: Started in 2018 by a secret cabal of ancient Pokemon nerds, Shin Pokemon is an enhancement ROM hack of Pokemon Red & Blue that aims to be the ultimate remaster fans never got. It is a mostly-vanilla hack that focuses on fixing game engine bugs and oversights from the original game. Additionally, trainer AI routines are improved and multiple quality-of-life enhancements have been added. It also acts as a kind of research-informed speculative work that interprets what the 2016 Nintendo Virtual Console re-release of Gen-1 Pokemon could have been. It is the image of a glitch-free experience with player-friendly goodies and enhancements common to other modern remasterings.

name: Shin Pokemon: Red Version
summary: Started in 2018 by a secret cabal of ancient Pokemon nerds, Shin Pokemon is an enhancement ROM hack of Pokemon Red & Blue that aims to be the ultimate remaster fans never got. It is a mostly-vanilla hack that focuses on fixing game engine bugs and oversights from the original game. Additionally, trainer AI routines are improved and multiple quality-of-life enhancements have been added. It also acts as a kind of research-informed speculative work that interprets what the 2016 Nintendo Virtual Console re-release of Gen-1 Pokemon could have been. It is the image of a glitch-free experience with player-friendly goodies and enhancements common to other modern remasterings.

name: Shin Pokemon: Green Version
summary: Started in 2018 by a secret cabal of ancient Pokemon nerds, Shin Pokemon is an enhancement ROM hack of Pokemon Red & Blue that aims to be the ultimate remaster fans never got. It is a mostly-vanilla hack that focuses on fixing game engine bugs and oversights from the original game. Additionally, trainer AI routines are improved and multiple quality-of-life enhancements have been added. It also acts as a kind of research-informed speculative work that interprets what the 2016 Nintendo Virtual Console re-release of Gen-1 Pokemon could have been. It is the image of a glitch-free experience with player-friendly goodies and enhancements common to other modern remasterings.

name: Sharp Things
summary: Single map for Ultimate Doom created for the first Battle of the Bits Doom compo. In this spectacular adventure, you must wage a one-man war against a thorn bush in your backyard that happens to accidentally contain a portal to spiky hell. Time to break out the metaphorical weed whacker!

name: Shell's Kitchen
summary: Dive into a fintastic culinary adventure where fish serve fish dishes to fishes, and scale new heights of seafood fun with your friends in this cooperative cooking game!

name: Ship of Fools: Water Garden Duo
summary: New Fools have emerged from the ponds. The Water Garden duo is ready to join your crew.

name: Shigatsu Youka
summary:
April of 2020. In the season, when cherry blossom petals dance in the wind...

In one city, a crimson red dead body was discovered. It was in such a horrific state that it was obvious at first glance. The subject has become very hot on television, the Internet, and social media. The cause is that there have been numerous similar accidents in the past.

It should have been something that appeared only in the media... And yet "something" has started to stir just behind certain women.

name: Shaylushay Treasure Expedition
summary: Join everyone's beloved blue cat-mushroom Shaylushay in his adventure into the depths of the mysterious Cave!

name: ShadowStorm
summary: Discover a chaotic future where the intensity of battles reaches unparalleled heights. Get ready for action and join the battlefield (up to 16 players in multiplayer) or take on bots in solo mode. ShadowStorm: strategy and boldness will lead you to victory!

name: Shopping in a Winter Zombieland
summary: An apocalyptic Visual Novel from Zombie Zone Germany for Christmas with German voice acting, lots of decisions and six different endings. There is only a version in German language.

name: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution
summary: Coinciding with the GBA release, an enhanced version of Shantae Advance is also being released for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5 and Windows PCs.

name: Shadow Strike: Street Combat
summary: Enter the heart-pounding world of Shadow Strike: Street Combat on Steam! Engage in 3D side-scrolling combat, navigating gritty urban landscapes. Master diverse combat techniques, customize your fighter, and gear up for an unparalleled urban battleground. Are you ready to dominate the streets?

name: Shelter of Exiles
summary: Shelter of Exiles is a tactical hack'n slash MMORPG with the economic development of the player base. Enhance your hero, amass a mighty arsenal, and obliterate the most formidable monsters alone or with friends and guild members.

name: Shin Nippon Pro Wrestling: Toukon Retsuden
Shockwaves
summary: Shockwaves is an online shooter game where music has an impact on the gameplay. The main game mode is 8 vs 8 point capture. Items that are gained when playing can be traded by players on the open market.

name: She's My Destined Fiancee?!
summary:
When you were just seven years old, a summer vacation on a remote Japanese island led to a promise—a promise to marry a girl someday. But life in the bustling city pulled you away. Now, as a high school student with a heart set on the class president, your life seems promising. However, that distant promise catches up with you when the island beauty transfers to your school and announces herself as your fiancée!

Your peaceful high school life is thrown into chaos, and you're torn between your past and your heart. Having a fiancée doesn't seem to deter your best friend and crush. If anything, their obvious jealousy brings them closer to you than ever. With all three girls vying for your attention, will you honor your childhood promise or let your heart decide your destiny?

name: Shinsetsu Shiawase Usagi F: Yuujou Yori mo Aiyoku
summary:
This installment of Shiawase Usagi abandons the heroines of the two previous games in favor of characters curiously named after Neon Genesis Evangelion heroes: the protagonist is called Shinji, the love interests Misato and Asuka, etc. The plot, however, has little to do with that of the anime series: the hero is a young man who is watching a porn movie and decides to get some real "action". Afterwards, it becomes a series of sexual encounters, which proceed depending on the player's choices.

Being a visual novel, the game can develop into different directions story-wise. The only gameplay consists of deciding where to go and/or what to do. Depending on the player's decisions, the story will be concluded with various endings, "happy" as well as "bad".

name: Ship of Fools: Aquapocalypse Edition
summary: Navigate treacherous seas and blast your way through colossal leviathans to defend your home from the upcoming Aquapocalypse. The Ship of Fools Aquapocalypse Edition features the soundtrack and 2 additional DLCs.

name: Ship of Fools: Deep Sea Duo
summary: New Fools have bubbled up from the crushing depths. Expand your crew choices with the Deep Sea Duo.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Warships DLC
summary: Get ready for an unforgettable adventure in the world of ship demolition with Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Warships DLC! Discover epic new warships, earn unique loot, hone your demolition skills, and become a legend in the demolition of warships.

name: Shards Online
summary: A casual, smooth, physics-based online shooter!

name: Shuffled Sky
summary: Use elemental cards to modify the world in the sky and combine them to discover new abilities in this Roguelike RPG adventure with deckbuilding and tactical combat!

name: Shhh!
summary: Face a terrifying experience but don't scream! If you make noise... It's game over! (You will need a Microphone)!

name: Short Sad Stories
summary: Alice is a dreamy girl who lives between the real and imaginary worlds, in love with the wrong person. Just before that situation becomes unsustainable, things change unexpectedly, and a new path opens for her and those around her.

name: Shattered Echoes
summary: Shattered Echoes is a single player arcade-platformer where your only enemy is yourself. Jump, dash and think two steps ahead in hectic attempts to dodge enemies that copy everything you do. Unlock versatile movement abilities and take on challenging arenas where you must outrun your past.

name: Shooting Squirrel Simulator
summary: The Checkered Squirrel who shoots cool weapons and parkour through levels in slo mo.

name: Shrines of Power
summary: Dive into the magic-infused world of Shrines of Power, a fast-paced FPS where strategic mastery and mystical abilities collide. Protect your shrines, outsmart your foes, and experience thrilling battles across unique maps. Unleash your dominance in this captivating blend of action and strategy.

name: Shelf
summary: Welcome to Shelf's mysterious library! Time to find a way to get out of here, it can't be that difficult. Am I right?

name: Shine: Kotoba wo Tsumuide
summary: Shine: Kotoba wo Tsumuide is a dating sim for the PlayStation 2 about a protagonist who decides to chase his dream of becoming a cameraman and flies towards an island in the Okinawa area to learn with his upperclassman cameraman. On the way to the island, the protagonist was given a very hard assignment to complete: taking a picture of six different girls who hate cameras.

name: Shoot the Robots VR
summary: Do you love shooting? What about robots? And what about shooting the robots? In this fast-paced game you have to use a well-aimed shots to neutralize robots which will run away from you in every possible way.

name: Shape of Clouds
summary: Welcome to Shape of Clouds, where every twist and turn unveils a masterpiece. Your mission is to revive arts in Shape of Clouds by rotate pieces, restore pictures in diverse themes and let your imagination soar.

name: Sharded World: Backpack Adventure
summary: Sharded World: Backpack Adventure is an exciting and strategic game that will allow you to show your strategic and creative skills. In it you will have to build your own backpack, buy equipment, improve it and use it to defeat your opponents in exciting duels.

name: Shattered Plains
summary:
After having taken the wrong pipe mario finds himself in a strange place yet again... the illusionary shattered plains. I suppose defeating bowser would be the obvious thing to do in this situation.

-5 worlds
-1 optional powerup per world
-3 endings
-sequence breaks?

name: Shooting Donut
summary: "Shooting Donut" is an addictive puzzle game with 100 diverse stages, where you shoot donuts to break blocks. Utilize 4 items strategically for precise aiming and level clearance.

name: Shadow Gambit: Yuki's Wish
summary: Yuki and Kuma from Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun return! Recruit them to your pirate crew, explore the enchanted Japanese island “Dragon's Dream”, and experience six new story missions. Will you solve the dragon's riddle and fulfill Yuki's wish?

name: Shadow Gambit: Zagan's Ritual
summary: "Zagan the Apostate" is inviting you to his ominous laboratory. Recruit the zealous scientist and former Inquisition member to your crew, set sail to an eldritch castle island and experience a new campaign. Will you unveil the secrets of the Inquisition's holy flame?

name: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance
summary: Slay the enemies in the silence of the moment. Run through the world of Shinobi full of monsters and ninja actions. Grab Oborozuki, the legendary sword, and slay evil once more. Your clan and the world are counting on you.

name: Shotgun Shenanigans
summary: A multiplayer FPS sports game

name: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew – Complete Edition
summary: The Complete Edition includes the Main Game, the DLC expansions Shadow Gambit: Yuki's Wish and Shadow Gambit: Zagan's Ritual as well as the Original Soundtrack and the Artbook & Strategy Guide in one package at a special discount price.

name: Shadow Hunter
summary:
You must catch all the ghosts of each screen, only in this way you can activate the trap that you must collect and activate it to finally enclose them and move on to the next screen.

You will find levers that give you access to restricted areas, as well as areas with blades or lava that will make your life a little more difficult.

Time is limited on each screen so you don't fall asleep.

Once you have caught all the ghosts of the 4 floors of the building you will have completed your mission, good luck!

name: Shepherd Planet
summary: Shepherd Planet is a leisure puzzle simulator game in which you play a witty sheepdog and drive the lambs into the sheepfold.

name: Shade: A Dog's Expedition
summary: Join Shade, a loyal Border Collie, and his loving family as they navigate challenges, overcome obstacles, and celebrate the enduring bonds of love.

name: Shades of Rayna: Lasher Class
summary: Lasher class for Shades Of Rayna

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Hunt for Moriarty
summary: Attention sleuths!

name: Shoujo Kenshi Akizuki Ren no Oshikake Harayome Seikatsu: Kozukuri wa Waga Shimei... Jusei Suru made Hanasanu zo!
summary: Masaaki is an expert in swordplay, but he is disliked by girls because of his pervert behavior. One day, he takes part in a swordplay competition. His opponent is Ren, a cool and beautiful girl, and he somehow beats her. This is the first time for Ren to lose and tells him she will marry Masaaki to give birth to offspring with Masaaki's strong gene. Masaaki's father soon accepts it and Masaaki and Ren start living together...

name: Shkilagames Story: Episode 1
summary: Маленькая полу-новелла про сервер Шкилагеймса

name: Shark Attack
summary: In this game you play the man-hunting shark for a change and try to kill the divers who are set out to kill you.

name: Shift 3
summary:
Time to get your hands dirty with the biggest Shift adventure yet!
Take on a huge complex filled with extras to collect/alternative ending and a super dooper fancy secret character!

name: Shinin
summary:
The protagonist continues to play mysterious games.
He doesn't know why he's playing that game or how long he's been playing, so he keeps playing...
However, the game and reality gradually begin to mix...?

name: Shirobara Gakuen Satsujin Jiken
summary:
The White Rose Academy is a boarding school for young ladies.

Yuriko Nagashiro, student council president and the daughter of the school's director, and Ranko Kanzaki, a first-year student at the school, witness Sayuri Okabe's suicide.

However, Yuriko suspects that this incident wasn't a suicide.
Together with Ranko, she begins to solve the mysteries of the school.

name: Short Maps for Short People
summary: A collection of 32 vanilla speedmaps.

name: Short Maps for Short People 2
summary: This is the prequel of SMFSP1 by Datacore. The project consists to 32 speedmaps.

name: Short Maps for Short People 3
summary: SMFSP 3 is a megawad of 33 speedmaps made in 10-15 minutes.

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner - Soul Hackers
summary: A remake of the PlayStation and Sega Saturn game of the same name. New features include full voice acting, 30 new demons, and the ability to use play coins to make Nemechi stronger.

name: Shep Hard
summary: Keep your flock safe in this extreme shepherding game. Your goal is to raise 10 platinum sheep. You'll need to grow your plot, smack away wolves, shear your sheep, and eventually lay down mortar towers and turrets to get it done in this insane blend of Tower Defense and King of the Hill.

name: Shikigami No Shiro Evolution
summary: Shikigami No Shiro Evolution for Xbox is an update of the original version of Shikigami No Shiro which was released in March 2002. The new version has an improved AI, new characters, and new game modes not found in the original. Available as 2 versions (blue & red cover).

name: Shootagem
summary:
Shootagem is a lightgun based puzzle game for the Sega Master System.

Shooting a gem will drop the gems above it down. By shooting out gems, match 3 or more gems in a row or column to score! Clearing multiple sets of gems in quick succession will add to your combo which will increase the points scored.

The timer is ticking down and it's game over when it hits zero. Clearing rows and columns will add time to the timer and you'll get more time added for longer rows of gems. After clearing enough lines, more and more worthless rocks will start to enter the play area which you'll have to clear them out by shooting them.

name: Shopping Clutter 9: Perfect Wedding
summary: Help the Walker family plan Mr. Rat's wedding in Shopping Clutter 9: Perfect Wedding.

name: Shopping Clutter 10: The Walkers Take the Stage
summary: Shopping Clutter returns with the 10th chapter in this favorite clutter franchise!

name: Shockwave Original: Sudoku Daily
summary: Daily sudoku puzzles in your browser.

name: Shadow Hawk One
summary: 1st person space shooter and strategy game.

name: Shooting Arcade
summary: Shooting Arcade is one of only two Atari 2600 games to use the Light Gun (Sentinel being the other), but was never released. Interestingly, it appears that Shooting Arcade was not developed in the US, but rather in Mexico by a company called Heuristica. How Axlon was involved is unknown, but they may have simply sub-contracted the game out to Heuristica instead of doing it themselves. So why wasn't Shooting Arcade released? No one knows the true reason, but one possibility is the flawed targeting system of the Light Gun. Another possibility is the late date of the game (1989). It's doubtful that an Atari 2600 target shooting game would have sold in great numbers, and this is probably why Atari went with the more action oriented light gun game Sentinel instead.

name: Shufflepuck
summary: Shufflepuck is a small personal project game based on the classic board game Shuffleboard, with some elements inspired by curling. Face 3 unique CPU difficulties to unlock new skins, or play together with your friends locally and online!

name: Shanghai Blood of War
summary: This game is a first-person shooter set during the Sino-Japanese War, focusing on a Chinese protagonist who leads a civilian resistance against the Japanese invasion of Shanghai in 1937, featuring historically accurate weapons and intense combat experiences in a meticulously recreated 1930s Shanghai.

name: Shanghai II
summary: Shanghai II is a variant of the puzzle game also known as solitaire mahjong. 144 mahjong tiles are arranged in rows and stacked upon each other in various patterns; the player's goal is to remove pairs of matching tiles that do not have adjacent tiles from both sides until the whole board is clear. This variant features six patterns named after animals: tiger, scorpion, monkey, snake, panther, and dragon. The player can choose to display hints or reverse any amount of moves. A mode with a time limit is available as well.

name: Shanghai II
summary: Shanghai II is a variant of the puzzle game also known as solitaire mahjong. 144 mahjong tiles are arranged in rows and stacked upon each other in various patterns; the player's goal is to remove pairs of matching tiles that do not have adjacent tiles from both sides until the whole board is clear. This variant features six patterns named after animals: tiger, scorpion, monkey, snake, panther, and dragon. The player can choose to display hints or reverse any amount of moves. summary: Shanghai II, not to be confused with Shanghai II: Dragon's Eye on the Sega Mega Drive, is a Sega Game Gear game. They are both sequels to Shanghai. Shanghai II is a variant of the puzzle game also known as solitaire mahjong. 144 mahjong tiles are arranged in rows and stacked upon each other in various patterns; the player's goal is to remove pairs of matching tiles that do not have adjacent tiles from both sides until the whole board is clear. This variant features six patterns named after animals: tiger, scorpion, monkey, snake, panther, and dragon. The player can choose to display hints or reverse any amount of moves. This variant features six patterns named after animals: tiger, scorpion, monkey, snake, panther, and dragon. The player can choose to display hints or reverse any amount of moves. A mode with a time limit is available as well.

name: Shin Megami Tensei VX
summary: A previously japanese-only fan remake of the first Shin Megami Tensei made in RPG Maker VX and translated into english by TeaTimeSpooks. Includes all new routes, altered gameplay, new demons, and more. .

name: Shark's Song
summary: Hilda, a sentient bipedal shark, lives with her creator at the bottom of the sea and tries to avoid public attention... but is this what she really wants?

name: Shalnor Legends Double Bundle
summary: Two Story-Rich RPG/Action-Adventure games, made by one person over the span of many years.

name: Shimizu Ritual
summary: Ayaka Nakamura, a respected student at school, harbors a dark secret as she secretly bullies Emi Shimizu, a girl who is interested in the Occult. One day, in what seemed like a normal day for Emi, she summons a devil that can grant her any wish. What will she wish for? Will it be revenge, or something else?

name: Shenanigans
summary:
The Evil Dr. Wector has taken the Great Sunflower’s Sun Energy for his evil plan and now it is up to you to get it all back! Join the four hooligans, Simon, Sebrina, Rae, and Beast, in a wacky and goofy 2D adventure!

From the mind of The Escaped Mental Patient, John Coday, explore a world of goofy characters and zany places created by Mythos Makers and Co. Run, Jump, Wall Run, and Swing Your Hammer as you go through beautiful levels and take down enemies along the way. You can run through all the levels or take your time. Take advantage of the smooth and fast paced 2D platforming giving you ultimate control of the adventure! Explore the world or speed through to save it! The choice is yours!

Play as one of four nut cases. The bat wielding madman, Simon. His violent hamer swinging sister, Sebrina. A kind witch named Rae, and her empty headed magical creature, Beast.

name: Shape Defenders
summary: Why are shapes attacking? Why do you need to deploy traps and shapes of your own to take them out? Who knows, we do know its good, simple old fashioned TD fun.

name: Shmoup
summary: Endless shoot'em up in space! With controller support

name: Shikhondo: Youkai Rampage
summary: Popular vertically scrolling shoot'em up game Shikhondo is back and powered up! One day, the soul-starved Youkai escape from the depths of hell. Now, the story of the Grim Reaper and the girl who has fallen into this land begins!

name: Shimai no Omoide
summary: Uncover clues to unlock forgotten memories.

name: Shipwrecked 64
summary:
A recovered copy of a lost game from the late 1990s about a Beaver named Bucky and his friends trying to escape from an island they crashed upon.

Excerpt from the back of the original Shipwrecked Box:

“BUCKY AND HIS FRIENDS NEED YOUR HELP!
After a sudden crash during a routine fishing trip, Bucky ends up on a mysterious island, where his friends appear to be apprehended by a pack of wolves for disturbing the peace. Embark on a puzzle-based adventure, as Bucky wanders the vast island of Nulla Terra, helping his friends work off the damages, fix your boat, and get back home!”

name: Shield Shifter
summary:
Shield Shifter is a homebrew Atari 2600 game developed by John Reder / Tactical Neuronics. It was given a limited cartridge release by Good Deal Games. Shield Shifter was later included on the Atari Flashback series of plug-and-play consoles, starting with the Atari Flashback 5 in 2014, and most recently on the Atari Flashback X Deluxe in 2019.

The player controls a turret at the bottom of the screen, firing up at three shield layers that loop horizontally. The goal is to create an opening in the third layer and hit the insectoid hiding behind it, which continuously fires at the player.

name: Sheila
summary: You search a castle in order to find and free the kidnapped Sheila.

name: Shave N Quit
summary: Its your first day on the job at the local hair salon. Just do your best, ok?

name: Shan Hai Chang Ge
summary: Shan Hai Chang Ge is a war strategy tower defense game based on the battle of the deer. The Chiyou army is about to attack your city, you need to continuously improve the army lineup, use the recruitment order reasonably, and help the Yellow Emperor defeat Chiyou.

name: Shuttle Intercept
summary: You pilot a space shuttle and have to collect satellites which are heading your way. Other space debris may be eliminated with yout on-board laser.

name: Shop Tycoon
summary: Buy, sell, and build the largest shopping center in the city.

name: Sherlock: The Network
summary: A game based on the Sherlock TV series.

name: ShadowStrikeVR
summary: "ShadowStrikeVR" is a sniper-themed VR shooting game and an award-winning entry in the Qualcomm XR Contest.

name: ShitMan
summary: ShitMan - joyful meat pigeon bullet screen shooting game! The game will make you feel refreshed from start to finish, fighting and brushing! Meanwhile, It is also a joyful story about sudden death and the regeneration of a pile of feces. Life is indeed a pile of shit, but please be your own ShitMan!

name: Shield knight
summary: Gain glory by defeating several leaders of a kingdom in ruins using only your shield as a weapon. Talk to the few remaining inhabitants and discover what secrets this kingdom holds.

name: Shattered Kingdoms
summary: Immerse yourself in the epic world of "Shattered Kingdoms," an MMORPG that harks back to the golden age of classic games like Runescape and Tibia. Crafted with passion for fans of the genre, this game invites you into a realm where every choice and every adventure writes the saga of your journey.

name: Shadow of the Curse-Eater
summary: The wilderfolk of Ushinega Island waste away in a rotting tropical paradise, haunted by a deadly malediction. Yet behind every curse lurks a secret. You have the power to save them... but should you?

name: Shinobi Saga
summary: Shinobi Saga is a one-life mini RPG with roguelite elements and interactive turn-based combat. Choose your Ninja team and embark on a journey into the wilderness to defeat evil spirits and save your village.

name: Shadows in Silence
summary: Shadows in Silence is a 4 vs 1 multiplayer horror game. One player takes on the role of the killer - the witch Elliana and her cat named Sharm. And the other four players play as survivors trying to neutralize the killer.

name: Shorticulture
summary: A cozy 3rd person 3D solar-punk puzzle adventure. Playfully combine alien plants with broken tech - this is the art of Shorticulture! Find botanical solutions to mechanical puzzles and witness the evolution of strange new life.

name: She was a Dream
summary: A short interactive story. The quest of an akward lesbian tryna make her dreams come true. Will you be able to seduce one of them ?

name: Shapes and Patterns
summary:
Shapes and Patterns is a series of educational games for the Apple II.

-Which is Different? - The player must select which of 4 shapes are different

-Pattern Match - The player is shown a pattern of 4 shapes, and must be matched to an identical pattern

-Memory Match - The player looks at a pattern, and then must match that pattern from a list of 4 patterns.

name: Shinda Classmate kara Koibumi ga Todoita.
summary:
I got a letter from my dead classmate.
It was a wonderful love letter.
It said he loved me.

name: Shinigami Killer
summary:
October 31st is Alvin's birthday.
His childhood friend, Chloe, celebrates Alvin's birthday every year. But Alvin really hates Chloe.

A short BL visual novel. Just two guys talking on Halloween night.

name: Shroomtopia
summary: Shroomtopia is a relaxing and atmospheric puzzle about manipulating soils and blending colors. Use your logical reasoning to solve challenges and help bring nature back to life.

name: Shootem
summary: Welcome to the arena! a fast-paced 2D top-down shooter allows up to 6 players to battle across diverse maps and unique heroes, each equipped with deadly weapons. Are you up for the challenge to rise to the top and become the ultimate hero?

name: Shovel Pirate
summary: X marks the spot! Follow the map and find hidden treasures.

name: ShawnCena121
summary: A 3d shooter strategy aim trainer game, using your scroll wheel will choose either your pistol or rifle. Using obstacles as cover avoiding trains and bullets.

name: Shajra Namla
summary: Relive your childhood!

name: Shrimp.io
summary: A Shrimp Based Bullet Heaven. Kill creatures, Level up & pick from 3 upgrades to unalive thousands more.

name: Shakedown Rally
summary: The new season is starting. Are you ready to shakedown the new car in the French Alps?

name: Shines Over: The Damned
summary:
Shines Over: The Damned will take you into a unique experimental horror experience in first person, where your senses will be tested and your reality questioned.

You have no name, no memory, no weapons. There are no friends to protect you. You are alone except for your faithful German Shepherd dog, who will guide you through this dark world and stay by your side.

Immerse yourself in a mysterious and terrifying walking simulator with your faithful companion, where jump scares, tension, and environmental puzzles surround you, and danger lies in wait.

Beware of the horrors that await you in Shines Over: The Damned. You have been warned…

name: SherloCat Holmes Nonogram
summary: SherloCat Holmes combines Picross with a captivating plot. With the charming detective cat, face various nonograms. Enjoy captivating music and design as you unravel mysteries and encounter Sherlock Holmes.

name: Shotengai 10
summary: Suddenly, I realized that I was in a Japanese shopping district that I was unfamiliar with. An unusual shopping street where even if you proceed blindly, you will end up returning to the entrance. Let's exit from this shopping street by relying on the hints left behind.

name: Shoomer Booter
summary: An unexpected find at an antique shop, a soy boy stumbles upon an ancient beard ointment. Each night, he slips into a dream where he embodies a Sumerian warrior, tracing his lineage to Gibil. In this fantastical realm, he courageously confronts demons that lurk within the mystical attics of Irkalla.

name: Shlemo
summary: Action-packed stories of 3 different guys who kill people to get to a briefcase with supposed wealth. The question is which of them will get it, will it solve their problems, which of them will die and what is in the briefcase?

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance
summary: Embark on this definitive version of the critically acclaimed Shin Megami Tensei V, massively expanded with a brand-new storyline featuring new locations, demons, and choices to make that will dictate the fate of all existence.

name: Sheep in Wolf's Clothing
summary: 'Sheep in Wolf's Clothes' is a short interactive visual novel, where you collect sheep that got stolen.

name: Shard Shuffle
summary: Shard Shuffle offers a unique experience blending strategy and puzzles. Place pieces skillfully, destroy to accumulate points. Use combos and win bombs to optimize your strategy. Challenges add spice; earn Shards to personalize your gaming experience!

name: Shijou Saikyou Miyamoto Julia
summary: 50 years after the end of the Galactic War, the eastern galaxy's bubble economy finally pops. The resulting depression catapults society into a desperate age of class stratification, with workers at the bottom struggling to make ends meet. Julia Miyamoto, the player character, is a temp worker doing her best to get by in the bad economy. She takes a gig at the Galaxy Crisis Management Organization, where she discovers that she has an incredible talent for cleaning up other people's messes, and sets out to prove herself. In the process, she'll find herself drawn into a galaxy-wide conspiracy. This mission-based action RPG has players setting out to clear missions by wiping out waves of enemies as efficiently as possible.

name: Shepherd's Eye
summary: Everyone has secrets at Found Sheep Farm, but it’s so much easier to pretend no one does! Will you pull the wool over your eyes, or will your pursuit of the truth make you the black sheep in this thrilling horror visual novel?

name: Shooting Disappearing
summary: Randomly-generated rows of blocks will gradually descend down the screen, and the player must shoot them before they reach the bottom. A variant also exists where the player have to shoot randomly generated blocks instead of rows, and have the ability to gain two shooters at the cost of one life. The player loses if any blocks reach the bottom.

name: Shooting Filling
summary: A shooting game in which the player shoot single blocks to form a complete 10-block line to clear them, akin to the objective of Tetris.

name: Ships of Chaos
summary: Ships of Chaos is a lost old Scott Cawthon game made in 2003. It seems to be quite similar to Gunball and Stellar Gun, all being space shooters, except instead of it being a top-down shooter it seems to be left-right.

name: Shotgun Chicken
summary: Shotgun chicken is a Foddian Precision Platformer Where you use your trusty old shotgun to make it back to the chicken coop but just one wrong move can send you tumbling down to the bottom.

name: Shockwaves
summary: Shockwaves is a captivating merging puzzle game where strategic placement creates powerful shockwaves, pushing and merging numbers. Challenge yourself with endless scoring or solve intricate puzzles.

name: Shadow of Engimor
summary: Shadow of Engimor promises an enthralling and deep storyline, a captivating world, and colorful adventures. Get ready to immerse yourself in dark mysteries and thrilling moments in this captivating 2D game. Demonstrate your skills and cleverness by diving into the world of Shadow of Engimor.

name: Shinobi
summary: Shinobi is, in essence, a reimagining of the arcade classic for mobile phones. While the levels and the gameplay remain unchanged (Save for the main character being able to take 3 hits before dying) a backstory was added to justify the inclusion of 2 playable characters.

name: Shockman Collection Vol. 1
summary: ~ Cyber Citizen Shockman + Cyber Citizen Shockman 2: A New Menace ~

name: Shogun Curse
summary: Face demons and monsters while seeking revenge for the curse casted upon you. Will you find those responsible and finally lift it?

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Steel Giants
summary: The new MASSIVE challenge is waiting! Grab your hammer and get ready to dismantle the new colossi in Steel Giants DLC!

name: Shovelboy: Zone X
summary: Zone X is a level expansion for SHOVELBOY with a new set of 15 extremely hard levels.

name: Shadows of Souls
summary: This is an Endless Runner - Fighter game. Defeat the enemies, get upgrades with coins and prestige points, complete the levels and try to get highest score that you can in endless mode.

name: Shadow City Mysteries: A Clockwork Noir
summary: Shadow City Mysteries is a narrative adventure game in which players take on the role of a detective investigating a Mystery. Or is it a Conspiracy? Or is it a Supernatural Thriller? Experience the story multiple times to discover a story and world bigger than they suspected existed.

name: Shining
summary: This is a detail oriented action shooting game that uses directional keys to move characters and clicks the mouse to design.

name: Shadows of Forbidden Gods: The Horrors Beneath
summary: This DLC adds an entire new map layer, under the existing lands, with Dwarves, a new Evil race and a new giant god-thing. Grow your horrific creature across the map, assisted by two new agents and new ways to expand your orcs and Deep Ones.

name: Shoot The Barrel
summary: Shoot the Barrel game. In this top down shooter you are the protagonist fighting against the barrels. 1. Shoot the incoming barrels in this runner shooter game 2. See how far you canget 3. As you survive the barrels become harder to destroy 4. Gather teammates and fight the barrels together

name: Sheep Gather
summary: Wander through flower fields, beaches, mountains, and more to find hidden sheep.

name: Shift II
summary: The Calm, the Tactical and the Frantic.

name: Shatterbound
summary: Work with your past (and future) selves to solve puzzles. Shatter your obstacles, be your own platform, and more in this time-looping puzzler where YOU are your own solution!

name: Shadow of Azrael 2
summary: The sequel to the epic platform fighter! Featuring 4-Player combat in a fast paced, high-powered battle royale. Fly, blast, and power-up with a brand new experience that blends fighting with RPG elements in a unique and well balanced way!

name: Shade Hunters
summary: Reclaim a silenced research laboratory from a mysterious threat. With randomized skills for each run, hard-hitting combat, an original soundtrack, unlockable characters, variable difficulty levels, and plenty of secrets to be uncovered, this roguelite RPG offers laughs and challenges for all comers.

name: Shy Cats Hidden Tracks: Paris
summary: A unique musical hidden object game where you search the streets of Paris for singing kittens from a choir and money bags to hire and assemble a cat band. As orchestra conductor, you'll be able to configure the musicians as you wish, creating your own music and choir melodies. Find them all!

name: Shrot
summary: Shrot is a bite-sized old-school action RTS set on a sandy planet with horses, tractors and techno music.

name: Shadowgate 2
summary: The sequel to the critically acclaimed, re-imagined, point-and-click adventure game is now available for preorder! Shadowgate 2 leaves 2D adventuring behind, expanding its horizons, and letting you lift the veil on the mysterious castle once again!

name: Shadow Walker
summary: So you want to become a shadow walker? In this game, you walk through a 4x4 grid of rooms, fighting your way through shadow biomes to prove your strength. During the day, you can see perfectly fine, but as night falls, your visibility is dimed, and that is when you are truly tested.

name: Shhh!Saw
summary: If you scream, it's game over! A death game linked with a microphone. Can you escape from the closed haunted house?

name: Sherlock Purr 2
summary: Join Sherlock Purr on a purrfect adventure!

name: Shards Between Us
summary: With their family and home on the brink of collapse, two magical sisters must find a way to grow together. Join their coming of age journey in this healing, heartfelt head-scratcher.

name: Ship's Cat
summary: As the chief anti-rodent specialist aboard a passenger ship you must rid the ship of mice. Explore the ship and eat the mice in this third person action walk-em-up.

name: Shelf Life
summary: Shelf Life is an action FPS set in a near future conglomerate, that will seem eerily familiar if you spend your time around online dumpster fires. Use your arsenal of weapons to shoot, burn and fungible-ize your way through the Edison facility fighting a lizardy hostile takeover.

name: Shinzen Hollow
summary: Embark on a journey in Shinzen Hollow, a captivating farm-sim RPG set in the Japanese highlands. Beyond farming, discover secrets, form bonds with NPCs, and tackle mysteries. With combat, crafting, and the beauty of changing seasons, experience a world filled with endless adventure and tranquility.

name: Sheryl: The Alchemist of the Island Ruins
