summary: Play as Sheryl, a purehearted alchemist, who must gather ingredients and craft them into items and medicine, in her journey to become a five star atelier!

name: Shinkansen 0
summary: Shinkansen 0 is a Japanese horror game set on a Shinkansen (Japanese bullet train).

name: Shadow Detective
summary: "Shadow Detective" is a first-person 3D horror adventure game for solo play where you can enjoy exploration and scenarios to find the cause of supernatural activity while protecting yourself from ghosts at a high school during the night.

name: Shining Girls
summary: Shining Girls is a relaxing puzzle game and multiple unique sexy girls.The game is a jigsaw puzzle, where players move puzzle pieces to restore the original image.

name: Shadowbyte Survivors
summary: Immerse in a virtual world, battle hordes, and level up in our roguelike game. Face intense challenges, upgrade your character, unlock unique abilities, and acquire powerful gear. Ready for the adventure? Gear up, and explore this captivating roguelike realm for a new challenge in every game!

name: Shadow Brawl
summary: Shadow Brawl goes through the story of you as a character who got pulled into another dimension by a powerful crystal the first thing you see in this strange land is a talking pancake! who tells you that a group of evil robots are the ones responsible and your mission is to retrieve the crystal.

name: Sh*thead
summary: With an unpredictable mix of luck and skill, Sh*thead is the classic card game, available now with ranked online PvP

name: Shultz's Treasure
summary: Wandering through a labyrinth you try to find a hidden treasure.

name: Shock Wave
summary: On the Silent Night of All Saints, monsters come to the human world at night.

name: Shrimp Game
summary: Become a pilot of a SHRIMP - Submersible Hydrodynamic Research Integrated Marine Platform. Krill your friends, explore areas for loot and customize your SHRIMP!

name: Shadows Unveiled: Agnes
summary: "Shadows Unveiled: Agnes" is an immersive horror game where you explore an ancient abandoned apartment, uncovering dark secrets and facing unimaginable horrors as you seek the truth behind the disturbing events.

name: Shot & Dread Online
summary: A remake of Seek & Dread Online in Unity. It has several advantages over its predecessor including: enhanced graphics, more efficient net code, IPv6 support, widescreen support and bots.

name: ShellShock Live
summary: It's shell or be shelled on the battlefield as you pummel other players into the earth with a seemingly endless arsenal of weapons launched from your very own mobile tank in this tactical, online multiplayer display of strategy and skill.

name: Shatter and Spin
summary: Play electronic gyro, memories of cyber childhood! In Shatter and Spiral, players will be able to modify their gyro partners and manipulate them to shatter enemies one by one!

name: Shape of Dreams
summary: Shape of Dreams is an action rogue-lite infused with MOBA-esque elements. Venture into a vivid dream world, and create your own champion by freely swapping skills with whatever you like. Play solo against all odds, or with friends in a 4-player co-op game.

name: Shouldermen
summary: Shouldermen is a dialog driven game where you partner with an angel and a devil. Your job: Rescue them from a virtual reality prison by getting them to say the password. The fate of the world hangs in the balance until they are free to stand on shoulders and guide people towards right and wrong.

name: Shoot Giant Robots and Wallrun
summary: A fast-paced, score-attack movement shooter. Mow down an endless horde of robots, flying through hand-crafted arenas at breakneck speeds.

name: Shadows of Dunwich
summary: An X-Com like game with procedurally generated maps for PICO-8. The game has 16 levels, and you need to beat level 16 to win.

name: Shallow End
summary: Discover the secrets to your brother's disappearance. Learn more about yourself and gain insights. A low rez adventure inspired by Zelda and Undertale.

name: Shadow Touched
summary: Shadow Touched is a 2D platformer where the player has to use their platforming skills and travel between dimensions to complete levels.

name: Sheep's Symphony
summary: Shee's Symphony is a rhythm runner fangame. Choose from a selection of outfits, stages, and enemies, and aim for the best ranking in each song!

name: Shopping Clutter 13: Mr. Claus On Vacation
Shoot-Out!
summary: You're a wandering lawman on the trail of an outlaw gang. Beat them in a test of reflexes and bring peace to the Wild West!

name: Shijie Xiuxian
summary: A real-time strategy fairy cultivation game, SHIJIE XIUXIAN. 18 combinations. Hundreds of skills. Endless Weapon Enhancement. You can play endless levels after breaking through the levels

name: Shadows of Destruction
summary: Deep in the Land of Honshu where ancient traditions and dark secrets converge. In this side-scrolling adventure, you'll wields the swords of Ryota, a betrayed samurai, and his enigmatic savior, Diago. Together, they are the "Shadows of Destruction," a force forged in revenge and shrouded in mystery.

name: Shady Lewd Kart: Wild Woody Character Pack
summary: Wild Woody joins Shady Lewd Kart!

name: Shy Girl's Makeover
summary: College students Kenta and Ayaka are united in their love for video games – and in their feelings for each other. Will their relationship progress beyond being two close gaming friends or will Ayaka’s heart be charmed by someone else? Find out in this slice of life RPG set in modern Japan!

name: Shush
summary: You are one of the "Waste Warriors", navigating hazardous forests to gather trash for the Eco-Collector. Collect resources, build a base, evade enemies, and uncover the dark secret hidden within the Eco-Collector to survive.

name: Shatter Remastered
summary: Shatter Remastered is a retro-inspired brick-breaking game that combines classic action with unique twists and incredible boss battles. This mobile version requires a Netflix subscription to play.

name: Shuǐhǔ Zhuàn zhī Qúnmó Fēngyún Lù
summary: A port of Chuanpu's Mega Drive strategy RPG "Shui Hu Zhuan"

name: Shapefall
summary: Engage in a unique cooperative FPS with up to three allies. Defend against endless enemies by utilizing weapons that fire 3D shapes. Match ammo shapes and colors to maximize damage and unlock perks. Explore ruins, solve puzzles, and discover easter eggs to enhance your strategic play.

name: Shissou, Yankee Damashii
summary: A mobile phone revival of Square Enix's cult-classic PC MMO.

name: Shardfall: FitQuest VR
summary:
Beautiful Worlds, Endless Enemies, and Unlimited Exploration.
Take on a huge range of fierce enemies with different fighting styles. Attack with powerful jabs, crosses, hooks and uppercuts. Defend yourself with blocks, jumps, ducks and dodges. Think and adapt to survive.

name: Shaman's Mask of the Rune Magic
summary: Non-linear platformer action game about a shaman and his mask.

name: Shui's Odyssey
summary: This is a puzzle game that combines text and images. Players use visual illusions to piece together fragments of memories from Alzheimer's patients, in order to reconstruct the truth of the story and witness the passage of time for three generations.

name: Shoko
summary: Capture and battle hundreds of different monsters to complete your bestiary. Shoko is a game with waves of enemies to defeat and Roguelite elements in a cute, colorful, hand-drawn universe.

name: Shark Siege
summary: Survive the siege and keep your vessel afloat in "Shark Siege", where the deep blue sea is your adversary, and courage is your strongest ally. Join the voyage, if you dare!

name: Shooper Nova
summary: Craft Your Ultimate Circular Fortress! Dive into SHOOPER NOVA, where you choose props and components to build a unique fortress. Unlock combos to shape your strategy and battle style. Become an unstoppable barrage machine and obliterate waves of enemies from all directions!

name: Short Fuse
summary: A fast-paced and ever-chaotic roguelike set around defusing bombs! Nothing is off limits, just make sure you're snipping the right wires!

name: Shade Silver
summary: Avoid Traps, Shoot Enemies, Collect Treasure, Discover Secrets, Solve Puzzles, Beat Bosses, Unlock New Places.

name: Shanghai Gold
summary: A boomer shooter set in 1930's Shanghai. Fight your way through Shanghai and greater regions of China, in search of treasure and adventure.

name: Shadow Code: Lucy
summary: Become a hacker, utilizing your skills to collaborate with the mysterious master thief - Lucy, to accomplish a sensational heist.

name: Shadow Among Nove
summary: In a remote corner of space lies an old ship with no engines nor power. In its dark cabin with no lights on, a brown-haired bounty hunter is watching the news about a high bounty on offer, unaware that someone is infiltrating his ship. Under the threat of a cold gun, a journey of suspicion and uncertainty begins.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: The Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance Digital Deluxe Edition bundles the base game with all purchasable DLC content including three Mitama items and two Demon Subquests.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Demon Subquest: Holy Will and Profane Dissent
summary:
Additional content that will grant access to the subquest "Holy Will and Profane Dissent".
In this quest, players will be able to take on "Dagda", and even recruit him should they prove victorious.

*After progressing to a certain point in the game, talk to the Bethel researcher in the Tokyo Diet Building to begin the subquest.
*It is recommended that this subquest be attempted at the end of the game.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Demon Subquest: Sakura Cinders of the East
summary:
Additional content that will grant access to the subquest "Sakura Cinders of the East".

In this quest, players will be able to take on "Konohana Sakuya", and even recruit her should they prove victorious.

*After progressing to a certain point in the game, talk to the Bethel researcher in the Tokyo Diet Building to begin the subquest.
*It is recommended that this subquest be attempted at least halfway through the game.

name: Shop Legends
summary: Immerse yourself in an Idle Simulation Tycoon RPG like no other, where you are tasked with managing a thriving item shop, crafting legendary gear for customers, commanding mighty heroes to loot rare artifacts & blueprints all while challenging top-ranked shopkeepers in an epic business adventure!

name: Shoot or Shout
summary: Experience the thrill of roguelite action in Shoot or Shout! Team up, shoot or shout at wacky enemies, and face unique bosses across dimensions. Navigate pre-designed levels in this pixel-art adventure packed with action and strategy!

name: Shuffleboard Dungeon
summary: Roll your way through over thirty encounters with careful aim and thoughtful strategy. Learn the strengths and weaknesses of different enemies as you battle your way through a Gothic citadel.

name: Sharkstorm
summary: A monstrous tornado unleashes ravenous sharks on the waterlogged populace. As sharks and debris rain around you, fly close enough to the twisters to toss bombs in so the explosions will equalize the pressure and neutralize the storm.

name: Shrouded Mind
summary: Shrouded Mind: pits scientist Kaiser Manger and US Marshal Andre Kar against a deadly virus turning islanders into berserk maniacs. Racing against time, they must find a cure while battling through perilous jungles and uncovering a sinister conspiracy. Will they save the island before it's too late?

name: Shashingo: Learn Japanese with Photography - Additional Camera Filters
summary: This DLC gives you an additional pack of 6 Camera Filters to use while taking photos in Shashingo!

name: Shimapanzer Strike!
summary: At Knight's Cross Academy, the most prestigious military academy on the continent of Lykaia, you will learn the military tactics needed to effectively command your squad of tanks, infantry, and magical girls to defeat a ruthless enemy only interested in the total subjugation of your world and race.

name: Shift Legacy Collection
summary: Step into the monochromatic and mind-bending universe of the Shift series developed by Antony Lavelle, where black and white landscapes hide more than meets the eye. This collection unites the original four titles - Shift, Shift 2, Shift 3, and Shift 4.

name: Shogun
summary: SHOGUN is an arcade style shooter that emphasizes running and gunning to stay alive. Rip through waves of increasingly difficult enemies hell-bent on your doom by shooting, looting, and eluding a bullet hell of cartoonish horror. Refuse death, explode with burning rage and tear asunder!!!

name: Shipwrecked: Lost Colony
summary: Shipwrecked: Lost Colony is an 18th Century city-survival builder set on a tropical isle lost to time. Lead a group of marooned survivors and forge a new beginning in an uncharted land, where dinosaurs are the biggest threat and your strongest allies.

name: Shallow Sea Roaming
summary: Find the secret treasure and explore the secrets of this mysterious island You need to use your courage and scientific knowledge to survive on this island,And find a way to leave this island!

name: Shaqing
summary: "Shaqing" is a Chinese horror puzzle game set in "Wuzhan Town". Players must help the protagonist escape an evil scene where dreams and reality blur, and save his beloved. The objective is to help the protagonist escape and save his beloved.

name: Shopping Benfica
summary: Shopping Benfica is a game about me and my best friend from high school beating the shit out of Totally Not Monica and Friends in Fortaleza.

name: Shop of Forgotten Memories
summary:
When your beloved grandmother passes away under mysterious circumstances, you’re left to pick up the pieces of her legacy.

But this is no regular family inheritance—instead, you find yourself the brand-new owner of an antique shop filled to the brim with unique and exotic artifacts.

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Strange Journey 2
summary: A fan-made sequel to Atlus' cult classic, made in Ren'py and predominantly featuring generative AI assets.

name: Shadow Slayer
summary: Hardcore Hack’n Slash Massive Action-RPG.

name: Shadow Knight: Ninja Game RPG
summary: Unleash your shadow knight out of the shadow war by fighting against hordes of monsters and defeating them all. The cool Ninja Game - fighting game with shadow fighting style is waiting for you to explore. Be a fighter and fight the shadow war if you want to be the Legends of Shadow!

name: Shadow Slayer: Demon Hunter
summary: Welcome to Shadow Slayer! Join our heroes' adventure in Foliga, a once happy and peaceful world turned dark. Undead bosses are now crowding everywhere. But this will end now! Stock up on epic hero powers to start the battle of the century today!

name: Shadow War: Idle RPG Survival
summary: Shadow War: Idle RPG Survival is a dark and atmospheric idle RPG where you battle against hordes of monsters in the Shadow Realm. Choose from a variety of classes, each with its own unique skills and abilities, and embark on a journey to become the ultimate Shadow Slayer.

name: Shadow Knight: Ninja Fighting
summary: Hurry up and get the most stunning items and unique skins for free to equip your unique hero and fight to become Shadow Legends.

name: Shift Change
summary: I have a heart too.

name: Shrouded Space
summary: After ten long years of solitary confinement on the Empress Xyra's prison planet, you have just been summoned for a special work detail. Could this finally be the opportunity you have been looking for to escape and put all this behind you?

name: ShiroKuro: Shiroi Kokoro to Kuroi Tsurugi
summary: A visual novel from developers ALTERNA. Akira leaves his town to observe the first and last major meteor shower in this century and gets in an accident. He regains consciousness when he is attacked by some black life form "Zyphos". A girl appears and rescues him. This way Akira makes the first contact with the extraterrestrial life forms and gets involved in the species confrontation.

name: Shootrush
summary: A runner where you have to avoid obstacles while defending yourself from robots who want to kill you.

name: Shades: Shadow Fight Roguelike
summary:
New enemies, new abilities and sequel to Shadow Fight 2 story - Shadow’s adventures continue!

Shades is a RPG fighting game that continues the story of the legendary Shadow Fight 2. Get ready for the enhanced features of the original game that bring your experience to the next level. Fight more battles, see more locations, meet more friends, encounter new enemies, collect powerful Shades and explore the expanded Shadow Fight universe!

name: Sheepy
summary: Get the sheep reunited with its fellow sheep while avoiding slimes.

name: Sherlock Purr 2: Extended Edition
summary: Join Sherlock Purr on a purrfect adventure!

name: Shadows of Betrayal
summary: Dive into Shadows of Betrayal, a horror/thriller visual novel about recent high school graduates, who head to a remote cabin for a celebration of sorts. Navigate friendships, delve into (optional) romance, and brace for suspenseful twists. Can you survive the unexpected, and what will it cost you?

name: Shield Strike
summary: Shield Strike is a competitive game where players use shields as projectiles, in addition to the unique abilities of each of the 8 characters. Made for up to 4 players, VS or Coop, and with a challenging journey in story mode.

name: Shining Star
summary: Have fun with different clothes to customize, Shining Star brings a relaxing and super aesthetic atmosphere where you can decorate your characters with the most diverse items, from the cutest to the most stylish!

name: Shadow and Darkness
summary: You are a explorer of new planets. As it turned out, other planets are inhabited by shadows that are very hostile. Your task is to survive several waves to win.

name: Shadows of Progakko: Kuro
summary: Progakkos were used to protect young people after a disease called "Blackout" emerged in a near-war situation between two countries. Adam starts living in Progakko, but doesn't trust the people around him, until he meets a girl who changes his life.

name: Shards of Epoch Past
summary: Eldritch entities invaded and destroyed your reality! All hope is long gone! Cling to your life for as long as you can in this simple, yet addictive, free-to-play platformer with Lovecraftian themes.

name: Shadows of Eldham
summary: "Shadow of Eldham" is an atmospheric narrative walking simulator where player choices shape the fate of the kingdom's lost children. Traverse haunting landscapes, interact with diverse NPCs, and reflect on moral dilemmas in this captivating journey of redemption.

name: Sheep Sweep
summary: Sheep gone missing! Join a goofy solo or coop adventure. Use various tools in a fully flammable world, crack unique puzzles, bypass obstacles and safely recover all the missing sheep.

name: Shoot Star
summary: Enjoy boss battles in a cartoon world! "ShootStar" is a 2D shooting action boss battle game.

name: Shadow of the School
summary: The player finds himself in an abandoned school, which was once a place of study for local schoolchildren. The protagonist is a paranormal researcher who came here to solve the mystery that shrouds this gloomy location.

name: Shadows in the City
summary:
Discover the hidden secrets of NeoCity in "Shadows in the City", the detective novel that immerses you in a world of mystery, conspiracy and futuristic science. He accompanies intrepid detective Alex Mercer as he confronts the shadows that lurk in the alleys of this futuristic metropolis.

Facing corporate conspiracies, political corruption, and banned scientific experiments, Mercer will unravel the truth behind the disappearance of scientist Claire Reynolds. The city, a crucible of technological advances and hidden shadows, becomes the scene of an epic confrontation between light and darkness.

name: Shrek Playtime is Ogre 2
summary: 10 years after the first game I have made a sequel to it. Fair forewarning though: This game is hard as balls. If you actually manage to beat "the shrek challenge", do let me know!

name: Shrek Playtime is Ogre
summary:
It is time for some extreme Shrek action!

It started as a joke between me and my friend, but then it kinda evovled into a serious game.

Move and jump with arrow keys,
punch with spacebar,
select powerup with ctrl and alt to use them.

There are 13 passwords in total! Can you find them all...?

name: Shopping Simulator
summary: "Shopping Simulator" is your ticket to a virtual mall adventure! Dive into diverse stores, manage budgets, and make friends in this nostalgic Scratch-style game. Ready to shop 'til you drop? Let's go!

name: Shiling
summary: The protagonist "Luo Ling" travels following vague memories in her mind, during which she discovers a child "Wuyi," who claims to be pursued by monsters and seeks help. They agree to stick together and find home.

name: Shopping Sort
summary:
Are you a shopping beast? Are you ready to exploit the best deals and make the most of your cash? Then this is the game for you!

In Shopping Sort you play as a shopping professional, always on the lookout for the newest promotions. Get ready and train to buy things on the cheap!

name: Show Me How To Live
summary: "Show Me How to Live" is a minimalist aesthetic shoot 'em up game, in which we control a ship that must navigate and understand the perspective of a person capable of seeing the senselessness of life but unable to do anything about it.

name: Shadow Hush
summary: In 'Shadows Hush' infiltrate 'Guard' to unveil sinister experiments. Stealth mastery is key. Unravel secrets with cunning, aided by your radio partner. Will you save the world?

name: Shoot or Date
summary: Be fast to the draw and either shoot or date the randomly chosen mate.

name: Shimokita Rose & Tears
summary: The protagonist is struggling with their gender. And realizing that they're in love with their best friend Haruto, the protagonist decides to work at Rose & Tears to be honest themselves about who they are, finding a family there who help them discover their identity.

name: Shaolin Bao
summary: Beat and batter your friends in this chaotic party arena game. Sauce up your attacks with spicy power ups as you team up or dish it out solo in fast-paced rounds across interactive Chinese-inspired arenas.

name: ShowMeSpeed
summary: 2D Single / Multiplayer speedrunning / racing platformer, enriched with items and timer.

name: Shootinator
summary:
Just shoot the living hell out of the incoming ships and watch some pinkish 80sness...

Nothing more...

name: Shoka
summary: The most grueling and unfair Isekai turn based RPG made with a budget of literally $0 (got RPG Maker VXA from a steam key giveaway), most will fail over and over and over until they eventually gives up and quit. Will you accept the challenge or chicken out? The choice is yours to be made. I pride myself on my ability to create a game with consistent power scaling and no plot holes.

name: Shrineflow
summary: Shrineflow is a multiplayer (1 vs 1) hide-and-seek game between a Kitsune and a Ninja. The Kitsune uses her magical abilities to track down her opponent. The Ninja uses his stealth skills to stay undetected while he collects enough to coins to break into the treasure trove.

name: Shenaniganza
summary: Outsmart friends in goofy hide-and-seek with crazy power-ups, vibrant cartoon aesthetics, and endless laughter. Form alliances, betray buddies, and experience multiplayer mayhem in this unpredictable, entertaining game. Get ready for a bonanza of fun – where laughs never stop!

name: Shadowed Descent
summary: A series of inexplicable events spread throughout the village, causing chaos and disrupting the balance, leading you to find clues using all available resources to unravel the mysteries that triggered this chaos and disorder.

name: She Could Fly: Documentary Escape Game
summary: Online gamer Tiger Orchid has picked up the new title 'She Could Fly: Documentary Escape Game'. You play with Tiger entering an empty flat covered in comic book art. Who lives here? What's up with the creepy knitted birds? How do you get out? Will someone fix the toaster?

name: Shooting Range Simulator
summary: Run your own shooting range! Sell ammo, rent weapons, and manage upgrades to grow your business. Buy supplies online, attract customers, and aim for success. Can you build the ultimate shooting range? Find out in Shooting Range Simulator!

name: Shadows of Chroma Tower
summary: An immersive first-person Dungeon Crawler RPG with heavy roguelite elements and huge bosses in an Extraction setting. Level up, learn skills on a vast talent tree, develop your profession as a harvester or crafter, discover new recipes, loot and craft your way to becoming an unstoppable fighter.

name: Shadow Over the Twelve Lands
summary: A dungeon-crawler first-person RPG built on TIC-80.

name: Shopping Clutter: Winter Break
summary: All kinds of holidays are coming up… from winter festivities to celebrations of love! Can you ensure everything goes off without a hitch?

name: Shopping Clutter: Spring Blossom
summary: Whether you’re helping Auntie Sheep decorate her flower shop, or serving delicious coffee in the mornings… Animalville needs you!

name: Shopping Clutter: Halloween Mystery
summary: An antique store transformed into Dracula’s lair… a thief in the town of Animalville… what’s next?!

name: Shi no Homura
summary: A PS2 boys love visual novel.

name: Shoot to Shoot
summary: Shoot balls with a gun, using physics collisions to push them into the basket. Test your precision and strategy to the limit.

name: Sheep It Up
summary: A Game Boy port of Sheep It Up.

name: Shovel Knight: Dig - Fate and Fortune
summary: The Fate and Fortune update is packed with even more adventure, including a brand new challenging quest called Knightmare Mode, sweet mementos to unlock and show off in the HUB, and tons of quality of life improvements to make your journey even smoother. We can't wait for you to dive back into Shovel Knight's epic journey and experience this expansive and FREE addition to the game.

name: Shovel Knight: Dig - Wicked Wishes
summary: Be careful what you wish for as you climb the ranks at Hoofman's Adventurer's Guild, where a plethora of quests and mysteries await! Discover new Relics, mini-games, Accessories, secrets, and crucial gameplay enhancements, too! We can't wait for you to dive back into Shovel Knight's epic journey and experience this expansive and FREE addition to the game.

name: Shovel Knight: Pocket Dungeon - Paradox Pack DLC
Shovel Knight: Shovel of Hope DX
summary: Shovel Knight: Shovel of Hope DX is an enhanced edition of the pixel-perfect adventure. Jump, battle foes, and dig up treasure as you quest to defeat the Order of No Quarter and The Enchantress. DX adds 20 playable characters, online multiplayer, and new features like rewind and save states.

name: Shadow of Pharos
summary: Shadow of Pharos is a short first-person horror game.

name: Shredded Faith
summary: Enter Shredded Faith, a world of ancient mysteries and modern challenges. Master combat, survival, and arcane arts while exploring towns, wilderness, and dungeons. Craft gear and shape your destiny alone or with a guild. Every choice counts in this dynamic realm of adventure.

name: Shadow Mansion
summary: By playing this product, you will push the limits of fear and go after dark secrets. If you dare, step into this scary adventure and unravel the mansion's dark past!

name: Shoni Island
summary: Settle, build, and survive on the enigmatic Shoni Island. Manage quirky NPCs, farm, and appease four unpredictable gods. Solve tricky puzzles, uncover hidden secrets, and balance chill with challenge in this captivating, cozy survival adventure. Will you escape or become part of the island’s legend?

name: Shogun
summary: Carve your legacy in a world of samurais, where strategy, prosperity, and heritage converge.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Safety Difficulty
summary: Adds the "Safety" difficulty option, suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story. This difficulty is recommended for those who have little experience with RPGs.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - DLC All-in-One
summary:
The DLC All-in-One bundle set includes the following:
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of Wealth
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of EXP
• DLC Content - Mitama Dance of Miracles
• Demon Subquest - Sakura Cinders of the East
• Demon Subquest - Holy Will and Profane Dissent

name: Shadow Trick
summary: Turn into a shadow and clear all the levels. Shadow Trick is a cute platformer game starring a wizard able to switch between the real world and the shadow realm. Keep an eye on your shadow and don't let your eyes trick you!

name: Short Adventure
summary: An RPG that uses the ATB battle system seen in early Final Fantasy games, Short Adventure follows a diseased young woman who goes from every day college student to criminal to outcast as she tries to cope with her life changing quickly.

name: Shinsetsu Shiawase Usagi 2
summary: The sequel to Shinsetsu Shiawase Usagi features the same characters: the nameless main hero and the two school girls: Yuki and Mary. The gameplay is similar to the previous game, the player being allowed only to make a choice occasionally.

name: Shattered Fate
summary:
Embark on a journey of discovery through a medieval world that was shattered by a mystical event in this Souls Like game!

In the world of Albion, you will control Leif, a young man trying to find his destiny, casted on a decrypt and corrupted world, he will have to battle against evil forces, discover his fate and try to heal the world from Chaos.

name: Shitamachi Ninjou Gekijou
summary: Mario, Bowser, Toad, Princess Peach, and Bill Gates engage in adult activities, such as sex, smoking, murder, damnation, prison breakouts, and adultery.

name: Shining Force: Horizons
summary: What if you could choose the classes of force members as they joined? After some brainstorming, I figured it out and put together what became Horizons. I figured this would be something that would offer tons of enjoyment for those that have always wanted to choose classes for their team. To make this work, there is a limited cast, out of the 12 members, 9 are given the option of choosing a class upon joining.

name: Shinobi
summary: The Master System version adds a life gauge, changes some of the hostage rules and simplifies the visuals in order to run better on the hardware.

name: Shift 87
summary:
Shift 87 is a first person observation horror game.
Keen investigators can find a total of 66 anomalies throughout 3 levels of handcrafted, highly atmospheric environments.

Runs are randomly generated, featuring small and subtle as well as horrifying and unmissable anomalies to provide a gameplay experience that is uniquely different and exciting each time. Players can expect a playtime of around 2-3 hours for a full playthrough.

name: Shifting Sand Land
summary: A map based on Shifting Sand Land from Super Mario 64.

name: Shrapnel City 2096: Trapped In The Future!
summary: Just like L.A. Meltdown 2047 did with episode 1, Shrapnel City 2096: Trapped In The Future! reinterprets all of episode 3 in just one big level.

name: Shocking Twist
summary: A new single map by Magnarj

name: Shadow Dancer
summary:
Shadow Dancer on the Master System retains a lot of the arcade game's content, but simplifies the graphics and sound to better suit the hardware. Stage layouts are slightly different, and the decision to use sprites similar in size to the arcade version means that fewer enemies can appear on screen at any one time. Sprite flicker is a common sight, and entire sections of stages are removed to save space. Unlike the arcade version, players cannot backtrack during either side-scrolling or boss sections, limiting player to a very small section of the screen during the boss fights.

The most striking omission in the Master System version of Shadow Dancer is the dog as an active character, but it is still available as a game mechanic. When a valid target is onscreen, the player must crouch. While crouched, the ninja magic icon will slowly transform into a a dog head. When the icon is completely full, it will move to the target enemy's location. Pressing attack will cause the dog to appear out of nowhere and attack the enemy. If no valid target exists, the icon will not move and pressing attack while crouched will perform a normal attack. The dog can be called only three times each stage.

The Master System version retains the first-person shuriken-throwing bonus rounds, but the one between the second and third stage is the same bonus round used by the Mega Drive version, which makes player to jump from a tall building and attack ninjas in a downward shoot-'em-up fashion.

Like the Master System version of Shinobi, ninja magic cannot be used during boss fights. In addition to the previously mentioned problem of being confined to a small section of the screen, this makes the boss fights even more difficult than the arcade version.

A small oddity, in the Master System version, Shinobi always bows to the boss before the battle.

name: ShedHorror
summary:
You've cornered yourself in a tiny shed in an attempt to hide from the creature that has been hunting you down. Now your best chance at survival is to keep the creature at bay from within the shed until dawn. However, all you have to work with is a flashlight and your ears.

This game contains an abundance of RED. If you're suffering from erythrophobia, you'll have a stroke playing this game.

name: Shogun Samurai Tycoon
summary: Are you ready to leave your mark on history?

name: Shisya 2: Ghost Video
summary: A horror adventure game where you identify ghost photos and ghost videos

name: Shoulders of Giants: Ultimate
summary: Simultaneously control a sword-wielding robot and a gunslinging space frog in Shoulders of Giants, an explosively colourful sci-fi roguelike. Play alone, with a friend, or as part of a four-person team, cutting through waves of enemies on a quest to rescue the galaxy from the forces of Entropy!

name: Shut Up, RPG!
summary: Medium sized chain map by Than, Gibbie, RPG, Nightbringer.

name: She From The Future
summary: In a bizarre fire two years ago, Mei lost her detective boyfriend. And now she is also a detective, and her goal is to find out the real cause of her boyfriend's death. And with her life in the detective agency, she is hooked up with the mysterious power that travels through time and space......

name: Shooting Range Simulator
summary: Run your dream Shooting Range shop. Manage your supplies, rent guns and sell ammos which suits guns calibre. Modify your guns as you like. Expand and upgrade your shop, level up your popularity to get even better equipments. Join shooting tournaments or shoot your guns in your own range.

name: Short Snow
summary: SHORT SNOW! Realistic open-world survival experience, you find yourself lost in a vast, snow-covered forest after a harrowing plane crash. With temperatures plummeting and hunger gnawing at you, will you succumb to the forces of nature, or will you conquer the frozen wilderness? The choice is yours!

name: Shop Crush
summary: Run a mysterious thrift shop in a story-rich Visual Novel. Meet eccentric customers, uncover hidden illusions, and unveil the sinister secret of your shop.

name: Shrimpwrecked
summary: Riding an extra-terrestrial weapon disguised as a guitar, battle to the bottom of the ocean deep to turn the tides of impending worldly destruction; krill or be killed!

name: Shop Town Dooter
summary: A chaotic party top-down shooter. In arenas that throw different surprises every round, find a way to out-perform your friends, even if it means cheating, bribing, or bringing a MECH to a gunfight! Upgrade your guns mid-fights for maximum results. - no refunds in case of friendship destruction.

name: Sheep Adventure
summary: Control a cute sheep in this 3D arcade game and help it reach the safe green meadow, avoiding passing cars and dangerous lakes. Go through exciting levels of increasing difficulty, testing your reaction skills and agility. Are you ready to become the hero of this exciting adventure?

name: Shoe it All!
summary: Swing, fling, and cause chaos with your shoes in this physics-based mayhem. Discover secrets, unlock bonus levels, customize your look, and fill your journal with shiny stickers. Master the perfect throw and SHOE IT ALL!

name: She is Home Alone
summary: Embark on a sky-high adventure in She is Home Alone! Take the wheel and race through the clouds towards your love interest's house in this quirky first-person endless runner, all while grooving to the synthwave soundtrack.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Darkest Mysteries Bundle
summary: Your sanity is the price of the truth.

name: Shamania
summary: Shamania is an open world survival game. Get ready to farm, craft, build and fight, but with a unique feature: use your shamanic skills to your advantage in creative ways! Survive in this sandbox with your friends in CO-OP mode.

name: Shy Guy Surfing
summary:
Slide, jump, and float over the ocean in this arcade-style fangame by LucasPucas. With over a dozen unique areas, rip-roaring rival battles, and a brand-new New Game Plus mode, the world of Shy Guy Surfing is packed with content like never before!
Travel across the wild seascape and face off against bosses in Journey Mode, or shoot for a high score in Endurance Mode.
Jam to classic music from the Mario series and more, arranged by an all-star cast of chiptune artists!
Customize your experience with a wide selection of screen borders and unlockable costumes.

name: Shoot to Pleasure
summary: Let's shoot wildly together!

name: Shoot or Die
summary: 'Shoot or Die' is a thrilling 2D shooting game where you take on the role of the last human survivor facing a robotic uprising. Arm yourself with powerful weapons, such as the Fireball and Shield, and utilize game-changing perks, to navigate dynamic battlefields and outwit cunning enemy droids.

name: Shape Survivor
summary: Damn it, quickly kill the enemies surrounding you. Choose your weapon, freely combine weapon enhancements, and obtain advanced effects when fully reinforced.

name: Shinonome Abyss: The Maiden Exorcist
summary: The main character is a shrine maiden named "Yono," who has to survive in a haunted houses where Mononoke (yokai and vengeful spirits) lurk, using a limited number of items and traps in this strategy roguelike horror action game!

name: Shadow of The Abyss
summary: Shadow Of The Abyss is a psychological horror game where you play through the eyes of a bodycam. As a security guard, your job is to survey an office building during a night shift, until you fall into the hands of fate.

name: Sherlock Holmes: The Tea Shop Murder Mystery
Shattered Melodies
summary: Slash and shred your way through the vibrant, musical world of Soronos. Summon all your rhythm, dexterity, and puzzle solving chops to beat down the fool that nabbed your little sister!

name: Shoot Shoot Cowboy!
summary: Hey Cowboy, straighten your hat!

name: Shadow Falls
summary: Shadow Falls is a first-person horror game, where you explore a mysterious farmhouse deep in the forest, solving eerie puzzles and uncovering secrets that reveal the thin veil between the world of the living and the dead. Delve deeper and uncover the sinister forces that led you here.

name: Short Sad Stories: A Night Out
summary: A Night Out tells about a random night in which Alice finds herself alone at home, with no plan, trapped by circumstances. But before getting desperate, she decides to go out to a nightclub and party on her own, whatever that turns out to be.

name: Shroud
summary: In an otherworldly twilight born from the petals of a mysterious cosmic flower, a shrouded girl seeks to sever the threads holding it together. In this 2D action platformer, use your ferocity and grace to traverse a variety of unique levels full of methodical encounters and untold new powers.

name: Shareholders
summary: Welcome to Shareholders an economy \ strategy \ simulator. Explore the depths of a simulated economy that is rich with mechanics and activities: from production and stock market manipulation to managing consumer demand and influencing global trade through exports and imports.

name: Ship on Wheels
summary: Welcome to Ship on Wheels, an exciting arcade racing game! Easily join the official seasons or create your own custom tracks. Players can also design unique arenas with mini-games. Dive in and start racing!

name: ShipOS 1994
summary: Are you ready to recover your family's fortune and rebuild the greatest shipping empire the world has ever known? Well if you are, then you're going to need the latest integrated shipping management system to get you there. Welcome, to ShipOS 1994

name: Shogi Wars
summary: Shogi Wars, officially approved by Japan Shogi Association, is a completely new type of Shogi app with fancy performance, fantastic graphics and the world-class AI, from HEROZ.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Submarines
summary: Submarines DLC gets you a new challenge awaiting you. Submarines, which bring many new challenges and possibilities! Get ready to smash some Submarines!

name: Shoot Bubble Deluxe
summary:
This is the most classic and amazing shooting bubble buster game. This deluxe version is the only one that contains both Puzzle Mode & Arcade Mode.

Make combinations of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst. Clear all the bubbles to level up.

How to play - Don't use the arrows on the bottom, just tap on the game board where you specifically want the ball. Click the menu key to select levels and other options. There is no witch craft in this bubble shooter game, just stick to the game with patience.

Game Features:
1. Puzzle Mode - 300 fun levels of saga puzzles of bubble shoot
2. Arcade Mode - The bubbles will go down gradually so you need to shoot quickly to avoid death
3. Game Center - You will get 10 points for each blast of bubbles and can submit the high score to global leader board.

name: Shattered Palace
summary: In your journey to find a way back to Parthoris, you've come across a desolate palace. In hopes of finding a way out, you step through the portal at the entrance.

name: Shrek Shreds
summary: Here is your chance to choose a skateboard and rip through the streets for Far Far Away with Shrek - but watch out for obstacles, they are everywhere, and be sure to read the instructions first, since this takes some skill. Now grab a board and have some fun!

name: Shadows And Monsters
summary: The minions of Evil have swept across the Shadowlands! Embark on a thrilling journey in this action-adventure platformer that combines intense combat with exploration and engage in dialogue and trade with cheeky NPCs.

name: Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula - Aratanaru Chousensha
summary: Shinseiki GPX Cyber Formula: Aratanaru Chousensha is a Racing game, developed by Aspect and published by Vap, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Shining Stars 4: Another Dimensional Incident
summary: Shining Stars 4: Another Dimensional Incident is a light kaizo mod continuing, and ending, the story line of SM64 Shining Stars. Star Whomp and Celestial Bowser team up to cause all kinds of alternate dimensional chaos with the 152nd Star Comet, and we must stop them!

name: Shadowblade Knight Symphony
summary: Embrace the darkness, bend reality, and carve your legend in shadowblade knight symphony.

name: Shattered Dreams
summary: Do you hate your life? Well, boy, do I have the game for you! Follow the story of a social reject turned evil, soul-sucking CEO. Battle your inner demons, suppress workers' unions, and travel through space and beyond to increase your profit. But watch your step while getting off your ship.

name: Shifter
summary: Explore this strange world using portals to shift between the light and dark dimensions. Navigate the world, transforming it as you progress. Illuminate the void to reveal what has been abandoned in the shadows. And remember, don't linger in the darkness...

name: Shipwrecked
summary: Shipwrecked is the first and only book of the Shipwrecked series.

name: Ship of Dreams
summary: Ship of Dreams is the first and only book of the Ship of Dreams series.

name: Shien Mogui
summary: Two girls travel to a small abandoned village to investigate an urban legend. This game is an incomplete work that was discontinued. Therefore, the ending is included halfway through.

name: Shepherd’s Plan
summary: An office point-and-click puzzle game mixed with visual novel-style storytelling set in a noir-fabled world. As you are fired from the job, to save yourself from a collapsing dream, it’s time to investigate, discover the black company’s secrets, and take sweet revenge for the money you deserve.

name: Shaft Hero
summary: Shaft Hero Alpha - An Endless Arcade Zig Zag

name: Shrimp
summary: Click Shrimp, get more shrimp, shrimp.

name: ShadowLight Siblings
summary: Two brothers against a world deprived of its colors.

name: Shapez 2: Supporter Edition
summary:
Show your support and get two unique rollercoaster inspired track pieces for your space railways, plus 40 minutes of additional music and the full soundtrack!

Rollercoaster Railway Pieces
Use the Twist and the Loop to add some rollercoaster flair to your railway lines!

Additional Music
Unlock additional 40 minutes of in-game music from the composer of the original shapez soundtrack, Petter Sumelius, with some tracks by Patrik Pettersson.
Official Soundtrack

The upgrade includes access to the full soundtrack, including the base game music and the additional music for a total of 80 minutes sci-fi inspired electronic music, keeping the essence of the original shapez sound while adding a touch of space to fit the new theme. High quality FLAC versions of every track are included.

name: Shuyaku ni Narenai Boku-tachi ha Kadan de Kaeru wo Tsubusunda.
summary:
Kimura Natsuya is average at everything he does, with a complex about his mediocrity.
Then, a celebrity called Tokiwa Akihiko, who was known as a one in a hundred million beautiful boy, appears before Natsuya...

-- Natsuya's emotions are shaken by Akihiko's presence...

name: Shiren the Wanderer 6: Toguro Island Exploration Record Plus Pack
Shadows of the Werewolf
summary: Shadows of the Werewolf is a cinematic, third-person action-adventure game that places players in a suspenseful, horror-filled world. The story unfolds across various locations, including a suburban home and a mysterious forest retreat, where an innocent couple faces a relentless werewolf and other monstrous creatures. Players will engage in tense exploration, object interaction, and combat, using stealth and strategy to hide, fight, and escape from supernatural threats. The game blends elements of classic horror films and survival horror games, offering a narrative-driven, single-player experience filled with fear, suspense, and the challenge of survival under the full moon.

name: Shelley Manor
summary: Find your way through a puzzle filled manor while barely dodging human-eating monsters. You wake up in a dark room with one objective: escape those sharpened teeth. However, you should not worry; you will meet friends along the way.

name: Sheepers
summary: Take on the charming challenge of raising and nurturing a vibrant flock of sheepers.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of EXP
summary:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Kushi Mitama", demons that drop items that give the protagonist EXP, and "Ara Mitama," demons that drop items that give ally demons EXP.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of Wealth
summary:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Saki Mitama", demons that drop items that can be sold for Macca.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance - Mitama Dance of Miracles
summary:
Additional downloadable content that increases the spawn rate of "Nigi Mitama", demons that drop items that give the protagonist Glory, points needed to learn new Miracles.

*There is still a low chance of Mitama spawning even without this DLC.
*You can revert the spawn rate mid-game from the Options menu.

name: Shattered Souls
summary: Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned, and you will not forget the betrayals inflicted upon you. With a mark that ties your fate to seven men, you’re determined to lay waste those who tried to shatter you. Will you try again?

name: Shadow Dash
summary: Shadow Dash is a retro 2D action platformer with pixel-art characters on oil painting backgrounds and changing game controls.

name: Shinde Shinde Tsuyoku nare!...?
summary: A deadly RPG with a new system that makes you stronger by dying and suffering.The graphics are a combination of dots and 3DCG, and the scenario is massive and branching. No matter how many times you die. No matter how many times you die. Don't give up hope.

name: Shissou shita Yuujin no Heya ni Nokosareteita Game
summary: Would like you to solve the mystery contained in the game.

name: Shining Lore
summary: Shining Lore is a cancelled Xbox and PC MMO.

name: Shoshin Test
summary: Become a subordinate of Detective Gumshoe and take an ability test. Register your grades in the ranking and compete with detectives nationwide for status!

name: Shut-in Vampire
summary:
Oh no! Mayu’s in a pinch! She’s woefully behind on paying the rent, and her scary landlady, Miss Himemiya, has issued an ultimatum. Mayu needs to earn ¥100,000 by the end of October, or she’ll be kicked out!

Being evicted from her home would be bad enough, but Mayu has a secret: she’s actually a vampire. Mayu hasn’t been a vampire for a full year yet, and the church is keeping close tabs on her to ensure she’s been behaving herself. According to the stone-faced Sister Juriel, it’s the church’s standard policy to execute all vampires without a fixed address, lest they start roaming the streets causing chaos.

If Mayu can’t pay the rent in time, she won’t just wind up homeless: she’ll be executed! What’s a fledgeling vampire to do?

Assume control of Mayu and manage these tumultuous two weeks of her life. Help her raise money to avoid a grisly end, all while managing her stress levels and forming relationships with girls over the internet. You never know: come Halloween, Mayu might be able to land a date, and she might even get to nibble on a cute girl’s neck!

Do your best, and don’t let this upcoming Halloween be Mayu’s last! She’s counting on you!

name: Shadow of the Ninja Reborn: Deluxe Edition
summary: Our fearless heroes, Hayate and Kaede have undergone a massive visual upgrade over their original 8-bit models.

name: Shape Invasion
summary: Line up the shape characters with the shapes falling from the sky. Make five matches to win!

name: Shootout Pool
summary:
A 3-D pool game where players use a real cue stick to hit on-screen cueball to effect the on-screen billiard balls.

Shootout Pool was produced by Sega in 2002.

Sega released 593 machines in our database under this trade name, starting in 1960. Sega was based in United States.

Other machines made by Sega during the time period Shootout Pool was produced include: Super Major League 2001, Power Smash 2, InuNoOsanpo, Crackin' DJ Part 2, Cyber Troopers Virtual On Force, House of The Dead 3, Virtua Striker 3, Beach Spikers, Virtua Striker 2002, and Maze Of The Kings, The

name: Shoot the Rapids
summary: You paddle down several courses in your canoe avoiding obstacles along the way.

name: Shuffle Quest
summary: Gather your party and shuffle your spells, it’s questing time! Bring up to four friends together in a whole new dimension of roguelike deckbuilding. Four decks are better than one!

name: Shadows
summary: Shadows is a very personal tribute to Death Bear's mapping origins and the journey they've been on the last four years. Shadows is a Vanilla Limit-Removing megawad, with Episode 1 inspired loosely by Knee Deep in the Dead. Each of the episodes follow similar themes as the original, with some personal flavor and some added twists.

name: Shortcut Run
summary:
Race against opponents, and stack up all the floorboards you can pick up along the way!
If you're clever enough, get out of the way and build bridges and take shortcuts to get to the finish line before everyone else!

name: Shadow Leap
summary: In the world of the night, the protagonist who has the power to manipulate "shadows" performs exhilarating actions to "leap" around and, together with his shadow clone, defeats his enemies. Shadow Clone Action game.

name: Shoot & Destroy
summary:
Shoot & Destroy is a short modern 1-bit top-down shoot'em up.

An outer space threat is at large destroying and conquering the galaxy.
Fly through 4 stages and defeat the Boss.

name: Shining Hero
summary: A single-player roguelike game with pixel art that blends deck-building with grid-based turn-based strategy.

name: Shawarma Legend
summary: Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your very own shawarma restaurant? Immerse yourself in Shawarma Legend, the newest and most exciting cooking game that lets you step into a world of culinary delight. Fulfill customer orders with precision and keep your restaurant thriving.

name: Shades
summary: A curse has been laid on the Island of Arulan which causes people and objects to vanish and reappear randomly. Also the curse brought monsters. It is your task to find out what causes all that trouble.

name: Shuntle
summary:
You get 6 tries to guess the secret word. The secret word is between 4 and 7 letters and you can guess words between 4 and 7 letters. Shorter secret words may have trailing spaces or leading spaces. Spaces might be at the beginning, the end, or both.

Letters in your guess are: green if you guessed a letter in the right place; yellow if the letter is somewhere else in the word; or grey if the letter is not in the word.

name: Shanghai Mahjong Solitaire Deluxe
summary: Embark on a Zen Puzzle Adventure – Over 900 Levels of Mindful Strategy and Endless Fun!

name: Shamoji
summary: Serve the rice making sure the bowl is facing the right way.

name: Shalnor: Silverwind Saga
summary: Rynna has arrived on one of Shalnor's most dangerous Islands. Prepare yourself for an epic RPG/Action Adventure game. With focus on gauntlet-style combat, traps, boss fights and beautiful pixel-art scenery.

name: Shift'n Slay
summary: A brutal blend of turn-based tactics and roguelike. Take on the role of an executioner, grab crime by the throat with the hand of the law... and smash it! Because you are the law!

name: Shadow and Flame
summary:
2 new factions, new heroes, spells and units for original factions, new maps, and campaign-compatible. Shadow and Flame is a modern reimagining of BFME1, with improved graphics and new gameplay systems.

Shadow and Flame has 6 factions to choose from; the 4 factions from the original game - Gondor, Rohan, Mordor and Isengard - have been overhauled with new mechanics, units, heroes and spells, and 2 new custom factions - Gundabad and Rivendell - have been added.

The goal is to create an RTS experience that is faithful to the spirit of Tolkien's mythos, with diverse, engaging, and balanced gameplay.

name: Shine On, My Little Sun
summary: When the Sun fell, darkness covered the world. In the snowy wasteland, the town of Svargo thrived under its faint light. But the Sun did not go out. The small Sun sleeps atop a grim lighthouse. What happens when the Sun awakens, seeking a few days of simple childhood?

name: Shrew
summary: You are an Etruscan Shrew, the smallest mammal in the animal kingdom. The animal cave is rumored to hold your great grandpa’s treasure. And you’re going to find it.

name: Shepherds
summary: Shepherds is a 3D, two-player co-op musical adventure game in which players control unlikely partners - a shepherd girl named Zoe and a magic wolf named Kin. Players must cleverly combining their unique mastery of musical melodies and distinctive movement styles to solve puzzles.

name: Shop Simulator: Supermarket
summary: DESIGN, SELL & EXPAND – YOUR SUCCESS IS IN YOUR HANDS. Put your entrepreneurial skills to the test in Shop Simulator: Supermarket. Immerse yourself in the world of retail and start your own business today!

name: Shiina Taki's Decameron
summary: Shiina Taki's Decameron is a doujin interactive fiction based on anime「BanG Dream! It's MyGO!!!!!」. The story concentrates on Shiina Taki, the drummer and song writer of MyGO!!!!! and her fight against fate till the last breath.

name: Shop Simulator: Pet Shop
summary: In SHOP SIMULATOR: PET SHOP you can fulfill your dream of running a pet store. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of retail and keep your customers happy. You and up to three friends can customize your store and take care of all the needs of a pet store.

name: Shadow Generations
summary: Play as Shadow in a brand-new story campaign featuring never-before-seen abilities that prove why he's known as the Ultimate Life Form! Speed through iconic stages from Shadow's history, discover hidden secrets in an expansive hub world, and unlock new powers to take on Black Doom and save the world.

name: Shantae and Asha: Dream Fantasia
summary: A Monster World IV sequel and crossover

name: Shadowveil: Legend of The Five Rings
summary: Recruit and command a party of samurai on expeditions into the Shadowlands of the Legend of the Five Rings universe. Gain experience and cards in battle to develop units and create powerful combat combinations in this strategic roguelite.

name: Shotgun II: Double Barrel
summary: Shotgun II: Double Barrel is the second installment of the SHOTGUN series and while not all the changes are present in this teaser, the way the game is played will have some cool tweaks worked in, plus cutscenes and a more in depth story!

name: Shining Force Cross Exlesia Zenith
summary: The fourth installment of Shining Force Cross arcade series.

name: Shades
summary: Shades is a really immersive solo FPS with infiltration and tactical extraction shooter aspects. Go stealth, or loud, in a variety of missions as a mercenary for an agency that really use your skills to make this world better.

name: Shadow's Descent
summary: "Shadows' Descent" is a psychological horror game where you investigate a very special hospital, full of mysteries and dangers. Solve puzzles, discover terrifying secrets, and survive an oppressive atmosphere where every shadow can be a threat.

name: Ships 3D
summary:
Ships 3D is a .io style ships game with 2 Game modes: Team Flags and Trader. It has many aspects of progression including the Session Leaderboard (Shown in the top right while playing), WOF (Wall of Fame), and the Clan Leaderboard.

The game was made and developed by a solo indie developer known as Yp3d with contributions from Zorm.

name: Shadow's Ladder
summary:
What is real and what is not? Explore the mysterious island where Shadow the Hedgehog wakes up. Destroy the G.UN. robots, find the keys, open the doors, and prepare to face something darker and mystical.
Shadow's Ladder is experimental light horror game, influenced by old school games. This is an attempt to mix the 2D style of Sonic games with the dark atmosphere of Japanese horror games.

name: Shroud of Gloom
summary: Shroud of Gloom is a point-and-click horror game. Solve puzzles, collect items and uncover secrets with nothing but a flickering flashlight to guide your way. Can you survive the dark and make it out alive?

name: Sherlock: A Rose Among Thorns
summary: Step into Victorian-era London and join Sherlock Holmes' detective agency on a thrilling quest to unravel the mystery behind a series of chilling murders that grip the city.

name: Shei Toule Wo de Nu Pengyou
summary: This game tells the story of the player through the clues on the slips of paper to find the stolen girlfriend！

name: Shadowhand Solitaire
summary: Ride with Lady Cornelia Darkmoor - aristocrat by day, highwaywoman by night. Play your cards right to untangle a web of corruption, smuggling and blackmail in this swashbuckling solitaire adventure. Your fortune and freedom are at stake!

name: Ship of Mist
summary: In the future world, artificial intelligence will replace the human brain, causing humans to lose their dreams and self-awareness. Weak Water will steal dream storage tanks to restore self-awareness and earn rich rewards for a small number of people, but she will encounter various thrilling events.

name: Shining Legend
summary: A cancelled action RPG that was in development by Blueside for Nintendo DS, where a prince has 800 days to win the heart of one of the kingdom’s seven princesses.

name: Shanghai Mahjong Solitaire Premium II
summary: NEW 1,100+ Levels of Strategic Zen and Global Challenge!

name: Shark Simulator: Ocean Predator Survival
summary: Hunt, Grow, and Reign Over the Ocean!

name: Shockman Collection vol. 2
summary: ~ Cyber Citizen Shockman 3 + Cyber Citizen Shockman Zero ~

name: Shirogane Maid Club
summary: A whimsical romantic comedy centered around the Maid Club!

name: ShockWave
summary: ShockWave is a strategy video game released for the Amiga in 1990 by Digital Magic Software.

name: Shattered Sun
summary: Shattered Sun is a fast-paced roguelike where you pilot a powerful mech to escape a doomed star system by battling through hostile planets, upgrading your gear, and racing against time before the sun explodes.

name: Shape Shifter
summary: Create, discover and share levels, compete for the best times and discover hidden secrets. In this sandbox platformer, whether you're a triangle, circle or square dictates how you solve puzzles and clear levels! each shape has their own unique abilities that completely change the game.

name: Shard Squad
summary: In Shard Squad, join elemental creatures to save their lands in intense battles against challenging hordes and bosses. Strengthen yourself with unique allies, gather valuable items, face epic calamities, and unlock new members to create unique strategies on your path to victory!

name: Shiren the Wanderer: The Mystery Dungeon of Serpentcoil Island - Plus Pack
summary: Ten new dungeons will be added to the adventures of Shiren and his companions on Serpentcoil Island. In addition, you can play Sacred Tree as Shiren's partner Koppa and the swordswoman Asuka!

name: Shape
summary: A minimalist style but inside a complex-minded With connecting word mechanism, you can make a rule for your rooms and solve the problem. Solve the puzzle and go to the door to the next room. explore new mechanism

name: Shooting Aircraft
summary: I heard it takes a truck of shells to shoot down a plane? A decompression game that simulates anti-aircraft gun attacks on airplanes.

name: Shirokuro: Shikijoushou no Osananajimi wo Sewa suru koto ni natta, Kanojo ni naisho de
summary: You secretly help your friend with erotomania, even though you have a girlfriend.

name: Shokudo Underworld
summary: Run your own sushi shokudo in a mysterious underworld. Satisfy the appetite of your customers, collect suspicious ingredients from bizarre fantastical creatures, and realize your dream of creating ... the legendary Chawanmushi!

name: Shin-chan: Bundle
summary: Shin-chan: "Me and the Professor on Summer Vacation -The Endless Seven-Day Journey-" and Shin-chan: "Shiro and the Coal Town" bundle set.

name: Shorebound
summary: Shorebound combines survivors/roguelite gameplay with base building and management.

name: Shadow
summary: In SHADOW, expect the unexpected. Every shadow conceals danger, every sound fuels your dread. Dare to survive a night of terror where the darkness is your enemy, and the unknown waits at every turn.

name: ShapeScale
summary: Scale shapes to match the target size

name: Sheeeroom
summary: You wish to bring "She" back to life to reclaim something precious you’ve lost. Solve the various puzzles set before you and gather what "She" needs. Even you don’t know what "She" truly is. "sheeeroom" is a mysterious adventure game.

name: Short Trip
summary: An interactive illustration five years in the making where you drive a cat tram through picturesque mountain villages. A relaxed, casual, delightful experience. Ding ding!

name: Sheol Inferno
summary:
Sheol is a roguelike card game based on Dante's Divine Comedy.

You will accompany Dante on his journey through the 9 circles of Hell and fight alongside him to defeat the guardians of the circles.

Use the cards from the Spanish deck or Poker deck to complete the missions that will be assigned to you in each circle and thus be able to access the next one.

During the game you will earn gold that will allow you to obtain Blessings to help you on your adventure and, at the end of the game, you will be able to improve your skills on your character sheet.

FEATURES:
- Card roguelike.
- Spanish deck of cards or Poker deck.
- Character progression.
- Deck Management.
- Based on the lore of the Divine Comedy.
- Highly replayable.
- NO micro transactions.

name: Shikanoko Fangame
summary: Shikanoko Fangame is a fanmade rhythm game based on the Shikanoko Nokonoko Koshitantan opening theme "Shikairo Days".

name: Shred! Remastered + Shred! 2 Bundle
summary: Shred! Remastered Bust out sick tricks and gnarly combos in over 30 courses inspired by Mountain Bike culture, hand crafted by a solo Dev who lives and breathes Mountain Biking!

name: Shattered
summary: Prepare to lose your mind in Shattered, a mixed reality escape room experience, where everything is just a puzzle waiting to be unraveled. Trapped in a mysterious mental health facility, your perceptions cannot be trusted.

name: Shippin
summary: Embark on a journey across cozy islands, where you’ll fish and experience magical moments. Uncover the stories of an ocean, where each harbor is a welcoming place, with friendly characters waiting to help guide you back home!

name: Shadows of Progakko
summary:
Adam Samishi went to live at Progakko, a huge school with the purpose of protecting teenagers from a threat that occurs in the country, however, nobody knows what exactly this threat is.

Note:
This game was originally released on Gamejolt, then re-released on Itch.io a few months later.
At the time the developer was known as SlothOgami/ShinOgami, only later it became Kuraishimi.

name: Shadow Labyrinth
summary: Shadow Labyrinth is a 2D action platformer and a genre-twisting alternate take on the iconic PAC-MAN. As The Swordsman, you wake on a mysterious planet amidst relics of wars past. To survive you will discover secrets, consume your enemies, and grow from prey to apex predator.

name: Shiver
summary: A survival horror game where reality itself seems to unravel as you navigate the frozen hellscape to find your missing sister – defending yourself from horrors beyond our understanding, and nature itself. Solve puzzles, combat ice-covered nightmares, and most importantly, survive.

name: Shuumatsu no Sugoshikata: The world is drawing to an W/end
summary: In a week the human race will perish. In this situation the hero keeps going to school while everyone gives up. What is there ahead?

name: Shuriken Trigger
summary: Master the ninja art of wall-running while fighting room after room of syndicate thugs and deadly robots in this top-down action shooter.

name: Shadow Siege
summary: Shadow Siege is an exhilarating third-person shooter (TPS) that plunges players into heart-pounding, action-packed battles. With fast-paced gameplay and strategic combat

name: Shooting Range Owner Simulator
summary: Run and develop your own Shooting Range and reach more and happy customers!

name: Shop Manager Simulator
summary: Take charge of your own retail outlet. Stack shelves with products, hire staff, set prices, appease the customers, manage suppliers, expand your space. Grow from a little store into a massive supermarket.

name: ShoppingMall: Manager Simulator
summary: Build your dream shopping empire from the ground up! Design, decorate, and attract top tenants. Keep customers thrilled, maximize profits, and dominate the industry. Can you become the ultimate shopping center tycoon? Start now and watch your empire thrive!

name: Shop Simulator
summary: DESIGN, SELL & EXPAND – YOUR SUCCESS IS IN YOUR HANDS. Put your entrepreneurial skills to the test in Shop Simulator: Supermarket. Immerse yourself in the world of retail and start your own business today!

name: Shattered Time
summary: Step into the chaotic world of Shattered Time, a 2.5D platformer set within the mysterious confines of a high-tech laboratory. As a lone experiment gone awry, you gain the ability to manipulate time itself, allowing you to reverse moments in the environment and use the past to reshape the present.

name: Shoot Away Pro
summary: Shoot Away Pro is an arcade light gun shooting game. Players use a plastic gun to shoot at targets on a projection screen.

name: Shore of Jord
summary: Shore of Jord is a story-driven cRPG set in an alternate world of Europa, where you take on the role of a retired military officer trying to resolve mysterious events from your past and survive the longest winter in history: strengthen or break friendships, find your love, and discover who you are.

name: Shaki Shaki Island
summary: A GB-styled drawing game created for Game Off 2024. Use an 8x8 drawing grid to recreate the wildlife and scenery around you.

name: Ship Simulator
summary: Welcome to Ship Simulator: Boat Game, a game in which you need to build a nuclear power plant in a deep province using ships. There is no transport infrastructure, only swamps and rivers around! Stand at the helm of an old boat, rebuild neighboring mining complexes and industries, transport resources between them and support their work. Buy new vehicles and improve the industry and all for the sake of building a nuclear power plant!

name: Shoku Iku Series 1: Soreike! Anpanman: Sukikirai Nai Ko Genki na Ko!
Shimajiro no Eigo Activity Ehon: ABC Park de Asobou!
Sheep Seeker
summary: Sheep Seeker is a fast-paced, 3D platformer where you race through dynamic levels to catch every sheep as fast as possible with a friend or solo. Unlock unique abilities to Run, Jump, Explode, and Warp to compete for the top spot on the global Sheep Seeker leaderboard!

name: Shell Out
summary: A shell hack with only 1 exit.

name: Shell Is Cool
summary: A basic shell jumps hack for beginners.

name: Shadows Of Wyrmwood
summary: Shadows of Wyrmwood is a roguelike adventure RPG. Use spells, swords, and strategy to defeat every corrupted foe. Travel across four procedurally generated maps that grow harder with every encounter. With each victory, you obtain new armor, weapons, and spells from defeated enemies.

name: Shellax
summary: This hack is focused mainly on shell tricks but still a ton of platforming throughout each level.

name: Sharks 3D
summary: Play as a shark and eat other sharks.

name: Shelloween
summary: This is my second hack, with some cool chocolate mechanics all around the shell, I`ll hope you enjoy to play it

name: Shop Empire 2
summary: The popular Shop Empire game sequel. With more booths, new facilities, a fun new parking system for cars and trains. But sadly also more clever thiefs that want to rob your shops! Build a bigger and better shopping mall, hire staff members to run the place smoothly. Shop Empire 2 is a detailed and free resource management game.

name: Shadows of Steam
summary: Unravel the secrets hidden in the smog of Brassfall

name: Shadow Baptism
summary: This is a third-person shooter in which a wizard uses homing magic to fight enemies and collect hats.

name: Shawley: Zoo of Wonders
summary: Navigate through enchanted worlds, defeat foes with your hammer, unlock new skills and save escaped animals to reopen the zoo.

name: Shakatto Tambourine!
summary: A spin-off of Samba de Amigo featuring a tambourine controller and primarily J-Pop tracklist.

name: Shinya Ichi-ji no Koukanshu
summary: Have you heard the rumor? If you call a certain number at 1am, you will be connected to a person called the 1am operator. This person is said to be able to connect you to the past.

name: Shadows Over Whispering Pines
summary: A first-person mystery adventure where you solve puzzles, answer calls, and navigate dangers as a nightwatch in a secluded wilderness park.

name: Shotball
summary: Blast your way to victory in Shotball, the adrenaline-pumping 3v3 class-based shooter sport game where football meets shotguns. Outplay, outmaneuver, and outgun your opponents to dominate the field!

name: Shararam
summary:
Shararam is a network multiplayer online game for children aged 6-12. Here they can communicate, have fun and learn. The game is based on the popular animated series "Smeshariki". The main values ​​of the project are: a moderated friendly world and the absence of war.

We managed to combine entertainment with modern educational methods. Playing, grows up, learns about the world around you and yourself. Adventures with Smeshariki develop memory, attentiveness, speed and creativity. The child also has the opportunity to consolidate the knowledge gained in class. Some games and victories are based on school curriculum subjects.

We carefully monitor that the game is regularly updated. Shararam constantly hosts exciting events in which every user can take part!

name: Shelldom
summary: In Shelldom, snails worship alcohol—a drink they love but one that kills them. Their cults sacrifice their own for more, trapped in a doomed cycle. But legend speaks of the Holy Water, hidden atop a merciless tower. Can you climb, endure, and break the curse? Or will you fall like the rest?

name: Shuten
summary:
A samurai shoot 'em up for one or two players. Owari’s village is trampled as ancient gods awaken. He takes up sword to end them.

Game available on Retro Game Crunch.

name: Shingakkou The Gift
summary:
A fandisc for Shingakkou, featuring after stories and mini games.

A sweet love disc.

name: Shingakkou Banchou
summary:
Fed up with the awful state his school is in, Michael sets out to find a legendary outfit which will grant his wish of making the halls a peaceful place.

Was originally released at Super Comic City 20, then re-released with The Gift fully voiced.

name: Shelltopia
summary: This is a Vanilla based Shell Hack.

name: Shawarma King
summary:
Celebrating 20 Years of "Falafel King" with a Modern, Flavorful Twist!

Welcome to Shawarma King, where you’ll discover what it truly takes to become the undisputed ruler of the street food empire!

Transform your small shawarma stand into a culinary empire while navigating the challenges of rising taxes, demanding customers, and unpredictable suppliers. Inspired by the classic Israeli game, "Falafel King," this modern homage comes with a new twist, tons of humor, and plenty of challenges.

Will you succeed in turning your small shawarma stand into a culinary empire spanning cities? Or will you end up under investigation by the tax authorities?

name: Shieven
summary: Enter the enigmatic Luminora Hospital, where, as a researcher on the brink of ruin, you take on a case that will test your courage. Amidst dark rumors, you will uncover terrifying secrets that have caused those who dared to go too far to disappear.

name: Shadow Prisoner
summary:
"Shadow Prisoner" is a 2D fighting game with simple controls that allow you to perform exhilarating combos.

You can play with 25 characters (9 will be added for free, and one is a collaboration character that will be paid DLC).

Even if you have no experience with fighting games, you can use the simple mode to play like an experienced fighting gamer just by repeatedly pressing buttons.

There are story mode and survival mode for single player, and versus mode and network mode for competitive play.

Network mode has a zero-latency netcode that supports rollback.

If you are playing in Japan, you can play with the same input sensation as if you were playing next to someone in Japan.

In addition, Epsilon mode, a fighting action game where you shoot each other with a barrage of bullets, exclusive to the Steam version, will be added.

name: Shogun Soul: Legendary Puzzle
summary:
Beautiful men and women in the guise of Sengoku warlords appear in abundance!
An easy puzzle game anyone can enjoy!

name: Shopping Fever
summary: Let the shopping fever get the best of you!

name: Shoot the Aliens
summary: Shoot the Aliens is a skill based puzzler where you must take out every alien on the screen with carefully placed shots! Thankfully, your bullets bounce around the level with ease! Try to take out as many aliens as you can with a single bullet!

name: Shadow Adventure
summary: The game is Shadow's own Adventure, with the resurrection of Professor Gerald Robotnik, learning about a counter part to Chaos from Sonic Adventure 1, Destructo. Learning this, Shadow must take Gerald out.

name: Shadow Tactics: Ultimate Bundle
summary: The complete Shadow Tactics experience in one bundle

name: Shape Shooter 2000
summary: Enter The Zone and do battle face-to-face with that many-faced menace, The Shapes! Shapes bad! Make shapes go boom!

name: Shadow Tactics: Aiko's Choice - Deluxe Edition
summary: The Deluxe Edition contains Shadow Tactics: Aiko's Choice plus the complete Shadow Tactics soundtrack

name: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Deluxe Edition
summary:
The Deluxe Edition contains:

-Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Game
-Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Artbook
-Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun - Strategy Guide

name: Shred Off
summary: In this 3rd-person action, snowboarding shooter, perform stylish tricks in the Alaskan mountains while gunning down enemies with an arsenal of ranged weaponry. Shred down the mountain on your snowboard to get a high score while competing against your friends!

name: Shanghai Dragon
summary: Shanghai Dragon is a 3D rail shooter, similar to The House of the Dead or Virtua Cop. The action takes place in 1937 and the player takes the role of Jackie Hua. He is a member of the Chinese resistance, fighting against the Japanese occupation. The hero walks through the city without player input and the player only has to shoot enemies. Sometimes he has to save some civilians. They give him first aid kits, weapons and ammunition. He has seven types of weapons. The main weapon is a pistol with unlimited ammo.

name: Shy Cats Hidden Tracks: Vol. 1
summary: A unique musical hidden object game where you explore Paris, Rio de Janeiro, and Tokyo to find choir-singing kittens and money bags to hire a cat band, impress local music critics, and mix your own song.

name: Shy Cats + Shy Dogs
summary: Explore a triple pack full of cuteness and music! Find over 870 items in amazing locations like Rio, Tokyo, Paris, Atlantis, Mars, etc. Solve puzzles, listen to fun songs and create your own melody in this wonderful musical adventure!

name: Sherlock Purr Adventures
summary: Be a cat detective and uncover hidden objects in this purrfect two-game bundle!

name: Shadowforge Chronicles
summary: Magic meets firepower in a battle for survival.

name: Shoujo Mahou Gaku Little Witch Romanesque Bangai Hen "Sayonara, Mauresumo"
summary: Short, stand-alone side-story available for free from Littlewitch's website.
