name: Shadows Bounce Once
summary:
The most exciting puzzle & stealth action game is here for you!
Control Ninja and assassinate all the white enemies.

name: Shadows Fall
summary: Set over 6 Zones of 3 Acts, Shadows Fall will tell a story, in the same vein as Sonic Rush and Chronicles, and power up Shadow with various upgrades along the way. Shadow is the only playable character planned right now, but he will be able to interact with several new characters, as well as a couple familiar ones...

name: Shotgun Cop Man
summary: GO TO HELL, ARREST SATAN. Propel yourself to justice and glory on a journey through hell in this punchy, crunchy, son-of-a-gun precision platformer from the creator of My Friend Pedro.

name: Shinobi Match
summary: Unleash your inner ninja in Shinobi Match, a thrilling tile-matching puzzle game! Use powerful ninja weapons to defend a unique cast of characters while dodging enemy traps. Outsmart your foes, plan your moves, and test your strategy skills. Can you plan far enough ahead and save your allies?

name: Shogi 3D
summary: Shogi 3D is a faithful take on the famous Japanese board game. Take a sip of coffee and enjoy a relaxing experience, playing strategic matches with traditional rules in a serene Japanese temple.

name: Shadow Breakers
summary: Play as Ultra, Apola, and Mozez as they battle shadow demons unleashed by the Cursed, a group seeking to restore balance through chaos. With their robot companions, they must split up to stop the demons and thwart the Cursed’s sinister plans.

name: Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows
summary: Konnichiwa Shop-owner-kun! Become a hero of the weeb/otaku community in a cute Japanese suburb with your very own waifu pillow shop! Stock your shelves with exciting dakimakura designs, expand your store, and make a fortune in Shop Simulator: Waifu Pillows!

name: Shovel & Swindle
summary: Shovel & Swindle is a fun co-op game, where players will make a living by graverobbing as Scotland's infamous Burke and Hare! Explore multiple locations and uncover the graveyard's secrets by solving puzzles, and avoiding getting caught by patrolling bobbies!

name: Shapefighter
summary: An arcade-style, twin-stick shooter where you blast through 30 unique waves of shapes.

name: Shifter
summary: Shifter is a minimalist and atmospheric puzzle game where you must navigate a shifting square through intricate puzzle-box levels to find the exit. With 60 handcrafted challenges spread across six unique zones, each with a unique twist. Can you master the shifting mechanics and escape every room?

name: Shrine of the Forest God
summary: Explore and fight your way through a dense and sprawling world filled with mystery. Take your checkpoint with you while discovering secrets and abilities as you fight your way up the mountain you found yourself in. Do you have what it takes to slay the Forest God?

name: Shop Life Simulator
summary: A shop life simulator and management, From owning a small room above the store to selling exclusive products as the highest rated shop, or scratch lottery tickets to try your luck at winning big, In a 24/7 shop, Manage alone or with friends.

name: Sheep Lass: Quest Zero
summary: Sheep Lass is a minimalist adventure game that forces you to pay attention by abstaining from leaning on modern quality of life features players expect from the genre. Explore a wide, non-linear playspace to find and explore dungeons to fight monsters and claim treasure.

name: Shadow Dreams
summary: An adrenaline filled magic based Rogue lite FPS with a psychological twist. Where you Play as the embodiment of the last thought of hope to enter a suicidal mind, battle your inner demons and corrupted thoughts to reclaim what ever is left of a shattered psyche.

name: Sheepherds!
summary: Sheepherds! is a cozy co-op party game where you and your sheepdog buddies guide colorful flocks through beautiful landscapes to sheer their wool. Take your time and have fun barking, running and discovering magical places together— or take on challenges to win even more treats!

name: Shadow of Backrooms
summary: Explore a dark world full of liminal rooms, abandoned corridors and surreal places. You will feel lost in the backrooms, wandering aimlessly through endless corridors and hoping to find a way out. But beware: you are not alone. How long can you survive? Will you find the exit - or get lost forever?

name: Shipping Nightmares
summary: A co-op horror game where you and your crew must keep a cursed cargo ship running, scavenge for supplies, and survive relentless horrors lurking in the shadows.

name: Shifting To The Backrooms
summary: "Shifting To The Backrooms" is a mix of psychological horror and drama game where the protagonist, Will, grappling with family tragedies, discovers the method of "shifting" enabling him to escape to the dream liminal worlds. However, the dream turns into a nightmare from which Will cannot wake up.

name: Shtrek
summary: Shtrek is a simple but challenging platformer where every move matters. You have 60 levels to beat and 60 lives to do it. No extra mechanics, no distractions - just precise jumps, fast resets, and pure platforming.

name: Shuyun Huazhang
summary: "Shuyun Huazhang" is an exploration game set in Sanxingdui's digital world. Players can explore scenes, interact with digital characters, enjoy films, with relics interaction and digital dress-up features. It supports VR, Windows and uses techs to add charm to Sanxingdui culture.

name: Shockwave Triggers
summary: SHOCKWAVE TRIGGERS is an arcade high resolution pixel art shmup/shoot'em up, in which you use the power of Shockwaves and a good timing to get the most bonus from your destroyed enemies. It's simple: shoot, dodge, wait and SHOCKWAVE!

name: Ship, Inc.
summary: Run a wholesome shipping business! Ship, Inc. is a cozy wholesome job simulator where you are a packaging employee in a cargo shipment company. Follow the shipment orders, choose package size, and prepare parcels. Upgrade your office, deliver orders safely and quickly!

name: Shuuchaku Gakuen
summary: The only quality that can be measured is whether or not they possess the qualities of morbid love. As they spend their time at the school, what was once a peaceful life turns into a blood-soaked, corpse-riddled, blood-soaked day....

name: Shi Shi Te Na O: Even in Death
summary: Shi Shi Te Na O: Even in Death is stealth horror action game that requires trial and error. It tells the story of a young girl who wakes up in a strange and unsettling world, where eerie creatures known as "Ochibito" roam.

name: Shoot For The Stars
summary: A foddian style game but you are a gun!

name: Shizuoka Curse
summary: Shizuoka Curse is the story of a desperate young Japanese vlogger, who goes to an abandoned school in the woods in hopes of recording footage that would make him internet famous but it all goes wrong...

name: Shadow of The Forgotten
summary: In a long-abandoned mansion of Dr. Victor Grimm, players find themselves trapped after a sudden collapse of the mansion's entrance. As they explore the sprawling, decaying building, they uncover secrets, and disturbing relics of Dr. Grimm's experiments.

name: Shelf Heroes
summary: Blast rogue toys with wacky weapons in this fast-paced Roguelite FPS! Mix & match toy parts to assemble your Shelf Hero, discover powerful perk combos, and explore a giant House. Play solo or with friends in 3-player co-op!

name: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne
summary: In Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne, the player takes on the role of a young boy who is caught up in The Conception while visiting his sick teacher, Yuko Takao, with his two classmates Chiaki Hayasaka and Isamu Nitta. The young boy is transformed into a demon known as the Demi-fiend and he must survive in the newly created Vortex World with the powers granted to him through Magatama.

name: Shoot Yourself With a Rifle
summary: Shoot yourself with a rifle.

name: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne - HD Remaster: Chronicle Pack
summary: Raidou Kuzunoha sets foot into the Vortex World! Play the previously unreleased Chronicle Edition for the first time! Select “NEW GAME: CHRONICLE” and enjoy the exciting new Amala Labyrinth and intense battles against the Fiends in this new story branch featuring Raidou Kuzunoha.

name: Shogun Castle
summary: Shogun Castle is a game in which you fight with WW2 tanks in Japanese historical castles. You can learn what Japanese castles were like, and Samurai tactics. There are 37 historical castles, which are accurately reconstructed in 3D.

name: Shiny Sisters
summary:
The cross-dressing protagonists met each other at an informal social gathering attended by the ojou-sama schools.
While not knowing that they are all guys, they felt a strange affinity with each other.
This development was amusing to Yuuki’s master Ran, so she plotted to make them into an idol group and have them perform at an upcoming event in town.
After some initial confusion about the sudden idea, they all ended up agreeing due to varying reasons.
Will they be able to become idols while keeping their true gender a secret!?

name: Shelley Duvall's Tales of Digby the Dog
summary: Meet Digby, the one-pound dog, and his friends, in three animated, interactive stories and 7 fun-filled games. Includes wacky sound studio, animated surprises hidden within every screen, and 5 sing-along tunes

name: Shadow Strikers: Arena of Rivals
summary: After the "Tournament of Shadows," Shadowhaven faces a new challenge: the "Arena of Rivals." Champions fight for power, honor, and survival. New fighters and unexpected alliances emerge. Prepare for intense battles where each victory redefines the city's destiny!

name: Shadowtime
summary: To exist in the virtual world is to have two bodies, four hands, two hearts. In Shadowtime, a guide to this double world leads you through irreconcilable realities and through the virtual as a place to take shelter.

name: Shobatsu
summary: Shobatsu is a fast paced arcade style beat'em up which will let you take the role of four highly skilled ninjas who must fight against hordes of powerful and varied enemies. Face the challenge yourself in the single player modes or invite a friend for extra fun in the local co-op mode.

name: Sherman's Quest
summary:
An outgoing, outdoor-loving, yellow rabbit named Sherman must leave his ill, bed-ridden wife, Alice, at home to rescue his grandchildren, Rodder and Mopsy, from the clutches of the self indulgent crow king, Velcrow. Along the way, you'll even meet up with a few friendly faces, and some challenges to test your consistency.

Traverse through 50 rooms inside Velcrow's nested tower of enemies and obstacles and take back your loved ones in this top-down, dungeon crawling, arcade-based game that takes inspiration from the SG-1000 console released in 1983.

name: Shahmaran
summary: Kingdom's ruler falls gravely ill and for the cure the Vizier revealing his true side as the evil sorcerer conjures a spell to summon vile creatures to assail Shahmaran for obtaining her flesh. Shahmaran and her helper friend Jamsab must defeat the evil sorcerer.

name: Shake the Baby!
summary: Shake the Baby! is a fast-paced satirical boomer shooter with a very peculiar weapon system. Pick up a wide variety of babies and merge them into an even more powerful baby. Rip apart your foes in arena combat or traverse carefully made tactical levels. Just remember: SHAKE. THE. BABY!

name: Shadey's Quest
summary: An autobattler roguelike about helping a cute monster called Shadey become a Hero. Travel the enchanting and dangerous Realm of Shadows, gather ingredients and cook power-increasing food, collect powerful equipment. Build your own unique Shadey and help him defeat the mighty King of Shades!

name: Shotguana
summary: A short RPG where a trucker and his dear friend (An iguana with a shotgun for a head) make a couple stops on a long dusty highway.

name: Shut the Windows and Don't Look Outside
summary: Recent disturbances and abnormal phenomena have been detected in your area. For your safety and well-being, all individuals must remain inside their homes. Under no circumstances should you look outside. Keep all doors locked and windows shut. It is required by all citizens to be afraid. The Angel will come.

name: Sheeple
summary: Cast cards to turn the tides of the battlefield, gather your army, and fight to regain The Original Sheep! Sheeple is a grand real time Auto battler with roguelike and deck-building elements.

name: Shmackle
summary:
Shmackle Inc. is dedicated to bringing humanity to the brink of technological assimilation. We strive to keep you safe and informed, for the future of humanity lies in YOUR hands. We are your vehicle to the world you hope for.

From the mind of jmancurly.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Steam Ships
summary: Step aboard three legendary steamships that have survived wars, luxury cruises and technological experiments. Each one has a unique story to tell - from a relief ship, through an ambitious aircraft carrier project, to the most iconic passenger ship!

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Floating Cities
summary: Set sail for new horizons with the Floating Cities DLC - this time, the challenge takes place on luxurious passenger ships that offer more than just scrap - they hold hidden treasures waiting to be uncovered!

name: Shark Coin Party
summary: Shark Party is a unique multiplayer party game focus on collecting Shark Coins and donate it to Shark King to gain its reputation.

name: Shadow of Light
summary:
Shadow of Light is a 1-bit platformer with stealth mechanics.
You will get new abilities, that will help you in your way, such as dash, double jump and wall jump.

name: Shadows Beneath the Badge: An Undercover Affair
summary: Shadows Beneath the Badge: An Undercover Affair follows Detective Jake Dawson, undercover to expose crime boss Victor Delgado, and attorney Sarah Hamilton, investigating Delgado’s corrupt charity. Their lives collide at a gala, sparking a connection complicated by Jake’s secret identity. When Sarah unknowingly steps into Delgado’s operation, Jake risks his cover to save her. Despite feelings of betrayal, Sarah recognizes his sincerity. Together, they bring Delgado to justice, forging trust, mutual respect, and the beginnings of a heartfelt romance.

name: Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne - HD Remaster
summary: The international console version of this remaster includes the expanded content from the Maniax Chronicle Edition, while Asian console and Steam releases require it to be downloaded separately or omit it entirely.

name: Shibai Michi
summary:
Shibai Michi is a Miscellaneous game, published by SCEI, which was released in Japan in 2003.

This is a party game in which participants watch a story unfold and read their lines into a microphone with feeling and timing, competing to see who can act best and who can become the character they want.

name: Shear Abnormality
summary:
This is a short psychological horror experience inspired by the Silent Hill games.

You must shear all abnormalities in a level while running from any threats in order to progress. Make sure to keep an eye out for key items.

The length of this game is about 30 minutes. There are checkpoints throughout the game for if you die.

name: Shining Princess Lapisphilia
summary: Lapisphilia, the Heroine of Justice, has thwarted the Gestarks one too many times! In a final bid for victory, they have created a dungeon as their last-ditch attempt to finally bring her to her knees! Fight through enemies and traps to escape and get back on surface!

name: ShotSurged
summary: ShotSurged is a 6v6 arcade shooter that aims to give you that classic shooter feel.

name: Shin Sangoku Musou Apuri
summary: A Japanese exclusives mobile spin-off of the Dynasty Warriors series.

name: Shinobi
summary:
Shinobi - Neo Geo fan port

This port was made by disassembling the arcade back into source code which ensure all gameplay logic is exactly like the original game.

name: Shoot'n'Shell
summary: Do not doubt!

name: Shellbound
summary: Shellbound is a hand-drawn 2D Metroidvania where life can only exist on a gigantic snail. Explore a vibrant world, fight bizarre flora and fauna and discover civilizations fueled by the powerful snail mucus. It is the key to your natural role: Devour everything so life itself continues to exist.

name: Shards of the Realm
summary: Immerse yourself in a turn based tactical RPG/Strategy set in an expansive open world, where you manage a diverse party of heroes and construct formidable fortresses. Strategize in battles, explore vast lands, and lead your team to glory in a dynamic fantasy adventure.

name: Shark's Treasures Adventure
summary: Plunge into danger! Dodge sharks, claim treasures, and survive the deep seas!

name: Shape Brawl
summary: “Shape Brawl” is a 2D synthesis-based bullet hell shooting game.

name: Shrink Rooms
summary: Run! The rooms are shrinking! A puzzle game Demo about escaping from shrinking rooms. Every step counts if you want to make it out alive! Complete box-pushing puzzles within a limited number of steps or be crushed into a puddle of meat by the pressing walls of the level!

name: Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond
summary: Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond is a brand-new strategy card game from the popular Shadowverse CCG. With the newly added super-evolution mechanic and Shadowverse Park, among other brand-new content, there is lots to enjoy for both seasoned and brand-new players.

name: Shio
summary: You've forgotten something. Something important. Maybe with that sketchbook of yours, you can figure out exactly what it is.

name: Shleep
summary:
It's time for bed... but how to fall into the deepest sleep? Let's count sheep!

Hmm, maybe this is going to be more difficult than originally thought...

name: Shrimp Keeping Simulator
summary: Grow, feed and care for your shrimp pals. Watch your shrimp multiply and sell your colony when they become too numerous.

name: Short Memories
summary: A short story about life shared through the conversation of two women sitting on a bench.

name: Shore Doodle
summary: Let's enjoy your own personal beach. Wander around at your leisure and use a branch to draw in the sand. What will you draw in the short time you have before the sea washes it away? The time-of-day changes as you draw, bringing you relaxation, and perhaps new discoveries...

name: Shojo Warriors
summary: Shojo Warriors is a fast-paced multiplayer brawl game set in a vibrant, anime-inspired fantasy world, made with『CliCli』. In this game, you'll purchase and combine equipment during battles to help the girls achieve victory through growth and strategic gameplay.

name: Ship of Love
summary: Ship of Love - is an erotic game in the genre of "Arkanoid", in which you will have to break the cubes and gradually discover really beautiful and hot images.

name: Shelter from the Storm
summary: Rain lashes down soaking you to the bone, you take shelter in a seemingly abandoned house. Navigate through the rooms solving puzzles and trying to escape in this short point & click adventure game.

name: Shells Shooter
summary: A new sensation action game that blends coin pusher and shooting elements. Players take on the role of a crab, throwing shells to battle monsters born from ocean pollution while rescuing trapped fish. Utilize various skills to enjoy a thrilling coin pusher experience.

name: Sheep Quest
summary: An atmospheric frustration platformer. Overcome obstacles in your struggle against wolf-kind.

name: Shattered Void
summary: Space MMORPG where players can fly on different ships, collecting devices, subsystems and navigations or finding new weapons that will serve in battles. Take part in battles, explore the world, mine ore, trade, fight and build your own clan with a station.

name: Shards of the Mirror
summary: Shattered Reflections: Navigating a Labyrinth of Multiple Endings

name: Shameless Afterparty
summary: It's just a ‘friendly fuck between friends' right? Never mind that one of these hotties has a secret that only her bestie knows. But once they start going at it in public, everyone's going to see that sexy secret, and how well the two can use it against each other!

name: Shallow Blue
summary: You are No. 13, a new game tester joining the Shallow Blue project. Following orders from your superiors, complete the testing of this mech game. But don't forget to maintain a healthy life and take care of the essential tasks that must be done.

name: Shadows of Despair
summary: Shadows Of Despair is a co-op horror game for up to four players, immersing you in eerie Case Files with a mix of terrifying and humorous enemies.

name: ShadowBox: Mausoleum of Natural History
summary: Experience the story of life on Earth like never before with SHADOWBOX: Mausoleum of Natural History, a virtual, interactive, and free-to-play museum featuring 3D scans of real fossils.

name: Shadow Alchemist
summary: Explore a mystical, ever-changing dungeon in this isometric puzzle-adventure game. Master self-transmutation abilities and solve increasingly complex challenges as you uncover the secrets of your past.

name: Sheep for the Stars
summary: A precision / rage-bait platformer featuring sheep strapped to jetpacks and rockets. Using physics and limited fuel, navigate every progression challenges and level layouts to try to reach the stars.

name: Shoot the Wall
summary: Shoot the wall! Simple, right? Use your gun to blast your way through the wall, upgrade and change your weapons so you can shoot your way through the wall even faster!

name: Shadow's Gamble
summary:
Description:
In Shadow's Gamble, you step into the boots of a skilled thief on a high-stakes mission to infiltrate the grand mansion of a corrupt duke. The mansion, known for its lavish parties and countless treasures, hides more than just riches—it holds dark secrets that could change the fate of the entire kingdom.

Your goal? To steal something precious from the duke, gather valuable loot, and leave without a trace. You’ll use your sharp wits and even sharper skills to navigate through the mansion’s labyrinthine halls and pickpocket the unsuspecting people.

name: Sharks and Minnows
summary: Find supplies to maintain your stamina. Complete ten laps. Escape.

name: Shutterbuds
summary: shutterbuds is a first-person multiplayer photography game! Explore Lone Tree National Park with up to 3 of your photojournalist friends. Take jobs from top magazine brands, then hit the trail in search of interesting landmarks and goofy creatures to photograph. Use your pay to buy useful items and cosmetics. You’ll be sure to make the front page in a flash!

name: Shards Reunited: Kintsugi
summary: If you love puzzles and crave a straightforward, relaxing experience, Shards Reunited: Kintsugi is for you. There's no fluff, just pure puzzle-solving joy with beautiful Japanese porcelain to keep your eyes delighted and your mind at ease.

name: Shopping Clutter 12: Halloween at the Walkers
Shimagami
summary: Shimagami is an open-world RPG with anime-style visuals and deep lore. Battle fierce monsters in action combat, solve puzzles, and conquer challenges to uncover the mysteries of Shimagami. A diverse cast of demi-human heroines awaits—find your perfect companion and shape your adventure!

name: Shadow Fang
summary: Alex and Bob went to the forest to pick mushrooms and ended up staying overnight for a few days. As time passed, they began to feel an increasing sense of unease, as if the forest was watching them and something was not quite right. Their discomfort grew each day, as though they were intruding upon something dark and threatening.

name: Shell Bless the Faithless
summary: Shell Bless the Faithless is a 3rd Person Roguelite Shooter supporting 1~4 players where you take on the role of a Norse warrior. In a chaotic world where runes, magic, and shotguns coexist, evolve with the blessings of the gods, crush heretical foes and their leaders, and rebuild a macho world!

name: Shadow Labyrinth: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Deluxe Edition Includes:
• Shadow Labyrinth
• Digital Artbook & Soundtrack

name: Shape Drop
summary: Jump and drop through dangerous obstacles

name: Shards of Dread
summary: It is a psychological horror game and walking simulator. Get chased by monsters. Monsters jumping towards at your screen.

name: Shichiya Shrine
summary: "Defeat the Monsters with the Cursed Sword and Sacred Talismans! The terror of the Japanese supernatural world awaits in this action-packed horror!"

name: Shadowmont: RPG Community Bot
summary: RPGCB is a browser-based fantasy RPG that blends idle gameplay with competitive elements. Players create characters, join factions, and progress by battling enemies, completing quests, and participating in seasonal events. The game features automated combat, leaderboard rankings, a player-driven economy, and deep character customization through gear and abilities. With a focus on long-term progression and strategic choices, RPGCB encourages both casual play and competitive engagement.

name: She's Leaving
summary: Put your forensic skills to the test in this brand new first person survival horror, She's Leaving. Play as Charles Dalton, a blood spatter analyst tasked with the most gruesome crime scene of his life. Can you survive a night in House Haywood?

name: Shard Plushie.exe
summary: Baldi mod where you get chased by the guy.

name: Shiika wo Tashinamu Re
summary:
A story told from two points of view.

On one side, the protagonist is one day masturbating to his little sister when his home which was actually sentient but in hibernation wakes up and forcefully ejects him from the premises. He returns only to be ousted once more. This repeats until the building gives up and the two start their lives together. This is a story of boy meets girl.

On the other side, Agnafire, Blizzarto, and Lie Spark are Devices, automaton created to annihilate humanity. Despite no longer receiving messages from above or any other Devices, they continue to search and destroy human settlements. Upon reaching a certain village, the trio split up with Lie Spark searching the nearby forest alone. Within the forest lies an abode with an unexpected inhabitant: a fellow Device who has been coexisting with humans. This fateful encounter begins Lie Spark's questioning about herself and her purpose of existence.

name: ShootX
summary: Enter the world of ShootX and experience exciting missions as a soldier fighting evil.

name: Shinpi no Sekai El-Hazard
summary: The Game Boy Advance port of "Shinpi no Sekai El-Hazard" is a Adventure video game published by AIC Spirits & Pioneer LDC, Rob Jinnai released on May 1, 2003.

name: Shinrin-yoku: Forest Meditation and Relaxation
summary: Welcome to Shinrin-yoku: Forest Meditation and Relaxation. In this VR experience, you will be transported to a northwestern forest, surrounded by trees, plants, insects and animals. Use the tools at your disposal, a stick and flashlight, to interact with the world around you, in day or night. Try it, it's free!

name: Shanghai: Dynasty
summary:
PSX Port of "Shanghai: Dynasty". Released as part of the SuperLite 1500 series.

Introducing Shanghai: Dynasty, with four royally addictive tile-matching games to render you powerless - including revolutionary multiplayer variations of the long-standing ruler of puzzle games. And for the first time in history, Shanghai represents the centuries-old tradition of Mah-Jongg. Shanghai: Destiny has come to power fall under its domination.

name: Shanghai: Dynasty
summary: Dreamcast port of "Shanghai: Dynasty".

name: Shake
summary: SHAKE is all about movement. In this action-packed arena shooter, up to 8 players fight to stay on the map by knocking their opponents off. Everyone is armed with multiple explosive, knockback dealing weapons you can use to send your enemies flying! Will you be the next victor of SHAKE?

name: Shatter Point
summary: Shatter Point is a fast, fun, and exciting first person shooter. You grapple, run, jump and slide through 20 levels.

name: Shoot The Moon
summary:
Launch rockets at him to make him stop.
Hmm. That only annoyed him ... Good! KEEP DOING IT.
Take an animated journey through the weirdest reaches of space...

name: Shadow Kings
summary:
Enter the funny fantasy world of Shadow Kings: Join forces with noisy dwarves and proud elves and take on the evil forces of the shadows!

Experience a new dimension of gaming fun in this gripping free-to-play game. Defend your city against orcs, goblins and trolls! Fight or form alliances with other players to gain power and honor!

In the MMO Shadow Kings you control the fate of your city in a fantastic 3D world full of secrets and dangers. Raise a mighty army of elves, dwarves and humans. Sharpen your axe, draw your bow and go to war against barbaric opponents. Build your city into a mighty metropolis. Shield your people behind thick walls and collect taxes from them in return. Conduct trade and get your economy rolling. Crush the rise of wicked enemies, teach your pushy neighbors some respect and increase your influence by conquering outposts. Fight alone or join forces with other players in alliances. The competition for prestige, power and supremacy in the whole realm has begun!

name: Shuttlecock-H
summary: Shuttlecock-H is a Space Bullet Hell in the company of beautiful women. Win their hearts by dodging deadly bullets. Give them (and by chance yourself too) an orgasm out of this world!

name: Shuten Order
summary:
"168 remaining until the end of the world..."

Humanity is approaching its end. A sudden dismemberment murder of the leader of a religious nation that advocates an apocalyptic ideology... Five adventure games are combined into one, centered around a suspenseful story full of mystery and intrigue.

name: ShapeShifter
summary: Jump around platforms, swim underwater, fight and dodge enemies, and collect power ups and coins in this love story driven platform game. It feels like a nostalgic classic without being a clone of one, yet the visuals and movement is modern, responsive and slick.

name: Shooting Showdown
summary: Experience the game that changed the FPS genre forever. Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone in the world in the world's first virtual reality shooting range! No headset required!

name: Shooting Showdown 2
summary: Experience the game that changed the FPS genre forever. Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone in the world in the first virtual reality shooting range!

name: Shroom and Gloom
summary: Gather and grow cards in Shroom & Gloom, a moody first-person, roguelike double-deckbuilder bursting with fungal foes and mountains of mega-combos!

name: Shade Silver 2 a Walk in the Darkness
summary: Shoot, Fight, Outwit Enemies, Avoid Spikes, Dark Faces, Evil Bunnies, Solve Puzzles, Fight Bosses, Collect Eyes, Blow Up Bombs, And More, Across Multiple Nightmares, In This Dark Sequel Dungeon Crawler.

name: Sherlock Holmes i el cas d'Arthur Gordon Pym
summary: A short puzzle exploration game, with progress based on your knowledge about systems that have been hidden from the very beginning. Uncover what happened to Holmes and Watson’s friend, face a strange cult, and reveal the hidden truth of our reality.

name: Shadoblitz
summary: Absorb enemies and build your own deck! This fast-paced action roguelike with deckbuilding elements lets you create millions of skill and passive combinations for a truly one-of-a-kind experience.

name: Shoestrings Story
summary: A point-and-click visual novel updating the classic "hero vs. demon king" fantasy into a cynical modern world where you can’t win by force alone. What defines a hero now? Will they be paid, or get any compensation at all?

name: Shape Warzone
summary: Face endless, unpredictable waves of unique geometric enemies by building and customizing a powerful base designed to withstand the chaos. Unleash the Quantum Decimator to obliterate gigantic bosses in this one-of-a-kind top-down tower defense where strategy meets action!

name: Shrouded Aspect
summary: The God of Death wakes, unleashing a terrible plague before him. Lead your heroes across a medieval world inspired by Celtic mythology and uncover the source of the blight. Choose your allies, shape your party, and make the tough choices in this turn-based tactical combat RPG.

name: Shade Protocol
summary: Shade Protocol is a 2D cyber-fantasy Metroidvania where music, code, and combat collide. Swap between DAWN and SHADE forms to unleash devastating abilities, wield Instruments as weapons, and rewrite reality itself in a world on the brink of annihilation by the Shade Protocol.

name: Shrine Protectors
summary: A casual arrow shooter meets rogue-lite strategy. Lead your army, crush waves of enemies, and unlock powerful upgrades and passive spells. Combine precision shooting with tactical army management in this relentless bullet hell.

name: Shuffle Farm
summary: A roguelike deckbuilder where farming meets the arcane. Build powerful synergies, master production chains, explore uncharted lands, and face formidable challenges - all with the help of a mysterious god. Or just chill and plant some crops... you can do that too!

name: Shaberu! DS Cooking Navi
summary: A cooking menu software for the Nintendo DS. The title of Shaberu! DS Cooking Navi only appears on Super Smash Bros. Brawl, since the game wasn't released outside of Japan.

name: Shadowforge Chronicles & Flames of Damnation
summary: Survive the flames. Defeat the shadows. The ultimate challenge awaits!

name: Shape Sender Deluxe
summary: Solve physics puzzles with magnets, springs, portals, fans, and more while your new best friend Sendy helps you along the way! But maybe keep an eye on him, he's been acting a little … strange, lately.

name: Shot! Shot! SPY
summary: You become a spy and you have to take down enemies with one shot. Increase your weapons, increase your buddy, do your mission and aim for first class spy!

name: Shroomer
summary: In this open-world relaxed VR fantasy, you are Shroomer, a mystical forager tasked with managing a secret enchanted forest. Gather rare fungi and vegetation, craft elixirs, build tools and complete tasks. Handle dangerous mushrooms with special approach or risk being claimed by the forest's magic.

name: Shattered Divinities
summary: In Shattered Divinities, embark on an adventure that pits you directly against divinity itself! An ancient War of Gods shattered the world, and their broken power has become the Calamities that consume all life. How will you survive in this land? And how will you uncover the secrets behind the War?

name: Shovelware
summary: Dig your way to the bottom in one hundred levels of block digging mayhem. Avoid TNT, collect gems, save kittens, collect potatoes and more in this colourful fun filled game.

name: Shank: Prison Survival
summary: Got a tooth brush? Sharpen it because its about time to shank someone. Prisoners have to get crafty because when the riot alarm sounds, its every inmate for themselves. See if you can survive in prison without losing your tight, sweet, precious... pride. Secure loot in your cell and run shit.

name: Shadow's End
summary: Shadow's End is an open-world RPG-RTS hybrid where you must save the fantastical realm of Akaria from the rising threat of the Demon King! Assemble your dream team, trade between bustling cities, and uncover legendary allies, sages, and weapons hidden in the farthest reaches of the land.

name: Shuttered
summary: You're trapped in the dark with only the flash of your camera to defend yourself against the monsters hunting you down. Can you make it out alive?

name: Shmooblin Blaster
summary: Shmooblin Blaster is a hardcore, bullet hell boss rush game where you fight outlandish superbosses, featuring a bright and stylized pixel art design.

name: Shattered Lands
summary: One Game, Three Modes Survivor Mode: Frenetic Combat, Endless Loot Hunts Auto Chess Mode: 280+ Skills, Infinite Strategic Depth Story Mode: Open-World Exploration, Squad-Building Mastery As an indie game, it is of high quality and definitely worth owning.

name: Shadows of Teotihuacan
summary: Explore ancient megalith of Teotihuacan as the detective tasked with finding a missing person.

name: Sherlocat Nonogram Rio
summary: Explore Rio de Janeiro through nonogram puzzles! Challenge your logical skills with challenges inspired by the iconic landscapes of Rio, charming graphics, and a touch of mystery. SherloCat Nonogram Rio is perfect for puzzle lovers of all levels.

name: Shock
summary: In SHOCK, you play as a disabled war veteran, hunted by a cybernetic creature. With only a wheelchair for mobility, use stealth, solve puzzles, and crawl into tight spaces to escape. Survive the horror and uncover the truth behind this nightmare.

name: Sheep Running
summary: In this charming and challenging game, you play as a shepherd with a critical mission — guide your flock safely into the barn without letting any sheep fall off cliffs or drown in the water. Use fear wisely to steer the sheep, but be careful — push them too hard, and they might panic and run to their doom! The more sheep you safely herd into the barn, the higher your score. Master the delicate balance between control and chaos in this fun and strategic herding adventure!

name: Shipwrecked Raft Survival
summary: Adrift, alone, and alive—survive the flood and uncover the truth.

name: Shrine of Haunts
summary: In the summer of 1990, you return to the secluded mountain village of Iwao as your grandfather falls critically ill. The village shrine is said to seal the yokai "Tsuchigumo." As the "Mushi Okuri Festival" nears, its ritual flames may awaken a thousand-year-old curse…

name: Shadows of Midnight: They Watch Me Sleep
summary: The game is a narrative-driven horror experience inspired by the Silent Hill and Fears to Fathom franchises. Live through two terrifying stories: a man’s summer getaway turns into a nightmare at a shady hotel, and a child grows up knowing something watches from the forest—always waiting.

name: Shovel Lands
summary: Shovel Lands is a fast-paced 2D digging platformer. Dig, dash, and fight your way through a world full of obstacles and danger. Discover hidden secrets and face menacing creatures on your journey into the depths.

name: Shape Blast
summary: Shape Blast is a short, arcade roguelike where you bounce a ball between two paddles and blast waves of shapes. Unlock tons of upgrades and customize your build. Keep the flow and find new strategies every game.

name: Show Quiz
summary: Show Quiz is a dynamic quiz game that tests your knowledge and reflexes! Chain together questions, climb levels and improve your rank to impress Jack Pot, your supercharged presenter.Over 5000 questions await you in this game!

name: Sheep and Gates
summary: A video game created by Stanley Gill and involved a dot (termed a sheep) approaching a line in which one of two gates could be opened. The Stanley Gill game was controlled via the lightbeam of the EDSAC's paper-tape reader. Interrupting it (such as by the player placing their hand in it) would open the upper gate. Leaving the beam unbroken would result in the lower gate opening.

name: Shiba Sweet
summary: Woof! You step into the paws of a novice Shiba chef who inherits a dessert shop from your retired grandma. You'll buy ingredients, bake desserts, and sell them in bento boxes. Use your earnings to upgrade the kitchen, decorate the shop, and unlock new recipes to create the best bakery ever!

name: Shadow Sacrament: The Roots of Evil
summary: Immerse yourself in a grim survival horror game where you investigate the secrets of an ancient monastery, solve intricate puzzles, and face terrifying nightmares that haunt its shadowy halls. Hunt the Haunt.

name: Sheva
summary: Sheva is a card-based fighting game where both players act simultaneously in strategic 1v1 battles. Predict your opponent, adapt your deck, and master the chakras as you sharpen your skills with every run.

name: Shirohebi and the Tower of Mercy
summary: In this roguelite RPG, Nemesis climbs the Tower of Mercy and discovers its secrets. He can meet and team up with other characters, and learn their reasons for climbing the tower. However, he needs to be cautious as he continues, since an entity is taking his strength away.

name: Shrooms! Tower Defence
summary: You can’t spell ‘Fungus’ without ‘Fun’! Shrooms TD is a quirky 3D tower defence game with procedurally generated islands, endless replayability, and a cast of mushroom defenders you command to fight off invading lumberjacks.

name: Shake It Co!
summary: Grow your orchard by shaking trees! Literally shake your mouse! Join Co, a friendly adventurer with a can-do spirit, and plant unique saplings for bountiful fruit. Collect coins, invest in upgrades, and harvest in a charming 2D style!

name: Shipwrecked Hamlet
summary:
The Tropical Experience mod adds content from every DLC ever released on Don't Starve to Don't Starve Together, as well as adding event content and creating your own content. The screenshots below try to summarize what the mod would be like in a standard generation world. When the world is created you start on the Together continent, and you can sail across the ocean in search of new continents, including Lunar Island, Pig City, Tropical Islands, Frozen Island and more.

but the new content doesn't only affect the surface of the game, the mod also adds new zones inside the caves, like the frozen cave that can be accessed by an entrance on the frozen island, adds the Hamlet caves that can be accessed by any entrance on the island where the cities of the pigs are located, there is also the interior of the volcano, which has a portal that takes you to the forge arena, and in addition to these additions, all the contents of the don't starve together are kept.

name: ShopFront
summary: ShopFront is a fast paced top down twin stick action arcade-like game set in a fantasy world full of heroes. Play as Keeper, an elderly shop keeper with a poor temper fed up with all the heroes destroying his pottery and decides to take matters into his own hands.

name: Shadow Cocoon
summary: "shadowcocoon": A Chinese horror puzzle game. As cop Chen Han, enter a surreal reality-nightmare world. Hunt clues in decaying settings, solve puzzles to uncover secrets. Choices shape the truth. Uncover the chilling truth?

name: Sheeperzzz
summary:
1 sheep… 2 sheep… 3 sheep…

Stop snoozing, time your taps and jump over your fellow sheep to wake them up.

Tap to jump, tap and hold to double jump!

Be careful and try not to bump into anything, that will only give you a headache. How far can you get?

name: Shuruka Boxing
summary: Shuruka BoxingExperience the most realistic first-person boxing game ever! Dodge, block, and throw powerful punches in intense fights against dynamic AI or real players. Train, rise through the ranks, and become the undisputed champion. Do you have what it takes to win?

name: Shadows of Memory Ll
summary: Go home, Alice. The past awaits you.

name: Ship Explorer
summary: You know their stories. Now it's time to step aboard! Board iconic ocean liner and warships from history like SS United States, Morro Castle and more as you explore and learn about the secrets that made them into legends.

name: Shieldbound
summary: Shieldbound is a metroidvania action-platformer. Explore a realm that revolves around a mysterious tower with many platforming challenges. Fight powerful enemies in 2D souls-like combat... all of that, using the unique abilities of a spirit-powered shield!

name: Shadowframe
summary: Freeze time. Analyze the battlefield. Then make your move. In SHADOWFRAME, reflexes alone won’t save you — you’ll need precision, patience, and planning to survive.

name: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
With the SHINOBI: Art of Vengeance Digital Deluxe Edition, you can play the game three days early and receive the Ghost Outfit, Medic Lite Amulet, in-game currency, digital artbook and soundtrack, and the SEGA Villains Stage, featuring bosses based on iconic SEGA villains.

It includes:
• Base Game
• Play the game 3 days early
• Digital Deluxe Season Pass:
o Starter Pack: the Ghost Outfit, the Medic Lite Amulet, and In-Game Currency
o SEGA Villains Stage (Coming Early 2026)
o Digital Art Book + Soundtrack

The iconic SHINOBI returns in an all-new 2D action platformer with a unique hand-drawn look created by the team behind the hit brawler Streets of Rage 4.

name: Sharpshooter
summary: Gunfight your way through procedurally generated Wild West towns. Customize the gameplay mechanics to suit your playstyle. Straightforward, non-stop action.

name: Shopping Spree
summary: You've been in this shop for hours and you can't quite remember what you came for. Surely if you buy everything in the store, something has to be it! Use the crank to run in circles around the store and collect items while avoiding security.

name: Shooty Shooty Robot Invasion
summary: An absurdist FPS/interactive fiction game where you murder stupid robots, chat with idiot people, and explore a painstakingly hand-drawn and highly animated world!

name: Shelter of Sursur
summary:
No one visits Sursur's Shelter anymore...

Take a look at the dark shelter near your house to find your missing child.

name: Show Yourself
summary: A psychological horror where Charlie will have to deal with his memories and his demons... but are they really demons? Who can Charlie trust? The flying brain or the mysterious voice? Every choice matters and will lead you to a different ending

name: Shuttle Mining
summary: Shuttle Mining is a Noita- and Terraria-inspired cozy & chaotic mining game. Craft your own unique lasers, burn, taze, and make things explode. The goal is to craft new batteries so you can use stronger lasers and dig deeper...

name: Shelter of Sursur 2
summary:
Take a look at the dark shelter opposite your house to find your missing child…

Solve all the puzzles while avoiding being chased by the monsters inside Sursur's shelter.

name: Shinsou Kaiten!! Wan-wan Umi Monogatari: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise DX
summary:
Pachinko Paradise DX is the final PS1 release in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features reproductions of three pachinko machines made by Sanyo Bussan, all of which are returning from previous releases: CR Umi Monogatari 3R and CR Umi Monogatari 6 from Pachinko Paradise 2, and CR Wan Wan Paradise SK from Pachinko Paradise 3. Each machine features new background graphics not found in the original versions.

There are two modes available: Tsūjō (Normal) mode allows the player to modify a wide range of settings for each machine, while Jissen (Battle) mode challenges the player to win as many balls as possible on the default settings with a limited starting pool and time limit. There is also a View mode where the various animations that play on the in-game display can be freely viewed. There is no story mode.

name: Shadowless
summary: Shadowless is a first-person psychological horror game. Explore a creepy house marked by tragedy, where dark entities and the past haunt you. Defenseless, you face a nightmare that consumes you before you can escape.

name: Shardbreakers
summary: Reclaim and synergize raw Shards to craft your own Magic in this fast-paced bullet-hell action roguelike. Unlock new heroes, unleash chaos, and conquer hand-crafted realms swallowed by darkness.

name: Shadows of the Blade
summary: A classic sci-fi pixel art adventure platformer about a young swordsman trying to save his village from invaders.

name: Shield Hero
summary: Wrenched from your world by a rift, you awaken in a hostile arena. Your only defense is an ethereal shield that evolves with each wave of foes you vanquish. With no memory and no way home, you must master the shield's power to survive and uncover the secrets of this strange dimension.

name: Shibuya Scramble Stories
summary:
Game designer and 428: Shibuya Scramble executive producer Jiro Ishii has announced the launch of a new “Shibuya Live-Action Adventure Game.” Led by general director Ishii and screenwriter Yukinori Kitajima, the project will be a live-action adventure game set in Shibuya.
The game itself will use an “ensemble drama” system—a synchronized story with multiple protagonists, in which players experience a multiple-perspective structure that shifts between each character’s viewpoint.

name: Shadow Protocol
summary: Suit up as an elite undercover agent in Shadow Protocol, a fast-paced, word-powered spy puzzle built entirely in Python. Crack cryptic clues, complete rapid-fire missions, and outwit a global threat. Now available on Windows.

name: Shane Warne's Cricket Test Interactive DVD Game
summary: An interactive DVD quiz game about cricket.

name: Shift 0
summary: Co-op for 2–4 players. Carry fully physics-based objects, complete tasks, and move up floor by floor, but don’t forget that time is limited. Your internship ends with either a job offer or a full reset.

name: Shift at Midnight
summary: An online co-op horror for 1–4 players. Be wary: some of your customers are only pretending to be human. Question them. Check their paperwork. Don’t let them trick you; make one mistake, and you’d better board up, set traps, and hide.

name: ShellMobile: Titan Rampart
summary: On the cosmic frontier, humanity has fought alien species for a century. As traditional defenses fall to new-gen alien mechs, tech giant ShellMobile—human-centered at its core—kindles new hope via breakthroughs in extraterrestrial titanium ore research.

name: Shelltered
summary: Shelltered is a short and Difficult Precision Platformer, inspired by Dream-Exploration games and a world depicted through the eyes of two young birds who's about to leave the comfort of their shelter.

name: Shopkeeper Simulator
summary: Take on the role of a manager in the most addictive simulation game - open the doors to your supermarket and build it from scratch, transforming a small shop into the ultimate supermarket! Become a great manager and make your store outstanding.

name: Shirotsume Souwa: Episode of the Clovers
summary:
A censored and fully voiced port of Shirotsume Souwa. Also includes the short side-story "Tsunakawa-sanchi no Christmas".

Tokyo, year 2008.
There is a mysterious group that experts from various fields gather. And Souji is the most outstanding researcher in the group, who researches about combat androids. He has produced three androids, Ema, Sayu and Toka. They adore Souji, and live a peaceful life. But one day, combat robots invade into his laboratory, and the battle to the end starts....

name: Shinobi Samurai
summary: The item passed around the pawn shop turns out to be a Time Capsule, a drug that will send you to the present day...! This is a story about the youth of the shinobi and kunoichi who are after it, and the samurai who help them! It's a slightly unusual visual novel adventure!

name: Shark Dentist
summary: Shark Dentist is a unique horror roguelike where you play as a shark dentist. Your task is to treat the teeth of giant predators in a dark clinic while avoiding their deadly aggression. Balance tactics, luck, and limited resources to heal your patient without losing your own life.

name: Shuffle Sword
summary: Shuffle Sword is a dark fantasy deck-builder roguelite. Fight your way through the blade cave, find different sword and magic cards to utilize, and prove yourself to the sword masters. They may have some strong swords, but nothing beats the Shuffle Sword Style!

name: ShinNaZuki
summary:
Orthodox Japanese RPG -- Absolute Audiovisual Feast
--- Six major floating island adventures for super interaction:
The chapter story line takes you to experience multiple worlds, and
the million-word story takes you to explore the grand world view.
--- Fantasy beautiful background music for super sense:
Background music is carefully produced by Japanese music master Hitoshi Sakimoto!

name: Shelldiver
summary: Take a deep breath and dive right into this cozy incremental game about a senior turtle trying to start a business selling jellyfish. Upgrade your equipment, explore biomes, and help your turtly village!

name: Shadow Warren
summary: You are a stranger, cast into the darkness of ancient mysteries. As a rabbit, you wander a world where nightmares lurk and rituals are part of an unfathomable game. Survive and follow the voice’s call—but remember: the true will of these powers is forever beyond your understanding.

name: Shooter Bundle: Ghost Assassin, Hotline, Water Blast, Shadowblade, Yori's Journey
Shattered Dimension
summary: Dive into a world of mystery and wonder in Shattered Dimension. As an unexpected investigator, you're plunged into a labyrinthine plot filled with enigmatic puzzles and intriguing characters.Uncover hidden truths by engaging in conversations and following the intricate web of relationships.

name: ShellPieces
summary: ShellPieces is a gauge-based command RPG. 23 unique heroes to form your party! Allies and enemies fight on a 3×3 grid. Skills have different ranges and rows—strategize your formation carefully! Collect powerful legendary gear and create synergies with your characters and party setup!

name: Shallow Pond
summary: Play as cute diver Ripples, swim like a penguin or bounce your way through the vivid landscapes of this 3D platformer. Defeat weird foes while collecting shells, water spirits and other secrets hidden in the levels. Enjoy the cozy vibes!

name: Sherlock: Hidden Object & Match-3 Mystery
summary: Explore familiar stories with Sherlock Holmes! Solve mysteries, find hidden objects, and play match-3 puzzles to restore classic tales. Join clans, take part in events, and uncover secrets across hundreds of detailed levels — the magnifying glass is in your hands!

name: Shellguard: Starbound Expansion Remastered
summary: A full expansion to Starbound, focused around a new faction called Shellguard.

name: Shadow the Plumber
summary: Shadow the Plumber will be a small, story-focused hack.

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Fishing Boats DLC
summary: Step aboard four distinctive fishing vessels: Arc, Sea Hunter, Mono-brew, and Richi-Kali. Each boat offers its own structure, secrets, and opportunities to be discovered.

name: ShaQu
summary: This is a vampire survivor game, players get experience points by killing monsters, and then upgrade spells or props, there are a variety of spells and props for players to upgrade, players can choose spells or Props, how to clear the level, survive for 10 minutes and then defeat the final boss.

name: Shatter
summary: Shatter the ever increasing waves of targets, using your memory, hearing, awareness (and your GUN). How long can you last and how high can you climb on the leaderboard?

name: Shutter Story
summary: Your friend is convinced his house is haunted. Examine his family's photo album to reveal signs of the paranormal, as the horror unfolds in the house around you. Their fate is in your hands.

name: ShuXian Chronicles: Idle Ascension
summary: Form a team, battle, AFK farming, loot grinding, divine weapon forging, artifact refining, pet catching, pet fusion, pet training... all the way to ascension!

name: She Was Swallowed By The Sun
summary:
Grief, death, and hate fill your veins. Let your girlfriend exsanguinate you.

Two girls, fulfilling their lives' work, and headed for the end. Witness as the burgeoning violence of fascism drives One and Anhedonia to the absolute breaking point.

name: Shepherdmancer
summary: Save sheep from evil monsters in this RPG puzzler. Collect skills and abilities as you make your way through 25 levels and utilize them to overcome great challenges.

name: Shafted
summary: A first-person psychological horror game where you explore an abandoned mine, uncover its dark secrets, and survive terrifying creatures lurking in the claustrophobic tunnels.

name: Shrek: The Forbidden Onion
summary:
A survival-horror game with more than a couple layers.

Brought to life as a joke, to end lives.

PS1 Shrek found footage
WASD + Mouse
Shift to sprint (limited)
Esc to ESCAPE

name: Ship Simulator: Ocean Fishing
summary:
Embark on the Ultimate Ocean Fishing Adventure!
In SHIP SIMULATOR: OCEAN FISHING, you are an independent fisherman starting with nothing but an old boat and the open sea. Navigate coastal waters in search of fish, crabs, and rare seafood, then sell your catch at bustling ports – each offering different prices, challenges, and opportunities.
Every voyage is a test of skill and strategy. Monitor your fuel, adapt to realistic water physics, and face the ever-changing moods of the ocean – from calm sunrises wrapped in fog to raging storms that push your ship to its limits.

name: Shadow at school
summary: The maraviwonderful adventure of gaster during a week of clasess

name: Shadow Project
summary: Shadow Project is a narrative-focused, horror FPS that takes place during the fall of the Soviet Union. Immerse yourself in a world of brutal historical fiction, where the events of the late 20th century have taken a dark turn.

name: Shikiyoku: Teru Yumemi in the Nightmare
summary: "There are things better left unknown" — The hidden paranormal horror ADV by ImCyan, creator of "Tsugunohi", is now on Steam. Detective Teru and his sister Luna investigate cases in spirits' dream worlds. Enjoy mystery, comedy, and horror across 9 episodes and 10+ hours of content.

name: Shipwrecked: A Quick Automation
summary: A short and sweet escape automation game meant to scratch that factory itch. Crash land from space into a randomly generated world with 4 basic resources and then gather, upgrade, and construct a factory to build your spacecraft back up from rubble and escape. A 2-3 hour experience (no game saves).

name: Shi's Summer Battle
summary: A raising breakout casual self-movement game, breakout + Roguelike, can allow players to reduce the operation at the same time, can be high degree of freedom to control the actions of the team, tailored for your team to create a set of powerful builds, to defeat all the enemies.

name: Shiny Stones
summary: The game combines platforming and puzzles, encouraging you to use your wits. Explore the dungeon, collect crystals and gold, use the environment to survive and find upgrades to fight the dark forces.

name: Shadowland: Rise of the Fallen
summary: In a world where the light has died, you are the last spark of hope. Shadowland: Rise of the Fallen is a single-player, cinematic action-strategy experience with tactical combat and a haunting post-apocalyptic setting.

name: Shotgun Dreams
summary: SHOTGUNS DREAMS is a first-person 3D platformer with an emphasis on momentum and creativity. Utilize simple parkour abilities like sliding and wall-running to maintain top speed. Leverage shell pickups to gain velocity, teleport, and manipulate gravity. How you reach the goal is up to you.

name: Shantae Advance: Risky Revolution Deluxe Edition
summary: This deluxe edition includes three special bonus outfits that change Shantae’s appearance and boost her magical abilities: Sizzle Armor Costume (enhanced Fireball Power), Relic Hunter Costume (enhanced Pike Ball Power), and High Voltage Costume (enhanced Storm Puff Power).

name: Shimmer's Quest: Way of the Whoop
summary: Join Shimmer and waddle around in search for a way to restore the destroyed sacred flower in this silly point and click fantasy adventure.

name: Shovel Game
summary:
After an unforeseen disaster occurs in a futuristic mining complex you find yourself stranded with nothing but the tool of your trade; a reliable old shovel.

Burrow and dig your way through a sequence of strange and unfamiliar spaces as you search for answers and escape.

name: Shepherd
summary: Shepherd is a first-person simulator puzzle game where you play as Jody Sima, the handler of a special task group codenamed “Shepherd”. Using a combination of radio conversation, live-positioning map, photo receiver, and a field manual, you will guide your teammates through a series of seemingly bizarre events and simulations, unveil the secrets of the facility, and (try to) bring everyone safely back home.

name: Shellborne
summary: Shellborne is a chaotic co-op game, where you guide a giant mystical turtle, over a dangerous mountain path. Collect resources and flee from the evil fog.

name: Shadowbound
summary:
Shadowbound is a brutal 2D pixel-art platformer with a horror twist. Your only lifeline? Light. Some lamps stay lit. Others fade out after just 3 seconds. Time your movement, plan your jumps, and don’t get caught in the dark — it’s game over.

There’s no mercy. Just raw, unforgiving gameplay that rewards precision and punishes hesitation.

If you’re looking for an easy ride, look elsewhere. But if you want a real challenge, step into the dark… and try to survive.

name: Sherlock Holmes: Night Stalker
summary: “When you have eliminated all which is impossible, then whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth.” — Sherlock Holmes. This work is an immersive mystery and deduction game, powered by the latest large-scale AI model technology and offering a brand-new interactive experience.

name: Shrapnel Sentinel
summary: Shrapnel Sentinel is an arena based FPS with an emphasis on defence. The longer you survive, the more you will encounter.

name: Shiath
summary: Sitting on the brink of extinction, you keep doing what you do best: take and survive. But deep down, you know. Something horrible is about to happen.

name: Shadow of the Matrix
summary: Shadow of the Matrix is an exhilarating third-person shooter set in a futuristic space environment. Engage in combat against a mysterious enemy disabling the spaceship's vital systems. Can the protagonist save the crew, or will the mission end in disaster? The fate of the voyage rests in your hands.

name: Shadows of the Deepforge
summary: An assassin weaving through ruin, striking fast and vanishing faster. The halls test your cunning, the darkness tests your nerve. Torchlight betrays, silence protects, and every shadow is both a hiding place and a threat.

name: Shredmill
summary:
In the year 30XX, your only shot at glory is on four wheels. Welcome to Shredmill, a televised bloodsport where fame-hungry technopunks skate across an endless, crumbling loop. With every lap, more of the track collapses behind you, turning the loop ahead into a perilous deathtrap.

The stakes are high, the falls are fatal, and the only rule is: skate or die.

name: Shards of Order
summary: A grim RPG with card-based combat where nothing stays dead. Lead a party of survivors through a world undone by shattered Laws. Restore them and reshape the rules of the game—but be ready to face the consequences.

name: Shadowed: The Demon Castle of Ooe
summary: With a focus on stealth, combat, and long-term planning, Shadowed offers 6 unique classes, over 200 perks, and a heavy emphasis on level and enemy design. Synergistic and brutal in both style and difficulty, Shadowed is a traditional Roguelike experience like no other.

name: Shidunzi Parkour
summary: Ever looked at a humble street bollard and thought, "I want to be that"? Now you can! Dodge and crash your way through endless streets as a sentient stone bollard in this quirky, stress-relieving arcade game.

name: Shā Diāo Zhī Lù
summary: A bizarre open-world action RPG by a Chinese independent studio, seemingly abandoned after some time in Early Access.

name: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance Randomizer
summary:
This is a randomizer for Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance.

This randomizer allows you to shuffle:

- Demons, encounters, bosses, items, and miracles
- Mix any or all options in settings

Key Features:

- Encounters are replaced with demons of the same level
- Demon levels, skills, stats, races, and alignments can be randomized
- Bosses and special fusions randomized within categories
- Unique skills can be assigned in vanilla, random, or free mode
- Items and miracles randomized while ensuring key progression items remain obtainable
- Shop, chest, enemy drops, and quest rewards randomized
- Gameplay adjustments allow more demons to be recruitable and flexible fusion combinations

Compatibility:

Incompatible with most mods due to extensive file edits

name: Shape Up Battle Run
summary: If one more minute on a treadmill means you may die of boredom and finding a running buddy is tough, take on a challenger in Shape Up Battle Run. You’ll be able to use interval-running to turn a simple fitness technique into a game. Audio cues guide you to pound the pavement on the beat in a series of easy to high-intensity runs. Challengers and friends keep you motivated in the themed STORY MODE or try short, 5 minute bursts in QUICK RACE mode. Put on your headphones and start matching the rhythm to level up your fitness.

name: Shadows of the Past
summary: This is a real time strategy game where each of your units is repeating your actions from a previous day.

name: Shinsei Project: Collapse
summary: Explore the Shinsei Project and stop the time loop that is threatening to bring the entire universe to a total standstill.

name: Shrimplation
summary: You are a packaging reduction worker in the store.

name: ShockJump
summary: Somebody, not us, screwed up. And now, the bugs are out of the containment area. A new nest has been established somewhere in the region and we're going to take it out.

name: Shattered Mythos
summary: Sally forth into the shattered remains of the world with a party of heroes at your command in real time combat. Explore the world, gain loot and levels by defeating the mythology inspired monsters to challenge the bosses and break through to the Lich's realm.

name: Shotgun Science
summary: Play as a test subject for a shotgun focused research company, while the tests keep coming the AI that overviews the testing seems to be getting aggressive.

name: Shadows of the Past
summary: Shadows of the Past is a detective horror game where the player is immersed in a dark and mysterious atmosphere.

name: Shaolin vs. Wutang Legends
summary: The continuation of the Shaolin vs Wutang series, this game is yet another indie love letter to martial arts and classic Kung Fu films. Designed for casual gaming fans, it's not aimed at hardcore fighting game players.

name: Shrek 2: The Adventure of Puss in Boots
summary: Shrek 2: The Adventure of Puss in Boots is a 2005 Java ME action-platformer developed by Distinctive Developments and published by Eurofun, where players control Puss in Boots on a quest to steal the "Happily Ever After" potion and rescue other characters like Pinocchio and the Gingerbread Man from the Fairy Godmother's clutches. The game is a mobile side-scroller with platforming and action elements, allowing players to experience an adventure through the Shrek universe on their Java-enabled phones.

name: Shapes Trader
summary:
Shapes Trader is a fun clicker game in which you click on a colorful shape and make a number go up.

Shapes Trader is a building strategy game in which you evaluate how to use your limited resources to build up your industrial might.

Shapes Trader is a game about ruthless capitalism, in which your ability to exploit and dominate a real shared-world multiplayer market will lead to your crushing victory.

Shapes Trader is all of the above.

name: Shards of the Library
summary: A simulation puzzle game where everyday life and mystery intertwine on a farm as you uncover secrets beyond the books.

name: Shapeland
summary: Addictive gameplay celebrating beauty and physics. Wacky, Quirky, Smart, Intellegent Adventure, 3D Arcade, Explore, Puzzle, Strategy, Tactics. Walk, run, dash, jump and float through this open world adventure. Learn what all the shapes do and how to maximize your score. Play fast or play chill.

name: Shopocalypse: Pro-Shopping Simulator
summary: Grab your shopping cart and stroll the aisles in this chore simulator with a twist. Become a personal shopper! Complete client orders, hunt for deals, and grow your business. Manage your budget, upgrade your HQ, and build your empire!

name: Shifting Sands
summary: Rise from the dust as a scavenger on a storm lashed desert world. Scavenge wreckage, loot forgotten ships, and craft powerful upgrades to survive longer in the shifting sands. Each day begins anew as sand storms reset the land revealing fresh dangers, treasures, and secrets to uncover.

name: Shel: The Cure
summary: SHEL: The Cure is a Replicant Diagnostics Simulator. Perform alchemy with spinal fluid, analyze brain scans, commune with otherworldly beings and prescribe treatments with the help of the Manual - an objective and unbiased* guide provided by your interstellar corporate employer.

name: Shove
summary: Send your rivals, friends, and yes, even your loved ones flying across this silly yet competitive arena! Fight for royalty, fame, and most importantly, bragging rights. With over 50 unique maps and a wide range of power-ups and obstacles, the laughter will never stop!

name: Shadow Sprinter
summary: A fast-paced 2D endless runner. Dash, jump, and outpace deadly traps in a world that gets faster the longer you survive. One mistake and it’s game over. Can you outrun the system?

name: ShatterRush
summary: ShatterRush is a multiplayer FPS where fluid parkour movement and massive mechs meet fully destructible environments to create flow-state movement combat you’ve been waiting years for!

name: Shǔshān: Chū Zhāng Mǎiduàn Bǎn
summary: First and premium (monetization) version of Shǔshān: Chū Zhāng.

name: Shǔshān: Chū Zhāng Wǎngluò Bǎn
summary: Second and MMO version of Shǔshān: Chū Zhāng.

name: Shǔshān: Chū Zhāng Zhèngshì Bǎn
summary: Third and expanded MMO version of Shǔshān: Chū Zhāng.

name: Short Short Fictions
summary: A short short mix tape of one story that connects three shorter stories. On the NewWave, a magical game console that is retro but new, enjoy DON'T SAY YES, TO:NORTH, and a secret tale nobody yet knows. Welcome to a slightly fantastical and nostalgic world of painful, toilful, and beautiful stories!

name: Sheep vs Tiger
summary: A timid sheep must outsmart fierce tigers in this turn-based puzzle game. Push crates to trap tigers and escape. Each move matters—plan wisely or face defeat! Can you survive the jungle

name: Shadow Spell Saga: The Winds of Fate
summary: A tactical RPG set in an original fantasy world. Driven by story, characters, and nostalgic strategy gameplay. 26 chapters, 40+ playable characters, and dozens of secrets to discover.

name: Shitlings
summary: Gather resources, build a camp and protect it by constructing defenses. Assign jobs to your Shitlings, take care of their needs, develop new skills and unlock new constructions. Move the camp between locations on a path to the total victory of Shitlingness over the World!

name: Shinka Tales
summary: Super Mario 64, but with masks, magic and machinery!

name: Shadow Album
summary: Shadow Album is a captivating narrative adventure game where you delve into the fragmented memories of Nira, piecing together her past through a collection of enigmatic photographs. Explore beautifully crafted environments, solve intricate puzzles, and unravel a compelling story filled with mystery and emotional depth. Experience a unique photographic memory mechanic as you reconstruct Nira's history, one photo at a time.

name: Shadow's Grove
summary: Step into the serene yet ever-shifting afterlife on a journey to reunite with your lost wolf companion. Explore surreal environments, solve thought-provoking puzzles, and navigate distorted enemies as you work through the tangled emotions of loss and moving forward.

name: Shards of the Banished
summary: Shards of the Banished is a dark fantasy action-RPG set in a cursed medieval world. A fallen king, a cursed queen, and a power-hungry usurper have plunged the land into ruin. As the exiled heir, you must rise, face powerful foes, and reclaim what is rightfully yours.

name: Shutdown.
summary:
Play as a Doll on the operating table. You have mere minutes before you're disassembled and dead... But who is that, picking away at your rivets.?

☆1000 words, 1 sprite, 1 background, 1 song, 1 sound effect, 4 endings and a single shared fate.

name: Sherlock Spot DX
summary: The Sharpest Eyes Win!

name: Sha Beast Dressage
summary: Will you escape the foul cycle of reincarnation by winning a dressage competition or will you remain a slave of an eternal god of torture?

name: Shrike
summary: Stalk the shadows in a medieval roguelike deckbuilder where stealth is your weapon. Pickpocket foes to build a deck of cunning abilities, turning their strengths against them in tactical, turn-based gameplay. Migrate across a wretched kingdom where every run writes a new, grim story of survival.

name: Shadow of the Five Moons: Code of the Ninja
summary: Unleash the silent fury of a true ninja and uncover the secrets of the Five Moons

name: Shiren the Wanderer: The Tower of Fortune and the Dice of Fate
summary:
Adventure with Shiren the Wanderer and his sidekick Koppa, the talking ferret, through a world filled with cunning monsters, deadly traps and countless treasure.
This version of Shiren the Wanderer: The Tower of Fortune and the Dice of Fate is based on the Vita “+” edition but adds three new dungeons (Bladeless Wasteland, Cloister of Certain Doom, and Garden of Destiny), a Music Collection feature, offers expanded language support, and provides a worldwide rescue system.

name: Shiren the Wanderer: The Tower of Fortune and the Dice of Fate
ShipCrafter
summary: ShipCrafter is a naval sandbox simulation game. Build you ship, unlock new components and defeat increasingly powerful foes in the campaign !

name: Shit Slam II
summary: ShitSlam2 is a sandbox shooter. You can have epic battles with your friends, create funny skits, or just hang out and chill.

name: Shepherd Knight
summary: Shepherd Knight is an adventure game where you must guide your flock of sheep, with your faithful dog by your side, through a world infested with dragons, wolves, and other dangers.

name: Ship Fight!
summary: A frenetic couch-coop 2D top down battler for 2-4 players, set in orbit around a black hole. Use orbital mechanics to curve your shots, outmaneuver your opponents, and survive.

name: Shattered Dreams: Redemption
summary: Shattered Dreams: Redemption is a choice-driven visual novel where you play as a former basketball prodigy whose dreams were shattered. The game emphasizes its immersive narrative, where you will face moral and difficult choices that will shape your story.

name: Shatterland
summary: Shatterland is a co-op zombie survival game with base-building and exploration. Loot resources, craft weapons, build with friends, and fight through a devastated world filled with the undead, hostile survivors, and military secrets.

name: Shuffles 'n Scuffles
summary: Enter a papercraft world in this single-player, deck-building, card-battling, roguelike strategy game. Use your wits to battle your way through waves of enemies, while rewriting the very definitions of the cards you hold.

name: Shadow of the Yokai
summary: Unleash carnage in 'Shadow of the Yokai'! Hack through hordes of blood-thirsty beasts in procedurally-generated levels. Utilize an assortment of weapons and abilities, leaving a trail of blood-soaked bodies in your wake. Will you slay the Daimyo, or will the Yokai's curse live on?!

name: Shattered Memories
summary: Embark on an unforgettable story-driven adventure as Hikari, a young boy caught between two worlds. Uncover the mysteries of Andogas, a land threatened by war and corrupted forces. Along your journey, you'll meet allies, face powerful enemies, and make choices that shape the fate of the world.

name: Shadow Quest
summary: Shadow Quest is a medieval-fantasy roguelite action game where you control a powerful mage, weaving spells like Fireball, Lightning Bolt, and Frost Shard to survive procedurally generated rooms and traps. Earn gold from defeated foes and upgrade skills at magical shrines before the next gauntlet.

name: Shinebringers
summary: You are the final spark of hope. Team up with your friends, wield magic, and survive a world swallowed by darkness — together.

name: Shelf by Shelf
summary: Work in a warm, cozy bookstore, sort books by genre, and brighten your shelves! Shelf by Shelf invites you into a peaceful world with satisfying organizing mechanics. Help local readers find the perfect books, make them happy, grow your earnings, and expand your shop!

name: Shalguy
summary:
Searching for a way home. It must be out there somewhere.

Based on a collection of dreams I had over the years.

name: Sheep Island
summary: Sheep Island is a bartering casual ranch game! You can grow plants, raise animals, process goods and develop your small island!

name: Shelf Life
summary: Solve your supervisor's deadly task sequence to survive, but be warned: every wrong guess makes the store a more monstrous labyrinth. Unravel the horrific code and finally clock out, or be a permanent employee.

name: Shoot Out
summary:
Survive the zombie horde invading your Hanok!

Fend off zombies that break through windows with two different guns, and overcome danger with the items dropped upon defeat.

Buy permanent health from the vending machine to survive longer against increasingly powerful zombies, and compete for rankings with your friends!

name: Shoulder-Mounted Space Program
summary: Explore the vast reaches of space inside a realistic gravity simulation with only your trusty rocket launcher by your side. Battle scores of local robotic inhabitants that want to push you out and stake your claim at the edge of the galaxy.

name: Shū Liàn Yǔ Jūn: Xiānzǐ Xiàn
summary: A vibrant, white-haired beauty, but her true identity is actually a timid, short-haired, glasses-wearing girl?! I'm still dating her! A 200% sweet college romance! Dates, hand-holding, hugs, kisses, and marriage after graduation!

name: Shìjiè Zhīwài de Yúrén Chuán
summary: This is a visual novel, in reality we create different worlds that belong only to you for various reasons, and they will gradually fade away with your memories. Please enjoy this time traveling in different worlds with the girls, and then return to where you are meant to exist - your life.

name: Shényóu Kèběn
summary: This interactive puzzle book is for all children and those who are young at heart! You'll be transported back to your childhood school desk and immerse yourself in Chinese, math, and English textbooks. Use your brain, click your mouse, solve puzzles, and have fun! The book also includes fun illustrations and stories, so come and try it out, young and old!

name: Shāpán Zhànzhēng: Sānguó
summary: "Shāpán Zhànzhēng: Sānguó" is a strategic simulation game set during the Three Kingdoms period. Here you can play as various factions from Three Kingdoms history to conquer cities and lands, unify the realm. With abundant historical officers and scenarios, come restore the Han Dynasty!

name: Shave & Stuff: Dreads
summary: Master the art of styling with the Dreadmaker tool, crafting thick, thin, or curly dreadlocks for head and beard. Shape, grow, trim, and reposition locks, then customize them with vibrant colors, adjustable lengths, and over 15 unique rings and beads!

name: Sheltered From the Storm
summary: A calm, atmospheric experience where you rest in shelters—cars, camps, houses, and an underground banker—while rain falls and danger lingers outside. No combat, no survival meters—just immersive weather, ambient soundscapes, and quiet reflection.

name: Showdown! Mahjong Tutorial Included
