summary: A Mahjong roguelike deckbuilder where you create powerful synergies between Mahjong hands and performance-based sponsorships to execute combos that make numbers go up. The game also features a step-by-step tutorial to help you learn how to play Mahjong.

name: Shrouded Siege
summary: A maze-building, roguelike, tower defense designed from the ground up to be a great solo or co-op experience. Each Irish mythology-inspired campaign is unique, with unending combinations of upgrades to combine, and each battle is filled with unique and randomized tactical challenges to overcome.

name: Shadow of Winter
summary: A narrative-driven survival horror set in the frozen wilderness of 1985. Descend into an abandoned Soviet bunker, uncover its dark secrets, and fight to survive the terrors lurking within.

name: Shadow Monarchs Rise
summary: Shadow Monarch’s Rise is a 2D action RPG with fast, skill-based combat, quests, hidden treasures, epic bosses, and character progression. Future updates will include cloud saves and accessibility features.

name: Shadows of Thornkeep
summary: A dark fantasy, grid-based dungeon crawler where every step hides peril. Loot, adapt, and survive in turn-based battles as you lead lost souls through cursed halls in this rogue-lite descent into madness.

name: Shadowbound
summary: Shadowbound is a minimalist 3D journey where light becomes your enemy and shadow your only ally. Each level offers a short and direct challenge: jump, solve puzzles, move forward, and seek refuge in darkness to continue your path and leave behind what haunts you.

name: Shadow Hunt
summary: 1v4 Asymmetric fight between Shadow and humans. Shadow is a melee, 3rd person, stealth character hunting and being hunted by 1st person humans with ranged weapons.

name: Shadows in the Silence
summary: Shadows in the Silence is a short first-person psychological horror game with jumpscare mechanics. You will have to explore an abandoned mansion and investigate the horrors committed by a cult devoted to Astaroth,there are scenes of violence and explicit images, the use of headphones is recommended.

name: Shadow Mansion 2
summary: A terrifying secret buried in your family’s shadow awaits... Decaying walls, whisper-filled dark rooms — are you ready to confront the curse of the past? A short, gripping, and immersive horror experience is calling you.

name: Shifting Chambers
summary: Shifting Chambers is a first-person horror exploration puzzle game set inside a manor where the room layout shifts when the bell rings. You must explore a constantly changing layout, solve cryptic puzzles, and avoid the enigmatic guardians who brought you here — and won’t let you leave.

name: Shitamichi Chinsou Club
summary:
Race through two courses inspired by real-world locations.
Master the unique handling characteristics of each of the four cars, and push for the fastest time on twisting, winding roads!
Compete against other players’ records and climb the local leaderboard.

name: Shellstorm: The Great War
summary: SHELLSTORM unleashes satisfying tactical combat that redefines the RTS genre with destructible terrains, physics-driven interactions, and complex AI. Command infantry, artillery, tanks, and aircraft to overcome impossible odds on difficult missions, or play PvP battles and climb the leaderboards.

name: Shika-Q
summary: SHIKA-Q is an online, real-time puzzle battle on a 10×10 board, where players link blocks to attack and defend. Original vocal tracks drive the action, creating an immersive experience that makes music a core part of gameplay.

name: Shirou Day Online
summary: Fangame of the Fate/stay night licence to celebrate the Shirou Day. This is an online multiplayer game where everyone plays as Shirou. You explore the city, find its secrets and unlock achievements.

name: Sherok's Case: Recollection
summary: "Scientific evidence, eyewitness testimony, and objective facts—when these align, the truth emerges. As my grandfather Holmes used to say: Whatever remains, however improbable, must be the truth."

name: Sherpa's Caravan
summary: Explore a cozy open world as a sherpa driver in your van! Deliver cargo, cook food, craft gear, and explore mountains, lakes, and hidden trails. Sail in boats and kayaks, dive underwater. Meet old friends and upgrade your van! A camping atmosphere and next-gen graphics.

name: Shitty Game
summary: Armed with a weaponized plunger and a bathroom full of mutant turds, it’s your job to shoot, flush, and survive the chaos. Add SHITTY GAME to your wishlist — before the stink spreads.

name: Shan Hai: Mythic Origins
summary: SHANHAI: Myth Origins is a MOBA-style action roguelike inspired by the Shanhaijing. Enter a mythic realm, forge divine weapons, wield the Five Elements, collect artifacts, bind spirits and capture beasts. Play solo or in up to 4-player co-op.

name: Shinobi: Art of Vengeance - Sega Villains Stage
Shopping Nightmares
summary: Shopping Nightmares is a top-down survival horror game. Step into the shoes of an unknown investigator as he is trapped in a dimension known as "The Negative". Fend off enemies, manage your limited resources and discover the secrets of The Negative and its parasite.

name: Shrouded Depths
summary: Stranded in the fog of the murky waters on an isolated ferry with nothing but your harpoon gun, you feel the overwhelming presence of something within the misty mangrove. Your vessel is stopped dead and it is up to you with the assistance of the Captain to get the boat back up and running again.

name: Shutter Evidence
summary: Shutter Evidence is an action-packed experience where you explore active crime scenes by flying a drone, photographing evidence to uncover secrets.

name: She's Still Alive
summary: Hare tries to keep his sick wife, Bunny, alive. Wake Up.

name: Shadow City Mysteries: Case Files - Rise of the Rat King
summary: Shadow City Mysteries: Case Files – Rise of the Rat King is a narrative game set in Shadow City’s underbelly. Assume the role of the Rat King, an underworld mastermind fighting for absolute power. Shape your legend by forging alliances, crushing rivals, and leaving a trail of consequences.

name: Ship v Maze
summary: Navigate a never-ending sequence of mazes and survive as long as possible. The Maze always wins.

name: Showdown Next Week!
summary: Showdown Next Week! is a choice-based adventure puzzle game where you must find a way to protect your village from the Demon King within seven days. For one week, wander around the small village—chatting, persuading, trading, and discovering—to explore different ways to defend it!

name: Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond - Skybound Dragons
summary:
In Skybound Dragons, Shadowverse: Worlds Beyond's fourth card set, diversify your tactics with 76 new cards, 8 different exchange tickets, and 2 additional fully animated cards.

Meet new allies from Cygames' Granblue Fantasy and employ their Skybound Art and Super Skybound Art abilities, which can be activated after a certain number of turns, or sooner if you evolve followers. Furthermore, Sandalphon, Primarch Successor joins the fray with a unique Invoke ability, which will summon him directly from your deck once its conditions are met.

Hesitate not, Skyfarer, even in the face of overwhelming malice.
We, the Wedges—the Six Dragons—shall preserve the balance of this realm.
"Fear not these vast skies."

name: Shadereap
summary: An ordinary farmer loses his family when monstrous creatures overrun the world. Now he must fight, solve puzzles, and search for a way to save his daughter.

name: Shankala
summary: This is a pixel-style simulation and adventure game. The game is set in a village called 'Shankala,' where you will meet various people, live together with them in the village, and learn farming and cooking.

name: Shrine Raider
summary: Help Regina recover an important relic that was stolen from her shrine, while saving her sister and stopping a secret organization from creating the ultimate weapon in this unique danmaku adventure!

name: Shadow Mantis
summary: A modern revival of classic top-down 2D stealth-action. Infiltrate a covert military base, procure weapons and equipment on-site, evade detection, and destroy the weapon known as SHADOW MANTIS.

name: Shrot
summary: Welcome to Shrot! A fast, funny, and unapologetically stupid first-person boomer shooter where a Slavic trucker gets stuck in an alien apocalypse and handles it the only way he knows how: with beer, cigarettes, and unresolved anger issues.

name: Shop it Up!
summary: It's the grand opening of the new mall, and the customers are already inside, but the mall isn't ready yet! Your skills are needed to open and decorate new shops. Boost profits with dazzling inventory displays and fancy advertisements. Once the mall gets busy, hire assistants and cashiers to help with all the customers. As the new boss, you'll need to take advice and meet challenges from the local business leaders. Fun is in the bag when you play Shop it Up!

name: Shogi
summary: Master the art of Shogi! Dive into Japan's classic strategy board game.

name: Shoot Up Basketball Pro
summary: Climb to impossible heights using skill, precision, and a basketball. Prove you’re still the GOAT in this punishing platformer where one mistake can send you falling back to the bottom.

name: Ship Explorer: Bismarck
summary: Step aboard the German battleship Bismarck - history's most legendary warship. Explore the ship to learn about how she worked and bring her guns to life once more!

name: Shadow Rift: Feral Strike
summary: From infiltration to urban defence! Eliminate the terrorist organisation! Extreme FPS action with overwhelming combat! Face endless threats with diverse weapons!

name: Shadows Of Lir'Ah
summary: A battle ensues and the fauna of the depths has awaken. Those who seek fortune, those who seek power gathered. You find yourself amidst it all, with no memory on how you reached the Island in the first place. What will you do?

name: Shardpunk 2
summary: The Empire may have fallen, but humanity continues the fight. Shardpunk 2 puts you in command of a human outpost in this potent mix of turn-based tactical strategy, RPG, survival and resource management as you gather your team, scavenge for resources and prepare for a new, evolving threat.

name: Ship Shape Slam!!!
summary:
Out-dodge, out-dash, and outlast your friends in chaotic 1–4 player bullet hell arenas. Side effects may include shouting, betrayal, and broken couches.

Enter arenas with up to 4 players where you can only move and dash. Bullets fly in from every direction with wild properties, forcing you to dodge, weave, and time your dash just right. Dashing isn’t just for escaping—it builds temporary invincibility and can even send friends flying. Land a charged dash to earn a full second of invulnerability against all bullets!

name: Shoe Salesman Mania
summary: Sell shoes. Keep smiling. Try not to cry in the stockroom.

name: Ship Happens
summary: Ship Happens is an

name: Shroomwood
summary: Top-down bullet hell with challenging roguelike progression. Unlock and upgrade your town as you fight through procedural levels.

name: Shaman Steps
summary: A short Sokoban-like puzzle game where you guide your tribe to collect food.

name: Sharkbaked
summary: Sharkbaked — you play as a friendly Shark. If your friends get hungry, your task is to cook for them. Find ingredients, mix them, and create. It's simple. But your friends will "help" you to cook the dishes as quickly as possible.

name: Shy Cats Hidden Tracks Collection
summary: A musical hidden object game where you search the streets of 9 CITIES for singing kittens from a choir and money bags to hire and assemble a cat band. As orchestra conductor, you'll be able to configure the musicians as you wish, creating your own music and choir melodies. Find them all!

name: Shadow of The Forerunner
summary: Shadow of The Forerunner is a card-based roguelike game with RPG elements set in a dark cyberpunk world. The game features a unique system of aspects and flaws, diverse equipment options, and prosthetics that influence the composition of your deck.

name: Shadow Hills Manor
summary: Shadow Hills Manor is a first-person psychological horror experience focused on exploration, puzzle-solving, and looting. Break into the manor left behind by greed and decay. Search for valuables, but the more you take, the angrier the manor becomes. Your choice of greed shapes how the manor reacts.

name: Shiro Enkai
summary: Shiro Enkai is a high-intensity top-down action experience where you become Mr. Katanas — a cyberpunk-era dark samurai. His world blends ancient Japanese aesthetics with the neon glow of the future. Face five distinct monster types, each demanding a unique combat approach.

name: Shield of Breaker
summary: Shield of Breaker is a single-player Action-RPG set in a fantasy world. Protect your castle from endless waves of enemies and turn the tide of battle by deflecting their own blazing fireballs. Choose your hero, upgrade your powers,. Each victory unlocks your path to defend new lands in your realm.

name: ShapeShift Rush
summary:
Get ready for a fast-paced test of reflexes and precision!
In ShapeShift Rush, your goal is simple — match your shape with the obstacles ahead. Switch, slide, and adapt as the speed intensifies. Hit the obstacle that matches your form to survive, but collide with the wrong shape… and it’s game over!

Stay focused, react fast, and see how far you can go in this thrilling geometric challenge!

name: Shrouded Suns
summary: In the midst of a seemingly hopeless war among the stars, take control of highly customizable spacefighters to experience classic space combat action throughout a story-driven campaign.

name: Shores of Vaelithar
summary: Cast forsaken upon the Shores of Vaeilthar, a hapless villager in a haunting world torn asunder. Learn the veil-borne arts, hunt demi-gods with blade and magic, and rise a legend in this classic sword and sorcery come to life.

name: Shuffle! Episode 2: Kami ni mo Akuma ni mo Nerawareteiru Otoko
Showy Homes
summary: Wordle with a twist

name: Sheol no Mori: Tasogare no Majuuzukai
Shibuya Sushi Master
summary: Cyberpunk sushi master adventure

name: Shattered Wilds
summary: The world has been broken. Fractured into small realms which once housed great civilizations but now shelter only ruins. These pocket dimensions are unforgiving, but with the power of the world forge you can traverse them. With enough power, perhaps you can use this gift to find a new home.

name: Shooty Seas
summary: Shooty Seas is an open world Pirate Exploration game where you take on the role of a pirate and plunder the seas picking fights and looking for treasure.

name: Shadows Show
summary: Are you ready to face the mysteries of the past? The player will explore the gloomy environment of the hospital, encountering creepy phenomena and supernatural creatures. Uncover the story of the disappearance of all the inhabitants of the "Red Forest" sanatorium.

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Digital Devil Saga - Deluxe Box Set
summary: Collector's Box for Digital Devil Saga and Digital Devil Saga 2. Includes official soundtrack CD featuring 30+ tracks from the game and a full color 40 page manual.

name: Show Guts
summary: Show Guts is a chaotic climbing game where you control a stretchy piece of omochi — yes, that soft Japanese rice cake — with grappling and an unreasonable dream: reach the heavens before losing your guts.

name: Shotgun Rogue
summary: Shotgun Rogue is a fast-paced roguelite where you defend your home from waves of enemies. Upgrade weapons, build turrets and traps, and unlock passive abilities each round. Create powerful combos, fortify your base, and survive as long as you can.

name: Sheep Way
summary: Sheep Way - a cooperative adventure for 1-4 players, guiding stubborn sheep through the chaos of nature. Care for your flock, avoid wild animals, use tools, and work together. Wool, chaos, and friendship - all as unpredictable as a hunchbacked mountain!

name: Shaolin Mystery: Tale of the Jade Dragon Staff
Sheriff Looper
summary:
Sheriff Looper is a short horror-themed action adventure game with looping mechanics (similar to games like Pokémon Ranger).
The game takes about 30 minutes to complete in one sitting.

name: She Tells Her Story
summary:
She Tells Her Story is an indie, narrative-driven visual novel that explores mental health through a deeply personal and emotionally honest story. The game follows a young protagonist navigating her teenage years while dealing with bullying, burnout, depression, trauma, and fear of failure — alongside moments of friendship, love, growth, and healing.
This is not a “high-action” game. It’s a story-first experience designed to resonate emotionally and spark reflection, discussion, and connection.

name: Shoyu Ramen Forever
summary: Overworked office worker Tsutomu, his ramen blog dying, stops at a station-side stall and orders six toppings. A kids' rumor says six makes you vanish. His heart sinks into history's dark.

name: ShapeCycle
summary: ShapeCycle is a peaceful open-world adventure built on recycling. Collect resources, solve shape-based puzzles, and restore balance to the world. Every copy also includes ShapeRecipe, a free expansion that lets you craft 3D shapes from 2D forms, blending creativity with critical thinking.

name: Shuwa Shuwa Guin!
summary: Shuwa Shuwa Guin is a time management game set in a charming world of penguins, where you must wash, dry, and iron clothes to keep your grandfather's laundry business open! Use the money you earn to buy items that will make your job easier!

name: Shadowpiercer
summary: Dive into the dark and magical world of Shadowpiercer. Aboard a mystical train, you’ll travel through ravaged lands in search of survivors, gather resources, and upgrade your gear to stay alive.

name: Sheep in Dreams
summary: One day, mysterious sheep began to appear in Hitsuji-chan's house! And strange things happen around everyone in the city... When you dream, you can enter the dream dungeon. Let's capture the dream dungeon and solve the mysterious phenomenon!

name: Shadow of the Moonlight
summary: A dark fantasy visual novel set in a medieval world. You are the privileged son of a wealthy family, seeking revenge, even if it means becoming an outlaw. Will you dare to face your weakness and strength? How far will you go to find your true enemy? Uncover your roots' secrets. Survive… if you can.

name: Shinshou Sange: Chiru Hana
summary:
A place that is here and not here.

Once the water surface looks blue, there's no going back.

An older sister who can see the future and a girl called the Grim Reaper.

Is what we see really the truth?

Or is what we cannot see the truth?

Produced by our circle,

Scattering flowers ~Chiruhana~

Reconstructing the second chapter of Renge ~Renka~Sange,

This work includes a final chapter.

name: Shmandala
summary: Shmandala is a delirious arcade-style shoot'em up choreographed to a banging soundtrack!

name: Shino's Insatiable Pursuit of Knowledge
summary: In this wacky story-driven adventure, you'll join Shino as she tries to fund her lab, catch the thief who stole all of their money, and... infiltrate a shady cult!? She'll make it through thanks to the power of invention! Probably! Explore a variety of locales to uncover special keywords known as Concepts and Processes, then combine them to unlock new maps, abilities, tools, and even quality-of-life features in this adventure RPG!

name: Shapeless
summary: A short action game set in a medieval castle with NPCs and enemies appearing in the form of different shapes. You must escape imprisonment and find a way out of the castle.

name: Shape Swarm
summary:
Shape Swarm is a top-down action arcade game where players survive increasingly dense waves of geometric enemies in fast, session-based matches. Players automatically attack while maneuvering through enemy patterns, collecting upgrades that modify weapon behavior, movement, and survivability.
The game features short, score-driven runs, escalating difficulty, and a variety of enemy shapes with distinct movement and attack patterns. Progression is contained within individual sessions, emphasizing positioning, build choices, and moment-to-moment decision-making.

name: Shells MMCCCXXXIV
summary: Occult push-your-luck card game where you face a five-turn demonic cube. Gamble by stabbing the pyramid, build your deck with arcane cards, and fight to reach the gate beyond.

name: She Was 98
summary: “SHE WAS 98” - you play as a grandson who returns to his elderly grandmother's home to care for her.....

name: Shadow Runner
summary: Maybe the first FPS where enemies are invisible—their shadows are all you can see. Follow the light, control the light, and even create the light. Survive with only one gun, fireflies, and fireworks. A minimalist system, but a rich experience. An FPS poem about light, shadow, and memory.

name: Shawarma Wars
summary: A 2-4 player co-op party game where each of you runs a shawarma van for a festival crowd. Cook fast, upgrade your stuff, throw poop (or grenades at least) into your competitors and then feed them with bullet rain!

name: Shadow of Paris
summary: Paris's life changes when she encounters a charming stranger who seems to be watching her. This choice-driven psychological visual novel delivers a tense, intimate story focused on curiosity, trust, and crossing dangerous boundaries.

name: Shorekeeper
summary: Shorekeeper is a cozy survival game which blends deep crafting and management mechanics with a relaxing atmosphere. Explore a vast island, chart your own path through the unknown, and cultivate a life of peace, crafting, and discovery.

name: Shin SD Sengokuden: Chijou Saikyou-hen - Ryuuko Daigekitotsu!
Shake Cubes
summary: Shake and rotate your console to guide cubes into portals while navigating challenging obstacles! 30 ready-to-play levels offer hours of fun and challenging gameplay!

name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner - Raidou Kuzunoha vs. the Fiefdom of Death
summary:
Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Summoner: Raidou Kuzunoha vs. the Fiefdom of Death is a free fanmade game.

As a result of a ritual of delayed demise, Raidou Kuzunoha XIV finds himself in the body of his descendant against his will. Raidou must complete the investigation into the missing boy Koichi and return to his own time. A gruesome dark story inspired by traditional Japanese folklore.

name: Shin Fangame Tensei
summary:
build a team of demons and summon the right party to defeat your enemies

each demon has an unique set of skills that determine their behavior in battle, so carefully consider their positioning as to not waste their talents, or worse.....

if your team sucks you can fuse your demons to make stronger ones, but even weak demons will shine with proper tactics

enemies grow stronger as the FULL MOON approaches, and something awaits beyond that.....

name: Shinobi
summary: A social stealth party game for 2-4 players. Blend in with AI ninjas, find the real threats, and strike before they strike you.

name: Shadows of Delusion
summary: A first-person survival horror game inspired by the classics. Fight to survive against grotesque horrors and disturbing delusions. Manage your resources carefully in order to survive this retro style psychological nightmare.

name: Shmoblins
summary: A co-op survival game about a tribe of mischievous creatures. Hunt for food, gather resources, upgrade your camp together with your friends... and kick everything and everyone, a lot!

name: Shattered Paradise
summary: Shattered Paradise is a turn-based roguelike RPG focused on tactical combat and long-term character development. Choose from multiple races and classes, explore procedurally generated areas as you try to survive the descent. Prepare to challenge God... and live with everything that follows.

name: Shadow Rush
summary: Slay hordes of Shadow Demons in this fast-paced Action RPG with roguelike elements. Spells are collectable, equip-able 'Shards' which trigger upon your attacks. Shards can be swapped around easily to experiment with re-rolling a variety of different builds. Can you beat the speed of darkness?
